33b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab par hUM zhes bya ba byas nas spyod do/ /bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag
33b4(rgyud): brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med
33b5(rgyud): thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so/ snang ba la dbang
33b6(rgyud): du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur
33b7(rgyud): ba yang stsol to/ /nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso bo'i phye mas sbyin sreg byas pas so/ /char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlas pas so/ /char gcad pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pas so/ /
34a1(rgyud): @#/ /ser ba gcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid kyis so/ /sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas pas so/ /
34a2(rgyud): bsal bal ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan brgyar bzlas so/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang / bdug pas mchod de/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo
34a3(rgyud): rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de thogs nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du sgyu ma'i las rnams ston te/ rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang / me
34a4(rgyud): tog mthong ngo / /nam mkha' la me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na chags so/ /cha lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i
34a5(rgyud): phyag rgyas so/ /gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so/ /smra bar bya ba na hUM zhes pas so/ /rgyug par bya na rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /smin ma 'gul bar bya na rdo rje'i
34a6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtshams su bsgul bas so/ /sa g.yo bar bya na rkang pa g.yon pa brdabs pas so/ /khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i
34a7(rgyud): phyag rgyas so/ /khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo btang gi phyag rgya bcings pas so/ /sprin med par char pa dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pas so/ /skad cig tu sprin 'du
34b1(rgyud): zhing ston pa ni rdo rje bskor bas so/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni rdo rje brdabs pas so/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba mang por bstan na/ rdo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so/ /dmag
34b2(rgyud): rnam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bas so/ /mtshan mo nyin par du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so/ /nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig btsums la rdo rje bskor bas so/ /thams cad nas
34b3(rgyud): rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so/ /thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te rdo rjes bskor bas so/ /phyag na rdo rje thams cad ba la bstan na
34b4(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so/ /thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzlas pas so/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po
34b5(rgyud): las/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
34b6(rgyud): rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so/ /ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir
34b7(rgyud): brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di sbyin no/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog por 'dug
35a1(rgyud): @#/ /ste mnos pa/ hUM badzra bid swAhA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /sems
35a2(rgyud): can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing dbang du gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
35a3(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbus su nas phul bzhi la
35a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang tsog tsog por bzhag go/ de nas de bzhin du gzhug go/ zhugs nas 'di skad du/ khyod deng nas
35a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do/ /de ste dad na de bshad do zhes bsgos shig /des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces pa dang / de nas khyod deng phan cad de bzhin gshegs
35a6(rgyud): par gyur to zhes smros shig / des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes des smros shig /gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs
35a7(rgyud): pa nyid du blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam/ pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas/ phyag rgya slongs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
35b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la/ rdo rje'i
35b2(rgyud): sgrub pa bsgrub bo/ /lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje bzung nas rang gi phyag rgya bsgom so/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ snying bsgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs
35b3(rgyud): pa yang tshe di'am gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig /dad brtan phyag na rdo rje la/ /de
35b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no/ /sems can thams cad mgu ba ru/ /khyod kyi de ltar brtag par bya/ /deng nas khyod kyi de ltar ma byas na/ /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar
35b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la slob ma bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo/ /lus thams cad kyis gtugs te/ de
35b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad ni bshags so/ /de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ pus
35b7(rgyud): mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas/ bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings
36a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas phyag 'atsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi badzra bid brjod cig /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje
36a2(rgyud): la phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti dang / mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo
36a3(rgyud): rje'i rig pa bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i g.yas su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po/ /g.yon du
36a4(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /de nas gso sbyong can du dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon la/ stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ /
36a5(rgyud): de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to/ /
36a6(rgyud): mchog ci 'dod pa stsol te/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to/ /de nas yang cho ga bzhin te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs
36a7(rgyud): par byas la/ /de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/ tsog tsog por 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo
36b1(rgyud): rje ya gcig gis rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na pad+ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur te/ khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams par byas la/ de nas tshes gcig nas
36b2(rgyud): brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas/ mchog ci 'dod pa stsol to/ /yang cho ga gzhan ni
36b3(rgyud): ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas pas 'jug la nyin mtshan gsum du smyung bar bya ste/ phyag na rdo rje byon nas
36b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo / /nam mkha'
36b5(rgyud): la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo / /des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to/ /sangs
36b6(rgyud): rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol to/ /'phags pa spyan
36b7(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lag nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo / /'jig /
37a1(rgyud): @#/ /rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
37a2(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba
37a3(rgyud): r tog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba yang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can gzhan lta
37a4(rgyud): ci smos/ gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par
37a5(rgyud): 'byang bar 'gyur pa dang / thams cad la srung par 'gyur pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur pa dang / mchog stsol pa dang / don thams
37a6(rgyud): cad sgrub pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur pa dang / gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar
37a7(rgyud): stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje/ khyod
37b1(rgyud): kyis legs par smros shig / ngas kyang bzung ngo / /de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi snying gar bstong pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang gi snying
37b2(rgyud): po 'di gsungs so/ /Tik+ka hUM dza/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu
37b3(rgyud): g.yos so/ /'phar rab tu 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par gyur to/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung par gyur to/ /byang chub
37b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sa'i snying por gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa yang sra bar gyur
37b5(rgyud): to/ /bdud dang / mi bgrungs pa'i phyogs thams cad kyang brlag par byas so/ /gdon thams cad bcos bsad bcom ste/ 'dar bad pad nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong
37b6(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal ba/ phyag na rdo rje 'di
37b7(rgyud): nyid la skyabs su dengs shig dang / 'di nyid khyed la skyob par byed do/ /phyag na rdo rje'i snying gnas kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba
38a1(rgyud): @#/ /la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'dzum zhing khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa
38a2(rgyud): b com ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs na phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka'
38a3(rgyud): nod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
38a4(rgyud): kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang / bcos pa dang / bcom pa
38a5(rgyud): kun 'tsho bar 'gyur pa dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de smros shig /oM TuM rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis/ bdag nyid go bgos na rdo rje'i lus
38a6(rgyud): dang / rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor
38a7(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che/ /gru bzhi ba de sgo bzhi ba'o/ /rta babs bzhi dang
38b1(rgyud): bcas pa ste/ /bcu drug cha dang ldan par ro/ /rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes pa ste/ grwa dang sngo yi zur dag dang / /de bzhin rta babs mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya/ /ba dan
38b2(rgyud): phreng ba dril bus brgyan/ /dang po'i phyi yi dkyil 'khor 'di/ /snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang / /rdo rje sred bu mnyam ldan pa'o/ /rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad
38b3(rgyud): ldan zhing / /rdo rje'i ka ba mdun gnas su/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o/ /de yi dbus su sems dpa' che/ /phyag na rdo rje gzhug
38b4(rgyud): par bya/ /sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad dag /dbu rgyan du ni brgyan thogs pa/ /cung zad tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal/ /rdo rje snyems par mdzad pa ste/ /me tog mda' gzhu
38b5(rgyud): 'chang ba po/ /de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid de/ /khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can/ /gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gengs shing / /gnyis
38b6(rgyud): kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o/ /rdo rje can gyis g.yas phyogs su/ /rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya/ /snying gar rdo rje brtan 'dzin cing / /'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bas so/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rgyab
38b7(rgyud): tu ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste/ /sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te/ /rin chen char ba rab tu 'bebs/ /rdo rje can gyi g.yon bris pa/ /rdo rje snyems pa dmar po ste/
39a1(rgyud): @#/ /gnyis kyis rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin/ /sgeg pas mchod cing 'dud pa 'o/ /dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas rnams su/ mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya/ /dpyid kyi rdo rje
39a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i sprin/ /ston ka'i rdo rje kha ba mo/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa dag tu/ /'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bri/ /sgo yi dpung rnams thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs/ /
39a3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di skad du smros shig /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing / /sems can
39a4(rgyud): kun la bde ba stsol/ /sems can kun gyi phar gyur pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag deng 'grub/ /Ta k+ki hUM dzaH/ de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar
39a5(rgyud): babs pa tsam gyis phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ la la ni 'tshang
39a6(rgyud): rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ des phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la/ /ras dmar pos mig gnyis
39a7(rgyud): bkab ste bcug nas 'di skad ces smros shig / khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mi mkhas pa su la yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig /'byung po'i
39b1(rgyud): gdon dang / phra man ma la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo nas gdong khrol cig /de nas 'di skad ces smros
39b2(rgyud): shig / gang dbus na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /
39b3(rgyud): gang mdun na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod pa'i khro bo'o/ /gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje dga' ba
39b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o/ /gang rgya ba na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang / nor
39b5(rgyud): sbyin pa'o/ /gang g.yon phyogs na ba 'di ni bdag nyid che ba'i bdud de/ sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o/ /gang grwa'i bzhi po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod
39b6(rgyud): pa/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri'i lha'o/ /gang phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no/ /gang sgo srung de dag ni
39b7(rgyud): mig dang / 'dod chags pa dang / mdza' ba ste/ kyo btang dang / zhags pa dang / sgrog dang / 'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan
40a1(rgyud): @#/ /'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smod par ma byed cig /gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
40a2(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa
40a3(rgyud): rnams ni sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed de/ 'dod
40a4(rgyud): chags ni byang chub tu bstan pa'o zhes so/ /de nas snying po byin cig /Ta k+ki hUM dzaH/ 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
40a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste/ Ta k+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o/ /hUM zhes pa ni khro
40a6(rgyud): bo'o/ /de nyid dgug pa'i phyir dzaHzhes bya ba ni/ 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slobs shig /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom
40a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa gnyis su rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra d+hA ra badzra pra taM d+hA ra ya sid d+h+ya Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ de nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje
40b1(rgyud): la phul bas de'i mgo la bskon no/ /de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang sbyin pa snying po 'dis so/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba kA rme shwa red twa i daM badzra nA nA ma a d+hi Sh+Thi te dri D+ho s+ya b+ha ba/ oM Tak+ki hUM
40b2(rgyud): dzaH/ de nas der 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje tshig gis brgyad stong ba zlas na de nas sa g.yo ste/ grub pa thams cad lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub bo/ /de nas dam
40b3(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la brgya bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed
40b4(rgyud): do/ /thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi brtan par chags so/ /snying thams cad las tshig thos par 'gyur ro/ /gyur ba dang / 'gyur ba dang / de ltar gyi
40b5(rgyud): tshig bden par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi snying las kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi mthong zhing gzhan la yang ston to/ /de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des na sems can
40b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mi gcod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i lus su 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /de nas gsang
40b7(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa bya ste/ rdo rje'i thugs bstod pa'i glus bstod do/ /de phyin can grub thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad dang / gsang pa'i mchod pa thams
41a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad kyis 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyed pa'i zas dang / ro dang / spyad pa thams cad kyis tshim
41a2(rgyud): par byas nas 'byung ngo / /rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba
41a3(rgyud): bzhin bris te zhugs nas mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stongs par byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ bcom ldan
41a4(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum bzlas so/ /de nas rdo rje de lci bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slar yang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de ltar mchan gcig thal byung
41a5(rgyud): du bzlas na nang bar rdo rje 'dzin tam/ /rdo rje khro bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rgyan dang /
41a6(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi ba rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de
41a7(rgyud): nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad pus thig btab te/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du
41b1(rgyud): bzhag nas 'di skad smros shig / ho badzra satwa su ra ta s+t+waM/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra ash+t+ro hUM/ g.yas su rdo rje dga' mgu
41b2(rgyud): 'khyud par bya'o/ /de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra ki li hUM/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba byams ma'i rdo rje bri/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra a gri ho/ g.yon du rdo rje snyems
41b3(rgyud): ma bris te/ rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ /de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /badzra gar+b+he ha ni/ de nas grwa dang / sgor yang rang gi lha mo bri/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chas la rdo rje lag
41b4(rgyud): tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa/ dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de zhugs la 'di skad brjod do/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ su ra ta ho Tak+ki hUM
41b5(rgyud): dzaH/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa dang / dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa yang stsol to/ /de nas slob ma yang
41b6(rgyud): de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje de nyid kyis btsud nas 'di zhes smros shig / khyod kyi dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' shig /mi bde ba ma spangs par myur du shi zhing du 'bod chen
41b7(rgyud): por skye bar 'gyur ta te/ de nas dam tshig brjod de/ bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni/ /'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung / /de bas khyod kyis sdig med pa'i/ /'dod dang
42a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsam pa ma btang shig/ /'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /oM Tak+ki hUM phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blud do/ /gang ngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir
42a2(rgyud): yang mnas bsgag ste/ de dag la yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas blud do/ /gang gis 'di las 'das na/ zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gas so zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
42a3(rgyud): dam tshig chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab po/ /de nas de bzhin du 'byung ngo / /shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /
42a4(rgyud): de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku'am/ mtshan ma gzhag go /der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o/ /de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa
42a5(rgyud): thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis
42a6(rgyud): brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya
42a7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bcings la bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thang cig bzlas te/ hUM zhes pas bsdigs na de bzhin gshegs pa yang 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ /de
42b1(rgyud): phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i las 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang / khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul bar
42b2(rgyud): 'dod na rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying gar bcings la phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de
42b3(rgyud): srid du bzlas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa sbyin/ tshul khrims bsrung / bzod pa
42b4(rgyud): bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug /shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ ci 'dod ci nus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i
42b5(rgyud): sku'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mthong gi bar du bya'o/ /de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/ /las kyi
42b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / //de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang / /slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la/ /mi
42b7(rgyud): zad snying po 'di mi sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phyag brgya bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ras la bris te/ ras
43a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri/ de'i g.yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi ba'i thugs ka nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/
43a2(rgyud): g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi ba ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/ kha dog dmar po bri/ /spyan sngar
43a3(rgyud): de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o/ /steng du nam mkha'i snying bo bri/ grwar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas 'gram pa dang mgo bor ro/ /de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla
43a4(rgyud): ba bzhin dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na de nas zla ba tshang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul
43a5(rgyud): du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po dang / lha mo yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/
43a6(rgyud): de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang bar rdo rje 'dzin 'thob po/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag
43a7(rgyud): na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa ni mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang / mtshan mo yang thal
43b1(rgyud): byung du bzlas na nang bar phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /
43b2(rgyud): ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du las
43b3(rgyud): thams cad byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyed zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de la
43b4(rgyud): sbyin no/ /des kyang longs spyod par nus na lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos/ brgya byin yang stsol to/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur
43b5(rgyud): ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed do/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas
43b6(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro/ /de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag gis
43b7(rgyud): grub par 'tshal gyi/ 'di ci 'tshal zhes smros shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te/ ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub po/ /
44a1(rgyud): @#/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i snying bo'i spyan
44a2(rgyud): sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/ /rdo rje bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams
44a3(rgyud): cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum
44a4(rgyud): bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung btsam
44a5(rgyud): gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo thogs te/ 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /kyo btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ kyo btang des thams
44a6(rgyud): cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro/ /zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rjes bcings pa bsdams
44a7(rgyud): te/ 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbang pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dbang
44b1(rgyud): nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na hUM zhes bya ba gcig gi gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis ltung bar byed nus par
44b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis der 'ongs te
44b3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/ 'khor lo de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas
44b4(rgyud): na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor bas tshar bcad pa dang / dbab pa dang / thang cig
44b5(rgyud): gis ni gnam lcags dang / ser ba 'bebs so/ /sa nad gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang byed
44b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te/ des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas
44b7(rgyud): te stong phrag brgya bzlas na zla ba gnyis su mthong ste/ de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems
45a1(rgyud): @#/ /can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /gza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thob ste/ pe con des ni 'thabs
45a2(rgyud): na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob po/ /skya sleng gi gnas su song ste/ 'bum bzlas na skya sleng las kun byed do/ /rgyun gyis myos pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na chang
45a3(rgyud): gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /ma d+hU ka ra la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba la bltas te
45a4(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thob pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /
45a5(rgyud): mdzod skyong rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na bza' ba dang / btung ba mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di la zad par mi nus so/ /rlung
45a6(rgyud): mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na rlung gis de dang mthun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /me la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i dbus su 'dug
45a7(rgyud): ba dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro na yang mi 'tshig ste me'i gzir gyur cing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sbyin no/ /ngal gsos po mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin thams
45b1(rgyud): cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no/ /gshin rje mnan te
45b2(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /gnam 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de las thams cad pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /klu ba ru Na mnan te
45b3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /mi'i gnas su song nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na mi thams cad g.yog byed cing don thams cad byed
45b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad
45b5(rgyud): bsgyel ba dang / dbang byed par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang
45b6(rgyud): du 'gyur ro/ /rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gser gyi dong tse la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /skyes pa bzung ste 'bum bzlas
45b7(rgyud): na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du
46a1(rgyud): @#/ /'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /glang po che la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung te 'bum bzlas na stong
46a2(rgyud): phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gos dang / rgyan gyi chas la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na
46a3(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mtsho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tshig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bslangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyur ro/ /gtsug
46a4(rgyud): lag thams cad dang / rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston
46a5(rgyud): cing ched du ma bslangs bar nor sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /sA la b+ha ny+tsa tsi ka mnan nas 'bum bzlas na nyin re bzhin yang gser gyi dong tse brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /
46a6(rgyud): gos gyi sgrogs la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang / gang gi snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang / de mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi
46a7(rgyud): cha lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang / ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /srin po mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /
46b1(rgyud): 'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro/ /
46b2(rgyud): de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa yang bsgrub bo/ /ri la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlas na ri thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug te 'bum bzlas na
46b3(rgyud): phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /zhing la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na bza'
46b4(rgyud): ba 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad ma bslangs par thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhing la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na
46b5(rgyud): thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro/ /grong du 'bum bzlas na zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo/ /gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas
46b6(rgyud): nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g.yog
46b7(rgyud): tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /snang ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang du 'gyur ro/ /skyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na skyed mos tshal
47a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyi me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /gter gyi gnas
47a2(rgyud): su 'bum bzlas na gter rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dgod cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ bgad ba tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /khros
47a3(rgyud): pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro/ /cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs
47a4(rgyud): kyi 'bum bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyi 'jom par rtags btsugs te/ 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang nam mkha'
47a5(rgyud): la 'gro ba 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jom pa la mdzub mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa dang / gtong
47a6(rgyud): ba dang / 'gyel ba dang / slong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jom pa lta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum
47a7(rgyud): bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jom par gur gum bskus te 'bum bzlas na des bskus pas 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /'jom par ba bla bcug ste 'bum
47b1(rgyud): bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jom par ldong ros bcug ste 'bum bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri
47b2(rgyud): can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /kyo btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo btang des thams cad 'gugs
47b3(rgyud): nus par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje lag gi bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
47b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi
47b5(rgyud): rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing 'bum bzlas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas
47b6(rgyud): na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyi lta ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /rdo rje snying po bzung nas
47b7(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par
48a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gzhon nu la lta zhing 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la yi ge snang ste/ thams cad smra ba dang / spobs pa thogs pa med par thob
48a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor zhing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /
48a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i mdzod la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams
48a4(rgyud): cad kyi bar du ston to/ /byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas
48a5(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang / yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas
48a6(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por
48a7(rgyud): 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad
48b1(rgyud): dang / las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa'i bdag po dang / /dbang phyug dang / byed pa po dang / 'byin pa dang / mi zad mi nyams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad
48b2(rgyud): nyams su myong zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rnyed cing 'thob ste sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / de rang gi gnyen
48b3(rgyud): dang / bshes gnyen dang / grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo / /de dag la yang 'grub par byed do/ /bsam pa tsam gyis sgyu ma thams cad ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
48b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos 'phrul yang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang ston to/ /
48b5(rgyud): skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang / stobs dang / gzugs dang / na tshod dang / shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro
48b6(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing don
48b7(rgyud): gyis 'bum bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro/ /hUM zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang / khams gsum gyi dbang po
49a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang / sems can thams
49a2(rgyud): cad grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad mi nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen
49a3(rgyud): po'i rgyal po las/ phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems
49a4(rgyud): dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po
49a5(rgyud): 'di stsal to/ /gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jig pa dang / gnam dal dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad
49a6(rgyud): thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
49a7(rgyud): legs so/ /legs so/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smros shig /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems
49b1(rgyud): dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /A ro li ku/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus te/ ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom
49b2(rgyud): l dan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs
49b3(rgyud): so/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /de nas yang dag
49b4(rgyud): par bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de dbus srad bu mnyam pa ru/ /grwa bzhi par
49b5(rgyud): ni gdab pa ru/ /gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgong bstan te/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste/ /dbus su thig ni bzhi yang bri/ /tshon rtsi dmar
49b6(rgyud): po dag gis ni/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po dbus su ni/ /'jig rten mgon po gzhug par bya/ /'dab ma kun gyi steng rnams su/ /sangs rgyas cha lugs bri
49b7(rgyud): bar bya/ /pad+ma che mchog phyag rgya yis/ /der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor gnas su 'jug nas ni/ /rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya/ /ji ltar pad+ma chu
50a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnams dang / /nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis/ /chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir/ /'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa yin/ /'di
50a2(rgyud): lan cig brjod nas bsgom ste/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo btang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar dgrol lo/ /de la pad+mo
50a3(rgyud): chen po'i kyo btang ni 'di'o/ /oM mahA pad+ma hUM dza hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po nyid byon te/ slob dpon la zhal ston par
50a4(rgyud): mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed do/ /de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug go/ dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar po bgos la/ thod dkar pos mgo la
50a5(rgyud): gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yon par pad+mo byin/ g.yas par sngags kyi nor
50a6(rgyud): bu bskur la 'di skad smros shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rtag par ru ni brtag par bya/ /khyod ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs/ /
50a7(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bslab bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o/ /de nas
50b1(rgyud): pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab ma
50b2(rgyud): kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyi blta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo/ /pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil
50b3(rgyud): 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas pad+mo re re zhing bzang po thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong 'bul
50b4(rgyud): lo/ /de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do/ /slob min bu min ma yin te/ /dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni/ /dag pa nyid
50b5(rgyud): de pad+ma bzhin/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te/ /
50b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i tshig gis so/ /lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste/ /nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs
50b7(rgyud): kyi dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga 'ji gsungs so/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na/ rang gi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs shing de bzhin
51a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs par bri/ de nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting
51a2(rgyud): nge 'dzin gyi rgyun tu bzlas te/ nam spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad+mo'i dbus su zhugs te/ yang de
51a3(rgyud): las gzhan pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te/ skad cig gcig
51a4(rgyud): gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing ldog go/ sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas
51a5(rgyud): na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sum 'bum
51a6(rgyud): bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
51a7(rgyud): dang / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na de'i nang par de
51b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying gar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thob bo/ /yang na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po 'thob bo/ /de nas
51b2(rgyud): ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas bdag srung ngo / /gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer srung ngo / /gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed
51b3(rgyud): do/ /dbab pa ni tsan+dan na gyi bdug pas so/ /gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hrI zhes bya bas so/ /sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te byin no/ /sems
51b4(rgyud): can thams cad gnon pas ni sa ser pos so/ /bud med dbang du bya ba ni su ma nA'i me tog la bsngags pas so/ /chom rkun gnon pa ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /ri
51b5(rgyud): dwags dang / bya gnon pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so/ /sgyu ma gnon pa ni rma bya'i char bus so/ /rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so/ /rmi lam ngan pa
51b6(rgyud): gzhil pa ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i sgro'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /bu mo thor bu dbang du bya ba ni bu mo'i skra'i sbyin
51b7(rgyud): sreg gis so/ /yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so/ /bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /
52a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la mchod pa byas nas/ nub gsum rangs par bzlas
52a2(rgyud): na de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na/ de nas bcom
52a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin
52a4(rgyud): gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog
52a5(rgyud): pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol
52a6(rgyud): to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po 'bul gyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
52a7(rgyud): bzhes su gsol/ /'dis sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
52b1(rgyud): 'das kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la skyes bu chen po smros shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems
52b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /traM pA bA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan
52b3(rgyud): thams cad dang / gos dang / gser dang / nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te
52b4(rgyud): bzhugs so/ /de nas nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin te/ /rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing / /
52b5(rgyud): grwa brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya/ /rin chen kun dang ldan par bya/ /der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag la zhugs nas 'di
52b6(rgyud): zhes brjod do/ /re ba thams cad grub pa yi/ /nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te/ /grub cig grub cig sems chen po/ /bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro/ /de nas
52b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la
53a1(rgyud): @#/ /de'i thad 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhug go/ bcug nas
53a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces brjod do/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /don shes bstan pa gang yin te/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin/ /
53a3(rgyud): de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab bo/ /de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / zas sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o/ /de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
53a4(rgyud): pa rnams la'o/ /nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o/ /zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o/ /chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi snang ba thams cad la'o/ /de nas snying
53a5(rgyud): po byin la/ rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do/ /oM badzra rat+nA b+hi Shi kA b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba d+hi pa ti hUM bA bA Ta Ta ha ha/ /
53a6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bslab ste/ sngags ni 'di'o/ /hUM bA ta ha/ de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM bA bA Ta mu baM/ de nas
53a7(rgyud): mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung ngo / /dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje rin po che dbus su bris la
53b1(rgyud): lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do/ /dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por
53b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la/ spyan sngar nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu
53b3(rgyud): rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la de nas de btsud de thams cad bstan nas/ dam tshig 'di sbyin no/ /sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag /gal te nyin re
53b4(rgyud): mchod stongs na/ /khyod kyis nor dang don bsags pa/ /tshe rabs kun tu 'jig par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni mna'i snying po'o/ /oM bA bA Ta Ta ya swAhA/ de nas chus dbang bskur
53b5(rgyud): ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i dbus su bzhag nas der btsud de/ de
53b6(rgyud): nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze la sogs pa la
53b7(rgyud): ci nus kyis sbyin no/ /de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin no/ /de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrid thams cad la sbyin no/ /de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang
54a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan
54a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang skur ba bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang
54a3(rgyud): bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o/ /g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de nas ras la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum
54a4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i mjug tu yi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i sngo ras la bris pa de las byug nas
54a5(rgyud): sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro/ /dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur
54a6(rgyud): ba ni 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
54a7(rgyud): gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal
54b1(rgyud): srid 'thob bo/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi dong tse 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te/ 'bum bzlas na
54b2(rgyud): chos kyi nor dang / gzungs thob bo/ /des nor yang skye bar byed do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'i
54b3(rgyud): mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las nor thams cad dang / zas thams cad kyi yo byad zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa la bltas te 'bum
54b4(rgyud): bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnam gyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo / /de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nor gyi
54b5(rgyud): bdag por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis byang chub sems
54b6(rgyud): dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
54b7(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa
55a1(rgyud): @#/ /las blangs te/ des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo rnyed kyi sems can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed
55a2(rgyud): pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba
55a3(rgyud): byin te/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smros shig /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu
55a4(rgyud): g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM ru Tu ru Tu hUM ma Ta/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang /
55a5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dang bcas nas ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ de bzhin
55a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de
55a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /rdo
55b1(rgyud): rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungs so/ /de yi dbus su sems chen po/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcas/ /lag pa gnyis ni
55b2(rgyud): btsir bar bya/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs rnams gzhag par bya/ /de dag gi ni grwa kun du/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi
55b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ zhugs la 'di brjod do/ /hUM dak+Shi Ni sma ra Na phaT/ de nas bcom ldan
55b4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par 'gyur te/ /de la phyag rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar mi nus so/ /de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying gar dgrol lo/ /
55b5(rgyud): oM badzra muSh+Ti mu/ de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis
55b6(rgyud): bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab
55b7(rgyud): bo/ /khyod chos dang / rdo rje las gang 'dod/ des smras pa/ gnyis ka'o zhe na/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i
56a1(rgyud): @#/ /mgo la bzhag ste/ dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying gar dgrol lo/ /de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o/ /g.yas
56a2(rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no/ /de ste rdo rje'o zhes zer na de'i lag pa g.yon par
56a3(rgyud): rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo zhig / 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod par gyis shig /de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'di
56a4(rgyud): zhes smros shig / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams/ /bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste/ /bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad/ /de nas snying
56a5(rgyud): po byin la phyag rgya bcings pa slobs shig / dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
56a6(rgyud): bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su ci rigs par/ /sangs rgyas sku lugs gzhag par bya/ /thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje khu
56a7(rgyud): tshur kun 'dzin pa'o/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /phyag rgya bzhin ni bri bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin/ /de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo'i
56b1(rgyud): dbus/ /rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya/ /grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya/ /de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun/ /bcing ba yang ni bslab par bya/ /sgrub pa
56b2(rgyud): gsang ba dag dang ni/ /bskur ba gsang ba bslab par bya/ /'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas/ /sgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam
56b3(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mtshan ma gzhag nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na/ /phyag rgya shes par bstan na ni/ /rdo rje rin chen
56b4(rgyud): rgyal ba dang / /sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom
56b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab bo/ /de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la/ /sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste/ /rdo rje
56b6(rgyud): 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing / /de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pas ni dam
56b7(rgyud): tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi ni ma yin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas
57a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'o ma 'thung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar bsnyen
57a2(rgyud): pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje
57a3(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
57a4(rgyud): rnams bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag
57a5(rgyud): thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o/ /de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i
57a6(rgyud): mjug tu zhag bdun smyungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgoms la/ mtshan thal byung du bzlas so/ /de nas nam phyed nas bdud kyi las
57a7(rgyud): sna tshogs snang par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'di brjod cig /oM badzra ruSh+Ti ha na ha na sarba mA ra Na phaT/ de nas nang phar gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus
57b1(rgyud): kun tu 'jug go / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de
57b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog sngo bsangs/ ut+pal
57b3(rgyud): sngon po lta bu/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis phyag rgya g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ de'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu tshur
57b4(rgyud): can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dmar por bya'o/ /de'i thad du rdo rje'i gsal phur ma rgyan thams cad kyis
57b5(rgyud): brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal phur thogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tshugs kyi dbu
57b6(rgyud): rgyan can/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/ de'i g.yon du pad+mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i
57b7(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo dang / rdo rje pho nya mo'o/ /rdo rje dpal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog go /dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog
58a1(rgyud): @#/ /sngon mo la rdo rje 'bar ba 'chang ba'o/ /de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong
58a2(rgyud): phrag brgya bzlas na/ gzugs kyi ras de las phaT ces bya ba thos na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad nam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing
58a3(rgyud): 'dod na mi snang bar yang 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen du yang 'gro'o/ /ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /kun tu 'khyil bas 'khyil ba'i skra
58a4(rgyud): can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus su gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can
58a5(rgyud): thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas shing rga ba dang / shi
58a6(rgyud): bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
58a7(rgyud): pa/ sku mdog ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog /phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyang la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ de'i g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan
58b1(rgyud): 'das ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yid tsam dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ lag pa g.yas pa na a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/
58b2(rgyud): g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to/ /de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum smyungs la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ska'i 'bru mar la snyugs pa brgyad
58b3(rgyud): stong du pa med pa'i 'dag me la bsreg go/ de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog
58b4(rgyud): stsol ba ni rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am/ sa brjod pa 'am/ sa'i 'og brjod pa 'am/ khams brjod pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i khams
58b5(rgyud): mi snang ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /yang bsgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de
58b6(rgyud): bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ut+pal sngon po'i mdog spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag
58b7(rgyud): brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung bzlas na nam phyed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon to/ mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /ras sam/ shing lab bam/
59a1(rgyud): @#/ /rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang a mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag
59a2(rgyud): rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings
59a3(rgyud): nas 'bum bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings na phyag na rdo rje la sogs
59a4(rgyud): pa'i gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum pa zlas pas so/ /lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcing te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ khu tshur bcings pa des mi snang
59a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur te phral na snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bcings pa'i khu tshur byas la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log
59a6(rgyud): par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la nor dang / gser
59a7(rgyud): dang / mu ting dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / me dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu dang / yi ge dang / 'thab
59b1(rgyud): cha dang / ston skyobs dang / mtshon cha dang / glegs bam dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par
59b2(rgyud): byed do/ /g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gyel bar nus
59b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro/ /g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams
59b4(rgyud): cad las nor dang / gser dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / mtshon cha dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad dgug /gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri
59b5(rgyud): dang / ro dang / reg bya las dam pa thams cad kyang dgug go /bud med kyi nu ma dang / mngal phyogs dang / mig dang / sna dang / mchu dang / rna ba dang / mgo dang / brla
59b6(rgyud): dang / ska rags dang / gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang dgug go /bkrol na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin zhag gcig smyungs la lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu
59b7(rgyud): tshur bcangs te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chad khu tshur bcangs pas las thams cad byed do/ /de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang /
60a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbang du bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / bslang ba dang / drang ba dang / bsgyel
60a2(rgyud): pa dang / brdabs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / go bzlog pa dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / gso ba dang / sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa dang / dus tshigs bsgyur ba
60a3(rgyud): dang / sa la sogs pa g.yo ba dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang /
60a4(rgyud): so sor lung ston pa dang / 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad dbye ba dang / gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang / dug thams cad bslang ba dang / ma
60a5(rgyud): rungs par bya ba dang / thams cad spo ba dang / thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang / thams cad 'gags pa dang / gas pa sbyar ba dang / sbrul bskrad pa dang / gzung ba
60a6(rgyud): dang / gtang ba dang / ser ba dang / char dbab pa dang / glog dbyung ba dang / thams cad slar bcad pa dang / sngon chad med pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang /
60a7(rgyud): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bya dang / ri dwags dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam
60b1(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/
60b2(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
60b3(rgyud): ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
60b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis smros shig ces gsungs so/ /de
60b5(rgyud): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ a ra pa tsa na/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las yi
60b6(rgyud): ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil
60b7(rgyud): 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi'am/ bco lnga la bris te/ de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o/ /rdo rje ral gri dang / glegs bam thogs par byas
61a1(rgyud): @#/ /la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du yi ge a ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag
61a2(rgyud): rgya bcings la zhugs te/ ni Sh+Tha pany+dza ga zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang stsol te/ de phyin chad
61a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung ngo / /de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste/ 'di zhes smros shig /deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
61a4(rgyud): chos thob par 'gyur gyi/ snying po 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig /de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams so/ /a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob
61a5(rgyud): bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o/ /ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o/ /na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin
61a6(rgyud): med pa'o/ /de ltar 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / don dam pa dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad
61a7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te/ de bas na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob
61b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab po/ /spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o/ /de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la de'i
61b2(rgyud): dbus su ral gri bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dam tshig gi
61b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po tshul bzhin du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ A d+ya nu t+pa n+na twa ta/ a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad
61b4(rgyud): kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes nang par langs nas nyin re lan re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas
61b5(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha
61b6(rgyud): ton byed pa dang / sgom pas so/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas bsgrub par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bris nas/ yi ge phreng ba thams cad
61b7(rgyud): brjod de 'di skad du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi bsgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'di 'bum bzlas na spobs pa mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang / @#/
62a1(rgyud): /nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni lan gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo//
62a2(rgyud): gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro/ /bzhi bzlas pas dran pa
62a3(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi
62a4(rgyud): ge phreng ba g.yas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bri'o/ /de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na bcom
62a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje cig char 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas chos bshad de slar gshegs so/ /
62a6(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsol to/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rtog

62b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po 'di stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par
62b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpa' la bskul lo/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang
62b3(rgyud): gi snying po phul ba/ oM badzra tsakra hUM/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid
62b4(rgyud): du zhugs so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba/ /rang gi lag na
62b5(rgyud): phyag rgya thogs/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/ /de yi thad 'khor thams cad du/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lo tshogs rnams bri/ /de yang sems can chen po rnams/ /de
62b6(rgyud): dag nyid ni legs par bri/ /de nas blo ldan thog ma ru/ /rdo rje 'khor los 'jug par bya/ /zhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas so/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod na des bcom ldan
62b7(rgyud): 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du stsol to/ /de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ de
63a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bri ste/ de bzhin du bzlas
63a2(rgyud): na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste/ 'di zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa yis/ /mthong dang
63a3(rgyud): de bzhin bsgrubs na ni/ rtog pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas brtags te bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid du/ /
63a4(rgyud): phyag rgya shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi/ /bla med pas ni bslab par bya/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa
63a5(rgyud): tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed de/ ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga 'am/ rtog pa las bshad pa sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
63a6(rgyud): rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces
63a7(rgyud): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste/ snying
63b1(rgyud): po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis smros shig ces gsungs so/ /de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/
63b2(rgyud): oM ga gan saM b+ha ba badzra pA tsa ho/ /de nas de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha' las mchod pa kun 'byung bar byas so/ /de nas dkyil
63b3(rgyud): 'khor 'byung ste/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri/ /de yi dbus su nor chen te/ /nam mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya/ /rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba'o/ /dang por slob
63b4(rgyud): dpon 'jug pa ni/ /mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste/
63b5(rgyud): de bzhin du slob ma yang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya yang slobs shig /mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /
63b6(rgyud): de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs shig /zhugs nas 'di skad brjod cig /'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de
63b7(rgyud): bden pa gang gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams
64a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste/ rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na de nas nam mkha' las mchod pa'i
64a2(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod
64a3(rgyud): kyi dam tshig go zhes brjod cig / 'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni/ /'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o/ /nam mkha' la ni 'dod pa 'byung / /'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/
64a4(rgyud): ces smras nas/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cig ces bsgo zhig /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /slob ma nam mkha' la yid kyis
64a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la/ der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa yang slobs shig /yid kyis 'di skad brjod cig /nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa
64a6(rgyud): thams cad la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub po/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog
