64b1(rgyud): kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsol bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i
64b2(rgyud): sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smres shig ces gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po
64b3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ /oM me tri dr-i D+ha tsi te tiSh+Tha ho/ /de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so//
64b4(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/ cho ga brtan
64b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do/ /badzra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/ de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams
64b6(rgyud): cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do/ /btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya bslab ste/ de nas go chas bskon no/ /brtan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de
64b7(rgyud): nas byams pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig/ byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di
65a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhes brjod do/ /rangs sam yang na khros kyang rung / /mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te/ /'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na/ /byams pa chen po bsgom
65a2(rgyud): par gyis/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bslab po/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can thams cad dge bar
65a3(rgyud): gyur cig / 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang / byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams
65a4(rgyud): cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub pas bsgrub bo/ /las rnams kyang yid kyi ci 'dod pa'i cho ga dang / byams pas sgrubs shig /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
65a5(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po las/ byams pa'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje rig pa'i dam pa la sogs pas mgo bos phyag
65a6(rgyud): btsal te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM dri/ oM b+hi n+da badzra shU la/ oM ts+tshi na d+ha hUM tsakra phaT/
65a7(rgyud): oM b+hu ra b+hu ba swaHswAhA/ oM ha na b+hin+da badzra hUM phaT/ oM la la la la a bi Sha g+ha N+Ta Tan/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor
65b1(rgyud): gyi grwa'i srad bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri/ der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad bri ba'am/ bzhag pa'am/ mthar ni tshon gyi thig le yang gzhag go/ /de nas thog mar
65b2(rgyud): slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'dug go/ /g.yon logs nas rdo rje'i slob ma yang bcug ste/ de nas phyag rgya yang bslab bo/ /de phyin chad
65b3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i blon po chen po'i
65b4(rgyud): rtog pa'o/ / //de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul
65b5(rgyud): ba| oM a mr-i ta ku N+Da li kha kha kha kha krod+ha dz+wa lA mA la hUM phaT/ oM mahA prA ba h+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM kA la daN+Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM kA la pra shA gra A kaD+D+ha hUM phaT/ de nas de
65b6(rgyud): dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris la de yi dbus su rdo rje gzhag go/ /phyogs bzhir ni khro bo rnams de bzhin du bar chad du byas la 'god do//
65b7(rgyud): de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab po/ /de nas thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / srung
66a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba 'grub bo/ /rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul lo/ /oM mahA bA lA
66a2(rgyud): ka mahA ga Na de bi ba bi pa ru hrIHran sarba duSh+TA na nA phaT/ oM mA lA d+ha ra tsa la tsa la ya hUM/ oM d+ha nur d+ha ra ba shI ku ru sarba sad twAn swAhA/ oM dza ya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ de nas
66a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris la der rdo rje gzhag go /g.yas su 'ang gnyis g.yon du'ang gnyis so/ /de nas rdo rje srin bu'i phyag rgyas
66a4(rgyud): btsud de/ de nas phyag rgya bslabs nas cho ga bslab pa ni/ /gang dge ba dang drin gzo dang / /lha yi 'khor mthong ma gtogs par/ /gzhan rnams de dag thams cad
66a5(rgyud): kun/ /mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ tshogs kyi gtso bo'i rtog pa'o// //
66a6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje gtun shing la sogs pa'i pho nyas rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM lAng ga lI hUM/ oM mahA pa ta hUM/ oM badzra dz+wA lA ya swAhA/ oM bi ka Ta b+hai ra ba de hi me sa ra
66a7(rgyud): ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni shing rta dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te/ dbus su rdo rje gzhag nas rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug
66b1(rgyud): la las 'di bslab po/ /mi dge ba'i sems can thams cad 'thungs shig /phrogs shig /sregs shig /zo zhig /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo/ /'jig rten
66b2(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ pho nya'i tshogs kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje kyo btang la sogs pa
66b3(rgyud): bran rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul
66b4(rgyud): lo/ /oM bA ra ha daMSh+Ta t+ka Ta bi ga to d+ha ra sarba na kha na kha na hUM phaT/ oM sarba mA ra da Da hUM phaT/ oM bi ka te ka daMSh+T+ra b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM mahA ma Ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil
66b5(rgyud): 'khor 'di'o/ /gru gsum par bris la mngon sum pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste/ gar gyi mchod pas ni dbus kyi rdo rje la mchod do/ /'jig
66b6(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ bran gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas ma thams cad kyis ku co'i sgra bton te/ gar gyi mchod pa
66b7(rgyud): chen pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo/ /de nas rdo rje'i blon mo chen mo dag gis smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha ra li hUM phaT/ oM badzra tsa kra tshin d+ha hUM
67a1(rgyud): @#/ /phaT/ oM shAn+ti hUM/ oM badzra muSh+Ti ha na shin d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM ku mA ra ha bi Sha g+ha Na ti ke ra Na ra Na ca lA ya sarba du Sh+TA na hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil
67a2(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgor 'khor la sogs pa bri'o/ /de'i dbus su rdo rje khro mo'i me lag nas rdo rje'i gsal bur can bzhag go /dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no/ /'jig
67a3(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rang gi snying po
67a4(rgyud): smras pa/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM sau mya kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM daN+Da Ta d+ha ri Na ha na hUM phaT/ oM biM ga li hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag
67a5(rgyud): go / cha bzhir bgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim gyis bzhag go /'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do/ /'di ni khro mo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /'jig rten gsum las
67a6(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM kharga ma ri Ni hUM/ oM
67a7(rgyud): a sha si ba d+he hi ra ma ho/ oM pA sha sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba rA ma Ni ra ti bri ye ho/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum po te/ sgo bzhi pa/ dbus su se ral srad bu byas
67b1(rgyud): te/ thig bzhi btab la rim pa bzhir bri'o/ /gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du zlum por thig bzhi rim du btab la/ de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi gdong bri'o/ /ngos
67b2(rgyud): bzhir ni rim gyis te/ shar phyogs nas bri ba'am/ gzhag par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir rdo rje'i mngag gzhug ma bri'am/ gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /b+hi ci ri Ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ /
67b3(rgyud): de ltar rig pa'i blon mo chen mo la sogs pa thams cad du gyis shig /'di thang cig bzlas pas thams cad khugs so/ /de nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis
67b4(rgyud): rkang pa'i mthe bo bzung ste/ phyag btsal nas skyil mo krung gis gar byed cing zhugs la dbab bo/ /bcangs nas dam tshig byin cig /sarba mA ra khA da pi ba de hi ba ra sa
67b5(rgyud): ma ya ho/ /de nas de bzhin du dam tshig sbyin no/ /glu gar dang / sil snyan dang / zas dang / skom gyis thams cad tshim par byas la dril bus phab pa ste/ de nas dngos grub
67b6(rgyud): thams cad dang / bde ba thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed nas/ rnal 'byor dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa yang thob bo zhes smros shig /'jig
67b7(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen mo'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje'i tshogs ma mo'i rtog pa'o// //de nas rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM b+h+yo oM ka
68a1(rgyud): @#/ /li ma rA ni/ badzra rAk+Sha si ha na sarba na TI ma/ oM bU tha Ni tha/ oM mahA ka ra bA ka tre hUM phaT/ /dkyil 'khor grwa lnga par bris te/ rdo rje ni grwa'i dbus su
68a2(rgyud): gzhag go / bzhir ni rdo rje pho nya mo bzhag ste/ de cho ga de bzhin du bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje po nya mo'i rtog
68a3(rgyud): pa'o/ / //de nas rdo rje bran mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM bA rA hi badzra mu khri dri toM ta rA pa ta la sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM kA li kA pA la mA la d+ha ri Ni
68a4(rgyud): ka Ta ka Ta ma Ta ma Ta b+hi mA ra ya sarba mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM pu ta ni u tsu sma ru drA khA da sarba na sho Sha ya swAhA/ /oM ma ka ra mu khi ha ra ha ra hUM/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la sgo bzhir
68a5(rgyud): bris nas/ de'i dbus su rdo rje bris te/ de bzhin gar gyis mchod do/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ bran mo'i rtog
68a6(rgyud): pa ste rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
68a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no/ /de bas na rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir don yod cing myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sems can thams cad
68b1(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa bde blag tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud shod cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'dul te/ dad pa dang mi ldan pa/ sdig
68b2(rgyud): pa byed pa/ brdzun smra ba/ le lo can/ dka' ba spyad pa mi bzod pa/ 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba/ rtag tu chags pa de dag gi don gyi phyir gang gis sems can de dag
68b3(rgyud): bya ba thams cad phyed bzhin pa dang / brtson 'grus med pa dang / dka' ba spyad pa yang med par bde blag tu tshe 'di nyid la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de de bzhin gshegs
68b4(rgyud): pas byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig / 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni yul la mngon par dga' zhing bdag gi grogs po dang / pha dang / ma dang / bu dang / chung ma
68b5(rgyud): rnams mthong 'dod cing de yang sred pas 'khol ba ste/ phyogs nas phyogs su yang 'gro mi nus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / rig 'dzin gyi gnas su lta ci smos/ de nas
68b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal te/ phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ga las byung / /phyag na
68b7(rgyud): rdo rje ga las skyes/ /rdo rje yang ni ga las byung / /phyag rgya snying po'i rig pa dang / /sngags rnams khyad par ji zhig yod/ /gsang ba sgrub pa ji lta bu/ /phyag rgya bcing ba ji lta
69a1(rgyud): @#/ /bu/ /de rnams kyi ni de nyid gang / /byin gyis brlabs sogs ji lta bu/ /sgrub pa rnams kyang ji ltar mthong / /dngos grub 'dod pa ji lta bu/ /ras la ri mo
69a2(rgyud): ji ltar bri/ /sku gzugs tshad ni ji tsam zhig /ji ltar bzlas pa bya ba gsungs/ /ci 'dra bar ni mchod par bgyi/ /bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar grub pa
69a3(rgyud): myur bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur/ /las rnams bsgrub pa ji ltar bya/ /de dag gi ni de nyid gang / /thams cad bdag la bshad pa'i rigs/ /de nas
69a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan te/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med/ /nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag /'dod pa 'gro ba
69a5(rgyud): bdag po yin/ /sems can kun sems gang yin pa/ /brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin/ /nges par rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /de
69a6(rgyud): la smras pa/ sems gzugs med pa la ji ltar na sra ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur/ smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ba na sha dang / rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba
69a7(rgyud): bzhin te/ sdug pa dang / chags pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa rnams 'dus pa las sems can skye ba dang / ji ltar klu rnams khros pas
69b1(rgyud): sems kyi ting nge 'dzin nges pas nam mkha' la gnam lcags 'byung ba'am/ glog dang bcas pa 'byung ba de bzhin du nges pa chags pa dag las rdo rje nyid du 'gyur te/ sems
69b2(rgyud): dpar byin rlabs sbyor ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpar yang 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan rdo rje de nyid ni/ /bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /de la sems par byin gyis rlob
69b3(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/ sems dpa' kun gyi bdag che ba/ /bdag nyid la yang gnas so zhes/ /byin gyis brlabs nas sems dpa' bdag /yin zhes nga rgyal bsgom
69b4(rgyud): par bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'am rgyal ba yin/ /rang sems so sor brtags pa ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid yin/ /de nyid phyag na rdo rje
69b5(rgyud): ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis so/ /'jig rten dbang po nam mkha'i snying / /de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do/ /sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid de/ /de ni rdo rje 'chang ba'i rigs/ /
69b6(rgyud): de nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs yin te/ /khams gsum de nyid yin zhes gsungs/ /'jig rten gsum po'ang de nyid do/ /de nyid byed dang
69b7(rgyud): 'byin pa po/ /sems can kun gyi mes po ste/ /de nyid sems can gnas yin te/ /'byung ba che rnams de nyid do/ /de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste/ /gnas pa dang ni 'gro
70a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /da kho na chen po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa
70a2(rgyud): dang po'o/ / //de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i khyad par gyi bar du bya ba ste/ snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
70a3(rgyud): ces bya'o/ /de la sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang ba brjod pa dang / smra ba ni snying po brjod pa ste/ snying po brjod pas ni snying gis bsam pa'i grub pa thob ces bya ba ni snying
70a4(rgyud): po'i khyad par ro/ /de nas phyag rgya'i khyad par ni/ /rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rnams kyi/ /gzugs brnyan sbyor ba 'di dag ni/ /phyag rgya kun gyi khyad par te/ /'byung ba yang
70a5(rgyud): ni de yis bstan/ /ji ltar jo bo'i rgya mthong na/ /bran rnams 'gal bar mi byed pa/ /de bzhin rgyal ba nyid rnams kyang / /phyag rgya 'da' bar yong mi mdzad/ /rdo rje'i sku dang
70a6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs/ /ji ltar gnas dang mthun byas la/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen por bdag nyid bsgyur/ /de ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ /
70a7(rgyud): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /sor bsnol brtan pa dam tshig ste/ /sems kyi shes rab ldan pa las/ /gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin/ /de dag dam tshig rtsa ba ste/ /
70b1(rgyud): rtsa byung bcing ba rgyu yi mchog /gang gis thams cad lus brtan 'gyur/ /de phyir phyag rgya brjod pa yin/ /gang gis thams cad rgyas btab pa/ /chud mi za zhing rab sbas te/ /
70b2(rgyud): mnga' bdag gzugs brnyan 'chang bas na/ /sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub/ /gang dag mthong na sangs rgyas dang / /sems dpa' la sogs mthong bar 'gyur/ /dam tshig
70b3(rgyud): nyams pas gzir bas na/ /'da' bar mi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya'i khyad par de yin te/ /don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o/ /de la sngags
70b4(rgyud): kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te/ ngag tsam spros pa med pa ste/ /sangs rgyas bka' yis grub pa nyid/ /chos kyi tshig gis bskul ba ste/ /de dag sngags zhes bya ba yin/ /de la
70b5(rgyud): rig pa'i khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ /ma rig pa ni med par byed/ /rig pa de bzhin chud par byed/ /don rnams rtogs par gyur pas na/ /rig pa zhes ni de phyir bya/ /snying po dang /
70b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i rab tu bya ba gnyis pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya bcings pa'i rab tu bya ba bshad do/ zhes bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i
70b7(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /de la phyag rgya chen po ni de nyid bskul ba'i snying pos bcing ngo / /dam tshig dang / las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bcing ba
71a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / brdab pa la sogs pa byas nas bcing ngo / /dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying bos phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya
71a2(rgyud): thams cad bcing ngo / /de yang ma chags pa dang / slob ma ma yin pa dang / snod ma yin pa dang / dang pa med pa la mi spyin no/ /yun du sbyangs na de dag kyang 'grub
71a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de la de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po 'di'o/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /sa ma ya ho su
71a4(rgyud): ra ta s+t+waM/ rdo rje khro bos phyag rgya thams cad rang gi bcing dam/ gzhan bcing du gzhug na ni hUM zhes bya ba thang cig tsam gyis so/ /de nas rdo rje bcing ba la sogs pa bcing
71a5(rgyud): ba 'byung ste/ badzra ban d+ha zhes brjod la/ rdo rje bcing ba snying gar chings shig /de nas snying po 'dis sor mo thams cad brdab par bya'o/ /oM badzra ban d+ha trAT/ 'dis ni
71a6(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad dgug cing dbang du byed do/ /de nas rdo rje ye shes dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo / /badzra A be sha/ zhes brjod la snying po 'dis rdo rje
71a7(rgyud): dbab pa bskyed par bya'o/ /aHthams cad dbab pa'i snying po 'di ni gdon mi za ba'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ badzra muSh+Ti zhes brjod
71b1(rgyud): la bcing ngo / /de ste de ltar ma byas na yang sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
71b2(rgyud): kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po don yod pa 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste/ stong bzlas pas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dam
71b3(rgyud): tshig chen po'i phyag rgya lan cig bzlas na grub pa thams cad la gces par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ thal mo sbyar la sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni rdo rje'i
71b4(rgyud): thal mo'o/ /de nyid sor mo'i bar rnams su shin tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bcing ba'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug ste/ mthe'u chung dang / srin lag gi bar du rab tu
71b5(rgyud): bcug la btsum pa 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gzhibs la nang du bcug la de bzhin du mthe'u chung dang / srin lag gi bar
71b6(rgyud): du btsugs te/ mdzub mo shin tu bkug pa ni rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya gzhan du 'gyur te/ dam tshig chen po
71b7(rgyud): de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod la snying ga 'am/ nam mkha' la so sor bcing ngo / /ngag gi phyag rgya yang badzra dzi hwa zhes brjod la phyag rgya bcing ngo / /lta ba'i phyag rgya ni snying
72a1(rgyud): @#/ /po'i don gyis bcing ngo / /so'i phyag rgya dang / mchu'i phyag rgya dang / mig bsgul ba'i phyag rgya dang / snying dang / lus g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni sa ma ya s+t+waM
72a2(rgyud): zhes brjod na bcing ba grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni rdo rje khu tshur du byas la mdzub mo brkyang na rdo rje
72a3(rgyud): khro bo zhes bya ba yin no/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/ /lag dar bsnol te bcings nas kyang / /mthe'u chung lcags kyu sbrel byas la/ /hUM zhes pas ni bsdigs par
72a4(rgyud): bya/ /de nyid g.yas pa kyo btang du byas pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i kyo btang ngo / /de la 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag mthil dag tu rdo rje bcing / /mthe bo bshibs pas
72a5(rgyud): bkab pa yis/ /khu tshur byas pa dam tshig gi /phyag rgya rdo rje khro bo ste/ /ti rin ti ri zhes bya'o/ /hUM ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o/ /ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni thams cad gsod pa'i
72a6(rgyud): khro bo'o/ /rdo rje'i sa bzhi bcing ba ni rdo rje bcing ba sa la brkyang ste bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje'i sa gzhir 'gyur te/ de la sus kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje 'dod
72a7(rgyud): pa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba bcings la mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas pa ni thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje bcings la mdzub
72b1(rgyud): mo gnyis mnyam par gshibs pas snying gar gtugs shig / gal te de las 'da' bar byas na snying gas te 'chi'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings la/ /mdzub mo kyo ba tang du
72b2(rgyud): bcing / /dkri zhing phyir dkri byas pa ni/ /lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /rdo rje bcings pa brtan byas la/ /mdzub mo bkug pa shin tu btsir/ /mthe bo gnyis ka gshibs
72b3(rgyud): pa yis/ /dbus su btsir ba bar snang gi /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ka sbrel nas su/ /mdzub mo yi ni rgyab sbyar te/ /bzlog pa nam mkhar rgyu
72b4(rgyud): rnams kyi'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas nas/ /khu tshur gyis ni sa mnan pa/ /'di ni sa pa'i dam tshig te/ /thams cad byed par 'da' bar dka'/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings
72b5(rgyud): te/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mos mdzub mo btsir/ /mthe'u chung sor mo mnyam brdab pa/ /'di ni 'og ma rnams dgug pa'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis ka brtan pa ru/ /rdo rje bcing ba
72b6(rgyud): sbrel bar bya/ /gung mo mthe bo rdo rjer bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'joms pa'o/ /rdo rje dkri ba dang / rdo rje btsir ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / rdo rje sa dang / rdo rje sa'i 'og
72b7(rgyud): dang / rdo rje he ru ka'o/ /de la rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa na/ /srad bu'am yang na ri mo la/ /'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba ni/ /bsgrub
73a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas yid kyis bteg nas so/ /de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra be ga hUM/ 'dis ni dam tshig ma nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du
73a2(rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa grub pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /dpung pa gnyis rdo rje bcings te/ rdo rje'i
73a3(rgyud): khu tshur gnyis su byas la pus mo btsugs te/ mgo bo sa la btsugs te phyag bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje la ni de nyid kyis dad pa'i stobs kyis gnas par byas la/ 'dzum zhing
73a4(rgyud): bskyod pa dang / smin ma 'gyed pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag btsal lo/ /gzhan rnams la ni pus mo btsugs pa'o/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing
73a5(rgyud): ba ni 'di yin te/ lag pa gnyis kyi rgya ba sbyar nas mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel bar bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ /pra
73a6(rgyud): tI ts+tsha badzra/ snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro/ /rdo rje kyo btang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i mdzub mo gnyis kyo btang gi tshul du bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams
73a7(rgyud): cad la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad dgug pa'i dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya ba ste/ dam tshig lcags kyu yin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
73b1(rgyud): cad kyi rtog pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /g.yas pas bsdams par bya ba ni/ /rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo g.yon/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog
73b2(rgyud): bsam pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /mthe bong gnyis ka'i skyil mo krung / /mdzub mo gnyis ka dgug par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo
73b3(rgyud): 'od dkyil 'khor/ /gung mo gnyis ka kha 'byed pa/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa
73b4(rgyud): dang / dbang du bya ba las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'di mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas badzra bid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/
73b5(rgyud): sems ni rnam dag shes bya ba/ /brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin/ /nges pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ngo bo'i bdag nyid de/ /sems nyid sangs
73b6(rgyud): rgyas nyid yin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po bcings nas de bsgom mo/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
73b7(rgyud): cad kyis rang gi sems so sor brtags pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas su sbyor ba byas nas ji ltar tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thob par 'byung te/ de ltar byin gyis rlob par mdzad
74a1(rgyud): @#/ /do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khu tshur ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin no/ /lus dang ngag sems
74a2(rgyud): rdo rje yis/ /phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'gying pa rab byed cing / /'gying dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor/ /'di yis kun 'gro skad cig gis/ /'od dang gyen du 'gro
74a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /'dod pa kun dbang thams cad pa/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba bcings nas kyang / /gung mo nang bcug snying
74a4(rgyud): gar bzhag/ /mthe'o mthe'u chung kha phye mnyam/ /rdo rje chen po de ltar bcing / /sems dpa' kun gyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /'di ni snying gar bcings pa yis/ /phyag rgya kun gyi
74a5(rgyud): dngos grub pa/ /dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ /phyag na rdo rje
74a6(rgyud): bdag gi lus/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la/ /'gying bcas rdo rje gsor byas na/ /'gying zhing gyen du ston tshul gyis/ /snying gar
74a7(rgyud): bzung na 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ 'di yin no/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/ /g.yas pa gzhu 'dren sbyor ba dang / /
74b1(rgyud): mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis su/ /kun la bsnun na chags par bya/ /da nas bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyag rgya
74b2(rgyud): gtsug tor du gzhag go / de nas phab ste gung mo rdo rjer byas te/ de las bskor te gung mo nor bur byas la/ g.yas phyogs su gzhag go /ltag par gung mo'i rdo rje'i pad+mo bzhag
74b3(rgyud): go / de las bskor te/ gung mo dang / mthe'u chung gyes par byas la g.yon du gzhag go /de nas mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa byas te/ phreng ba bcing pa'i tshul du ltag par mdud
74b4(rgyud): pa byas la/ sor mo thams cad mthe'u chung nas mthar gyis 'jig pa'i tshul gyis dgrol ba ni cod pan gyi tshul bzhin dgrol lo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas bcom
74b5(rgyud): ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' bsgrub par 'dod pas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ de nas nyin gcig cing bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs
74b6(rgyud): nas/ ji lta bu'i dus su ci nus pas ci 'dod pa bde bar byas la/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyi glu dbyangs kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas te/ snying po
74b7(rgyud): 'di ci 'dod pas bzlas so/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ de ltar zla ba gcig bzlas te bsgrub bo/ /zla ba gcig lon pa'i mjug tu tshes
75a1(rgyud): @#/ /bco lnga la ngal na phyag rgya bkrol la/ rdo rje'i thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o/ /cung zad gnas nas ji ltar ngal bar mi 'gyur
75a2(rgyud): bar byas te/ de ltar mtshan rangs par bzlas na de'i nang bar bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i kha dog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa'i 'od can byon te/ sgrub pa po la 'khyud
75a3(rgyud): nas de'i lus kun tu zhugs so/ /de nas sgrub pa po yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i 'od can dang / /zla ba'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba
75a4(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi rigs
75a5(rgyud): dang / gnyen dang / grogs po dang / gnyen bshes la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis gzugs bzang po mthong na yang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lta
75a6(rgyud): bar byed do/ /mchod par byed do/ /sten par byed do/ /don thams cad byed do/ /de yang rang gi khyim de nyid na gnas bzhin du lha'i cho 'phrul byed do/ /de bzhin
75a7(rgyud): gshegs par yang gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad byed do/ /rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis kyang 'dul bar byed do/ /sems
75b1(rgyud): can de dag gis kyang mthong ngo / /ma btul ba rnams kyang 'dul lo/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / gyen du 'gro
75b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gye khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas nas phyir 'ong ba'i bar du'o/ /don thams cad la longs spyod pa
75b3(rgyud): dang / 'dod pa thams cad la dbang ba dang / 'dod pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /
75b4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs pa las/ mda' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis me tog gi gzhu 'dren pa ni thams cad dga' bar
75b5(rgyud): byed pa yin no/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar rdo rje hUM zhes pa ste/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phen pas rdo rje 'phangs pas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o/ /de
75b6(rgyud): nas 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs te/ /de ltar kyo ba mthe'u chung mdzub/ /mdud nas mthe bong gshibs pa yis/ /bsdams te snying gar
75b7(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa nges par dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'dren par
76a1(rgyud): @#/ /byed pa'o/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'khyud pa ni rdo rje dga' ba'i phyag rgya'o/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcing ba bsdams byas nas/ /g.yon
76a2(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mtheb mo mtshan du/ /mthe bo'i rtags ni btsud nas su/ /de bskyod bar du bsdam par bya/ /'dis ni bud med thams cad dga' bar byed do/ rdo rje'i khu tshur
76a3(rgyud): gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan no/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcings pa bsdams byas nas/ mdzub mo gnyis ni
76a4(rgyud): dgug par bya/ /srin lag gshibs la mthe'u chung bkyed/ /de ltar mthe bo'i gnyis kyang bkyed/ /'di bstan pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang
76a5(rgyud): byams pa bstan par mdzad na gzhan lta ci smos/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snyems par byed pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'o/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bcas
76a6(rgyud): kun byas nas/ rtsib logs gnyis su bskur nas su/ 'dzin pas bskyod pas 'dud pa ste/ khro bo thams cad mgu bar byed/ rdo rje sems dpa' chen mchog cas
76a7(rgyud): dang / /rdo rje gar gyi rab sbyor bas/ mdor na me tog la sogs pa'i/ gsang ba'i mchod pa myur du 'grub/ /rtog pa gzhan gyi gsang ba'i mchod pa dang yang sbyar
76b1(rgyud): ro/ /de nas rdo rje gar 'byung ste/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /'dzum pas mtha' nas brtsams te dgrol/ /glog bzhin bsgyur te bskor zhing dgrol/ /'gram pa dang
76b2(rgyud): ni gtsug tor bzhag/ rdo rje gar zhes bya ba ste/ /bdag che'i mchod pa thams cad do/ /mchod pa'i 'di ni gsol bas na/ dngos med nyid kyang myur du 'grub/ de nas
76b3(rgyud): rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing pa ni/ rdo rje bcing ba brkyang la mthil du blta'o/ /rdo rje bcings pas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni pi wang gi shing ngo / /g.yas pa
76b4(rgyud): bkug pas ni lan te/ brkyang pa'i lag mthil gyis rang gi snying gar byug go/ me tog gi thal mo'i tshul gyi rdo rje ro btung bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs te/
76b5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i kyo btang gis bzung ngo / /kyo btang de g.yas pas sems dpa'i dam tshig thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyang dgug
76b6(rgyud): go / rdo rje bcings la mthe bo mdud pa ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo sbrel ba ni thams cad bcing ngo / /rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas ni thams
76b7(rgyud): cad 'bebs par byed do/ /de nas go cha'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ khu tshur bcings pa gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa'i tshul du bya'o/ /spos nas yang ltag par yang de bzhin
77a1(rgyud): @#/ /no/ /spos nas snying gar yang de bzhin no/ /yang bar du yang mdud do/ /yang spos nas snying ga dang / ltag par yang de bzhin no/ /mgo la yang de bzhin du dbang
77a2(rgyud): bskur ba'i gnas su'o/ /phreng ba bcing pa'i mdud pa'i tshul gyis mthe'u chung la sogs pa'i sor mo thams cad dgrol ba'i cod pan gyi tshul du bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan
77a3(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ pad+ma'i zum pa'i thal mo sbyar/ pad+mo'i chen por grags pa ste/ mthe'u chung mthe bong gnyis 'gyed pa/ sdig pa rnams ni sel ba'o/ /
77a4(rgyud): de nyid mdzub mo kyo btang du byas pa ni thams cad dgug pa'o/ /de nas pad+mo'i 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcings pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam pa'i steng du gung mo gnyis
77a5(rgyud): bzhag go/ de gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa la g.yas pas pad+mo 'byed par bya'o/ /de nas pad+mo'i dag gi phyag rgya ni hrIH/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni pad+mo'i 'byed pas 'dod chags la
77a6(rgyud): sogs pa'i dri ma sbyong bar gsungs pa nyid do/ /de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya bcing pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis kas dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcing ngo / /de nas rdo rje rin po
77a7(rgyud): che'i phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje bcing pa kun byas nas/ /mdzub mo mnyam nas mtheb dang sbyar/ /de dag ngos su sprad pa ste/ dbang bskur gnas su dbang sbyin no/ /de nyid kha yar bstan la
77b1(rgyud): snying gar bzhag pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur zhes bshad de/ /don thams cad 'phrog pa'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo'i rdo rjes mdzub mo mnyam pa mnan te/ rgyab bskum pa ni rdo rje'i nor bu'o/ /trAM/ chos kyi
77b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /ye shes kyi phyag rgya thams cad nam mkhar bsgom pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ /de ltar sngar bshad pa nyid do/ /bAM/ ngag gi phyag rgya'o/ /byams pa'i bcing ba ni
77b3(rgyud): bcing ba'i nang na mchog ste/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /mdun du ni rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bstan pa nyid do/ /rgyab tu ni rdo rje bcing ba snying gar bkan nas
77b4(rgyud): mthe bo sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis dgug par bya'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcing pa'i mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis snying gar brkyang ba ni rdo rje ste/ rdo rje thams cad kyi'o/ /rigs
77b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ grub pa thams cad stsol ba phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du bri'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje khu tshur mdzub mi'i rtse mo'i rtse mo dkug
77b6(rgyud): pa 'di ni ral gri'o/ /snying po ni glegs bam mo/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i glegs bam bcangs pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pas gzung ngo / /A chos kyi phyag
77b7(rgyud): rgya'o/ /chos thams cad la yi ge med ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs te/ mthe'u chung mdzub mo'i rdo rjes bcing //
78a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bshad de/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /'di mthong bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dbus su kha bzhag ste
78a2(rgyud): bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /hUM/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje nor bu'i phyag
78a3(rgyud): rgya las mthe'u chung dang srin lag mnyam pa'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du bya'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ trAM/ 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya bcing pa
78a4(rgyud): ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o/ /ngag gi phyag rgya ni/ oM/ de nas rtog pa thams cad spyi'i phyag rgya shes pa 'byung ste/ de la lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang
78a5(rgyud): rung / rkang pa bsnyams ste/ brkyang pa dang / lag pa bsgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /mchog bsgrub pa la rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /langs nas g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas
78a6(rgyud): g.yas pa bkug pas drangs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin no/ /langs la pus mi bkyed de bkug nas lag pa gnyis bsdams te gyen du brkyang
78a7(rgyud): ba ni thams cad gtan 'pho ba'i ral gri'o/ /dpung pa gnyis kyi rang gi snying gar 'khyud pa ni go cha ste mi phyed pa'o/ /de nas rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ /a ho haM hUM/ dbab pa dang dbang du bya
78b1(rgyud): ba dang bsrung ba dang / gtan 'pho ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba ni/ /myur 'gyur rdo rje'i lta ba ste/ bgrad de btsums pa 'dren pa yin/ /khro bo'i lta ba/ khro gnyer to/ /brtan par lta ba mi g.yo
78b2(rgyud): ba'o/ /de nas 'di dag gi las 'byung pa ni rdo rje'i lta bas skye 'gro thams cad mgu bar bya'o/ /bgrad pa'i lta bas ni thams cad dgug pa dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / byad ma la sogs pa dang / nad
78b3(rgyud): thams cad sel to/ /khro bo'i lta bas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o/ /brtan par lta bas ni thams cad bsrung ngo / /de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ /badzra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta/ dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti am ku sha dza/ om kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti phaT/
78b4(rgyud): dr-i D+ha dr-iSh+Ti haM/ so'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ so bca' bas ni gtan 'pho'o/ mur pas ni dbang du byed do/ /snying po bzlas shing khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas te phyag rgya'i las byed do/ /g.yas nas gcu pa ni
78b5(rgyud): 'gug pa'o/ /g.yon nas gcu pa ni dbang du byed pa'o/ /ma mchu sos mnan pas ni gtan 'pho'o/ /mchu gnyis ka bsdams pas ni bsrung ngo / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran
78b6(rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje khro bo rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje rjes su dran pa ni thams cad sgrub pa ste/ mchu'i phyag rgya'o/ mchu gnyis ka bsdams pas ni bsrung ngo / /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran
78b7(rgyud): so/ /gnyis ka btsums pas ni gtan 'pho'o/ /gnyis ka bgrad pas ni srung ngo / /thams cad kyi snying po bzlas te gyen du bltas na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /thur du bltas na sa'i dbang
79a1(rgyud): @#/ /por 'gyur ro/ /g.yas nas bskor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/ /g.yon nas bskor bas ni phyag na rdo rje la mchod de/ thams cad kyi snying po stong bzlas
79a2(rgyud): nas bsgrub bo/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ de la 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i khu tshur las 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje bcing ba las g.yon
79a3(rgyud): pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug nas mthe'u chung dang / srin lag gi bar du btsir la bsdam par bya ste/ de nyid la phyag rgya'i snying po 'di 'bum bzlas te bsgrub bo/ /oM badzra mu dra huM/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis
79a4(rgyud): su byas te/ g.yas pas mtshan ma ji ltar byas pa bzhin du gzung ngo / /ma rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur las g.yon pa rdo rje'i khro bo'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba
79a5(rgyud): ste/ dur khrod dam/ tshogs kyi gnas su rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mos mi khrag thigs pa gsum khar blangs te myangs nas mi ro ma smas shing ma nyams pa rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te brgya bzlas
79a6(rgyud): na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / byad ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ tshogs de dag thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro/ /thag 'jug pa dang / phan 'dogs nus par
79a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog thams cad dang / rtog pa thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i khu tshur sgrub pa'i snying po ni
79b1(rgyud): 'di yin no/ /oM badzra A ra li/ phyag rgya bcing ba'i bar du'o/ de nas de'i rjes la phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i skabs bshad par bya ste/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
79b2(rgyud): phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor bri ste/ der 'di skad brjod do/ /bcom ldan phyag rgya btsun mo 'di/ /rtag tu bdag la stsal bar stsol/ /sems can kun gyi don
79b3(rgyud): sgrub phyir/ grub pa'i mchog ni bsgrub par bgyi/ phyag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor nas 'di zhes brjod do/ /su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ /badzra satwa A d+ya sid+d+ha nan/ /de nas byang chub sems
79b4(rgyud): dpa' gzhan rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /rtag tu bdag la grub pa stsol/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ni
79b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje khro bo ni thams cad byed pa yin no zhes de skad brjod la bsgrub par bya'o/ /ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod
79b6(rgyud): cig gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i de kho na 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni sems las sang rgyas kyi chos 'byung ngo / /yang
79b7(rgyud): dag par na 'di dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i thugs la gnas pa yin no/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas bdag gi chung ma yin pas/ bdag
80a1(rgyud): @#/ /gi chung ma yin no zhes sngar bsgoms la phyag rgya bsgrub bo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni/ /rab dga' bcing ba kun gyi mchog/ /de las phyag
80a2(rgyud): rgya rnams su byas/ 'dod pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /grub brtan myur du stsol bar mdzad/ /de nas gzhan dag ni/ bcom ldan rtag pa 'dod pa ste/ /de dag de bzhin
80a3(rgyud): gshegs pa 'o/ /de las thams cad bdag nyid gzugs/ /bdag kyang phyag rgya grub par shog/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na ni phyag na rdo rje lha thams
80a4(rgyud): cad dbang du byas nas rdo rjer byas te/ de dag gi phyag rgya yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid do/ /de nas ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni/ ma rung thams cad za ba'i phyir/ lha
80a5(rgyud): rnams kun gyis byas pa ste/ phyag rgya 'bebs pas de yi phyir/ bsgoms nas kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na rab tu sbyor bas thog mar bsgoms
80a6(rgyud): nas bsgrub bo/ /phyag rgya'i de kho na'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las bshad do zhes nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
80a7(rgyud): rdo rjes gsungs pa/ nyin re dang po dus bzhin du/ /rdo rje chen mchog phyag rgya yis/ snying kha smin mtshams lkog ma gtsug/ bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya/ de la byin
80b1(rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no/ /badzra twa/ badzra rat+na/ badza d+harma/ badzra karma/ de la 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po yin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa
80b2(rgyud): snying po 'dis rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya smin mtshams su bzhag ste/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba'i tshul du bcings la/ ltag par mdud pa'i tshul du byas te bskor te/ mthe'u chung
80b3(rgyud): nas brtsams te dkrol bas sor mo thams cad bkrol te dar dbyangs pa ltar bya'o/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bskyod pa ni rdo rje bcing pa bkan te pang par bzhag
80b4(rgyud): nas bsgom pa'i snying po 'dis rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsam mo/ oM badzra A tam kaH/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pas ci 'dod pa bzlas so/ /de nas rdo rje'i mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba ni/ /rdo
80b5(rgyud): rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas/ /rdo rje 'gying ba legs par bya/ rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin glu/ /rdo rje gar kyang spyi bo nas/ /der bstod pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing mchod par bya'o/ /
80b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'o/ /rdo rje rin chen bla med de/ rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/ rdo rje las ni mdzad par gsol/ dga' ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / glu dang
80b7(rgyud): mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang rnyed par mi dka' na grub pa gzhan lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems dpa'i bde ba 'di dang mtshungs pa med do/ /
81a1(rgyud): @#/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje sa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/ nyin re dang por dus bzhin du/ /rdo rje'i byin gyis brlab tshul gyis/ /bdag
81a2(rgyud): gis bdag nyid byin brlabs nas/ /sems dpar byin rlabs rnal 'byor ldan/ /rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje bcing / /rdo rje 'bebs la sogs tshul gyis/ /rdo rje khu tshur
81a3(rgyud): rdo rje bcas/ /gnyis byas phyag rgya'i mchog gis su/ /bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya/ /'dod pa bdag nyid ces kyang bsgom/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang
81a4(rgyud): ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o/ /de la gsang ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje'i glus ci 'dod pa bzlas so/ /Tak+ki dzaHho/ /de nas bsgrub pa gzhan yang rdo rje bcing bas rtags bzung
81a5(rgyud): ste 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / 'dod pa'i tshe dang / 'dod pa'i bdag po dang / kun du 'gro ba thams cad grub
81a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin du snying
81a7(rgyud): po 'dis sbyin no/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi She ka a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ni ji ltar bcom
81b1(rgyud): ldan 'das sems can thams cad nyid yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang thams cad nyid do zhes nas snying po 'dis thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang /
81b2(rgyud): dbang du byas te bsgom mo/ /de la snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM satwa dzaHhUM baM heH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa
81b3(rgyud): thams cad byed de/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs la/ /rdo rje gar dang sbyar nas su/ /me tog la sogs pa dbul ba ni/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa phyag rgyas dbul/ /gzhu 'dren pa yi tshul
81b4(rgyud): gyis su/ /rdo rje mda' ni 'phen par bya/ /kun nas 'khyud dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /gnyis snyems 'dzin pas mdud pa'o/ /rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis rdo rje'i glu glang zhing mchod do/ /
81b5(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa dag gi bde ba dang / /shin tu yid bde bcom ldan rab dga' khyod la 'dud/ /khyod kyis bdag la deng du dga' bde kun mchod la/ /
81b6(rgyud): mchog gi bdag nyid grub pa'ang myur du tshul bzhin stsol/ /bstod pa'i snying po 'dis thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la nyin rer lan
81b7(rgyud): re bstod na bcom ldan 'das las thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon de rang gi lce las kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad dang /
82a1(rgyud): @#/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rtog pa thams cad dang / tshig gi rgyud thams cad kyang smra bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i glu sngon ma byung ba yang len
82a2(rgyud): to/ /rdo rje'i glus 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lan gcig byin gyis brlabs la de nas phyis sgrubs shig /de nas nyin gcig bzhin byin gyis
82a3(rgyud): brlab pa la sogs pa nyin rer lan re byas na grub pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / shes pa thams
82a4(rgyud): cad dang / las thams cad 'grub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems dpa' rnams der lhags nas phra mo la sogs pa ston te tshig
82a5(rgyud): smra'o/ /byams par byed do/ /mchod do/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro thams cad kyis mchod do/ /sems can thams cad la
82a6(rgyud): tshar gcad pa dang / phan 'dogs nus par 'gyur ro/ /'jig pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / 'god pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can
82a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyang sel to/ /cho 'phrul thams cad ston to/ /bdag nyid kyis de bzhin
82b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems dpa'i gzugs man chad dang / bdag gi lus thams cad dang / nam mkha' dang / sa dang / shing dang / ri dang / chu rnams las
82b2(rgyud): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ston par byed do/ /'od zer ston pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad ston to/ /rang yang sangs
82b3(rgyud): rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang / thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /mig gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa thams cad yi ge rnams las
82b4(rgyud): mthong ngo / /thams cad las thos shing rang gi lces smra'o/ /sngon ma byung ba'i rtog pa dang / mdo sde thams cad 'chad do/ /ston skyo ba thams cad dang / sil snyan dang / 'phong
82b5(rgyud): dang / mtshon 'debs pa dang / bshes gnyen dang / bzo dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad lhun gyis grub par shes par 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du gzugs chen po dang /
82b6(rgyud): mdog dang / stobs dang / dpa' ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang /
82b7(rgyud): sgra skad dang / tshig shes shing mthong ngo / /nyin gcig bzhin thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la
83a1(rgyud): @#/ /sogs pa dngos grub thams cad ma bsgrubs par tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ /byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de la
83a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub pa ni mdun du bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags
83a3(rgyud): dang / rig pa rnams sgrub bo/ phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa ni sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ 'dod par bsgom pa'am/ rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su
83a4(rgyud): dran pa'am/ bdag gi snying gar rdo rje bsgom pa'am/ bdag gi mdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed bzhin du snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang /
83a5(rgyud): rig pa rnams sgrub bo/ /sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni bdag nyid kyis rang gi sems dpa' rjes su dran pa'am/ snying gar rdo rje chen po bsgom zhing snying po
83a6(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /phyi'i rdo rje rigs sgrub pa ni khro bo'i tshul gyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig
83a7(rgyud): pa rnams bsgrub bo/ /rdo rje ma rnams sgrub pa ni sems can thams cad za ba'i rjes su dran pa'am/ bdag nyid rdo rje srin por gyur te/ de'i phyir bdag nyid kyang
83b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad bza'o zhes khros te snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o/ /sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi
83b2(rgyud): rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sgrub par gsungs pa ste/ /grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba'o/ /
83b3(rgyud): de nas ras kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ni skra med par byas la dkyil 'khor zlum por thig gdab bo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i ras ni ngos
83b4(rgyud): thams cad par gru bzhi po dar ram ras la bri'o/ /sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni ji lta bur 'dus pa'i 'khor bzhin du'o/ /phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis
83b5(rgyud): ma bsdus pa la 'dus pa'i 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du dgod do/ /rdo rje ma rnams kyi ma nyams pa la kha tshar ma bcad pa ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis sbyin med pa'i
83b6(rgyud): tshon rtsi snod gsar par bzhag pas bri/ ras kyi rab tu bya ba'o/ /de la cha lugs kyi tshad rab tu bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang
83b7(rgyud): tsam du bya ba'o/ /phyag na rdo rje'i ni mtha' med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshad du bya ba'o/ /de la rdo rje'i tshad ni ji tsam du 'gyur zhe na/ rang gi mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor
84a1(rgyud): @#/ /mo bcu drug tu bya'o/ /de la rdo rje'i dbyibs ci 'dra bar bya zhe na/ zur bzhi la rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba can sum char bya'o/ /sems dpa'
84a2(rgyud): chen po thams cad ni mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor bcu drug gi tshad du bya ste/ thams cad kyang pad mo la bzhugs par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sku gzugs kyi tshad las
84a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung ting nge 'dzin
84a4(rgyud): gyi tshig ste/ rdo rje rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no/ /de la rtog pa thams cad kyi spyir ni rdo rje'i tshig gi bzlas te sgrub bo/ /phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rje tshig gi glu dang sbyar te bzlas
84a5(rgyud): so/ /rdo rje hUM zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i khro bo rnams ni rdo rje'i khro bo'i tshig gi bzlas so/ /phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams ni chos kyi tshig gi khro bo'i sgra chen po gsal
84a6(rgyud): bar byas te khro ba dang bcas pas bzlas so/ /rdo rje ma rnams ni rdo rje'i tshig phra mos bzlas so/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag ni yid kyis bzlas so/ /de la rdo rje'i ngag ni/
84a7(rgyud): lce thog rab tu mi g.yo bar/ /so mchu gnyis ka sbyar ba ste/ /rtog pa kun la rig pa ni/ /rdo rje dag ni sgra spangs pa'o/ /de la rdo rje'i glu tshig ni/ /sha Ta pa la sogs
84b1(rgyud): pa'i glu/ /grong dga' ba rnams blangs pa yi/ /rdo rje'i tshig bzlas rtog pa ru/ /rdo rje'i glu zhes grags pa'o/ /de la rdo rje'i khro bo'i tshig ni 'di'o/ /hUM zhes pa yi 'brug sgra 'dra/ /
84b2(rgyud): de bzhin phra zhing sgra dang ldan/ /khro bo gsal ba rdo rje che'o/ /khro bo'i tshig ches grags pa'o/ /tshig gi rab tu bya ba'o/ /de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya ba yin te/ rtog
84b3(rgyud): pa dag ni kun la yang / /sems dpa' gang dang gang dag gi /snying po phyag rgya sngags bsgrub pas/ /de yi bdag nyid spyan drang bsgrub/ /gnas dang srog chags thams cad
84b4(rgyud): spyan drang bsgrub/ /gnas dang srog chags thams cad ni/ /rang bzlas pa ni rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'byung ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i snying
84b5(rgyud): po dang / /phyag rgya sngags rig de bzhin te/ /bzlas pa'i don gyis mgon po bzlas/ /rtog pa kun la'ang bsgrub par bya/ /phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /khro bo'i mnyam
84b6(rgyud): par 'jog pa'o/ /rdo rje ma rnams thams cad kyi/ /yid kyis su ni snying yang gzung / /bzlas pa'i don zhes bya ba la/ /phyag na rdo rje'i 'dod pa bsgom zhing bzlas pa ste/
84b7(rgyud): 'di ltar oM zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ste bde ba chen po'o/ /'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /'dod pa ni thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang /
85a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'dod pa ni shin tu dga' ba'o/ /'dod pa ni bzlas pa'i don to/ /gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'di
85a2(rgyud): bzlas na bsod nams chung ngus kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bslu bar mi nus so/ /thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mchod pa
85a3(rgyud): bya ste/ de la me tog gi mchod pa ni me tog gi thal mo gyen du phye bas so/ /bdug pa'i mchod pa ni thur du brkyang bas so/ /mar me'i mchod pa ni mthe bong mnyams
85a4(rgyud): pas g.yogs pa'o/ /dri'i mchod pa ni rab tu brkyang ste stong pa'am/ gang bas so/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid du mchod par 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi
85a5(rgyud): zhing thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa dang / lha
85a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad la yang ngo / /mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de la bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gang
85a7(rgyud): y ang rung ba cig nyin re zhing ji tsam 'dod pa'i tshad du nyi ma bzhir bris nas ji lta ba bzhin du der zhugs la phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rang gi lhag pa'i lha
85b1(rgyud): lan brgya bzlas so/ /bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
85b2(rgyud): myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ ting 'dzin chos sbyin la sogs dang / /rgya chen tshul rnams klog pa dang / /dad la gnas te de bzhin mchod/ /dngos grub myur sbyin chen po
85b3(rgyud): yin/ /de la phyag na rdo rje'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ 'dod la chags dang bral min dang / 'dod la chags pa'i dam pas mchod/ /'dod la ci nus chags bya ba/ /
85b4(rgyud): myur du dngos grub sbyin pa yin/ /de la 'di ni sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa ni/ sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod/ /brtson 'grus bsam gtan de
85b5(rgyud): bzhin blo/ /ci nus kyis kyang bya ba ni/ /nyin gcig bzhin du ci 'dod par/ /phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa myur ba ni/ /sangs rgyas mchod cing de bzhin dang / /phyag na rdo rje
85b6(rgyud): brtul zhugs brtan/ /rdo rje rtag tu lag na bzung / /mi bgrungs thams cad tshar gcod mchog /de nas rdo rje ma rnams kyi grub pa myur du sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ sems
85b7(rgyud): can dge la dang ba dang / /mchod cing dam tshig srung ba ste/ /phyag rgya'i gar gyi mchod pa dang / /sems can ma rung drag shul bya/ /grub pa myur ba'i rab tu bya ba'o/ /de la
86a1(rgyud): @#/ /slob dpon gyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du sgrub pa ste/ dkyil 'khor du de bzhin
86a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar badzra bid ces bya ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas slob dpon rang gis dam tshig gi phyag rgya stong bzlas te/ slob ma dbang bskur ba'i snying po
86a3(rgyud): ni 'di'o/ /badzra satwa/ badzra rat+na/ badzra d+harma/ badzra karma/ oM a mu kha ma d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba ta thA ga ta AR+ya dat+te swAhA/ 'di brgya bzlas pa ni snying ga la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhag
86a4(rgyud): nas spyi bor thams cad bzlas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon sbyin no/ /phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs spyi por bzung nas snying po 'di brgya'am/
86a5(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad du zlos shig brgya bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /brgya rtsa bzlas pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje slob dpon du
86a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de la snying po ni 'di'o/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ de nas de'i lag tu rdo rje sbyin no/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi ste/ lag pa gnyis
86a7(rgyud): su rdo rje byin nas rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje'i dri chus bsres pa'i bum pas dbang bskur ro/ /snying po 'di'o/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa d+hi twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi dri D+ho b+ha ba dzaHhUM baM hoH
86b1(rgyud): hUM phaT/ de nas pad+mo rigs kyi slob dpon du sgrub pa ni pad+ma lag tu byin nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te pad+ma'i phreng bas mgo bcing ngo / /snying po 'di brjod do/ /oM pad
86b2(rgyud): m a mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa lo ke shwa ra ra twe swA hA hrIHrdo rje rin po che'i slob dpon du bsgrub pa ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya slob ma dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag nas snying po 'di
86b3(rgyud): stong bzlas so/ /oM badzra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa rat+na d+hi pa ti twe b+ha ba Ta Ta/ slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad du btsud de dbang bskur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje slob dpon du bya
86b4(rgyud): ste/ yang bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la bdag nyid la bdag gis slob dpon du dbang bskur ro/ /de la slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
86b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i slob dpon ni zla ba gcig gi bar du rab tu byung la bslab pa thams cad bzung ste/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha dus gsum du bsgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
86b6(rgyud): rigs kyi slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am/ rang gi lha nyid la mchod nas kyo btang gis bkug ste/
86b7(rgyud): mi skyo bar bzlas te/ lam dang / lam ma yin pa'i skabs mi dbye'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs
87a1(rgyud): @#/ /'byung ste/ nyin re zhing nang par langs nas bdag nyid byin gyis pa rlab pa la sogs pa byas te/ bkrus la dri zhim po dang / gos 'tsher
87a2(rgyud): ba dang / rgyan gyis chas te/ glu dang / sil snyan dang / bkod pa dang / sgeg pa rnams dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod
87a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das dang / bdag nyid la 'dod pa'i dngos pos mchod pa bya ste/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid ci 'dod
87a4(rgyud): pa bzlas te/ phyed yol gyi bar du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyad nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ ci 'dod par bzlas so/ /de nas yang mtshan rangs par
87a5(rgyud): 'dod pa lnga rnams la brten cing bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar zhag bzhi'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du smyon par
87a6(rgyud): bsgyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing phyag na rdo rje mchod de/ mgo sa la gtugs nas sgren mor phyung ngam/ gos gyon yang rung ste/
87a7(rgyud): mgo bo rdob cing mi'o cog la gshe zhing rgyu la phyag rgya rnams kyi gar byas te/ yid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bsams nas mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa byas
87b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar ba bzhin du mchod pa byas te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/
87b2(rgyud): ba'i gcin hub gang 'thungs la ba'i lci ba cung zad zos na dag pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad 'grub bo/ /de nas zhag bdun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag
87b3(rgyud): nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni nyin re zhing rang la dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po rnams
87b4(rgyud): mchod de rgyal po lta bur sgom zhing rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po'i mdun du brgya brgya zhag brgyad kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de ltar na slob dpon gyis grub pa
87b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / kun gyis mchod pa la sogs pa dang / las thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//

87b7(rgyud): chen po bcings nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa brgyad stong bzlas na 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad la phyag rgya thams cad bcings ba tsam
88a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyis bdag dang / pha rol gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sngags ni rdo rje tshig gis stong phrag brgyar bzlas na sngags thams cad thang cig
88a2(rgyud): bzlas pas las kun byed do/ /rig pa stong phrag brgyar bzlas na de nas rig pa thams cad thang cig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do/ /de nas snying po dang /
88a3(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams 'byung ste/ badzra satwa ni snying po'o/ /satwa badzra ni phyag rgya'o/ /oM ni sngags so/ /khri ti ni rig pa'o/ /de nas snying po dang /
88a4(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po 'byung ste/ oM mahA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar

88a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ phyi ma'i rgyud
88a7(rgyud): bshad pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis 'jig
88b1(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad lags na/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams grub pa de sems can
88b2(rgyud): 'dul ba'i slad du yul gzhan du mchi ba'am/ dbul por 'gyur pa'am/ 'khrug pa'am/ phrag dog gam/ sma dbab pa'am/ sdug bsngal ba'am/ 'dod pa chung ba'am/
88b3(rgyud): 'dod pa la chags pa'am/ rab tu 'byung bar sems pa'am/ gnod pa mang ba'am/ nyes pa mang ba'am/ mya ngan nam/ nad dam/ 'jigs pa mang po la sogs pa gzhan

88b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad pa/ ma thul ba 'dul ba
88b6(rgyud): 'di khyod kyis de bzhin du bshad pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sgrub pa po de dag gis dang por re zhig de brgyad
88b7(rgyud): stong ji lta bar bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan dag gi yang rung ba bsgrub par bya'o/ /gang dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi 'dul ba de lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar
89a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur te/ de dag la yang snying po 'di sbyin no/ /oM b+hU sarba ta thA ga ta badzra satwa hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ 'di yang brgya stong du bzlas nas de nyid dam/
89a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ /sems can kun la phan
89a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ /rtog pa'i dam pa rab bshad pa/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba/ /grub pa thams cad rab stsol mchog /gang gis brjod pa tsam gyi ni/ /sdig pa kun

89a5(rgyud): tshe 'di nyid la ni/ /grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur na/ /dad pa brtul zhugs brtan pa yis/ /grub par byed pa ci smos te/ /sangs rgyas phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid
89a6(rgyud): la de yis thob/ /rtog pa kun kyang sbyar yang rung / /rang gis byas pa'ang de bzhin te/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid bsgrubs na/ /dad pa med kyang myur du 'grub/ /bdag
89a7(rgyud): gi khyim du gnas pa gang / /de la bdag kyang kun 'grub phyir/ /de la bdag ni bsrung bar gnas/ /dngos grub dang ni 'dod kun dang / /'phel ba dang ni 'tshe
89b1(rgyud): med dang / /shes pa rnams dang tshe dang stobs/ /gzugs mchog nges par stsol bar bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/ khams gsum mtha' dag lus
89b2(rgyud): dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i rdul phra mo rnams kyis khyab nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so/ legs so/ sems dpa'
89b3(rgyud): chen po zhes byas nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
89b4(rgyud): po kun rdzogs so/ / //'di'i 'gyur la lo chen rin chen bzang pos bsgyur yang zer/ rnal 'byor rgyud la mkhas pa zha lu ba rgya mtshos tshig don la legs
89b5(rgyud): par dpyad nas zhus dag yang 'ga' zhig rma dge blos bsgyur ro zhes kyang 'dod pa yod/ / //rgya gar skad du su pra ti Sh+tha ta n+t+ra saM gra ha/ bod skad du/ rab tu
89b6(rgyud): gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'chal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
89b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ brdungs pa dang / bris pa dang / 'bur du byas pa la sogs
90a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa/ slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing / /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya sngags dang

90a3(rgyud): 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur/ /yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang / /khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni/ /cho ga dag
90a4(rgyud): dang ldan pas bya/ /cho ga dman pas mi bya ste/ /rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis/ /'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal la/ /'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa

90a6(rgyud): byas bsod nams che ba ni/ /mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye/ /sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis/ /de la byin rlabs 'jug par 'gyur/ /gang du sku
90a7(rgyud): gzugs rdzogs pa la/ /byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na/ /de la bkra mi shis 'byung zhing / /ji srid mchod par de mi 'os/ /dper na skyes bu la la zhig
90b1(rgyud): rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na/ /'jig rten dun gyi mchod mi byed/ /de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de/ /rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la/ /gang gis mchod

90b3(rgyud): pa gang / /de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis/ /skye pa ru ni mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad rab tu

90b6(rgyud): brtags/ /dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na/ /gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab/ /gzod ma nas ni skye med pa/ /ci 'dras ji ltar rab tu gnas/ /dang po'i las can
90b7(rgyud): sems can rnams/ /rtogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad par zad/ /dang por re zhig yongs su brtags pa'i gnas yongs su sbyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang

91a2(rgyud): ldan pas tshes dang / rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon legs par mnyam par gzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod de/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

91a5(rgyud): lha'i khang par rang gi slob ma dang por bcug ste/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i skur bltas la/ lha la mngon par

91b1(rgyud): gsum par du brjod par bya'o/ /oM sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya ho a haM/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /dga' ldan du ni gnas pa las/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs
