92a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bya/ /de nas bsgrub phyir de la ni/ /de la lan gcig gtor bya ba/ /de nas de la sngags 'dis na/ /me dang de nas chu la gtor/ /oM
92a2(rgyud): sarba pA baM da ha na badzrA ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas so/ /de nas/ rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ /don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste/ /de nas gnas gsum rnams su bstim/ /oM
92a3(rgyud): hUM AHyi yi ge gsum/ /oM yig sbyin bor bstim bya zhing / /snying gar hUM gi yi ger 'gyur/ /ngag gi phyogs su AHyig go /sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya/ /yang
92a4(rgyud): na/ gang gi sa bon gang yin pa/ /de yi thugs gar de dgod do/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing / /ci rigs pa ni snyan gsan dbab/ /gser ram dngul lam
92a5(rgyud): zangs ma'am/ /rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni/ /sa 'am dung chos de bzhin te/ /yang na shing lo'i 'dab ma rnams/ /mchod yon snod du sbyar bar bya/ /de bzhin bum pa gser
92a6(rgyud): la sogs/ /zangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni/ /mchod yon snod la rab tu shis/ /gal te nus pas ma rnyed na/ /ji ltar rnyed pas kun tu bya/ /de nas dri yi til
92a7(rgyud): mar sogs/ /dUr ba'i phon gyi pir gyis sbyang / /bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgras/ /na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod/ /til mar la sogs sngags kyis ni//
92b1(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bum lnga 'am yang na brgyad/ /tsan+dan la sogs rnams kyis byug /sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang / /'khor lor byas la mngon
92b2(rgyud): par bsngags/ /bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu 'am/ /yang na ras bal skud pa'ang rung / /tshon chen po yis bsgyur byas la/ /de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya/ /sman lnga rin
92b3(rgyud): chen lnga dang ni/ /me tog 'bras bur ldan pa ste/ /sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan/ /bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ /gtsug tor rnam rgyal zhes bya dang / /gzi
92b4(rgyud): brjid gzhan gyis mi rji dang / /bkra shis zhi rnams sngags kyis ni/ /khrus kyi tshad du mngon par bsngags/ /'jam pa'i til mar dag dang ni/ /u dum wA ra'i lcug
92b5(rgyud): ma bzang / /'khar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu/ /bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya/ /dri lnga yis ni de dag byug /sa bon lnga ni gtor bar bya/ /slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa
92b6(rgyud): yis/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya/ /bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i/ /blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod/ /rig ma spyan ma ji bzhin du/ /cho ga bzhin du
92b7(rgyud): mngon dbang bskur/ /sngags ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis
93a1(rgyud): @#/ /khrus gsol lo/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ lugs ma rnams ni dngos su bkru/ /
93a2(rgyud): ri mo rnams ni me long la'o/ /dag byed lngas ni sngon du bsgo/ /dUr ba yis ni mnye bar bya/ /ras sam lag pa dag gis ni/ /blo dang ldan pas sku lus phyi/ /gur gum
93a3(rgyud): mar dang bcas pas bsku/ /gos zung dag kyang sku la gsol/ /blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /oM d+hi badzra wA
93a4(rgyud): sa se swAhA/ oM badzra gan+d+he swAhA/ oM badzra A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi dbang bskur ba/ /ji ltar 'os par
93a5(rgyud): mngon dbang bskur/ /oM hUM aM dzriM khaM/ de ltar cod pan bcing byas la/ /gdan la legs par bzhugs gsol te/ /brtag pa las gsungs tshul gyis so/ /
93a6(rgyud): mdun phyogs su ni ma bub cing / /yo ba min zhing drang ba yis/ /de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod/ /de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang de
93a7(rgyud): bzhin dri/ /mar me na bza' sogs 'byor gang / /de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra puSh+pe AHhUM/ zhes bya ba 'di dag la
93b1(rgyud): sogs pas so/ /mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni/ /chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes/ /mchog tu dad pas khyod la 'bul/ /ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes/ /lhan cig skyes
93b2(rgyud): dang sbyar las byung / /mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni/ /bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung / /
93b3(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni/ /mchog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes/ /mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog /mar dang til gyi mar me 'di//
93b4(rgyud): yang dag ye shes spyan dbye phyir/ /dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi/ /bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs/ /kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan/ /thams cad ldan pa'i
93b5(rgyud): lha yi bshos/ /bdag gis dbul gyis so sor bzhes/ /de la sogs pa gang yang yung / /cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la/ /de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis/ rim
93b6(rgyud): pa yis ni dbul bar bya/ /sngags kyi gtsang sbra tsA ru bya/ /der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya/ /zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas/ /oM tsak+ShuH
93b7(rgyud): tsak+ShuHsa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ oM d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi pri Na ne swA hA/ de ltar bzlas te de nas yang / /slob ma rab tu bcug byas la/ /khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i/ /sku
94a1(rgyud): @#/ /gzugs dag ni khyad par du/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rab gnas par/ /de dag don ni nges byas te/ /de rnams don ni grub zin gyi/ /ci bde bar ni
94a2(rgyud): mchod par byos/ /de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bar/ /khyod la byas kyis sreg blugs ni/ /stong ngam yang na de yi phyed/ /sngar gsungs par mas 'bru rnams kyis/
94a3(rgyud): 'o ma can gyi bud shing la/ /sreg khung gru bzhir sreg blugs bya/ /de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis/ /lhag ma tsA rur phul byas la/ /bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni/ /zhi dang
94a4(rgyud): rgyas pa 'phel bar bya/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ A gats+tsha ha ri ping+ga le te dza te dza ha lo gi ta k+Sha de hi da ba ya i daM tsa l+ye kAR+yan ku ru swAhA/ oM badzra puSh+Ta ya swAhA/ de ltar byas
94a5(rgyud): la 'bad pa yis/ /khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya/ /sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i/ /tshad tsam du ni rab tu brtag /oM su pra tiSh+Tha badzre swAhA/ me tog spos sogs
94a6(rgyud): sngon 'gro bas/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya/ /oM in+d+ra ya swAhA/ zhes bya bas dbang ldan la thug gi bar du rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de
94a7(rgyud): gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni/ rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang / /gang dag chog ga ma tshang ba/ /de dag bzod pa mdzad
94b1(rgyud): bar rigs/ /kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa ru/ /yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /sa dang chu dang
94b2(rgyud): me rlung gi / lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs la/ /bskal ba brgya ru bsrung gnas mdzod/ /dgyes shing yid bzang gyur nas su/ /slob dpon slob mar bcas pa yi/ /bu dang
94b3(rgyud): tsha po bsrung mdzad nas/ /rang gnas bde bar gshegs su gsol/ /dpyid zla ra ba'am dpyid zla 'bring / /dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chungs sam/ /dbyar ra de bzhin
94b4(rgyud): dbyar 'bring po/ /nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi gnyis pa'am/ /rim bzhin de ltar gsum pa 'am/ /gang tshe gza' dang rjes mthun/ /nag po'i
94b5(rgyud): phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya/ /gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na/ /mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed/ /bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang / /bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no/ /
94b6(rgyud): gnam stong dang ni de bzhin du/ /bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min/ /thams cad du ni chu smad dang / snar ma gro zhun de bzhin te/ /lag pa snubs dang snron dang ni/ /rgyal dang
94b7(rgyud): chu smad de bzhin no/ /khrums smad dag kyang de bzhin te/ /rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du/ /skye dgu 'phel zhing de yi ni/ /rab tu gnas pa'i mchog tu byed/ /skar ma
95a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbo la rab gnas bya/ /des ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid la 'dod pa ci yang rung / /dngos grub me bzhis ster bar 'gyur/ /lus las
95a2(rgyud): shes pa yang dag pa/ /khrums sam yang na gro bzhin gyis/ /lag gis skal bzang snar mas ni/ /gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed/ /mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston/ /
95a3(rgyud): chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson/ /rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis/ /rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur/ /snron gyis mchog tu ba de bar byed/ /lha mtshams kyis ni mchog
95a4(rgyud): ster 'gyur/ /phur bu lag dang pa ba sangs/ /zla ba gza' sogs shes bya ste/ /'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge /gsum pa drug pa
95a5(rgyud): bdun pa la/ /bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba/ /gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad/ /bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la lag/ /gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu /de bzhin
95a6(rgyud): phur bu bcu gcig pa/ /dus sbyor zhi ba las brten nas/ /de la lhag par gnas par bya/ /drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yis/ /pa ba sangs nyid dge ba yin/ /de ltar gza'
95a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyi/ /stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya/ /gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang / /zhing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin/ /dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin/ /nor
95b1(rgyud): rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya/ /rjes su mthun par byed pa pos/ /skad cig de la yongs 'grub cing / /ji ltar gsungs bzhin kun byas na/ /rab tu gnas pa mchog 'gyur
95b2(rgyud): zhing / /'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni/ /thob 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /gza' dang rgyu skar der med de/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med/ /gza' rnams
95b3(rgyud): thams cad rjes mthun zhing / /bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid/ /de ru grub par kun gnas shing / /gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyi/ /dngos grub dag ni ster
95b4(rgyud): bar mdzad/ /yid kyis cung zad gang bsams pa/ /skye dang skye ba 'grub bar 'gyur/ /rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni/ /phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod/ /gang dag de la
95b5(rgyud): grogs byed pa/ /gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya/ /de nas de dag thams cad la/ /dga' bas 'di skad brjod par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams/ /bdag la
95b6(rgyud): mthun pa'i nus pa med/ /de phyir khyod la bdag bzod gsol/ /sngags kyis gtsang sbra'i bza' bca' dag /gzugs brnyan dag la sbyin bya ste/ /bder gshegs lhag ma
95b7(rgyud): 'di dag ni/ /zo zhig sdig pa byang bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya bas so/ /glang po rta glang shing rta nor/ /yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya/ /de nas de la nan tan gyis/ /longs
96a1(rgyud): @#/ /spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya/ /gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na/ /bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing / /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /bla ma
96a2(rgyud): yang dag mnyes par bya/ /de nas yang dag brtul zhugs can/ /dge slong dge bsnyen dge slong ma/ /mchog tu gus pas mchod byas la/ /ji ltar 'os pa'i yon
96a3(rgyud): yang dbul/ /dung ngam rol mo sgra la sogs/ /bzang po'i glu dang gar rnams kyis/ /gnyen dang rigs rgyud 'khor rnams kyis/ /rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul/ /
96a4(rgyud): de ltar thams cad phul zin nas/ /gang rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la/ /phul lam 'bul bar byed pa rnams/ /slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi/ /bzo bo la ni mi
96a5(rgyud): sbyin zhing / /dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya/ /slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te/ /nor rnams thams cad de la dbul/ /de nas dkyil 'khor byug bya ste/ /ba yi lci
96a6(rgyud): bas byugs bya zhing / /rdul tshon chu bor rab dor ro/ /de yis yang dag legs par 'gyur/ /rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //
96a7(rgyud): kha che'i paN+Ti ta chen po dz+nyA na badzra dang / lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur ba'o// //dur khrod dag dang bshan pa yi/ /khyim dang srin
96b1(rgyud): po'i gnas rnams su/ /mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba/ /tha ba khung tha ma bar ma mchog /phyed dang gsum mam khru gsum mam/ /khru dgu pa ni byas pa las/ /stegs bu de yi tshad
96b2(rgyud): brtsigs te/ /gru gsum pa'am mdung rtse 'dra/ /lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni/ /bskus pas thab khung nag por bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /nag po shin tu 'bar ba
96b3(rgyud): bri/ /mu ran steng du rtse gsum dang / /rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan/ /de yi phyi rol mu khyud la/ /dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri/ /de yi phyi
96b4(rgyud): rol keng rus te/ /bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan/ /dud sprin mdog 'dra drang srong mchog /ra yi steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang / /gzar bu phreng ba ril bar
96b5(rgyud): ldan/ /de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas/ /lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg /shin tu gdug cing tsher mar bcas/ /sreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang / /sha
96b6(rgyud): dang khrag dang lcags phye dang / /rus phye dug dang ke tshe dang / /dri chen dri chu la sogs pa'i/ /rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni/ /bsgos pas lan grangs 'bum bsregs
96b7(rgyud): nas/ /de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang / /gnyen dang 'khor dang bran rnams dang / /bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams/ /spangs te srog dang bral nas ni/ /sdug bsngal
97a1(rgyud): @#/ /mi bzad myong bar 'gyur/ /mngon spyod kyi las rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dza ya ra k+Shi tas
97a2(rgyud): bsgyur ba'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ shrI pa ra mA di nA ma mahA yA na kalpa rA dzA/ bod skad du/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i rtog pa'i
97a3(rgyud): rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
97a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig dang / /mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che
97a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal
97a6(rgyud): 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ sems
97a7(rgyud): can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen
97b1(rgyud): po/ rtag pa dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags pa/ bstod pa/
97b2(rgyud): nor bu chen po dang / rin po ches sbras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa
97b3(rgyud): dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na byang chub
97b4(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'
97b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
97b6(rgyud): chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor
97b7(rgyud): lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab
98a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs gcig ste/ yongs su bskor
98a2(rgyud): cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
98a3(rgyud): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di yang dag par ston
98a4(rgyud): te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/
98a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /rig pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par
98a6(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /thams cad la dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
98a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/
98b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /bsnyems pa rnam pa dag pa'i gnas de ni
98b2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid tshim par byed pa rnam par
98b3(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /lus
98b4(rgyud): bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
98b5(rgyud): gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
98b6(rgyud): gnas so/ /ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam
98b7(rgyud): par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/ /badzra hUM/ lag na rdo rje/ su las chos thams
99a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas bsgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig thos na yang / de byang chub kyi
99a2(rgyud): snying po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal
99a3(rgyud): ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'dzin pa'am/ nyin
99a4(rgyud): re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas chos thams
99a5(rgyud): cad la dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
99a6(rgyud): chen po'i chos bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
99a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje dbyings mtha' dag gi sems dpa'i mchog khams gsum po mtha'
99b1(rgyud): dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod pa/ don thams cad grub pa/
99b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa thams cad pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
99b3(rgyud): gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying gar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde
99b4(rgyud): ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa
99b5(rgyud): d ang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad rjes su mnyes pa brtan pos mnyes par byas te bkug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
99b6(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dam tshig gi bcings nas dbang du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
99b7(rgyud): b de ba chen po'i bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs
100a1(rgyud): @#/ /so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
100a2(rgyud): par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil
100a3(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /de nyid dang po dam tshig che/ /rdo rje byin rlabs zhes bya'o/ /gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang / /khyams rnams kyis ni yongs bskor ba/ /rta babs bzhi dang
100a4(rgyud): yang dag ldan/ /'od zer 'bar bar 'khrigs ba'i 'od/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i/ /rin chen kun
100a5(rgyud): gyis nye bar mdzes/ /rtse mo sna tshogs ba dan ni/ /dril bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod/ /me tog chun 'phyang me long spras/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du 'khor
100a6(rgyud): lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru/ /rdo rje thig gis thig gdab pa/ /rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad/ /de yi dbus su ci rigs par/ /sangs rgyas sku ni gzhag bya
100a7(rgyud): ste/ /'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /rdo rje phreng sogs kyis spras shing / /sna tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /pad+ma'i gdan
100b1(rgyud): la bzhugs par ni/ /lugs ma'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o/ /rang gi snying po kun bzlas te/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ /
100b2(rgyud): snying po nyid kyis yang dag dgod/ /rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus/ /gzhag gam yang na bri bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun tu ston
100b3(rgyud): pa'o/ /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can/ /rdo rje mtshon ni gsor bar brtson/ /dmar skya dag tu nges par dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs
100b4(rgyud): su/ /rdo rje kI li kI la ni/ /yan lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa/ /rdo rje can gzugs nyi ma'i 'od/ /rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni/ /chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs/ /sngo skya'i mdog can
100b5(rgyud): ci rigs par/ /blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya/ /g.yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa ni/ /bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis 'dzin pa/ /btso ma'i gser dang
100b6(rgyud): 'dra bar dgod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /me tog la sogs kyis mtshan cing / /thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i/ /mchod pa chen po bzhag par bya/ /phyi yi
100b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'dod par bya/ /sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du/ /gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod/ /sangs rgyas dkyil
101a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor can brgyad ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor
101a2(rgyud): gnas rnams su/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug bri bya ste/ /mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal lo/ /'dod pa'i tshangs pa zhi byed mchog /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug
101a3(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'byung ste/ de la dang po nyid du ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga 'dir zhugs pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon dang / dkyil 'khor
101a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi slob dpon dang / dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang / chos thams cad rig pa dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang /
101a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang / mchod pa thams cad dang /
101a6(rgyud): 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid kyis
101a7(rgyud): bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig thams cad kyi lam la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing byin gyis brlab par rtog par 'gyur ro/ /ma
101b1(rgyud): brlabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mdor bsdus na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog
101b2(rgyud): ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs
101b3(rgyud): s hing don yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gis bcings la dbang du byas te rjes su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug cing bsgrubs na 'grub par
101b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ snying po lan gcig brjod nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rnam par
101b5(rgyud): sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas la phyag byas nas gos dmar po gyon la me tog gi phreng ba thogs te gdong dris byug pa dang / rdo rje thal mos rdo rje'i gar byed
101b6(rgyud): cing bskor bas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgeg pa dang / bskor bas gdung zhing snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de
101b7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid la dgyes
102a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing smin ma bskyod la sku thams cad dam/ yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro/ /'od zer gyi
102a2(rgyud): rang bzhin gyi zhal lam/ /sku thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ /cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba stsol ba'am/
102a3(rgyud): dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa dang /
102a4(rgyud): mi gsod par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
102a5(rgyud): rjes sgrub par mdzad do/ /de nas de yang dag par mchod de rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur zhing dpa' bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ snying po bzlas nas
102a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas rang nyid kyis stsol cig ces brjod la rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub
102a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ /
102b1(rgyud): de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no/ /de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa yang byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrubs la 'byung
102b2(rgyud): bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba bsgrub pa lan gcig bya'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i
102b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang / bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas
102b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste/ shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub
102b5(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ zhugs pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa
102b6(rgyud): byas nas rdo rje slob ma la cho ga rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byas te phyag rgya bcing ba yang bslab par bya'o/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dam tshig
102b7(rgyud): la mos pa de rnams la yang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
103a1(rgyud): @#/ /lha gzhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar zhugs pa
103a2(rgyud): rnams zas dang / ro bcud dang / gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la/ ji ltar shes pa'i gar dang / glu dang / dgod pa dang / bu
103a3(rgyud): dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen mtshams dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o/ /de la 'dir ni snod dang / snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/
103a4(rgyud): sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di dang / 'dod pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas
103a5(rgyud): rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ /de nas cho ga 'byung ste/ zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tu
103a6(rgyud): dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur par dang por byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje'i tshig gis brjod cing ji srid zla ba gcig
103a7(rgyud): gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub thams cad 'grub
103b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ras bris 'dri ba'am/ 'drir gzhug par 'dod na dang por rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la/ de'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad
103b2(rgyud): du yang de nyid kyis dang por brtsam par bya ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das cho ga ji lta bzhin du bri zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri
103b3(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul ltar bzlas nas zla ba nya pa'i mtshan mo thog thag ji lta ba bzhin
103b4(rgyud): du skyo bar ma gyur pas phyag rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba stsol
103b5(rgyud): cing sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
103b6(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bri bar bya'o/ /de
103b7(rgyud): nas de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas kyi nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'grub po/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsnyems pa dang bcas pa bris la/
104a1(rgyud): @#/ /de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /
104a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo gcig pa bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du
104a3(rgyud): zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad
104a4(rgyud): phul bas so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su mnyes par
104a5(rgyud): bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so/ /rdo rjes thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni rang gi snying po bzlas pas so/ /lha la sogs pa sems can thams
104a6(rgyud): cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so/ /bdag bsrung ba la ni yungs kar la lan gcig bzlas pas so/ /gzhan bsrung ba la ni
104a7(rgyud): rdo rje bskor bas so/ /thams cad bsrung ba la ni yid kyis lan gcig go /mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni blta ba'am/
104b1(rgyud): yungs kar la sogs pas so/ /sems can thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so/ /sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje
104b2(rgyud): btsir bas so/ /sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsum nas bzlas pas so/ /thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje bral bas so/ /sems can thams cad rgyas
104b3(rgyud): gdab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgyas so/ /snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so/ /sems can thams cad za ba la ni ldang zhing myur
104b4(rgyud): bas zlos pas so/ /sems can thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgyas so/ /nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gser gyis bzlas pas so/ /nor dang /
104b5(rgyud): 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi wang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pas
104b6(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad 'bigs pa dang / rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad chags par bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de
104b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so/ /gdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan por nges par 'tshir bas so/ /ma rungs pa rab tu bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje
105a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsnyems pas so/ /rgyan thams cad dbrog pa la ni 'bar ba'i blta bas dbrog pas so/ /thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje
105a2(rgyud): khu tshur snying khar bzhag pas so/ /mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje kha shar du bltas te bskor bas so/ /lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyi
105a3(rgyud): bzlas pas so/ /gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so/ /sgra thams cad thos par bya ba la ni rdo rje pi wang
105a4(rgyud): gis so/ /dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so/ /zas dang / skom thams cad dang / bcud thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje spo
105a5(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / se gol dang / glu'i bzlas pas so/ /thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la bdag nyid gar
105a6(rgyud): byed cing bzlas pas so/ /thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas pas so/ /thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje ma chu yis so/ /thams
105a7(rgyud): cad babs nas lan ston pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pas so/ /gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgyas so/ /gdon thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa
105b1(rgyud): la ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas pas so/ /rims nad thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gdon gyis so/ /rims thams cad bsal
105b2(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rje'i lta bas bsal bas so/ /dug thams cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta ba'i dug gi phyag rgyas so/ /dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chun bos so/ /dug thams
105b3(rgyud): cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so/ /bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i
105b4(rgyud): gdon thams cad las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams
105b5(rgyud): cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas so/ /ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / snying po dang /
105b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa dang / gsang ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phaT kyis so/ /ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug
105b7(rgyud): par bya ba la ni ma mo'i gnas su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs kyis so/ /
106a1(rgyud): @#/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo / /'thab pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rgyal
106a2(rgyud): mtshan gyi phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o/ /thams cad dgrol ba la ni yi ge mu yis so/ /ro langs dang / 'khrul 'khor thams
106a3(rgyud): cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis so/ /lcags sgrog thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long gis so/ /me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel
106a4(rgyud): gyis so/ /chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis so/ /nam mkha' las zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad la sogs pa
106a5(rgyud): yo byad mang po 'byung ba la ni nam mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /nam mkha' las sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs thams cad ston pa la ni
106a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rjes su dran la nam mkhar lta zhing bzlas pas so/ /nam mkha' las yi ges 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden
106a7(rgyud): par ston pa la ni yi ge a bris la bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas so/ /pra se na thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo
106b1(rgyud): ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pra se na thams cad dbab pas so/ /de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so/ /
106b2(rgyud): rna bas thos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so/ /rnas mnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so/ /lces rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas
106b3(rgyud): pas so/ /lus kyis reg par bya ba la ni lus la bzlas pas so/ /yid kyis shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so/ /rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan
106b4(rgyud): pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so/ /sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun po la 'bum bzlas pas so/ /thams cad g.yog par bya ba la ni zhi
106b5(rgyud): ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so/ /thams cad la lan ldon par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rjes so/ /rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag
106b6(rgyud): rgyas so/ /cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so/ /rang gi lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje sems
106b7(rgyud): dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje bskor bas
107a1(rgyud): @#/ /so/ /klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gnod sbyin thams cad mngag gzhug par
107a2(rgyud): bya ba la ni rdo rje'i bka' bsgo bas so/ /'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la
107a3(rgyud): ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag rgyas so/ /glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so/ /char dbab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o/ /
107a4(rgyud): char gcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin blug bya'o/ /sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /sprin bshig pa la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i sprin
107a5(rgyud): gyis so/ /chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so/ /gter thams cad shes par bya ba la ni snod du
107a6(rgyud): chu blug par bya'o/ /gter thams cad brko ba la ni rdo rje 'jor gyis so/ /gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni rdo rje nor gyis so/ /rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni
107a7(rgyud): rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje
107b1(rgyud): 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so/ /dam tshig thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo
107b2(rgyud): rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyems pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so/ /ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i
107b3(rgyud): phyag rgyas so/ /rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /rdo rje thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag
107b4(rgyud): rgyas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rjes so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos so/ /sangs rgyas
107b5(rgyud): nyid bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na
107b6(rgyud): nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin
107b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ rdo rje sra
108a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid
108a2(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang
108a3(rgyud): chub chen po'o/ /thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/ /lag na rdo rje/
108a4(rgyud): gang la la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la
108a5(rgyud): thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su
108a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'dir nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /aH/ de nas 'di
108a7(rgyud): gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
108b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugs so/ /de nas
108b2(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
108b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i
108b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad kar sna tshogs pad+mar rab tu
108b5(rgyud): gnas pa de'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i phyogs thams cad
108b6(rgyud): du sa la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad gzhag gam bri bar bya'o/ /de nas tshon gyi thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs
108b7(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang / mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa'
109a1(rgyud): @#/ /brgyad ci lta ba bzhin bzhag nas bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams su dgod par bya zhing / byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/
109a2(rgyud): shar nas brtsams te ne'u gsings dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang / ro drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / gos la sogs pas
109a3(rgyud): yongs su bkang ba'i snod dang / 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod do/ /de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gshegs
109a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na/ bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob
109a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang / dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang / mi sod pa dang / sgrib pa thams
109a6(rgyud): cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug go /zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba yang sbyin
109a7(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /bstan pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /rnam par mi rtog
109b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ji lta bas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/ /dam tshig chen po'i dkyil
109b2(rgyud): 'khor ro/ /de nas sgrub pa ni ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dzum pa dang bcas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya yongs
109b3(rgyud): su 'dzin par bya'o/ /gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang / dngos grub mchog
109b4(rgyud): rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te/ 'di'i mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi
109b5(rgyud): khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur la/ de nas de
109b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs pas kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin
109b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ji snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas so/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
110a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bas so/ /dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs pa la bzlas pa so/ /sems can
110a2(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so/ /chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po gdon pas
110a3(rgyud): so/ /bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rgyan thams cad phul
110a4(rgyud): zhing rang nyid bcings pas so/ /chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje pad+ma la blta bas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub thob pa la
110a5(rgyud): ni thams cad rdo rje'i las kyi mchog gis so/ /sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen pos so/ /bde ba chen
110a6(rgyud): po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal
110a7(rgyud): po rdzogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa'o// //de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang
110b1(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ /'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa
110b2(rgyud): nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams
110b3(rgyud): cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi spros pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ gang
110b4(rgyud): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems
110b5(rgyud): can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song gi skye bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /
110b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya
110b7(rgyud): bcings la/ khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste 'bar bar blta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa'i tshul
111a1(rgyud): @#/ /gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po thams
111a2(rgyud): c ad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste lhung bar mdzad nas dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rnam
111a3(rgyud): p ar rgyal bar mdzad bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul te bslang nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po
111a4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas pa zhabs gnyis su phab nas mnan pa mdzad do/ /de nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du sgra chen po
111a5(rgyud): bsgrags te/ kye/ rdo rje 'chang chen po/ yongs su skyob par mdzod cig /bdag cag rnams ma gzir cig /'dir khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o/ /dam

111b2(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad nas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas rdo rje
111b3(rgyud): r in chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs te rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang rjes su stsal nas sems can ma lus pa'i don du phyi'i
111b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu bzhag go / de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje las phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid can kha dog dang / rgyan dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs
111b5(rgyud): bsnams pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ tshems kyis sgros gnon pa/ smin ma mi bzad cing khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ spyan dang / dbu skra dang / ag
111b6(rgyud): tsom 'bar ba/ zhal 'jigs pa/ rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / mtshon cha mda' dang / dbyig pa dang / ral gri dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / gri ring
111b7(rgyud): dang | chu gri phyag na bsnams pa/ khro bo chen po hUM mdzad las phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /lha
112a1(rgyud): @#/ /la sogs pa de rnams kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag go /gdon la sogs pa de dag kyang
112a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim na gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
112a3(rgyud): la snyoms bar zhugs nas khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /de
112a4(rgyud): nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ /'dul ba chen po 'dul byed pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor dang po'i
112a5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su khro bo che/ /phyag na rdo rje
112a6(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas phreng la sogs pas spras/ /ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /zhal ni cung zad mche ba gtsigs/ /khro bcas bzhad pa'i zhal
112a7(rgyud): mnga' ba/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis legs bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad bsdus pas so/ /g.yon gyi zhabs kyis legs gnon pa/ /de yi bya ba dbang phyug che/ /
112b1(rgyud): g.yas ni dka' thub zlog ma yi/ /nu ma'i steng du rab tu 'jog /'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyis/ /khro bo kun tu gzhag
112b2(rgyud): par bya/ /'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo de yang mkhas pa yis/ /'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od can bri/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /
112b3(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams so/ /khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi bo ni/ /gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang / /'khor lo de bzhin rtse gsum bsgreng / /sgo rnams kun tu
112b4(rgyud): bri bar bya/ /phyi rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi/ /sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang / /ba dan sngon po dril btags shing / /rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs pa'o/ /de
112b5(rgyud): n as 'dir 'jug pa la ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon po zung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas pas 'dzin par gyur pas
112b6(rgyud): zhugs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /de nas brtsams te sdig pa la sogs pa rnam par grol zhing mi sad
112b7(rgyud): pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mu stegs thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang / phan 'dogs nus shing thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub
113a1(rgyud): @#/ /par 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje rnon po rtse bzhi pa
113a2(rgyud): 'bar ba byin la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste/ 'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje ste/ /

113a5(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / ma mo rnams bri bar bya ste/ de nas bsgrub pa chen po la yang de bzhin te/ de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni ras la bcom ldan

113a7(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang / de bzhin du thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba dang /
113b1(rgyud): dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dgrol ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / lkugs par bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid med

113b5(rgyud): kyi snying 'byin pa la ni khros pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o/ /gdug pa thams cad tshad gcad pa la ni khros p+sa rdo rje bskor bar bya'o/ /gdug cing khros pa dogs pa la ni/ /
113b6(rgyud): khros pas lcags phye'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni rang gi sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /gnod sbyin thams cad bskrad pa la ni ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas

114a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad dbang du bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / bsnun pa dang / gsod pa dang / gdul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed
