114a3(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rje skyes bus so/ /'dod pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu
114a4(rgyud): dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral bas so/ /dbang phyug chen po 'dul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje tri shU dral bas so/ /ma mo
114a5(rgyud): thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / gsang ba'i dngos
114a6(rgyud): grub rnam par gtor zhing rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed pas so/ /ri dang / shing dang / khyim dang / gtsug lag
114a7(rgyud): khang dang / grong khyer dang / mchod rten dang / lha'i khang pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa
114b1(rgyud): la ni rdo rje khro ba'i lha bas mig la reg pas so/ /ltung ba thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje khro bo bslang bas so/ /thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas
114b2(rgyud): so| |thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang / dbrog pas so/ /'jigs pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so/ /dpung thams cad bsad
114b3(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mos so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / long bar bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa
114b4(rgyud): dang | bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo ma rungs pa'i srin mos so/ /rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po thams cad gsad pa la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gis sbyin
114b5(rgyud): sreg byas pas so/ /lha thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab pas so/ /lha'i bdag po thams cad bsreg pa la ni lha
114b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi yam shing gis so/ /rang gi khrag gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'khro bo sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so/ /khams
114b7(rgyud): gsum thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
115a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i khro bos so/ /khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang /
115a2(rgyud): nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so/ /khams gsum po thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
115a3(rgyud): bcing pa dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gnon par bya ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khro bos so/ /
115a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
115a5(rgyud): po rdzogs so/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang
115a6(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ 'dod
115a7(rgyud): chags thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis
115b1(rgyud): 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten nas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /
115b2(rgyud): shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
115b3(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+mo lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams
115b4(rgyud): dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
115b5(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid yang rgya cher ston cing bzhin
115b6(rgyud): rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la blta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma'i gzugs sna
115b7(rgyud): tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /hrIH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis pad+ma chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan tham
116a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba'i pad+mas mtshan pa'i gzugs can nges par phyung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
116a2(rgyud): gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzigs pa'i ye
116a3(rgyud): s hes kyi dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
116a4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor ci lta ba'i nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa la de bzhin du sgo dang / mtshams su bcas par bri'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad
116a5(rgyud): pa'i tshul du thig bzhis thig btab pa la tshon dmar pos pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgong par bya'o/ /de'i mdun
116a6(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po chags pa sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ pad+ma chen po dang / mda' dang / gzhu bsnams pa/ g.yas su bcom ldan 'das
116a7(rgyud): pad+ma chen po'i gtum po dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog
116b1(rgyud): nag po gzhag par bya'o/ /g.yon du pad+ma chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po bzhag par bya'o/ /g.yas kyi mtshams su pad+ma chen
116b2(rgyud): po sa 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /mtshams gnyis par pad+ma chen po rgya mtsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gsum par pad+ma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can
116b3(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o/ /bzhi par pad+ma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su shrI hI gI d+hI lha mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste/
116b4(rgyud): thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par bya'o/ /sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mya ngan las
116b5(rgyud): 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi gzugs dang / sbrul gyi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang / pad+ma'i gzugs zhes bya'o/ /
116b6(rgyud): de nas gos dkar po bgos te/ gos dkar pos gdong g.yogs la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste/
116b7(rgyud): gang du babs pa de des bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma blangs la pad ma'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing pad+ma'i 'dab
117a1(rgyud): @#/ /ma la blta bar bya ste/ ci ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyis nyes pas mi gos te/ /'dam gyi nang na dag pa ltar/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
117a2(rgyud): sogs de bzhin/ /de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni/ /blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang / /nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob
117a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras
117a4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so/ /de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / bkra shis shing dngos grub
117a5(rgyud): thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin
117a6(rgyud): no/ /ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma bsgrubs kyang
117a7(rgyud): thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/ /thams cad gsad pa la ni pad+ma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams
117b1(rgyud): cad rmongs par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po phag gis so/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas
117b2(rgyud): so/ /sa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du bya ba la ni sa la skyil mo krung bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o/ /chu thams cad
117b3(rgyud): dbab pa la ni klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni mun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis so/ /rlung thams cad dgug
117b4(rgyud): pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rlung gi mchog gis so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
117b5(rgyud): po las/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtog pa'o// //de nas
117b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba ye shes kyi
117b7(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /nor
118a1(rgyud): @#/ /sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zang
118a2(rgyud): zing sbyin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po
118a3(rgyud): bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas te/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po ches dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba
118a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /trAM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang
118a5(rgyud): bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis
118a6(rgyud): bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
118a7(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i
118b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'i nang du rin po che zur brgyad pa/ rin po che'i ka ba brgyad la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcugs
118b2(rgyud): mas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba dang / lcog dang / me tog gi phreng / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o/ /
118b3(rgyud): de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rta'i khri la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang nyid 'ching bar mdzad cing zhal rnam par bzhad pa margad kyi mdog can gzhag
118b4(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa
118b5(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o/ /g.yas su rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin pa dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /rgyab tu chos chen po rin po che'i glegs bam 'dzin pa gzhag
118b6(rgyud): par bya'o/ /g.yon du rin po che chen po ro myong ba zas dang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rin po che'i
118b7(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rnga dang / srog shing rnams/ 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi mtshams su bum pa gang ba rnams so/ /sgo rnams su ni dbang
119a1(rgyud): @#/ /bskur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi rol du ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re rnams
119a2(rgyud): kyis kun tu khyab par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas zhugs nas/ de nas brtsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i
119a3(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcings te rin po che blangs nas rin po che'i ming gi dbang
119a4(rgyud): bskur bas dbang bskur la sbyin pa thams cad phul nas slar dbyung bar bya'o/ /slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no/ /rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil
119a5(rgyud): 'khor ro/ /sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas ma bsgrubs par dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur
119a6(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas so/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas pas so/ /chos thams cad
119a7(rgyud): kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la blta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o/ /zas dang / skom thams cad la sogs pa dang / ro thams cad thob par bya
119b1(rgyud): ba la ni nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas brjod stong byas pas so/ /shin tu mthon po thob phar bya ba la ni gdugs
119b2(rgyud): bzung nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis so/ /grags pa dang / snyan pa chen po dang / ming thob par
119b3(rgyud): bya ba la ni nyin re zhing kha thams cad du bltas nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /bdag po chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgyas so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don
119b4(rgyud): yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /rin po
119b5(rgyud): che'i rigs kyi rtog pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
119b6(rgyud): cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab
119b7(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du
120a1(rgyud): @#/ /'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
120a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag
120a3(rgyud): rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
120a4(rgyud): tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
120a5(rgyud): shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med
120a6(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig
120a7(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub
120b1(rgyud): kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /aH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad
120b2(rgyud): b com ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas
120b3(rgyud): gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis kyang sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig gi
120b4(rgyud): sems dpa' phyung nas kyang dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs
120b5(rgyud): p a thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
120b6(rgyud): gsungs so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas bris la nang du rdo rje'i thig gi 'khor lo bri'o/ /de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig btab la/
120b7(rgyud): dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur phyag gnyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du rdo rje sku'i mchog ces bya
121a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba rdo rje bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje ljags zhes bya ba rdo rje lce'i mchog 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyab tu ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje
121a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o/ /shar lho'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gnyis pa la ni nor gyi khu tshur zhes
121a3(rgyud): bya ba dang / gsum pa la ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / bzhi pa la ni las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / rang gi phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang 'dzin par bya'o/ /
121a4(rgyud): sgo rnams su ni rdo rje bsnyems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung la rang nyid zhugs nas phyag rgya
121a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi slob dpon tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad don yod pas 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu
121a6(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur ba myur bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /der zhugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa bcom ldan
121a7(rgyud): 'das las bslab pa bya zhing rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /gzugs brnyan lta bur
121b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya kun zhes bya bar bsgrags/ /dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba'o/ /slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /
121b2(rgyud): sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams kyang de bzhin/ phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba bsgrub pa la ni snying gar rdo rje'i khu
121b3(rgyud): tshur gyis so/ /phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i khu tshur gyis so/ /dam tshig thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /sems can rjes
121b4(rgyud): su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje chags pa chen po'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje
121b5(rgyud): bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad bsdam par bya ba la ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhal zhal gyi khu tshur
121b6(rgyud): gyis so/ /thams cad btsir ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje
121b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nges par 'tshir ba'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams
122a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad
122a2(rgyud): smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje brdung ba'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad lkugs pa
122a3(rgyud): dang / 'phye bor bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po 'phye ba'i khu tshur gyis so/ /phyag rgyas thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams
122a4(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgyas gzhig pa la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dbye ba la ni hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /phyag rgya thams
122a5(rgyud): cad bcing pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /phyag rgya thams cad rdo rjer bya ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma mo'i khu tshur gyis so/ /
122a6(rgyud): thams cad phye mar bya ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad rnam par gzhig par bya ba la ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad gzhig pa dang /
122a7(rgyud): rnam par gzhom pa la ni dbang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /chu'i nang du gnas shing 'chags pa la ni rdo rje gnon po'i khu tshur gyis so/ /gzugs mang por ston pa la ni
122b1(rgyud): rdo rje sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so/ /mi snang ba'i dngos grub la ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rdo rje nam
122b2(rgyud): mkha'i khu tshur gyis so/ /nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur gyis
122b3(rgyud): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje las kyi khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur
122b4(rgyud): gyis so/ /nor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid la ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so/ /las thams
122b5(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /rang nyid 'das pa dang /
122b6(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams ston pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyu mchog gi khu tshur gyis so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /
122b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/
123a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom
123a2(rgyud): l dan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
123a3(rgyud): bshad do/ /ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'i
123a4(rgyud): tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/ /de nas bcom
123a5(rgyud): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don 'di rgya cher ston te/ bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing
123a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs so/ /a/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa mdzad nas
123a7(rgyud): dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pas spros pa med pa'i ral gri zhes bya
123b1(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor ci lta ba'i nang du 'khor
123b2(rgyud): lo bris la/ a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i phreng ba go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul gyis thig btab la de'i lte ba la bcom ldan
123b3(rgyud): 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang zhing 'dzum pa dang bcas pa nam mkha'i mdog can phyag bzhi dang / ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams
123b4(rgyud): cad la 'debs par gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i mdun la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi'i mtshams rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu
123b5(rgyud): phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar thob pa bzhin du gzhag par bya'o/ /sgo rnams su ni mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / lhung bzed dang /
123b6(rgyud): glegs bam rnams so/ /de nas ral gri dang / glegs bam gyi phyag rgya de bzhin du chos kyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas ral gri blangs te ral gri'i ming gi
123b7(rgyud): dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces chos 'di bshad par bya ste/ ral gri 'di ni rtag zungs la/ /shes rab tshul 'di bkar smra zhing / /nam mkhar sangs rgyas
124a1(rgyud): @#/ /sbyor ba yis/ /'debs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir dang / /sems can mang po bsrung ba'i phyir/ /
124a2(rgyud): 'dis bsad sdig par mi 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /slob ma rnams la'ang de bzhin te/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
124a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor
124a4(rgyud): ro/ /sgrub pa'ang de bzhin no/ /ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni thams cad nam mkha'
124a5(rgyud): bsgoms pas so/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas so/ /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni
124a6(rgyud): smon pa med pa bsgoms pas so/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi ye shes thob pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas so/ /nyon mongs pa
124a7(rgyud): thams cad gcod pa la ni chos bsgoms pas so/ /yi ge thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes la ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so/ /gnas thams
124b1(rgyud): cad du yi ges chos kyi bya ba mthong bas ni a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i ngo bo nyid bsgoms pas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub pa thob pa la ni rdo rje'i
124b2(rgyud): ral gri'i phyag rgyas so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ 'khor lo chen po ltar yi ge bskor ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i
124b3(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /'jam dpal gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus
124b4(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de
124b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la
124b6(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug
124b7(rgyud): pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher
125a1(rgyud): @#/ /ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di
125a2(rgyud): smras so/ /hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po can khams gsum tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dkyil
125a3(rgyud): ' khor thams cad du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor
125a4(rgyud): gyi tshul gyis ci lta ba bzhin du bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya
125a5(rgyud): z hes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs
125a6(rgyud): so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la/ dbus su rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor ba gzhag par bya'o/ /phyag
125a7(rgyud): na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i
125b1(rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /sgo rnams su mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang / rdo rje khro bo'i sku dang / spyan ras
125b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi sku dang / nam mkha'i snying po'i sku rnams so/ /de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas
125b3(rgyud): nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor lo blangs la 'khor lo'i ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya zhing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
125b4(rgyud): bzhi'i thig btab pa'i rigs rnams su 'jug par bya'o/ /slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /sgrub pa yang de bzhin no/ /ma
125b5(rgyud): bsgrubs par yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los te/ rang gi khar bcug la gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni
125b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos so/ /de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so/ /de bzhin du dam
125b7(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khor los so/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi 'khor los so/ /de bzhin du
126a1(rgyud): @#/ /rjes su chags par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / don thob pa dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gcad pa dang / 'jug pa dang / mchod pa
126a2(rgyud): dang / gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la ni sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya g.yon na 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don
126a3(rgyud): yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i
126a4(rgyud): rtog pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa snod kyi mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog
126a5(rgyud): ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /
126a6(rgyud): sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de
126a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
126b1(rgyud): klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas
126b2(rgyud): pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces
126b3(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /oM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' thams cad las mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ nam mkha'i khams ma lus par
126b4(rgyud): spros par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems
126b5(rgyud): d pa' nam mkha'i mdzod mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i mchod pa'i mchog
126b6(rgyud): don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du rin po che'i ka ba brgyad byas la/ dbus su
126b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal 'dzum pa/ sku dang / yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhag par bya'o/ /
127a1(rgyud): @#/ /de'i phyogs thams cad du dam tshig sems dpa' rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs
127a2(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po/ byang chub kyi sems dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du smra ba dang /
127a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / mchod pa thams cad dang / sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis
127a4(rgyud): ci lta ba bzhin du gzhag go / phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / sgo rnams su ni dbyig dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rin po che ste
127a5(rgyud): mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thams cad kyis mchod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la/
127a6(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las thams cad dang / phyag bya ba dang / ngag dang /
127a7(rgyud): yid dang / sems kyis chos kyi dbyings su spros pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya zhing / rdo rje dang / phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas
127b1(rgyud): pa'o/ /slob ma rnams kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas sgrub pa dang / dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas ma bsgrubs par
127b2(rgyud): yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas so/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so/ /dbang bskur
127b3(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so/ /phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni sna tshogs rdo rje thams cad kyis so/ /stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni a la sogs
127b4(rgyud): pa'i yi ge'i lung bstan pas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so/ /mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so/ /gdug pa 'dul
127b5(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos so/ /me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas pas so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ sna tshogs
127b6(rgyud): rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so/ /nam mkha'i mdzod kyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
127b7(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang / ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
128a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshul 'di bshad do/ /sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do/ /sems can thams cad dul ba nyid pas khro bo
128a2(rgyud): dul ba nyid do/ /sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do/ /sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
128a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin
128a4(rgyud): rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba snying po 'di smras so/ /ha/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam
128a5(rgyud): gyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi thugs las byung ste/ dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs
128a6(rgyud): so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs thams cad kyis 'dul ba khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gdug pa
128a7(rgyud): thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar
128b1(rgyud): bya/ /de yi nang rim nyid du ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa/ /sgo bzhi pa la thig bzhir ldan/ /mtshon sna lngas ni rnam par bri/ /ka ba brgyad ni mdun gnas par/ /
128b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /de yi dbus su ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gzhag bya ste/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa dang / /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs
128b3(rgyud): pa'i 'od/ /'jig byed kha dog sngo ba dang / /ha ha zhes bzhad gsal ba'i zhal/ /de yi kun tu gnod sbyin ni/ /shin tu 'jigs pa gzhag par bya/ /de nyid dang po la sogs
128b4(rgyud): mchog / phyag na rdo rje sogs mtshan 'chad/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ /mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje'i mtshan ma
128b5(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'jug pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/ /rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / /ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul
128b6(rgyud): nus shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zhugs nas rdo rje mche ba blangs nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid la bsnun
128b7(rgyud): no/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi
129a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag po phyag na rdo rje gtum por bdag grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub par
129a2(rgyud): bya'o/ /de nas mchod la de bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig brjod la slar dbyung bar
129a3(rgyud): bya'o/ /de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
129a4(rgyud): ro/ /sgrub pa dang / dngos grub kyang de bzhin te/ ma bsgrubs par yang dang po ci lta ba bzhin no/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje ma che ba'i phyag rgyas
129a5(rgyud): so/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bos ha ha zhes dgod cing zlos pas so/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung
129a6(rgyud): bar bya ba la ni chos gos dang / snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /dbang bskur ba thams cad da brog pa la ni khams thams cad kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /
129a7(rgyud): thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad bcad pa la ni gzugs brnyan byas nas gtub pas so/ /ma rungs pa thams cad kyi
129b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bzung nas 'jug par bya'o/ /mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /thams cad
129b2(rgyud): skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed kyi lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje dam tshig ces bya
129b3(rgyud): ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam
129b4(rgyud): pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyis mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes
129b5(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do/ /thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
129b6(rgyud): phyin pa chos nyid do/ /thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
129b7(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas don
130a1(rgyud): @#/ /yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
130a2(rgyud): cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste/ dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas phyag na
130a3(rgyud): rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nges par btud de dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bris la dkyil 'khor
130a4(rgyud): gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so sor gzhag go / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig thams
130a5(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil
130a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo bris nas/ 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs
130a7(rgyud): pa bri bar bya'o/ /thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis btab cing sems dpa' chen po gzhag par bya'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i
130b1(rgyud): rigs ci ltar rjes su mthun par bri bar bya'o/ /sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i
130b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o/ /dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po
130b3(rgyud): chen po las/ bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /rigs bsdus pa'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
130b4(rgyud): d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad
130b5(rgyud): do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can
130b6(rgyud): no/ /thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can/ ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas sems can thams cad ni
130b7(rgyud): chos kyi snying po can no/ /sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no/ /de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs
131a1(rgyud): @#/ /rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen po rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying
131a2(rgyud): po 'di phul lo/ /tri/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ kun nas zlum po thig gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi pa mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum
131a3(rgyud): pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri bar bya'o/ /de'i logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad pe bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ nag po chen po dang / dga'
131a4(rgyud): byed dbang phyug dang / dril chen dang / gar gyi dbang phyug rnams ni phyogs rnams su'o/ /mtshams su ni thod pa bzang po dang / gtum po'i dbang phyug dang / lag na
131a5(rgyud): kha T+waM ga dang / ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug go /thig gi mtshams su ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /sgo rnams su ni dbyug pa'i
131a6(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / mgo'i dbang phyug dang / dril rna dang / drag po chen po'o/ /phyi rol tu ni 'byung po rnams dang / yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon thal
131a7(rgyud): ba gtsang mas lus bskus shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ mdung rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gzhag par bya'o/ /zhugs nas kyang snying po bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas slob
131b1(rgyud): ma de bzhin du bcug la lag par mdung rtse gsum pa byin nas chos bshad par bya'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /bstan pa thams cad bsrung phyir dang / /'dod
131b2(rgyud): kun bdag po nyid kyi phyir/ /drag po'i las la gnas par gyis/ /de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas brtsams te 'jigs pa med par
131b3(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rjes su myong nas drag po'i 'jig rten du mchod par 'gyur ro/ /
131b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po zhi ba'i mdung thung gis mtshan ma zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal te/ dang po mgrin gcig tu thams
131b5(rgyud): cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / gsad pa dang / bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo/ /b+h+yo/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bshad
131b6(rgyud): par bya ste/ zur bzhi pa/ byang gi sgo can kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab la/ dbus su nag po chen po gar byed bzhin pa gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i phyogs dang / mtshams
131b7(rgyud): thams cad du ma mo brgyad bri bar bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ drag mo dang / tshangs pa mo dang / khyab 'jug mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / nag mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / za
132a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba mo dang / srin mo'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bri bar bya ste/ zhi ba mo dang / be ruN+Ta
132a2(rgyud): dang / gtum mo dang / 'jigs byed mo rnams so/ /de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung rtse gsum pa dang / phreng ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / thod pa khrag dang
132a3(rgyud): bcas pa dang / mkhar gsil dang / mche ba dang / kha T+wAM ga'o/ /sgo srung rnams kyi ni thod pa dang / rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang / bya rgod dang / byi la'o/ /de nas phyag
132a4(rgyud): rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa/ gtsang ba/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa thams cad za ba'am/ thams cad spyad pa la yang smad pa med de/ zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas
132a5(rgyud): zhugs la snying po bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas b+h+yo chen po thos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad
132a6(rgyud): ci ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par 'gyur te/ gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so/ /de nas slob ma lag na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig
132a7(rgyud): bkab la nag po chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste/ rna bar dam tshig chen po b+h+yo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas skrag nas me tog dor ro/ /de nas gang du
132b1(rgyud): lhung ba de lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya'o/ /gal te lhung bar ma gyur na yang dor du gzhug go /de nas ni 'jigs par byed par nus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob
132b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /gdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas snying po dang / rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin
132b3(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ /sems can thams cad rgyas gdab cing / /dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya/ /sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste/ /dam
132b4(rgyud): tshig rnal 'byor grub ster bya'o/ /drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dang / /ma mo rnams kyi rgyas 'debs pas/ /gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying / /rtag tu 'jig par byed par
132b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas brtsams te gang sha chen po za ba ni de ring po mi thogs par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang za bar mi 'gyur ba de'i dngos grub med do/ /gal
132b6(rgyud): te dam tshig las 'das par ma gyur na tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya'i gar dang mchod pa
132b7(rgyud): byas nas gtor ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod la sogs pa'i tshim par byas nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o/ /dngos grub thams cad kyi dam
133a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal
133a2(rgyud): te mgrin gcig tu rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo/ /swa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ /zur bzhi pa dang / sgo bzhi par/ /phyi yi dkyil
133a3(rgyud): 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni/ /gzhu yi dbyibs can bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su ming po ni/ /mchog gsum dag ni gzhag par bya/ /sbrang rtsir
133a4(rgyud): byed dang rgyal byed dang / /don kun grub byed ces bya ba'o/ /go cha ya lad bgos pa dang / /de bzhin thod pa mtshan ma 'dzin/ /lha mo'i gos dang phreng ba 'chang / /cung
133a5(rgyud): zad dgod cing khro ba dang / /seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'o/ /dngos grub kun ster dag pa ste/ /gsum ni srid gsum dag
133a6(rgyud): dang mtshungs/ /sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du/ /tshogs la sogs pa legs par bzhag /sgrub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang / /gtum dang khro mchog
133a7(rgyud): gsod pa'o/ /phyi rol ba dan rtse mo la/ /dril bu phreng bcas thams cad du/ /bum pa gang ba rol mchog bcas/ /'byung po ma lus gtor mar bcas/ /glu
133b1(rgyud): rnams glu ru len pa dang / /rol mo rdung bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas/ /phyag rgya kun gyis 'jug par bya/ /zhugs nas sgrub la dad pa yis/ /
133b2(rgyud): yang nas yang du 'dud bya zhing / /me tog kun gyis mchod pa yis/ /bsgrub dang de nyid dag kyang brjod/ /'jig rten gsum po srid gsum mchog /ngan song gsum
133b3(rgyud): mchod gsum rnam gsum/ /legs ldan sbas pas grub pa ni/ /dngos grub kun la rtag tu'o/ /de nas snying po lan gcig brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad kyi g.yas pa'i
133b4(rgyud): mdzub mo lcags kyur byas la dgug par bya'o/ /de nas dril bu dang bcas pa'i phreng ba rnams g.yo'o/ /thams cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas
133b5(rgyud): dam tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ /gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na/ /pha gsod 'gro ba gang yin dang / /ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang / /'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /
133b6(rgyud): rtag tu dam pa bsten par bya/ /dam pa min pa yongs su spang / /gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya/ /rtag tu ming po gsum po bsgrub/ /'di ni dam tshig go /de nas glu dang /
133b7(rgyud): gar dang / rol mo dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / za ba dang / mgu bas mel tshe bya'o/ /phyag rgya dang / gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa yang byas la slob dpon
134a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyis kyang phyag rgya de dang bcas pas byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes brjod par bya 'o/ /de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams
134a2(rgyud): cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'byor pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan
134a3(rgyud): 'das la phyag btsal te/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo/ /hUM/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum por thig
134a4(rgyud): btab la thig bzhi la 'khor lo bzhi pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor de rnams su sgo bzhir blta ba'i lha mo bzhi'i gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/
134a5(rgyud): dga' ba mo ni shar du lta ba/ /mda' dang / gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa/ sgeg mo mdog dmar ba'o/ /gsod ma lho phyogs su lta ba/ lag na gri dang / phub thogs pa/
134a6(rgyud): mdog nag po 'o/ /phag mo nub tu lta ba/ lag na gser gyi gter thogs pa/ gser gyi mdog can no/ /grub pa mo/ zhi ba mo zhes bya ba byang du lta ba/ lag na
134a7(rgyud): gri dang / sha kha ra thogs pa/ mdog dkar mo'o/ /phyi rol gyi sgo bzhir mtshan ma dgod pa gzhag par bya 'o/ /de nas slob dpon dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa
134b1(rgyud): g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o/ /zhugs nas snying po bzlas par bya 'o/ /de nas phyag rgya dang / gar gyi mchod pa bstab par bya 'o/ /de nas yid la 'dod pa'i
134b2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa dang / 'di ni nor rnams
134b3(rgyud): kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa thams cad kyis mnyes par byed pa dang / gter thams cad 'byin pa dang / dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par nus
134b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no/ /de rnams dang 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
134b5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa rdzogs so/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rtog pa'o// //de nas bcom
134b6(rgyud): l dan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos
134b7(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
135a1(rgyud): @#/ /mtha' yas pa nyid pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas
135a2(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med
135a3(rgyud): pa nyid pas las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid do/ /gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
135a4(rgyud): dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa des sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te sgrib pa thams cad zad
135a5(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod
135a6(rgyud): pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /sems can chen po legs so legs/ /bde ba
135a7(rgyud): chen po legs so legs/ /theg pa chen po legs so legs/ /blo gros chen po legs so legs/ /cho ga 'di ni legs par smras/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun
135b1(rgyud): gyis/ /'bras bu yod la 'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje'i mdo 'di byin gyis brlabs/ /cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med/ /gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ /bdud la sogs
135b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/ /de dag mi sod mi tshugs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs
135b3(rgyud): pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs 'thob par 'gyur/ /de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la/ /kun mchog sangs rgyas mkha' bcas
135b4(rgyud): pa/ /thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
135b5(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAR+ya shrad d+hA ka ra barma dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pha ba
135b6(rgyud): pa'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ shrI ba ra mA d+ya man+t+ra kalpa khaN+Da nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mchog dang po'i sngags kyi rtog pa'i dum bu zhes bya ba/
135b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/
136a1(rgyud): @#/ /chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ rdo rje chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
136a2(rgyud): sgo dpal mchog dang po thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub
136a3(rgyud): dam pa ni bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
136a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i
136a5(rgyud): stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i
136a6(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams gsum pa
136a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub dam pa ni sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la yang ma
136b1(rgyud): chags shing / brtson 'grus chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams
136b2(rgyud): cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug
136b3(rgyud): par gyur pa'i tshe/ /ji srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / /ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni/ /
136b4(rgyud): chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni/ /'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang / /'jig rten sdig
136b5(rgyud): byed de sbyang phyir/ /'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul/ /ci ltar pad+ma rab dmar ba/ /'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin gnas kyi nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan
136b6(rgyud): rnams la mi gos so/ /'dod chags chen po rnam par dag /bde ba chen po nor che ba/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na/ /sems can don rnams ston par byed/ /
136b7(rgyud): gang la la zhig nang par langs nas dpal mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang /
137a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yis bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod
137a2(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa
137a3(rgyud): chen po thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
137a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
137a5(rgyud): c ad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
137a6(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i cho ga phyag rgyas btab pa'i sku gsung thugs thams cad kyi rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
137a7(rgyud): dam tshig chen po thams cad la rab tu zhugs nas chos nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i
137b1(rgyud): phrin las kyis dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spros pa las kyi mtha' can de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ zla ba phyed pa du ma la rab
137b2(rgyud): tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gsal ba/ gser gyi dril bu btags pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung
137b3(rgyud): gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang / na bza' dang / me long dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas mdzes
137b4(rgyud): shing brgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i kha khyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / gar dang / glu yis rab tu brgyan pa dang / bstod pas
137b5(rgyud): sad par byed pa/ bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
137b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen
137b7(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mchog tu gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa/ thams cad dbang du byed pa po/ 'dzin pa po/ 'dod pa thams cad
138a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa/ rgya che ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga thams cad brtag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ ci srid srid pa'i bar gnas

145a5(rgyud): par rab tu zhugs te phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o/ /ci srid bdag 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug dang / khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por

145b1(rgyud): ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so/ /thams cad bsrung pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang pa'i mdzod spus so/ /phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang /

159b7(rgyud): pa thams cad myur 'grub byed/ /thog mtha' med cing dang por byung / /bsod nams thams cad cher mtho ba/ /gzi can rnams kyi bde mchog dang / /'dod chags chen po rnam dag
160a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyir| |rjes su chags pa sgom pa zhes/ /ji bzhin ye shes rab 'jug pa/ /nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po/ /bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /hUM/ de nas
160a2(rgyud): 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams/ /nye bar 'dzin pa mdzad nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad skyed par mdzad/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba kun bskyed nas/ /gtso
160a3(rgyud): bos dngos grub dris gyur bas/ /ci ltar skad cig gis 'di 'grub/ /sems dpa' chen po myur du smros/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /thog mar dkyil 'khor byin rlabs
160a4(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje kun mchog dam tshig ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni/ /de nas phan chad sems can 'byung / /ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'gro ba/ /rtag par sdig pa kun spyod dang / /ngan
160a5(rgyud): sems dang ni le lo can/ /de ni skye bo gsum gzigs nas/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyis dris/ /bcom ldan ci ltar 'o na ni/ /byis pa dge ba kun tu skyed/ /de rnams kyi ni tshig
160a6(rgyud): gsan nas/ /tshig ni 'di skad gsungs pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin kun byed pa pos/ /las kyi 'chi ba ltos gyur pa/ /de yi tshig de thos nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /sras
160a7(rgyud): bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /thugs rje chen pos 'di skad gsungs/ /bde ba chen po rab grub dang / /shin tu chags pa rnam dag phyir/ /kun mchog cho ga rgyas pa yi/ /
160b1(rgyud): snying po de ni bshad du gsol/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /dngos grub thams cad stsol ba yin/ /rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba dang po mchog /gzhan yang snying po
160b2(rgyud): bstan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga che/ /sna tshogs phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed/ /'jig rten thams cad khams chen po/ /phra
160b3(rgyud): rab rdul rnams dang mnyam pa/ /snying po chen po 'di nyid kyis/ /grub pa'i bden pa dam par gyur/ /de nas bde gshegs de rnams ni/ /de yi tshig mchog gsan gyur
160b4(rgyud): nas| |dang po'i dkyil 'khor grub stsol ba/ /de tshe de la gsol ba btab/ /chags pa dang bral 'dul ba'i phyir/ /chags bral bstan par bya ba'am/ /'dod chags
160b5(rgyud): thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /nyid kyi thugs kyi cho ga gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i glu chen po gsungs zhing dkyil 'khor brtag par mdzad do/ /thams
160b6(rgyud): cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu byung ba yin/ /rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po/ /brtan mtho de ring
160b7(rgyud): bdag la myur grub mngon phyogs mdzod/ /ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor glu len cing brtag par mdzad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor
161a1(rgyud): @#/ /brtag par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje thams cad du/ /rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs/ /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni/ /brgyan par bya ste rab 'jug bya/ /
161a2(rgyud): g.yon du bu mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /bsdus te rnal 'byor bcang bar bya/ /rdo rje dang bcas bsnyems pa yi/ /phyag rgya mchog gis rang nyid 'jug /dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs
161a3(rgyud): nas kyang / /lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun 'dug ste/ /de nyid gsang ba'ang brjod par bya/ /hUM hUM mahA su kha badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sa
161a4(rgyud): ma ya s+t+waM a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ dr-i T+ho me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bAn/ a na di ni d+he na swAhA/ ma hA su kha badzra satwa sa ma ya gu h+ye sa ma
161a5(rgyud): ya/ sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsa oM ha ha ha ha a/ de nas rab tu dga' bas rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya'o/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti sa ma ya ke phaT/ badzra ki li ki li ho/ /hUM sma ra
161a6(rgyud): badzre Ne ban+d+ha hUM hUM tuSh+Ta badzra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das pa bdag la grub par mdzod cig ces bcom
161a7(rgyud): ldan 'das la gsol ba brjod par bya'o/ /myur du thams cad rjes chags par/ ki li ke las thams cad nus/ /thams cad rjes su chags dran dang / /rtag tu
161b1(rgyud): legs par mnyes gyur bdag / oM mahA su kha sid+d+hi badzra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ /sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur zhing 'thungs la rdo rje rtse lnga ba bzung
161b2(rgyud): ste| bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes rang gi ming brjod la snga ma bzhin du gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa bya ste/ ci ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas slob ma dang lhan cig mchod
161b3(rgyud): pa byas nas 'byung bar bya'o/ /slob ma gzhug par bya zhing rang nyid kyang der zhugs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje slob dpon thams cad phyag rgya thams
161b4(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po/ dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang / phan 'dogs par nus pa/ dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las
161b5(rgyud): byed pa/ rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
161b6(rgyud): zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid nges par rang nyid rang gi dam tshig gi rdo rje slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug par mdzad do/ /las thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa yang mdzad pa yin no/ /
161b7(rgyud): snying po 'di'i byin gyis rlabs kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig bzlas pa byas
162a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rig pa dang / shes pa yin
162a2(rgyud): no| |rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par mdzad nas/ dngos grub thams cad de la stsol ba yin no/ /yongs su sbyang ba dang brten
162a3(rgyud): pa'i don du ma yin no/ /bgegs byed pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal ster bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po/ /rdo rje 'chang chen shin tu brtan zhing shin tu dgyes
162a4(rgyud): pa| rjes su chags pa/ shin tu rgyas pa/ dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas
162a5(rgyud): myur du grub par mdzad pa yin no/ /'on kyang gang gis bris sam/ 'drir bcug gam/ /lan gcig brjod pa'am/ 'dzin pa des ma bsgrubs shing dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na yang tshe 'di
162a6(rgyud): nyid la ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
162a7(rgyud): kyi bdag po'i bdag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus te thams cad rjes su chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes
162b1(rgyud): su chags pa las byung ba yin no/ /'dod pa brtan pas rjes su chags pa ste/ de mi 'dod pa ji ltar mchog gi bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang thams cad du 'gyur ro zhes bya bar
162b2(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos gsungs so/ /grub na bde ba chen po ni/ rdo rje chags pas skad cig ster/ /sgrub pa'i dam tshig 'di yin te/ /'di ni kun
162b3(rgyud): gyis 'da' bar dka'/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa'am/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar/ lan gcig bzlas pas sdig sbyangs pas /mchog sgrub pas ni grub par 'gyur/ /rtog par gsungs
162b4(rgyud): pa'am/ 'dod pa yis/ /gzugs brnyan rjes su dran bsgoms na/ /snying po yang na glegs bam du/ /thams cad nyid phyir bdag po grub/ /nga la gzugs brnyan med pa dang / glegs bam med par 'gyur
162b5(rgyud): na yang / /yi ge hUM ni thams cad du/ /bris te bdag sgrub bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bya ba don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub can rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i/ /las
162b6(rgyud): kun sgrub par 'dod na ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad thig btab nas/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /dang po'i rdo rjes zhugs nas brjod par bya ste/ chags pa che las thogs pa che/ /
162b7(rgyud): thogs pa che las bde ba che/ /bde ba che las rdo rje brtan/ /rdo rje las ni phyag rgya 'byung / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya thams cad bshad pa
163a1(rgyud): @#/ /ste| |dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs/ /yang dag bsdus par gyur nas ni /
163a2(rgyud): mnyam pa'i 'jig rten grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya yi/ /bka' ni 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de bzhin rgyal ba kun gyi ni/ /phyag rgya 'da' bar nus pa min/ /
163a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang / /de ltar bskal ba bye ba yis/ /thob min ji ltar phyag rgya mchog /bsdus pa tshe 'di nyid la thob/ /ji ltar gdul bya'i 'jig rten ni/ /
163a4(rgyud): de bzhin dngos grub gsungs pa yin/ /de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste/ /dngos grub thams cad byed pa mchog /de bzhin cho ga rgyas pa dang / dngos grub thams cad
163a5(rgyud): gdon mi za'o/ /de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba 'di yin te/ sor mo thams cad kun sbyar nas/ /rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod
163a6(rgyud): do| |sor mo nang du bcings pa las/ /rdo rje bsdams par yang dag bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni/ /mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar/ /g.yas pa yi ni mthe
163a7(rgyud): bong btegs/ /bcug ste btsir ba'i lcags kyu 'dzin/ /mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni/ /dbus ma'i bcings pa nang du gnas/ /mthe bong bsnyams pa'i mtha'
163b1(rgyud): rdo rje| |dang po'i bde ba dam pa bstan/ /mtheb mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'i rtse/ /mig 'bras ltar sbyar 'dzin pa 'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i 'og tu ni/ /mthe bong gis mnan btsir
163b2(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /rdo rje 'dren ma dang 'dra ba/ /srin lag mthe'u chung kha phye ba/ /bskor nas pus mor bzhag pa ni/ /dang po'i rdo rje las byung ba'o/ /gyen du gtor dang thur du blugs/ /
163b3(rgyud): mthe bong sbyar nas bskor ba dang / rab tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang / /bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang / /bskor nas snying gar bzhag pa dang / /yongs su bskor zhing
163b4(rgyud): dgod pa'o/ /kha las gyen du 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang / mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyi dang / /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo g.yas kyis bzung / /mdzub
163b5(rgyud): mo'i mthe bo bcing ba dang / mthe bong mtha' ma'i nang du bzhag /khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di rnams kho na'i las kyi phyag rgya
163b6(rgyud): b cing ba mchog tu gsang ba bla na med cing bla ma'i las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis kyang gnon par mi nus
163b7(rgyud): so| |de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma las rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo mchu la sogs par gzhag pa dang / 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / rdo rje nu dang / ci ltar 'dod
164a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i dngos grub kun tu byed pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje rin po che dang /
164a2(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub po/ /rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las so/ /g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa'i mig gis bltas pas thams cad rjes su chags pa'o/ /mig 'bras
164a3(rgyud): tshur 'dren pas ni dgug pa'o/ /gzhug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o/ /btsir bas 'ching ba'o/ /btsums pa med pas dbang du bya ba'o/ /rdo rje ki li ki las dbus ma
164a4(rgyud): la tsum pa na dang / 'khyud pa dang / btsir ba dang / rol ba dang / dbus ma dang / mthe bo'i rtse mor bde bar brdeg pas mthong ba dang / rol ba dang / btsir ba rnams
164a5(rgyud): kyis thams cad la rol ba ste/ rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba thams cad du lha'i gzugs kyis bud med rnams 'byung ba yin no/ /ci srid 'di rnams dang rol cing rdo rje sems
164a6(rgyud): dpa'i btsun mo la yang rol par byed do/ /rdo rje chu srin mas btsir ba dang / gyen du bteg pa dang / myang ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / myur du za ba rnams kyis brtan pa'i
164a7(rgyud): chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chu'i nang du gnas pa dang / 'chag pa dang / thams cad za ba grub pa'o/ /rdo rje bskor bas g.yo
164b1(rgyud): zhing g.yo ba dang / lhod par byed pa dang / btsir ba dang / dbus ma phan tshun lhan cig dgug pa dang / mgyogs par dbus ma'i rdo rje dral ba rnams kyis khro bo thams cad
164b2(rgyud): 'bar ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / ltung ba dang / gsod pa rnams myur du 'grub pa'o/ /mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams
164b3(rgyud): kyis mchod na rdo rje 'chang chen pos kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyis mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i las rnams kyis lha'i bu mo thams cad
164b4(rgyud): kyang bkug nas rol pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad nye bar sbyar ba'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i nang gi khu tshur gyis las rnams kyis yid kyis 'dod pa'i
164b5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad do/ /de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / las kyi dngos
164b6(rgyud): grub grub pa'o/ /don yod pas grub pa myur du thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pas yid kyis 'dod pa grub pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i
164b7(rgyud): rdo rjes rtags kyi rtse mo g.yo ba las thams cad do/ /skye gnas g.yo bas kyang de bzhin no/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i las byed pas dngos grub thams cad
165a1(rgyud): @#/ /sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mig mi g.yo bar byed pas las thams cad bsgrub par byas na thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur
165a2(rgyud): ro| |de bzhin du rang gi phyag mtshan rnams kyis dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /dang po nyin re lan gcig tu/ /phyag rgya chen pos snying po bzla/ /rdo rje nye ba'i
165a3(rgyud): snying po yis/ /phyag rgya thams cad nges sbyar bya/ /thams cad don yod grub pa'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog phyir ma/ /sgrub pa'i don yod dam
165a4(rgyud): tshig ni/ /snying pos skad cig dngos grub ster/ /rtsa rgyud phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla na med/ /dngos grub mchog ni de bzhin du/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes
165a5(rgyud): grub| |de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni/ /pang ba g.yon du
165a6(rgyud): dgod bya ba/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma ci bder bri/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /sku ni drang por 'dzin pa bde/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa yang
165a7(rgyud): dag 'chang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur/ /'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid dam sras nyid dam/ /dngos
165b1(rgyud): grub kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ji bzhin phyag rgya'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi/ /
165b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bshad do/ /rdo rje mda' la sogs pa'i bzhi bo 'di las
165b3(rgyud): byung ngo / /mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu'i phyi rol tu mngon par phyogs pa'o/ /mthe bos 'khyud pa'o/ /mthe bo gnyis kha phe la mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus ma'i rtse mo 'dren
165b4(rgyud): cing srin lag dang / mthe'u chung mnyam por sbyar la rtse mo so sor kha phye bas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi bsgreng ba'o/ /brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du mtshams
165b5(rgyud): rnams la rdo rje thal mos bskor bas so/ /sgo'i phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /bde chen mchog gi phyag rgya che/ /de bzhin dngos grub rab stsol ba/ /
165b6(rgyud): mda' sogs dam tshig sna tshogs pa'i/ /dngos grub chen po mchog ster ba'o/ /de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni/ /ho bid hUM d+h+r-i ka hUM/ de rnams kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol
165b7(rgyud): ba'o| |de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje med pa rnams kyis rtogs par bya'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas g.yas pa'i khu tshur gtod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar
166a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzung bar byas pa rdo rje bsnyems pa ste/ rab tu dga' ba brtan par byed cing dngos grub thams cad stsal ba'o/ /mda' gzhu gtod pas rdo rje mtshon
166a2(rgyud): cha ma'o/ /'og tu 'khyud pa'o/ /rgyal mtshan gyen du bsgreng ba'o/ /bsnyems pa gnyis gtod pa'o/ /sgeg pa dang bcas mtha' mal sogs pas bkrol bas glog 'gyu ba'i gar
166a3(rgyud): g.yas su yongs su bskor bas me tog la sogs pa'i ka bu ta'i thal mo spyi bo nas phab/ rdo rje thal mo bkrol bas de bzhin du sgeg pa dang bcas pas mchod pa dor bar
166a4(rgyud): bya'o/ /rdo rje gar ni nang gi mtshams la'o/ /rdzogs pa'am ni ma tshang ba/ /yang na ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin/ /me tog mchod la sogs ma yis/ /dngos grub mchog stsol
166a5(rgyud): thun mong yin/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i mtshan ma yongs su gzung ba'o/ /'di rnams kyang don yod pa'i las sgrub pa rnams so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi bdud rtsi'i
166a6(rgyud): chu bzla'o/ /'jug pa'i cho ga'i phyag rgya bshad pa ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i
166a7(rgyud): 'jug pa'i phyag rgya gnyis pa ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /g.yon mtheb mdzub mo'i skye gnas su/ /g.yas pa mthe po'i ltag bcug la/ /btsir ba bde ba
166b1(rgyud): ster ba'o/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa des/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'jug par bya/ /yang na sems dpa' gang la 'jug /de der myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rab tu dga'
166b2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje ma'o/ /rang gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blangs nas chu'i rgyun des dbang bskur te 'thung du bcug na dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang bskur ba thams cad
166b3(rgyud): kyis na tshod dar la bab pa dang / nad med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'di la rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma
166b4(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya la sogs pas gnod pa byed par mi nus so/ /skyil mo krung gis ni gar dang / mchod pa 'bul bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa ni rdo rje gar gyis so/ /rdo rje glu blangs pas
166b5(rgyud): rdo rje gar dbul ba ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i gar gyis so/ /rdo rje khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rdo rje gtod pas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa bsgreng bar bya ste/ mthar sgeg mo
166b6(rgyud): dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i bzhad pa dang bcas pa'i zhal dang / spyan g.yo bas phyag 'tshal ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang dgyes pas dga' ba thams cad la sogs pa'i
166b7(rgyud): bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams pa btsir ba rang gi snying gar bde ba dgrol na dkyil 'khor dgrol ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i
167a1(rgyud): @#/ /sgom pas re khA dang rdo rje yid kyis gyen du bteg la rim pas nang gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs na dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems
167a2(rgyud): dpa'i sgom pas dkyil 'khor la phyogs na dam tshig nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / snying
167a3(rgyud): gar bzhag pa phub ste/ phyogs thams cad du 'bar ba'i ra ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang 'jug par mi nus so/ /snying gar sgom pa
167a4(rgyud): rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /gyen du kha blta bas ltung bar bya'o/ /rang gi gdong yongs su sbyangs nas gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje brtag par bya'o/ /dpung
167a5(rgyud): mgo gnyis su bzhag cing snying gar bzhag par bya'o/ /dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba mthong ba'o/ /skye gnas las dang / tshe 'byin pa'o/ /spyi bor gzhag par bya'o/ /sa
167a6(rgyud): la reg par bya'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i rtags kyi lcags kyus so/ /rtse mo gtod pa'i skye gnas bkrol ba lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil nyed cing bsnun par bya'o/ /de btsir
167a7(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /mig btsum par bya'o/ /bskor zhing btsir nas khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /yongs su bskor nas kha'i mthar mche ba bstan pa'i g.yas pa'i mdzub mos
167b1(rgyud): sdigs mdzub bo/ /mdzub mo la ldang bar bya'o/ /mthe bong btsir bar bya'o/ /yi ge mus phyag rgya dgrol ba'o/ /dang po mthe'u chung gi rdo rjes bsnun par bya'o/ /de nyid rnam par 'gyur
167b2(rgyud): ba'i gdong pas so/ /de nyid yongs su bskor nas dpral bar gyen du kha blta bas gnas pa'o/ /de nyid kyis nam mkha' la rdeg pa'o/ /g.yo zhing btsum pa'i mig gis phyag rgya
167b3(rgyud): bcings pa dgrol ba'o/ /mthe'u chung gi nor bus reg par bya'o/ /mdzub mo mnyam pas zhabs kyi sor mo brje bar bya ste/ bza' ba'am/ yid kyis gzhag par bya'o/ /mdzub
167b4(rgyud): mos sbyin sreg byed pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byed pa'o/ /mthe'u chung gnyis skye gnas la sbyar te phyag rgya dral bar bya'o/ /srin
167b5(rgyud): lag dang mtha' ma mnyam par sbyar sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du bsgreng bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pas legs par byed pa mdzub mo mthe bong mnyam por phye ba dang bkug pa bskor
167b6(rgyud): nas dral bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rab tu brkyang pa'i mthil sa la reg par bya'o/ /dang po'i rdo rje sprin skyed pa'o/ /mdzub mos char bskyed par bya'o/ /mdzub mos bzlog
167b7(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rdo rje blta bas 'phrog par bya'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bshad do/ /mdzub mo gcig gi nor bu'o/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo/ /mdzub mos sa 'og
168a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas chu mig bkug la bstan pa'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje sa la bzung nas g.yo bar bya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyis gdengs ka'i tshul bstan pa'o/ /
