168a2(rgyud): rtse mo bzhi'i 'od zer gyis me stag ston pa'o/ /mdzub mos rlung skyed pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes mdzub mo'i rtse mos me long dang / rol pa dang / nam mkha' la
168a3(rgyud): rdo rje blta ba dang / steng du bskor bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i mdangs shing drung thams cad dang / nags dang / skyed mos tshal dang / 'bru thams cad la gzhag par bya'o/ /
168a4(rgyud): mdzub mo rnon pos klog par bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyis thams cad la drang bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dpung mdun du bskor bar bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis glog 'gyu
168a5(rgyud): bas bskor bar bya'o/ /glog 'gyu bas nam mkha' la bskor bar bya'o/ /g.yas pas g.yon pa la brdeg par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis g.yo zhing g.yo ba
168a6(rgyud): med pa la gzhag par bya'o/ /mdzub mo mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni nor bu'o/ /mdzub mo'i rdo rje'i g.yon pa'i mthe bong gi bu gar g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gzhug
168a7(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes steng du nam mkha' la dka' ba bskyod pa dang / skye gnas g.yo ba dang / dbus ma'i rdo rje bskyod cing btsir ba'o/ /rdo rje yid
168b1(rgyud): las byung ba dang / rdo rje kI li kI la dang / rdo rje chu srin dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma ni bshad pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos gsol ba 'debs par byed pas mdzub mo
168b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi rang gi mig bkab la yid kyis ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgom par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg byed pa'o/ /mdzub mos rang mig btsum par bya'o/ /sos gzung
168b3(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /btung bar bya'o/ /rtse mo bskyod cing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mthe bo'i 'og tu rab tu brkyang la sbyin par bya'o/ /rdo rje sku'i phyag rgya mchog ni mthe bong sems dpa'i
168b4(rgyud): skyil mo krung gi mdzub mo rdo rje ni rdo rje'i sku mchog go / dbus ma'i mnyam pa'i mgo lcogs kyis ngag 'byin pa'o/ /snying gar bzhag nas/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da yA mi
168b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba bsgom mo/ /mthe bo'i rtags g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i bu gar gzhug par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis glog 'gyu ba ltar bskor bas rdo rje 'khor lo'o/ /rdo rje
168b6(rgyud): bsnyems ma rdo rje dang bcas pa'o/ /yi ge hUM gis sdigs mdzub bo/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyi kha sbyor ro/ /rdo rje bsnyems ma bshad do/ /mthe'u chung gi zur gyis
168b7(rgyud): mdud pa'i rtse mo mnyam pa yongs su bskor/ 'og nas bteg pa mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse mo dang / dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag na rdo rje mdzod spu'o/ /de bzhin
169a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'og nas bshad par bya 'o/ /rdo rje gar gyi bshad pa yin no/ /mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa bslang ba'i rdo rje
169a2(rgyud): snying gar badzro haM zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje sgom zhing ma hA sa ha haM zhes bya'o/ /ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta thA ga toHhaM bcom ldan
169a3(rgyud): 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bshad do/ /de nas/ rdo rje khu tshur bcing pa ni/ /mdzub mo rdo rje bsdams pa bcing / /mdzub mo bkug pa gnyis kyis brgyan/ /mtha' ma
169a4(rgyud): gnyis kyi nang du ni/ /mthe bong gnyis kyi kha sbyar ba/ /dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog /khu tshur dngos grub mchog kun stsol/ /rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtags// //
169a5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po rnams ni ta thA ga to nya haM zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o/ /dam tshig cho ga
169a6(rgyud): mchog ni mthe bong mthe chung mnyam pa'o/ /rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje 'o/ /mda' la sogs pa bcing ba ni de bzhin no/ /las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni nyid do/ /de bzhin
169a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba 'o/ /lcags kyu ma bzhin no/ /khu tshur gyi khyad par rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur mthe bong gnyis la gnas pa
169b1(rgyud): dam tshig gi khu tshur te/ de gnyis su byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis dang / dkyil 'khor lngas phyag 'tshal zhing 'jug
169b2(rgyud): par bya'o/ /'di dag kyang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba'o/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje sku mchog gis spyi gtsug dang / mdzod spu dang / snying khar bzhag ste/
169b3(rgyud): bskor zhing bskor bas mkhur tshos dang / gtsug tor du gzung bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i
169b4(rgyud): tshul bya'o/ /g.yon pa snying gar bzung ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gcig gis sa la reg pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i khro bo'i mdzub mo g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi nang du mngon par phyogs
169b5(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur sangs rgyas nyid du myur du thob pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'og tu bcing bas brtan pa'i skyil mo krung ngo // //de
169b6(rgyud): nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i dgug pa'i phyag rgya de nyid do/ /phyag rgya chen po rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /
169b7(rgyud): dam tshig ni 'og du rdo rje bsdams pa'i sor mo thams cad 'bar ba'i nang du mthe bong rdo rje ni rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri ste/ rdo rje 'chang chen po sgrub par byed pa'o/ /gzhan dag
170a1(rgyud): @#/ /kyang de bzhin no/ /chos kyi rnams ni de bzhin te/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin no/ /khu tshur gyi khyad par ro/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo sdigs
170a2(rgyud): mdzub bo/ /dam tshig las byung ba ni de bzhin no/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba'o/ /lag pa rdo rje'i mthe'u chung gdu bur bcings pa'i sdigs
170a3(rgyud): mdzub ni/ rdo rje hUM mdzad de g.yon brkyang pas gnas pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo'i rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo/ /sna'i dbugs dang / yi ge hUM gis so/ /khros pas yi ge a sbyar
170a4(rgyud): bar bya 'o/ /ha har dgod pas bzhad par bya'o/ /snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po'o// //de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas
170a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la de'i snying gar gzhag pa ni rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni de
170a6(rgyud): bzhin no/ /dam tshig gi khyad par dang / khu tshur gyi khyad par ro/ /kha 'bus pa'i thal mo las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung kha phye bas 'dab ma bzhi pa'i pad+ma chen po'o/ /thams
170a7(rgyud): cad bcing ba ni ci lta ba bzhin no/ /khu tshur gyi khyad par ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam par brkyang la dbus ma gnyis phyi rol tu
170b1(rgyud): gshibs pa dang bcas pa bzhag pa ste de gnyis su byas pa pad+ma'i khu tshur ro/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni pad+ma chen po'i bshad pa'o/ /de nyid spyi bo la'o/ /de nyid rdo rje
170b2(rgyud): lta bas blta bar bya'o/ /de nyid sor mo thams cad kha phye bas so/ /de nyid rdo rje gnyis gnyis kyi mig go /de nyid legs par byed pa'o/ /de nyid dpral bar byas nas gsol ba
170b3(rgyud): gdab par bya'o/ /de nyid g.yon pa'i skye gnas su mthe bo'i rtags bcag pa'o// //de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi chog rgyas pa ni/ rdo rje thal mo rab
170b4(rgyud): tu brkyang zhing mthe bong mnyam po la mdzub mo bkug pa bzhag ste dpral ba'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag na dbang bskur ba thams cad gsol ba'o/ /phyag rgya chen po la sogs
170b5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba de bzhin no/ /dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis phyir bkug pa'i sor mo mnyam por nor bu mthe bong rdo rjes bkag pa rdo rje nor
170b6(rgyud): bu'o/ /gzhan rnams ni de las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur ro/ /de gnyis su byas nas rin bo che'i khu tshur ro/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsgreng ba bsgrub
170b7(rgyud): par bya ba'i myu gu'o/ /kha sbyar nas srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam por kha phye bas mchog gi dar dbyangs 'dzin pa'o/ /dbus ma'i nor bu'o/ /mthe'u chung gi rtse mo'o/ /'og
171a1(rgyud): @#/ /du gtor ba'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las ni mdzub mo'i nor bu brkyang ba'i phreng ba'o/ /rdo rje rin po che gsum mdun dang / logs gnyis su bcing bar
171a2(rgyud): bya'o/ /rdo rje rin po che'i mdzod spu'i phyogs su bzhag ste mdzub mo'i rtse mos steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs kyi tshul du bya'o/ /mthe bong gnyis brtan pa'i skyil mo krung byas
171a3(rgyud): la mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi lus can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog go / des spyi bo nas brtsams te mdun
171a4(rgyud): dang / g.yas dang / rgyab dang / g.yon du bya ba byas nas de bzhin du mdun dang / rgyab dang / logs gnyis su sgeg pa dang / bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa bkrol ba
171a5(rgyud): byas nas/ phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud ba bya zhing dar dpyangs kyis tshul du bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba dang srid pa gsum gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi mchog
171a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob pa yin no/ /rdo rje thams cad kyi rtog pa thams cad ni gong du ci lta ba bzhin no/ /de nas phyi'i phyag rgya shes par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ phyag rgya chen
171a7(rgyud): po ni g.yon par kham phor dang g.yas su mda' gtod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /dam tshig gi 'jug pa ni mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag mnyam por legs par sbyar
171b1(rgyud): la rtse gsum par byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ni mgon po rnams kyi'o/ /ci nas ltar bzung ba bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /dam tshig ni gung me dang
171b2(rgyud): srin lag rdo rje bsdams pas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung dang / srin lag mthe bo'i sor mo'i rtsa bar bsdus pa ni sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /gal
171b3(rgyud): te dkyil 'khor brtag par mi nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings pas dkyil 'khor shin tu brtag par 'gyur te dngos grub kyang shin tu gsol ba yin no/ /lha mo rnams 'di nyid kyis spyan
171b4(rgyud): drang ba dang 'jug par bya'o/ / //de nas sgyu ma'i 'khor lo ni g.yon pa'i steng du sor mo thams cad shin tu brkyang / dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste/ lha ma
171b5(rgyud): yin thams cad kyi sgyu ma thams cad don yod par bsgrub pa'o/ /gdengs ka can gyi dbang po'i mthe bong gnyis pas rtse mo phyi rol tu phyogs pa'i sor mo brgyad kyis gdengs
171b6(rgyud): ka'i tshogs kyis klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dam tshig ste lto 'phye chen po'i lag pa'o/ /gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi
171b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /gung mo dang srin lag bzhi pos mdud pa byas la mgu ba'i tshul gyis steng du sgreng ste bsdus nas mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mos brdegs par byas na dug thams
172a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad 'bar ba dang / dug thams cad bcing ba dang / kun nas bsdus te brdegs pas dug thams cad 'jig pa'o/ /'di nyid kyi dug thams cad za ba
172a2(rgyud): dang / 'phro ba dug med par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad
172a3(rgyud): par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la sku'i phyag rgya lnga ni/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje 'chang chen
172a4(rgyud): po'i rigs la'o/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /pad+ma chen po ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje nor bu chen po ni
172a5(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs la'o/ /de nas gsung gi phyag rgya lnga ni/ snyan pa'i glu'i yul thams cad kyi tshul rnams nus pa ci lta bu'i glu'i rgyun thams cad kyis glu blangs te bzlas pa ni rdo
172a6(rgyud): rje sems dpa'i rigs la rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i ngag go / lce dang / mchu gnyis shin tu g.yo ba med cing ngos shin tu ma 'byar ba dbyangs dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i ngag de ni
172a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ste/ rigs thams cad dgos pa'o/ /sprin gyi 'brug sgra yi ge hUM gi sgra phra mo dang ldan pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ngag rdo
172b1(rgyud): rje'i rigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi ngag pad+ma'i rigs la te thams cad dag pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'o/ /chos kyi ngag nor bu'i rigs la te mchod pa'i nor bu'o/ /de
172b2(rgyud): nas thugs kyi phyag rgya lnga ste/ thams cad bsgrub par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos pos so/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /bdag
172b3(rgyud): gam bdag gi mdun du gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /sbyang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /nam mkha' thams cad bsgoms pas nor bu'i
172b4(rgyud): rigs la'o/ / //de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga ni/ rdo rje rtse mo lnga 'od zer gyi phreng bas rtse mo yongs su khyab pa dang / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i
172b5(rgyud): rigs la'o/ /rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o/ /'bar ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje rtse bzhi pa rdo rje
172b6(rgyud): khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje'i rigs la'o/ /pad+ma'i steng gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i pad+ma'i khu tshur gyis pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje phyed pa rdo rje rin po che nor bu'i khu
172b7(rgyud): tshur gyis nor bu'i rigs la'o/ / //de nas rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i gsang ba thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba'i de kho na nyid kyi bden pa myur du mchog
173a1(rgyud): @#/ /gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med par myur ba'i mchog
173a2(rgyud): gi dngos grub can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig go /gsung gi phyag rgya ni snying po'o/ /
173a3(rgyud): thugs kyi phyag rgya ni nye ba'i snying po'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma'i 'o// //de nas phra mo'i las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di yin te/
173a4(rgyud): ma mchu'i sgros so rnams kyis bzung nas rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rol pa dang / brtan par byed pa'i dngos grub
173a5(rgyud): skad cig gis so sor nyams su myong ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la'o/ /rdo rje phra mos byin gyis brlabs te/ dam tshig tsam du blta ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams
173a6(rgyud): cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni de bzhin
173a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /khro gnyer dang bcas pa'i khro bos mi bzad pa'i lta ba byas nas shin tu ma mgal bsdams nas thams cad ltung ba dang / dbab pa
173b1(rgyud): dang / rengs pa dang / nyal du bcug pa dang / rgyas btab pa dang / gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi dpung rmugs pa dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub skad cig
173b2(rgyud): mas 'byung par 'gyur ba ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur rigs la'o/ /btsums pa med pas brtan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas mchu mnyam pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang / bsrung
173b3(rgyud): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub 'byung ba ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o/ /'bar ba'i lta bas zhal rnam par bzhad pas dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / phun sum
173b4(rgyud): tshogs pa thams cad dang / mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ro// //de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa ni/ /nyin re mngon
173b5(rgyud): du lan gcig tu/ /snying po rang nyid bsgrub pa ste/ /rang gis bcings nas mdor bsdus pas/ /phyag rgya thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang
173b6(rgyud): ba sgrub pa ni/ /snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i/ /sgrub pa 'di ni rmad du byung / /ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yis/ /nye ba'i snying po gsang ba 'o/ /don yod thogs med gsang
173b7(rgyud): ba dang / /rang bzhin grub pa de bzhin du/ /bsod nams med pa rnams la yang / /dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa rnams la/ /snying po
174a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchog 'di sbyin mi bya/ /gsang ba'am gsang rgyud dam pa ni/ /gal te dngos grub yid 'ong 'dod/ /gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa'i/ /phyag rgya
174a2(rgyud): sngags 'di dge ba ste/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing / /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /dum bu gnyis pa sngags dum gyi rtsa rgyud rdzogs so// //sems
174a3(rgyud): can thams cad bde don dang / /bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin de la zhus/ /bde ba chen po rab
174a4(rgyud): sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud/ /sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /
174a5(rgyud): 'dir ni rtog pa gang zhig brjod/ /snying po zhes ni gang bshad pa'i/ /ye shes rgyud ni ji ltar yin/ /dkyil 'khor zhes ni brjod pa ci/ /der 'jug yon tan ci dang
174a6(rgyud): ldan/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par dang / /gzhan yang sgrub pa ji lta bu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid/ /'di yang ci ltar de nyid gang / /thog ma tha ma med
174a7(rgyud): nyid dang / /rab tu dga' ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /dang po'i snying po 'di yi yin/ /de bzhin nyid ni gang zhig yin/ /hUM gi glu ni gang gis gsungs/ /'di yi don ni ji ltar
174b1(rgyud): brjod/ /sems ni rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin phyag rgya rdo rje nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba dang / /rigs rnams kyang ni de bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub pa dang / /
174b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bdud du ji ltar 'gyur/ /rtogs pa rnams kyang bsgrub pa dang / /dang po'i snying po'i de nyid dang / /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'i/ /sgrub pa de bzhin dngos grub rnams/ /
174b3(rgyud): bsod nams med pa'i ci ltar 'grub/ /slob dpon nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /dri rnams ci yin ji ltar 'gyur/ /mchod pa yang ni ji ltar bya/ /gsang
174b4(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa ji ltar yin/ /kun byed kun za sdig pa can/ /shin tu sdig can ji ltar grub/ /don yod thog med dngos grub kyis/ /de rnams ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang ba
174b5(rgyud): de yang gang zhig yin/ /'di nyid du ni gang gis 'grub/ /bde ba chen po rab grub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /gsang ba'i de nyid gsang ba ni/ /bdag cag rnams
174b6(rgyud): la kun bshad gsol/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ zhal
174b7(rgyud): rab tu bzhad de/ bzhad pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma 'di
175a1(rgyud): @#/ /gsungs so/ /de la rnam par mi rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud ni/ /rnam rtog med pa'i ting 'dzin las/ /sems can don ni yongs su brtag /des
175a2(rgyud): na brtag par bshad bya ste/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro/ /de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyud ni 'di yin te/ /sa la yi ge'i gnas bris nas/ /
175a3(rgyud): bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa/ /de yi dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /snying po thams cad sgrub byed pa 'o/ /de la dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ /ci ltar gnas dang ci ltar
175a4(rgyud): dus/ /ci ltar 'jig rten ci lta bu/ /'khor ni dgod par bya ba ste/ /de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor 'dri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa'i rnam par smin
175a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi/ /'khor bcas de tshe dkyil 'khor du/ /zhugs pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /de ltar bris pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /
175a6(rgyud): de nas rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi rgyud ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo bstan pa bzhin/ /lcags kyi 'khor lo dam pa ste/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo de bzhin du/ /
175a7(rgyud): pad+ma 'dab brgyad nor bu che/ /de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas ni/ /nang gi rim par zhugs bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor
175b1(rgyud): dag la dzaHhUM baM/ /hoHpra sid d+h+ya maM brjod bya/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rgyud ni/ sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro kun gyi/ /thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan mchog /sems
175b2(rgyud): can 'byung phyir sems dpa' ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags/ /de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo
175b3(rgyud): rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das de nyid/ /de nas thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ thog
175b4(rgyud): mtha' med pa thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas/ /nam mkha' skye ba skye med phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu
175b5(rgyud): dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ rab tu dga' phyir nyon mongs te/ /'gro ba thams cad bde 'dod pa/ /de la bde ba rnam dag phyir/ /srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan 'byung / /
175b6(rgyud): de nas dang po'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa kun la chags pa che/ /'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed/ /'dod chags 'bar ba dri za yi/ /snying po'i
175b7(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje'o/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni/ glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod/ /rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung / /thams cad 'byung bar grub pa'i
176a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyir| |bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi bzlas pa'i don gyi rgyud bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ myur du thams cad rjes chags
176a2(rgyud): pas| |dngos grub thams cad rjes su chags/ /rjes su chags par byed mchog ni/ snying po'i bzlas pa'i don yin no/ /de nas rdo rje sems rgyud ni/ glu rnams ci ltar
176a3(rgyud): khro bo ni/ bsdus nas kun tu 'jug pa na/ /rdo rje thog ni brtan gyur pa/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa 'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ thams cad
176a4(rgyud): bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ bdag gi bdag nyid la yang gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su ni/ /myur du thams cad du yang zhugs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
176a5(rgyud): pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ 'dod las chags pa dga' las bde/ /bde las sdig pa sdig las sdug /sdug las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan/ /rdo rje nyid las
176a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid dang / /de nyid rdo rje rigs
176a7(rgyud): chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag ba/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad/ /de nas mngon par byang chub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems so sor rtog pa ni/ /
176b1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rang sems
176b2(rgyud): nyid ni bdud nyid de/ /sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ /rang gi sems ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'byung / /de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub
176b3(rgyud): pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rtog pa kun la grub bya gang / /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas dang po'i snying
176b4(rgyud): po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub ste/ /ci srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa mchog /dngos grub chen po'i bde ba
176b5(rgyud): ster/ /de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / /phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang / /bzlas
176b6(rgyud): pa'i don du sems dpa' che/ /bdag nyid dang ni bsgrub bya ba/ /de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun
176b7(rgyud): gyi/ /byang chub rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir/ /de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyi dngos grub grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /ci 'dod 'khor
177a1(rgyud): @#/ /lo bris nas ni/ /ci yang rung ba'ang thal bas kyang / /sems dpa' chen po bzhag byas nas/ /nyin zhag bzhir ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas slob
177a2(rgyud): dpon nyid kyi grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje yi/ /gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyer du/ /ci bzhin rang nyid rab zhugs te/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bskur
177a3(rgyud): bya/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje can la mchod pa kun/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar/ /rdo rje bdag nyid nag
177a4(rgyud): po ste/ /dmar po pad+ma nor bu ser/ /de nas dbul ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdzogs pa 'am ni mtshang ba/ /yang na ji ltar rnyed pa ni/ rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa yis/ /rtag tu
177a5(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dus kyi mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /drug ldan la sogs snyam pa'i glu/ /glu ni thams cad ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje 'byed ma la sogs
177a6(rgyud): 'grol/ /mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni/ go rims ci lta ba bzhin du/ /bzlas pa'i don
177a7(rgyud): gyis ma brjod kyang / /mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / /
177b1(rgyud): tshul khrims 'chal ba la sogs pa/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stos kyis ni/ sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa smad
177b2(rgyud): par mi bya ste/ /rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ster/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che/ /'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud
177b3(rgyud): ni/ ji bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /rtog pa kun nas rnal 'byor 'di/ /tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i
177b4(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po che chen po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs
177b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi
177b6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad+ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas 'phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rjes thams cad la khyab pa/ ma lus shing
177b7(rgyud): l us pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams bstan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin
178a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs
178a2(rgyud): so/ /ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs/ /de srid sems can gdon par mdzad/ /mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can/ /sems can don ni nus pa min/ /de phyir sems
178a3(rgyud): dpa' dam pa rnams/ /'khor ba srid du 'khor bar bzhugs/ /sems can don ni mngon par bzhed/ /thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
178a4(rgyud): mi 'dul bas/ /sems can don mi mdzad pa de/ /'dir ni rab grub dngos grub mchog /dus kun du ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa/ /'di ltar bsod nams
178a5(rgyud): rnam smin gyis/ /kun la mthong ba la sogs kyis/ /rang gi las kyis mdzad mi spyod/ /dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / /srid pa 'di la myur 'grub 'gyur/ /shin tu
178a6(rgyud): mthong ba la sogs kun/ /sems can thams cad rab stsol mdzad/ /kun nas dus kun thams cad la/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur/ /rgyal po rdo rje
178a7(rgyud): 'chang chen po/ /srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /de phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o/ /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du/ /shin tu rtag
178b1(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thob/ /lugs ma 'am ni brdungs ma 'am/ /ri mor bris pa 'am 'dus byas pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni/ /ci bzhin bshad par rab gzhug bya'o/ /bde
178b2(rgyud): ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
178b3(rgyud): kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin/ /dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /'dis ni rtag pa
178b4(rgyud): thams cad la/ /phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas/ /dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub/ /phyi nas ma bsgrubs kyang grub 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje
178b5(rgyud): chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /gang dang der ni gnas pa 'am/ /thams cad rjes chags rnal
178b6(rgyud): 'byor gyis/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i gar
178b7(rgyud): mchog mchod pa 'am/ /yang na mchod pa ci bde bar/ /byas te mgon po bsgrub byas na/ /mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag
179a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste/ /rang gi snying pos lan gcig bsgrub/ /brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags/ /shin
179a2(rgyud): tu dgyes myur bdag po grub/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blang ba'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi da sogs rgyan dang ldan/ /ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa/ /dri za dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi
179a3(rgyud): ge hUM gis grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang
179a4(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ / //de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med
179a5(rgyud): pa'i 'phrin las can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chos so/ /shin nu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen
179a6(rgyud): po'i rdo rje'i bcud kyis len gyis so/ /gzugs chen po dang / gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so/ /'du byed chen po thams
179a7(rgyud): cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so/ /sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung bas so/ /phyogs thams
179b1(rgyud): cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas te/ thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus
179b2(rgyud): shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pas so/ /bdag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad dam/ /gzhan dag rdo rjer
179b3(rgyud): byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje go chas so/ /'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /'thab mo srung ba ni
179b4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhig pa ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas so/ /gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa dang / ldang
179b5(rgyud): ba dang / ltung ba dang / gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so/ /rims thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang / nad chen po zhi ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
179b6(rgyud): 'phrog pas so/ /dug thams cad gzhig pa dang / dug med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i las kyis so/ /gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po rdo
179b7(rgyud): rje'i 'byung po bskrad pas so/ /ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang / gzhom pa dang / snying gzhan dbyung ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang /
180a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshe 'phel ba de shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'ching ba
180a2(rgyud): dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug pa dang / snga ma 'byung ba so sor bstan pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / cho 'phrul bstan pa dang / bden pa thams cad
180a3(rgyud): pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang / dgrol ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so/ /rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams
180a4(rgyud): cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje pra dbab pas so/ /rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes mthong ba dang / thos pa
180a5(rgyud): dang / smra ba dang / ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgoms pas so/ /thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba
180a6(rgyud): thams cad bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am/ dngos po sna tshogs pa thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad
180a7(rgyud): mkhyen pas so/ /glog dang / char pa dang / thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so/ /sa'i 'og thams
180b1(rgyud): cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / mun pa chen
180b2(rgyud): por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos po
180b3(rgyud): thams cad mthong ba dang / nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas so/ /thams cad gzhom pa dang / rengs pa dang / dral ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid
180b4(rgyud): log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / gsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa ni bde ba chen po'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rjes su
180b5(rgyud): chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bkrol ba dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / ltung ba bslang ba dang / 'dren pa dang / bran du
180b6(rgyud): byed pa dang / mngag gzhug bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang / thams cad tshur drang ba dang / phar btang ba dang / gsad pa dang / slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa
180b7(rgyud): dang / dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pas so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad
181a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs
181a2(rgyud): pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang / mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen
181a3(rgyud): po'i rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so/ /de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ bde ba
181a4(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o/ /'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya/ rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong
181a5(rgyud): pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la kun tu bskor nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor dang / phyogs thams cad dang / dkyil
181a6(rgyud): 'khor bskor ba'o/ /snying ga dang / yid kyis rgyab dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bo dang / dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la go cha bya ste/ mdud
181a7(rgyud): pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o/ /snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bor gzhag
181b1(rgyud): par bya'o/ /dbus ma'i dar mchog go /byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang / 'jigs pa'i gdong gis blta ba'o/ /'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang
181b2(rgyud): gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o/ /lta bas 'phrog par bya'o/ /dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o/ /yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus
181b3(rgyud): ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste/ dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/ snying gar gtod pa dang / skyed pa
181b4(rgyud): dang / 'ching ba dang / gar byed du bcug pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / rdo rje rtse mo btsir ba dang / kha dbub pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / bcings pa myur du dkrol ba
181b5(rgyud): dang / bsrung ba dang / bya ba pa'i las so/ /snying ga kha sbyor bskyed pa'o/ /nyid re bzhin snga rol tu lan gcig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang / snying
181b6(rgyud): gar gzhag pa dang / phyag rgya la lta ba ste/ nyin re snga rol du lan gcig dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskor bar bya'o/ /dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas
181b7(rgyud): so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste/ nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang / dbab pa sbyin pa dang / 'bar ba'i me stag byed
182a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung gi tshul dang / nam mkhar sgom pa las du ma'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang / rtse
182a2(rgyud): mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang / sen mo brud pa dang / mig 'degs pa dang / btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying gar bteg pa dang / ltung ba dang / slong bar
182a3(rgyud): byed pa dang / phan tshun rdeg pa dang / rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang / lcags sgrog gnyis kyis
182a4(rgyud): dgug pa dang / g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang / rtse mo bskyod pa dang / gdu bur bcing ba dang / myur du dgrol ba dang / sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba
182a5(rgyud): dang / ltung bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bteg pa dang / g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du
182a6(rgyud): drang ba dang / tshur 'dren pa dang / phar gtang ba dang / g.yon dang / g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang / rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang / las thams cad
182a7(rgyud): la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i las dang / snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang / snying gar
182b1(rgyud): de las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang / gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so/ /bde ba chen po rab grub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam
182b2(rgyud): dag phyir/ /don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun/ /sems can
182b3(rgyud): thams cad myur grub dang / /don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan/ /de dag kyang ni grub 'gyur te/ /
182b4(rgyud): bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir/ /gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam/ /brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshad ba/ /dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang / /slob dpon nyid
182b5(rgyud): byin ma rlabs dang / /de dag grub mchog rdo rje chen/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur/ /don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i/ /bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed/ /bsam
182b6(rgyud): pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug /dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog /bde ba che las yang dag 'byung / /bag chag shin tu grub pa dang / /dgrol
182b7(rgyud): ba thams cad la yang ngo / /de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ /las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni/ /skal ba ci bzhin snying pos grub/ /rang gi bdag nyid
183a1(rgyud): @#/ /nges sbyar bya/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i
183a2(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
183a3(rgyud): yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyis sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang
183a4(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab cing spro ba dang / dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ srid pa thams cad
183a5(rgyud): kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no/ /rdo
183a6(rgyud): rje nam mkha' chen po yis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog /rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi/ /chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams
183a7(rgyud): cad ni/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang / /rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni/ /yongs su mthar thug nus pa min/ /e ma'o mngon zhes sems can dang / /le lo can dang
183b1(rgyud): las kun dang / /thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa/ /
183b2(rgyud): rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
183b3(rgyud): cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa
183b4(rgyud): chen po rnam dag phyir/ /thams cad dngos grub don du ni/ /yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang / /gang gis khyim na
183b5(rgyud): gsang ba thams cad gnas/ /bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i/ /dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la bstan/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed/ /
183b6(rgyud): sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir/ /rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te/ /rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med/ /dngos grub 'phel med min par
183b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs/ /bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed/ /rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang bsgrub pa/ /myur du dngos
184a1(rgyud): @#/ /grub mchog phyir bdag brtan 'gyur/ /brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjes su cha chags/ /bde ba chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas/ /nga yi dang po'i
184a2(rgyud): snying po gang sgrub pa/ /de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ste/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
184a3(rgyud): pa la mngon par bstod do/ / //bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa'i rgud phyi ma yongs su rdzogs so// //
184a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang / mchog dang po'i rdo rje
184a5(rgyud): b de ba chen po rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs gar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu grub pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba
184a6(rgyud): chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa
184a7(rgyud): rnams kyang mchog dam par grub par byed pa dang / mchog tu gsang ba/ thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen
184b1(rgyud): po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/ /de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams dga'/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /rin chen 'od 'bar rab tu gsal/ /dri ma med pa'i ma dngas
184b2(rgyud): kyis brgyan/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod/ /zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas/ /
184b3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa/ /dra ba me long rtog me long / /me tog chun po'i rgyan gyis bskor/ /bde ba chen
184b4(rgyud): po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje kun gyis legs sbyar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog /rdo rje
184b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa kun gyi gnas/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog ces bya/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni/ /bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs/ /thog mtha' med
184b6(rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan
184b7(rgyud): pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya/ /brtan par bzhag pas ting 'dzin te/ /nges pa la ni rdo rjer gyur/ /sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
185a1(rgyud): @#/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sems rgyas de nyid do/ /rdo rje drag
185a2(rgyud): po mthar byed nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs
185a3(rgyud): bzang bshad/ /de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid/ /'dod dang grol ba de nyid de/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum
185a4(rgyud): pa/ /mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid/ /brtan pa sra ba nor chen po/ /rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas pa/ /thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i sems dpa' sems
185a5(rgyud): dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde bar stsol/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa dang / /btsun mo'i tshogs bcad sna tshogs pa/ rdo
185a6(rgyud): rje lha mos yongs su bskor/ /bde ba chen po grub don du/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /ma lus gdul bya'i don du ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir/ /
185a7(rgyud): dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya kun myur grub
185b1(rgyud): mngon du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir/ /dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po/ /bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba/ /ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /snying po chen po
185b2(rgyud): dam yin ste/ /gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa 'am/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa 'ang / /don yod thogs pa med mchog 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad rnyed
185b3(rgyud): dka' min/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan/ /dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster/ /rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed/ /thog mtha' med phyir
185b4(rgyud): dang por 'byung / /mchog dang dang po zhes byar bshad/ /tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod dang / /chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar/ /rjes su chags par bgyi'o zhes/ /ci bzhin
185b5(rgyud): 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug / nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po/ /bskal ba dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
185b6(rgyud): sras bcas pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa/ /skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar/ /yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung / /ci ltar 'gro
185b7(rgyud): bar rab grub ces/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris/ /de rnams kyis ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin rang grol ba ni/ /'byin dang stsol dang ston pa po/ /byed
186a1(rgyud): @#/ /pas tshig ni 'di skad gsol/ /chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams/ /chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur/ /'dod chags chen po
186a2(rgyud): bde ba che/ /'di ni ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi tshig de gsan nas ni/ /rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems de thog ma'i lha/ /khyod ni thabs chen nyid
186a3(rgyud): yin no/ /ji srid 'khor lo'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /ci srid
186a4(rgyud): sems can rnam rtog pa/ /de srid byang chub srid pa che/ /byang chub sems can la phan phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis/ /de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor/ /dang po'i
186a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog /ci bzhin cho gas bsgrubs pa nyid/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ /bde ba chen po grub phyir
186a6(rgyud): dang / /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /gtso bo mgon la gsol ba btab/ /bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /snying po 'di
186a7(rgyud): ni rtog pa mchog / bde chen myur du grub pa 'o/ /de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
186b1(rgyud): bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog /gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad do/ /thog mar dam tshig gsum thob
186b2(rgyud): pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas/ /'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya/ /rtag pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed
186b3(rgyud): yin/ /dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i/ /rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dngos grub cho ga thams cad la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /
186b4(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya 'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog /bla na med cing mnyam med pa/ /nam mkha'
186b5(rgyud): kun la rab tu gnas/ /mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang byas la/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor
186b6(rgyud): de ni grub par bya/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang / /me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis/ /ji rnyed pa dang / ci 'dod par/ /mchog dang por ni brtag par bya/ /mchog gi dang
186b7(rgyud): por mtha' yas mchog / bla na med cing dpe med pa/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog /thog ma med mchog rtag pa'i phyir/ /sangs
187a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid rten pas/ /lhag dang mtshang med kun gang / /mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'
187a2(rgyud): ni/ /'di ni dbu mar rnam brtags pas/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de yi dbu mar rnam brtag nyid/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma'i gzugs/ /yu bar bcas pa
187a3(rgyud): rab tu gzhag / sna tshogs pad+mas yang dag khebs/ /thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin/ /de nas srad bu nyis 'gyur du/ /byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste/ /nam mkha'
187a4(rgyud): kun gyi tshad yin phyir/ /gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yas pas/ /tshad ni tshad med pa yin no/ /mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa/ /dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam
187a5(rgyud): gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin/ /khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag /gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa 'o/ /rgyan rnams kun
187a6(rgyud): gyis bkra ba ni/ /bsams pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /gdul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dam chos mchog ste kun tu 'gro /rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs
187a7(rgyud): pa'i/ /ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs/ /me long ye shes rtag me tog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba me long me tog che/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis
187b1(rgyud): bskor/ /kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni/ /bde ba chen po zhes bshad do/ /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dang po'i gnas su bri bar bya/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog
187b2(rgyud): kun mchog de ni legs bris nas/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam/ /de ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil
187b3(rgyud): 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin/ /'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster/ /byang sems theg pa chen po yi/ /mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /rdo rje thig
187b4(rgyud): gis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de ni sna tshogs pad+ma cher/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa 'am/ /byas pa 'am
187b5(rgyud): yang na bris ba ste/ /'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang la sogs/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa/ /sems
187b6(rgyud): dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod cing / /rang snying pos kyang gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyogs ni thams
187b7(rgyud): cad du/ /tshon nam de bzhin phye ma yis/ /go rims dag ni ci bzhin du/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ /rdo rje mchod bstod la brtson bya/ /rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri/ /lha mo
188a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje rol pa ni/ /rdo rje can la rab 'khyud pa/ /rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa 'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje khu
188a2(rgyud): tshur gnyis bsnyems bri/ /de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni/ dzaHbadzra dri Sh+Ti sa ma ke ma Ta hUM/ oM badzra ki li ki la hUM/ baM badzri Ni sma ra ra Ta/ ho badzra kla me shwa ri
188a3(rgyud): s+t+waM/ /mtshams su rdo rje sems ma sogs/ /dus kyi mchod pa yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sbrang rtsi ma dang sprin/ /ston dang dgun ni rdo rje ma/ /me tog bdun pa mar me che/ /dri
188a4(rgyud): ste spyi bor thal sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste/ /de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya/ /oM ma d+hu badzri g+huM g+huM/ oM badzra me g+he gu lu gu lu/ oM sha rad badzri/ oM oM/ oM badzra
188a5(rgyud): shi shi ri hUM hUM/ sgeg mo bzhad ma glu chen ma/ /gar mdzad ma yi lha mo'i tshogs/ /rdo rje rol mo 'di dag ni/ /phyi rol gyi ni mtshams su bya/ /he ra ti badzra me g+ha bi
188a6(rgyud): la si ni tra ha/ /he ra ti badzra nr-i t+ye be ba be ba/ sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /gsol ga pa ni bzhi po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog de bzhin dril
188a7(rgyud): bu ma'i/ /badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA she hUM/ badzra shriM kha le baM/ badzra g+ha N+De hoH/ /dam tshig mchog ni thams cad kyi/ /dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje lha
188b1(rgyud): mo la sogs pa/ /dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsol ka ba dang g.yog mo yi/ /gtso mo pho nya bran mo'o/ /de nas kun mchog la sogs pa/ /mngon bris yang dag
188b2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su/ /dzaHhUM boM hoHzhes brjod bya/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar 'dug /bde ba chen
188b3(rgyud): po'i rdo rje mchog / bdag po lan cig yang dag dgug /hUM mahA su kha badzra satwa/ ya hi shI g+h+raM mahA su kha badzra a mo g+hA ya/ a nu pA la ya/ pra bud+d+ha su ra ta s+t+waM a nu ra k+to
188b4(rgyud): me b+ha ba/ su to sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su to sh+yo me b+ha wa/ b+ha ga wA na nA di na sa satwa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ a she ta ma tri sha A be sha ya sa ma ye ra bad d+ha/ pa shI ka ro me/ i me ra mu
188b5(rgyud): drA pa daiH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs/ /bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan/ /dbang du gyur nas rab tu
188b6(rgyud): thub/ ces bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po gsungs so/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang lha ni/ /'od zer kun tu ston la sogs/ /mtshan ma rnams pa mang po ni/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong
188b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni/ /rdo rje thal mo kha byed bul/ /bum pa kang dag ci snyed pa'i/ /me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod/ /ba dan rtse mor dril btags
189a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa/ /mtshams kyi char ni bzhag par bya/ /bum pa spos chus gang pa la/ /rdo rje bcas pas phyin brlangs pa/ /lcug ma la ni yongs su bzlas/ /de
189a2(rgyud): la bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi tshur bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ hUM mahA su kha badzra ma mo g+ha sa ma yo da ka sad d+ha ma b+hi sha ny+tsa/ sarba su kha so ma na s+yA myA da da ku ru
189a3(rgyud): ku ru/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /bsang gtor bya ba dang / 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal
189a4(rgyud): thams cad bsal pa dang / bde ba chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs
189a5(rgyud): kyang / /rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs shing / /rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlob/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /rang nyid khrus byas dris legs
189a6(rgyud): byugs/ /ci rnyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing / /me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo/ /rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor
189a7(rgyud): ba yis/ /spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas/ /gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /de nas mdun du
189b1(rgyud): 'dug nas ni/ /de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba chen/ /rdo rje chen po nor che ba/ /ye shes chen po las chen po/ /de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod/ /de nas me
189b2(rgyud): tog sil ma ni/ /mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin/ /dang po Sha Da la sogs/ /bstod pa glu ru lan gcig blang / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa
189b3(rgyud): brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te/ /dpal mchog dang / po sems dpa' che/ /dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba chen/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag
189b4(rgyud): po'i bdag / sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud rni rab 'joms pa/ /thams cad du ni
189b5(rgyud): byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid/ /'dod dang thar
189b6(rgyud): pa nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /brtan par rang 'byung gsal ba ste/ /rab phra sbom dang legs bsags
189b7(rgyud): pa/ /rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa/ /srid pa 'khor ba sbyong mdzad pa/ /thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can/ /mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas/ /snying po phyag rgya
190a1(rgyud): @#/ /sbyor dam tshig /de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos dang las ni khams chen po/ /dam pa'i chos ste las/
190a2(rgyud): mchog bdag /byang chub sems ni rab sbyod mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo khro bo che/ /dus mtha' ltar 'bar 'dul ba po/ /'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog /drag po drag
190a3(rgyud): nyid zad mdzad pa/ /thams cad dag pa pad+ma che/ /shes rab thabs te tshul chen po/ /'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che/ /nam
190a4(rgyud): mkha' mtha' yas rtag pa'i don/ /'byung po thams cad gnas chen po/ /'byor pa po ni thams cad gnas/ /'byor pa dpal dang gtso bo rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
190a5(rgyud): mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pas khyed la bdag brten bgyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /
190a6(rgyud): gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /nyid re nang par rjod byed dam/ /chos kyi tshig gis lan gcig brjod/ /dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod
190a7(rgyud): na/ /dang por nyin re dus gsum dang / /bstod na sdig pa las nges grol/ /zhing dag pa ni grub par byed/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /lan gcig rab tu brjod
190b1(rgyud): pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad skal bzang byed/ /phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed/ /dngos grub don yod yon tan can/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'o/ /de nas
190b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pas ni/ /rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod/ /rang gi phyag rgyas lan gcig ni/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub/ /de nas lha yi chu dang ni/ /de bzhin sku
190b3(rgyud): mchog gis dbang bskur/ /rang nyid snying po rdo rje phyag /snying po 'di ni blang bar bya/ /de la rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ hUM mahA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi
190b4(rgyud): She ke na hrIHa b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sarba badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM dr-i d+ho me b+ha ba mi d+ha nA ma ma ste ga blan/ mahA badzra d+ha ra su rata s+t+waM/ mahA badzra satwa/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swa/ /de nas rdo rje dbang
190b5(rgyud): bskur ba/ /phyag na rdo rje ril 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen slob dpon du/ /'di nyid du ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par/ /cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni/ /rdo rje
190b6(rgyud): gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /legs par mchod la phyir phyung bya/ /de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag /rdo rje kun gyi gsung rab 'dzin/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon/ /dngos
190b7(rgyud): grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub / /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che/ /d+hIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che/ /las rnams thams cad
191a1(rgyud): @#/ /nus la brtag /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster/ /sems can kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs
191a2(rgyud): nus/ /thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog /kun rig pa dang kun gyi bdag /'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor/ /phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che/ /lha la sogs pa'i
191a3(rgyud): sems can kun/ /bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong / /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan/ /dga' zhing
191a4(rgyud): rang nyid de bdag por/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis brlab cing
191a5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / //de nas rdo rje slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
191a6(rgyud): dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje mchod yon snying gar bskor/ /bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis ni/ /mgo bos yang dag phyag rgya bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad grub byed
191a7(rgyud): yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'gro ba kun la'ang grub mdzad brjod/ /de nas dus kyi
191b1(rgyud): mchod pa yis/ /bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/ /de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug /de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab
191b2(rgyud): gzhug / slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas slob ma bcug nas ni/ /dga' chen po 'di brjod par bya/ /rab dgyes rab bde
191b3(rgyud): bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod/ /de nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /spyi bo nas ni myur du 'dor/ /gang du me tog babs gyur te/ /lhag pa'i lhar ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas
191b4(rgyud): lha yi chu yis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin par dbang bskur/ rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga/ /byon la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra/ /badzra a b+hi She ke na s+t+waM/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /ma hA badzra d+hA ra/ he
191b5(rgyud): badzra nA ma si d+d+ha nA ma/ gang la rdo rje ming gang zhig yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas snying po byin la/ phyag rgya bcing ba bslabs nas ci ltar mngon par
191b6(rgyud): 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am/ /gang 'dod rang gis grub pa la/ /de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid/ /'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad/ /'jig rten
191b7(rgyud): pa ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yang / /thams cad rang gi ngo bo ni/ /rgyas par bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub/ /'di la rab tu 'jug tsam gyis/ /mi tshugs pa
192a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang mi ldog pa/ /nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing / bde chen rab tu grub pa ster/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /mna' ni dam du bsngags nas kyang / de nyid
192a2(rgyud): chos dang dam tshig ni/ /rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab/ /de la 'di ni mna' grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig
192a3(rgyud): 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu/ /de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smra/ /skye bo
192a4(rgyud): 'dug nang gnas pa 'ga'/ /dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang / dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te/ thog mtha' med
192a5(rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ /de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba lnga'i
192a6(rgyud): de kho na nyid chen por bshad par brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal bar mdzad de/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral
192a7(rgyud): byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin/ /de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam
192b1(rgyud): tshig chen po bsten par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya/ /
192b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /de la rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang
192b3(rgyud): ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ /ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur ba'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya
192b4(rgyud): ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog /rgyun tu sems can don
192b5(rgyud): byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde skyed bsten par gyis/ /de na 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rab tu
192b6(rgyud): mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas khyed kyis bcud dang / kha zas dang / gnas pa dang / glu dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par
192b7(rgyud): bstabs pa bas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs/ /ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing / /rdo rje gar gyi
193a1(rgyud): @#/ /mchod pa yis/ /yang dag par ni mchod de byung / /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /
193a2(rgyud): slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang / /glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag /yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya/ /dpal
193a3(rgyud): mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o/ / //de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste/ /gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la/ /
193a4(rgyud): dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o/ /'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /srid par gnas shing srid par sangs/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rtag tu sems can
193a5(rgyud): kun don byed/ /'di yi ci ltar mchog grub pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas/ /dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur/ /gdul
193a6(rgyud): bya min pa bsod nams med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mthong sogs kyis/ /sems can don byed mi nus so/ /de bas rgyud chen las grub pa/ /sangs
193a7(rgyud): rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthong la sogs pa sems can don/ /nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yi/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med/ /nam
193b1(rgyud): mkha' mtha' yas sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /bsod nams med pa'am le lo can/ /de yang kun mchog grub pa
193b2(rgyud): yis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog
193b3(rgyud): rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lugs ma 'am ni brkos pa 'am/ /byas pa 'am ni bris pa yi/ /dang ba'i sems dpa'i brtags
193b4(rgyud): nas ni/ /mdun du de ni bsgrub par bya/ /nyin re zhing ni dang po ru/ /de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste/ /phyag rgya chen por rab byin
193b5(rgyud): brlab/ /rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po rang / /rdo rje hUM ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje cha lugs ci bzhin
193b6(rgyud): du/ /mchog gi dad por rab dgyes pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni/ /ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsgrub/ /'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'dod pa tsam gyis
193b7(rgyud): 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /phun tshogs kun bdag thams cad pa/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /
194a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /rtag par kun tu 'dul ba po/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin/ /rdo rje
194a2(rgyud): kun gyi dngos grub che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas/ /khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs
194a3(rgyud): pa| |tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa/ /kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog /kun rig dngos grub thams cad ste/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rang gi rnam
194a4(rgyud): 'phrul rab ston byed/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po'i dbang phyug che/ /gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin/ /
194a5(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing rjed/ /rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa/ /rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa'
194a6(rgyud): 'am/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa/ /rtog pa kun bshad
194a7(rgyud): cho ga 'am/ /rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu/ /dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis/ /dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
194b1(rgyud): che rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs/ /de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag la/ /rang gi snying pos lan gcig
194b2(rgyud): sgrub/ /dr-iD+ha su to Sh+ya saM rak+ta/ /su po sid+d+ha ta la gu/ /de la ci ltar yi ge hUM gi glu blangs pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /ri d+hi ta sogs kyis brgyan ldan/ /ci nus pa dang / dga' dang
194b3(rgyud): gaN+De la sogs glu blangs pa'i/ /yi ge hUM gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyogs rgya thams cad kyi/ /mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de/ /gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na/
194b4(rgyud): de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /rang nyid kyis ni rgya bcings la/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar du bsgrub/ /de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/
194b5(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya bcing nas ni/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ /rang gi snying gar rim bzhin du/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog sgrub
194b6(rgyud): pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar bsgrubs na/ /mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang
194b7(rgyud): chen nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang / /gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni/ /dam par myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa
195a1(rgyud): @#/ /chen po don yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni/ /nyin re zhing dang
195a2(rgyud): por lan gcig phyag rgya bsgrub par don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya
195a3(rgyud): ba dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas so/ /bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / dngos
195a4(rgyud): grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so/ /tshe dang / lang tsho dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjod chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya
195a5(rgyud): ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so/ /dpal chen po dang / skal ba bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/
195a6(rgyud): stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang / chos dang / las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che bas so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rmad du byung ba dang /
195a7(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul bas so/ /thams cad du yi ge dang / gzugs kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa
195b1(rgyud): dang / smra ba dang / 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang /
195b2(rgyud): zil gyis gnon par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /sgyu ma thams cad dang / bde ba'i mchog dang / lung bsgo ba dang / lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje
195b3(rgyud): yid du byung bas so/ /gter thams cad dbyung ba dang / nor dbrog pa dang / rgyal srid thob pa dang / sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bskur bas so/ /yul
195b4(rgyud): thams cad dang / skye bo dang / grong khyer dang / nangs dang / chu bor nye bar longs spyod sprul ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/ /thams cad las sngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang
195b5(rgyud): rin po che dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / g.yog 'khor shin tu bzang po la sogs pa sprul te nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so/ /skad cig gis sa
195b6(rgyud): gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang / snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo
195b7(rgyud): rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rang rtser gzhug pa dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang
196a1(rgyud): @#/ /po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so/ /dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo
196a2(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so/ /rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing
196a3(rgyud): ston pa mi snang ba dang / nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so/ /'jig
196a4(rgyud): rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bcing ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis so/ /lha thams
196a5(rgyud): cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so/ /klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba
196a6(rgyud): dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so/ /gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang
196a7(rgyud): du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang / 'jug pa
196b1(rgyud): dang / mchod pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so/ /phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang
196b2(rgyud): du bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so/ /dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni dang
196b3(rgyud): po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so/ /las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa la rnam pa mi 'jigs par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni
196b4(rgyud): dang po'i rdo rje las kyis so/ /rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so/ /sems dpa' chen po thams cad
196b5(rgyud): dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
196b6(rgyud): bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i de bzhin gshegs pas so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni dang
196b7(rgyud): po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /sdig pa thams cad byas pa 'am/ /rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa dang / /dngos grub
197a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad grub par 'gyur/ ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub pa don yod par grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas dang po'i snying
197a2(rgyud): po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad
197a3(rgyud): kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /don yod pa dang thogs med pa/ /bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu/ /las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag ni/ /
197a4(rgyud): dngos grub skad cig gis sgrub byed/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi pa dang / bde legs su bya ba dang / tshe mngon par
197a5(rgyud): 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub
197a6(rgyud): bcing zhing bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so/ /nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / slar zlog pa dang / rtag pa can dang / khyab 'jug gi rims
197a7(rgyud): thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad med pas so/ /gdung ba thams cad dang / gnod byed dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig
197b1(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so/ /dug dang sbyar ba'i dug las nye bar thar pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bza' ba dang / bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje
197b2(rgyud): gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so/ /gdon thams cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / rab tu gdul ba dang / bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon
197b3(rgyud): las thar pa'o/ /thams cad la bcing ba dang / thar pa dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi
197b4(rgyud): phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / gdon las thar bar bya ba dang / shi ba bslang bar bya ba dang / tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang / shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis
197b5(rgyud): so/ /sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang /
197b6(rgyud): bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang / pra se na thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas
197b7(rgyud): so/ /thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so/ /
198a1(rgyud): @#/ /thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / gsad pa dang / bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug
198a2(rgyud): pa'i srin pos so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje
198a3(rgyud): gar gyi gshed byed kyis so/ /khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang / bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang / rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang / 'jigs pa las thar pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs
198a4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang / char chen po dbab
198a5(rgyud): pa dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / glog dang / ser ba bzlog pa dang / dro ba dang / grang ba bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang /
198a6(rgyud): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug
198a7(rgyud): pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rtse ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa dang / klu
198b1(rgyud): thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so/ /rnam thos sras
198b2(rgyud): mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las
198b3(rgyud): rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so/ /mchod pa thams
198b4(rgyud): cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs
198b5(rgyud): p a ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos
198b6(rgyud): grub dam pas so/ / //de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ nyin re dang po lan gcig ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /snying mchog
198b7(rgyud): lan gcig bzlas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya/ /de yis rjes la nye snying po/ /las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas/ /don yod grub pas las rnams ni/ /kun la
199a1(rgyud): @#/ /shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ba la/ /ma bshad pa la'ang
199a2(rgyud): rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog 'dir 'jig pa yod min te/ /'khor lo med la brgya byin la/ /gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas/ /rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sdig pa chen po
199a3(rgyud): byed pa yang / /bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya/ /'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i
199a4(rgyud): rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o/ / //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'byin pa byed pa bde ba che/ /bde chen can du
