199a5(rgyud): brtan phyir dang / /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med/ /kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te/ /mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas/ /
199a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo / /mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad/ /'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /til gyi gang
199a7(rgyud): bu bzhin myur gang / /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs/ /sems can thams cad ma dag pas/ /rang rig las kyi
199b1(rgyud): dag ma gyur/ /de tshe sems can khams rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir/ /rang gi las ni sbyang don du/ /btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan
199b2(rgyud): rdo rje can/ /sems dpa' chen po bde ba che/ /byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul/ /sems can la phan bsod nams can/ /byang chub
199b3(rgyud): sems ni brtan pa dag / sems can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas/ /shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /thugs
199b4(rgyud): rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs/ /byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil
199b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa yin/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi/ /'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung / /de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis/ /sems can thams cad
199b6(rgyud): yang dag bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la/ /de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa/ /de
199b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung
200a1(rgyud): @#/ /thugs ni rdo rje la/ /yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so/ /oM b+hUM khaM/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /bdud bcom
200a2(rgyud): la sogs mdzad nas ni/ /byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa/ /sems can la ni bde don phyir/ /rtog pa
200a3(rgyud): kun gyi bde ba che/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /'khor lo lta
200a4(rgyud): bar sangs rgyas nyid/ /'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba/ /su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /oM sid+d+ha mAM zhes brjod dgod/ /mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas
200a5(rgyud): yang dag bri/ /g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba/ /rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /g.yon
200a6(rgyud): du log par rnam dregs pa/ /sdig pa bsdus pa kun 'byin pa'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ badzra satwa/ badzra rat+na/ badzra d+harma/ badzra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa
200a7(rgyud): badzrI/ rat+na badzrI/ pad+ma badzrI/ bi shwa badzrI/ /mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / /rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni lha mo ste/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams
200b1(rgyud): su/ /de bzhan snga ma ci lta bar/ /'khor lo de ni brtag par bya/ /mchod pa'i thal mo snying gar bcing / /g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya/ /me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs
200b2(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim/ /me tog bcas te snying gar bcing / /bsam pa g.yos pas gdung par bya/ /mgon la mgo bos phyag byas la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas
200b3(rgyud): ni/ /zhugs nas me tog 'dor bar bya/ /shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa
200b4(rgyud): dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan na twa da/ /de nas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /ston la me tog sil ma dor/ /sangs rgyas
200b5(rgyud): byang chub rab bsgrub phyir/ /'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod/ /de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni/ /thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis/ /
200b6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog /sna tshogs
200b7(rgyud): pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin cho ga ni/ /rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu gzhug /mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che/ /mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar bya/ /sgrub pa
201a1(rgyud): @#/ /byas nas dngos grub kyang / /cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya/ /ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs/ /rnam par rgyal ba mnyes par bri/ /sgrub 'di lan
201a2(rgyud): gcig tsam gyis ni/ /de 'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la/ /rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin/ /
201a3(rgyud): bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na/ /ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang / /tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom
201a4(rgyud): med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na/ /phyag
201a5(rgyud): rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ /bstan par myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /snying gar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ /
201a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog
201a7(rgyud): bcings te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mtshungs med sems can don byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de
201b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / //de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog /las rnams rab 'byams dam pa
201b2(rgyud): ste/ /sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa/ /go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste/ nad thams cad dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / dug thams cad
201b3(rgyud): dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gshed byed dang / g.yengs byed dang / ro langs dang / sngags dang / sman dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa
201b4(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rims dang / gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / nyes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lus dang /
201b5(rgyud): ngag dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so/ /tshe dang / lang tsho dang /
201b6(rgyud): gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi byin chen po dang / mdangs dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / bsod nams dang /
201b7(rgyud): ming dang / snyan pa dang / grags pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtog pa dang / stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phung po dang / 'du byed dang / sku dang / gsung
202a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / thugs 'phel ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
202a2(rgyud): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang / thabs dang / rdo rje dang / bsgrub pa dang / gzungs dang / sa
202a3(rgyud): dang spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / chos dang / las dang / sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang / sems can gyi don dang /
202a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / rdo rje chen po grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis
202a5(rgyud): so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams
202a6(rgyud): cad kyi don dang / 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i sa dang / gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs
202a7(rgyud): pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa
202b1(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha las babs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba la rab tu
202b2(rgyud): bzhag pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang / mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang / rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / dngos grub thams cad sbyin
202b3(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
202b4(rgyud): kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so/ /ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis/ /byang chub sems la mngon brten pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod tshogs kyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur/ /
202b5(rgyud): don yod bsod nams dam pa yis/ /las kyi rab 'byams sgrub byed pa/ /cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed/ /rnam pa kun tu dad ldan pa'i/ /
202b6(rgyud): sems can kun la sbyin par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed/ /dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ de bzhin
202b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i rtog pa rgyas pa'o/ / //de nas sna tshogs las chen po/ /khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen
203a1(rgyud): @#/ /po/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing / /gang phyir nyes
203a2(rgyud): byas kyis gdug pa'i/ /rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis/ /zhi bas sems can kun gyi don/ /gdul bar rab tu bsgrub mi nus/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub bya ba/ /'gro ba
203a3(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad yin/ /gang tshe bde gshegs sems can don/ /dam ba mdzad par mi spyod pa/ /de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun/ /gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab
203a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab/ /u ti Sh+Tha sa ma ya kro b+ha ni sum+b+ha dz+wA la badzra hUM/ de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsam gyis/ /
203a5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /slar byung nas ni mdun na gnas/ /khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs
203a6(rgyud): bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'od kyis gsal ba/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che/ /drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing / /'bar
203a7(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phros pas sreg pa 'dra/ /'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni/ /bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra/ /dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas/ /rdo rje
203b1(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ /de la rdo rje chen po me dang nyi ma ltar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun gyi bud shing
203b2(rgyud): zad/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum/ /thams cad g.yos zhing 'gul par 'gyur/ /lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni/ /g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje
203b3(rgyud): 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun/ /de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams/ /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'gro/ lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum kun/ /de tshe
203b4(rgyud): kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad/ /sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po/ /dam pa yang ni thugs
203b5(rgyud): su chud/ /de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yin/ /g.yon brkyang bas ni
203b6(rgyud): legs par bzhugs/ /spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing g.yo/ /kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /mkha'
203b7(rgyud): 'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams/ /phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni 'bar bar 'khrug /rlung bskyod bskal ba'i me lta bur/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu
204a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khrugs/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa/ /yang dag bzhugs pa legs bskul te/ /'jig rten thams
204a2(rgyud): cad yongs su bskor/ /bkug nas sems can kun don dang / /brtan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum bdag de rnams dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med
204a3(rgyud): byas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni/ /de rnams la ni thugs rje yis/ /'chi ba slar gso brtan por gsungs/ /oM u t+tiSh+Tha ma hA a d+hi pa ti
204a4(rgyud): badzri Ni/ shI g+h+raM ud thA pa ya hUM/ rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba thams cad bslang ba'o/ /de nas sa gsum bslang ba ni/ /thams cad du ni shi ba gso/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur
204a5(rgyud): cing / /rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bas/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing / /nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes/ /sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo/ /
204a6(rgyud): de rnams kyis gsol ba/ 'di su zhig lags/ /bcom ldan sku ni zhi ba la/ /gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs/ /khyed kyi dam tshig ci 'dra ba/ /zhus pa bde
204a7(rgyud): ba'i tshig tu gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba/ /gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin
204b1(rgyud): du/ /nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'di thos nas/ /tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi/ /'bar ba'i mtshon gyis
204b2(rgyud): 'thab par brtsams/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig /gnod sbyin
204b3(rgyud): bsgo bas ci zhig bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas/ /khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas/ /de nas khro gnyer thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod/ /g.yon pa bsnyems
204b4(rgyud): pa rgya bcas pas/ /smin ma spyan bsdus pas dgod cing / /nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /drag tu khros bcas pas smras so/ /de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i
204b5(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus rgyal ba la ni 'di yin te/ /hi/ de nas snying po 'di phyung bas/ /des rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang / /dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug /
204b6(rgyud): rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas/ /rdo rje ming ni byin nas su/ /'jig rten gsum po'i ting 'dzin bzhag /de nas rdo rje chen po mchog /mgon
204b7(rgyud): po yis ni gsol btab pa/ /sems can kun la rjes ston pas/ /rtog p+ba 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu/ /'bar
205a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su bzhag bya ba/ /sngon po 'bar ba'i gzugs bzang ba/ /zhal gyi mche bcung zad gtsigs/ /zhal ni khro
205a2(rgyud): dang bcas pas bzhad/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrugs pa'i/ /rdo rje gsor
205a3(rgyud): ba mdzad la brtson/ /de yi dngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang / /ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin pa/ /mtshams
205a4(rgyud): su mda' dang kha T+waM ga / 'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa/ /'bar ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba
205a5(rgyud): ni/ /thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu/ /dang po rdo rje phyag rgya bdag /gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste/ /gsum par rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor/ /rdo rje
205a6(rgyud): chen mo sgeg mo che/ /bzhi pa glu mkhan ma la sogs/ /rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyis/ /khro bo rnams ni lnga ba la/ /drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog /gnod sbyin
205a7(rgyud): srin po king kar/ /dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs/ /gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams su/ /mdor na ming po gsum la
205b1(rgyud): sogs/ /lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad/ /legs par bri ba 'am gzhag par bya/ /mtshams su lha mo rab bshad pa/ /de rnams kyi ni sgo bus su'ang / /lcags kyu la
205b2(rgyud): sogs de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /go rims dag ni ji bzhin du/ /cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya/ /khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /khro gnyer 'dzum
205b3(rgyud): dang bcas pas mdud/ /de nas khro zhing slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub/ /hUM mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /bsnyems dang
205b4(rgyud): bcas pas rgyas gdab nyid/ /de bzhin khro bas gdul ba la/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yis/ /gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes/ /de nas me tog blangs nas ni/ /khros pas
205b5(rgyud): bdag po che la gtor/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /oM ma hA badzra dz+wA la yA na la rka ya hi dzaH/ sarba badzra ku la pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba mu
205b6(rgyud): draM ga nA ban+d+ha na trA Ta/ sarba sa ma yaM sA b+ha ya phaT/ sarba du Sh+TA na da ha ba tsaM b+ha smiM ku ru ma hA kro d+ha a ka ni badzra Ni hUM phaT/ a a a a/ de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi/ rgyal
205b7(rgyud): po brtan pa che byon 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun/ /dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad/ /de nas hUM mdzad la sogs sgras/ /mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung
206a1(rgyud): @#/ /bar 'gyur/ /gal te slob ma la sogs la/ /snying gar dbab pa bra ba skye/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi/ /phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /bcug nas
206a2(rgyud): dang po'i sems dpa' yi/ /rang gi snying po brjod par bya/ /hUM hUM badzra pra ha ra Ni phaT/ hUM badzra shU la yA gr-i Ni tri ti/ ma tas hUM badzra ko She ts+tshin+da haM/ oM badzra a ma la pA she maT/
206a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'gugs pa dang / rdo rje mdung dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i srung ba'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa/
206a4(rgyud): shin tu grub pa/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra gu h+ya sid+d+ha pa ra ma yo gI shwa ri hi/ hUM
206a5(rgyud): badzra tsaN+Da ho kha T+rAM ga ma hA badzra ka pA la ya ma ku te ru lu ru lu N+Di hUM badzra nA rA ya Ni dzi/ hUM badzra ba Ta ka dzi/ rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan gcig bzlas te dgod pa 'am bri bar
206a6(rgyud): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol na dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig brjod
206a7(rgyud): par bya ste/ /sems can rnams la bde phyir dang / /bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa 'dul las bsod nams ni/ /'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /
206b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / 'jig
206b2(rgyud): rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi
206b3(rgyud): pa la bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhag pa dang / gsad pa dang / slar 'tsho bar bya'o/ /gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni
206b4(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur na de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la shin tu bsrung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu bsrung ba yin
206b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed do/ /de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang / /dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun gyis kyang / /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par/ /tshe
206b6(rgyud): 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ste/ /ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni/ /bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /'bum tshang
206b7(rgyud): nas ni sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog /rgyas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing / /
207a1(rgyud): @#/ /sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par/ /'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing / /cis kyang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po
207a2(rgyud): sgrub pa ni/ /'greng ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am/ /'gro ba'am nyal bar byed pa na/ /ci ltar de ltar 'bum bzlas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis 'dod
207a3(rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug kun/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang / /rang
207a4(rgyud): gi nye du rnams kyis bsten/ /gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing / /gang la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so/ /de
207a5(rgyud): nas phyag rgya'i dam pa sgrub pa ni/ /ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcing / /bdag nyid nges par bsregs nas ni/ /ci srid nyid du khro chen po'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par
207a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni/ /bdag ni thams cad gsad bya zhes/ /brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yis/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin
207a7(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni/ /las rnams dam bsgrub pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhir ni rab phyed cing / /thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na/ /rdo rje las nyid thob
207b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas dngos grub sgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi/ /las kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams/ /go rims bzhin
207b2(rgyud): du bshad par bya/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad bsreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / rmongs pa
207b3(rgyud): dang / gzhig pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzir ba dang / dral ba dang / brdeg pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / btso ba dang / gcad pa dang / dbug pa dang / phye mar
207b4(rgyud): bya ba dang / gtor ba dang / rnam par gzhom pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang / smyo bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis
207b5(rgyud): so/ /thams cad dgug par bya ba dang / des par bkod pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug pa dang / brgyal du gzhug pa dang / rtser gzhug
207b6(rgyud): ba dang / ha ha zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang / 'khor ba dang / drang ba dang / 'od du gzhug pa dang / bsgom pa dang / nub par bya ba dang / dbyung ba dang / 'phang ba dang / nye bar
207b7(rgyud): 'degs pa bya ba dang / bskur ba dang / nga ro 'don par bya ba dang / dur gzhug par bya ba dang / rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang / 'ching bar bya ba dang / skra 'bal bar bya ba
208a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / zhe 'gras par bya ba dang / gos bshu ba dang / khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdon gyi phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad dgug pa dang /
208a2(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / pra se na bsgrub pa dang / bden pa smra bar bya ba dang / sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa ston pa dang / dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog
208a3(rgyud): pa dang / /dus ma yin par shing las me tog dang / 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang / 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston par bya ba dang / rims dang / sbyar
208a4(rgyud): ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las thar bar bya ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa
208a5(rgyud): dang / phyogs dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyob par bya ba dang / thar par bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / dbang
208a6(rgyud): du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub pas so/ /lha la sogs thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang / klu gdon par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
208a7(rgyud): srin po skrag pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul ba dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams gdul ba dang / gdug
208b1(rgyud): pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang / gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang dag par bskyed pa dang / nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba
208b2(rgyud): dang / nor sbyin las nor bu thams cad dbrog pa dang / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang / brgya byin
208b3(rgyud): mnan nas bde sogs ma dbrog pa dang / skem byed tshar gcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang / khyab 'jug gdul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal
208b4(rgyud): ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang / rdo rje bsgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
208b5(rgyud): bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis so/ /

208b7(rgyud): dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni/ /

209a3(rgyud): can khams dag ni/ /de rnams la ni rab spyod par/ /skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen/ /mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad/ /
