275b4(rgyud): krung phyed pas 'dug ste/ rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du 'ong ba
275b5(rgyud): thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong na lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags
275b6(rgyud): bzung nas g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol bar byed
275b7(rgyud): pa'am/ sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba ni bcu ste
276a1(rgyud): @#/ /snying gar sen mo 'drud pa'o/ /lcags kyu brdeg pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la g.yas pa de gzhug pa'o/ /lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o/ /
276a2(rgyud): phan tshun sems brud pa'i snying gar byas pa'o/ /lce mnyam par byin pa'o/ /snying gar rdo rje brtan par rab tu bzhag pa'o/ /rdo rjes byab pa'o/ /rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo / /'di
276a3(rgyud): rnams kyi dngos grub dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / chos dang / ye shes dang / las dang / bde
276a4(rgyud): ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod par thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i
276a5(rgyud): lcags kyus so/ /kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so/ /mthe bo rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su brud pa'o/ /mdzub mo rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyi
276a6(rgyud): lcags kyu gnyis so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o/ /srin lag gi rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o/ /mthe'u
276a7(rgyud): chung gi rdo rje'o/ /de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo bcing ba'o/ /'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang /
276b1(rgyud): rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang / rol pa dang / chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang /
276b2(rgyud): dgod du gzhug pa dang / gsod pa'o/ /de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma
276b3(rgyud): thams cad brtan par rjes su chags pa ni rdo rje lta bas so/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo bar byed pas myang ba dang / btung ba'o/ /chags pa brtan zhing
276b4(rgyud): ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so/ /de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyis dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung ba gnyis gtod pas so/ /thams cad kyis mchod par
276b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni snying gar gzhug pas so/ /yod pa thams cad rnyed pa ni mig dgug pas so/ /'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i smin pa'i gdong
276b6(rgyud): gis lta bas so/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams kyis so/ /'dod pa'i chags pa gsad pa ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid
276b7(rgyud): ldang bar byed pas so/ /'dod pa thams cad kyi rjes su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka' bsgo bas so/ /de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la
277a1(rgyud): @#/ /sogs pa'i brtan pa dang / g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar sbyor na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i
277a2(rgyud): dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje bsnyems ma'i
277a3(rgyud): phyag rgyas thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / rjes su chags pa'o/ /rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang /
277a4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bde bar grub pa'o/ /rgyal mtshan sgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen
277a5(rgyud): po nyid do/ /dus kyis mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do/ /rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang / thams cad
277a6(rgyud): 'phrog pa'o/ /g.yon pa bsnyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi las rnams kyis sgyu ma dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang / rmugs pa
277a7(rgyud): dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / bskor ba dang / bskrad pa dang / 'bru dang / ltung ba 'pho ba dang / dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las
277b1(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o/ /rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad do/ /mdzub mo
277b2(rgyud): gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe bo'i rdo rjes bkab pas
277b3(rgyud): thams cad rnyed pa'o/ /de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad bsrung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
277b4(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du byed pa bsgrub pa'o/ /mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis
277b5(rgyud): legs par bzung bas mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang / dpal dbrog pa'o/ /de nyid kyi
277b6(rgyud): dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang / dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor
277b7(rgyud): ba'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o/ /sems dpa' mnan
278a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas rdo rje lha mo rol tu gzhug pa'o/ /de yang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so/ /rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga'
278a2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rjes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so/ /mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo bsgreng bar
278a3(rgyud): byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung mnyam la dral bar bya ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /btsir bas
278a4(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o/ /mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o/ /mdzub mos phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pas
278a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o/ /rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas bsgrub pa'o/ /skye gnas g.yo bas bud med dang / skyes pa dag
278a6(rgyud): gi rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dus
278a7(rgyud): pa dang bral ba yang ngo / /rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi
278b1(rgyud): lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skye gnas su sen mo brud pas skyes bu rnams so/ /de
278b2(rgyud): nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs
278b3(rgyud): pas bde ba ster du gzhug / bsgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyis rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM
278b4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur
278b5(rgyud): gsang bar reg na thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o/ /smin ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong
278b6(rgyud): ba'o/ /rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po sgrub ba'o/ /rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyi bden pa thams cad dang / de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu
278b7(rgyud): bar smra ba'o/ /rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur ba yin no/ /rang gi bdag
279a1(rgyud): @#/ /nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o/ /de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAM gso/ /dngos grub thams
279a2(rgyud): cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do/ /thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams
279a3(rgyud): cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /
279a4(rgyud): thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams
279a5(rgyud): cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad gzhug cing don yod par bsgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
279a6(rgyud): kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ /pi wang dang / gling bu
279a7(rgyud): dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuN+Da dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / guny+dza dang / ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du
279b1(rgyud): rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / gdon las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'thab mo las rnam
279b2(rgyud): par rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin/ /phyag rgya'i
279b3(rgyud): rtog pa rab tu brtags/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la/ /rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis/ /don yod kun grub bde bar gsol/ /zhes
279b4(rgyud): bya'o/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa tshad
279b5(rgyud): m ed cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog
279b6(rgyud): tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /
279b7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas/ /sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis/ /las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya/ /thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba chen po rdo
280a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi
280a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste/ /mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje
280a3(rgyud): lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje las kyi mchod pa che'i/ /thal mos sbyi bor bzung nas ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na/ /dbang po rnams dang sbyar
280a4(rgyud): bar bya/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing / /sgeg bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol
280a5(rgyud): bas/ /de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing / /phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog
280a6(rgyud): gi phyag rgya brgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas/ /thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /mchog dang po yi las chen po'i/ /phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin
280a7(rgyud): no/ /zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya/ /rab tu dga' mchog sgra bkrol bar/ /bde ba
280b1(rgyud): nyid du mngon par sbyar/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas/ /
280b2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya/ /mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag /ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga /lus kun
280b3(rgyud): gyis ni gar bya zhing / /rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing / /dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o/ /ji ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa/ /rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /
280b4(rgyud): rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa/ /phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de la
280b5(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster/ /kun mchog
280b6(rgyud): dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir/ /nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs/ /dam pa mchog tu grub par
280b7(rgyud): byed/ /mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po/ /dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la/ /phyag rgya kun gyi tshul
281a1(rgyud): @#/ /'di ni/ /bstan par bya ste gzhan la min/ /de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi/ /mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub
281a2(rgyud): mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan/ /dpal mchog dang po'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug
281a3(rgyud): pa'o/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas sems dpa' chen po kun/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang
281a4(rgyud): bcas pa'i mchog / rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni/ /mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol/ /kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub
281a5(rgyud): phyir/ /rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/ /de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa/ /gang
281a6(rgyud): gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la/ /dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji
281a7(rgyud): ltar lags/ /sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang / /de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni/ /byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags/ /bdud
281b1(rgyud): dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje gtum po mthar byed nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang / /
281b2(rgyud): 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang / /khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i snying po ji ltar byung / /de ci nye snying ji ltar lags/ /bde
281b3(rgyud): chen rdo rje chen po yi/ /don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs/ /de yi rnam smin ji ltar bu/ /thig gdab ba dang brtag pa yis/ /dngos
281b4(rgyud): grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags/ /gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba/ /ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni/ /rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags//
281b5(rgyud): thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang / phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang / /thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che/ /bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che/ /de ni de nyid
281b6(rgyud): gsang ba dang / /don yod pa ni mchog nyid de/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
281b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mdo gsungs so/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni/ /the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su/ /'di yi lan
282a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni gsungs pa yin/ /de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las/ /sems can don yod yongs brtags
282a2(rgyud): bas/ /des na rtog par gsungs pa ste/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro/ /de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad/ /phyi ma sngar dang
282a3(rgyud): yang dag byung / /de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang / phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod/ /de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun
282a4(rgyud): la rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog /bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i/ /grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
282a5(rgyud): sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam
282a6(rgyud): mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan
282a7(rgyud): 'das de gang yin zhe na/ dkon mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog
282b1(rgyud): de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di/ /
282b2(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu
282b3(rgyud): bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog /de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub
282b4(rgyud): chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog /rdo rje dbang phyug chen bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog
282b5(rgyud): dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'byor ba rnams/ /de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
282b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog
282b7(rgyud): nyid du bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam
283a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyis mi khyab rgya che ba/ /thab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad khyab cing dri ma med/ /byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa/ /de nas 'di'i
283a2(rgyud): las kyi khyad par ni/ /sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas/ /ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag /rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun/ /rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te/ /bcom
283a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni/ /bdag la byin rlabs mchog bsgrub pa/ /nyin re sgrub par byed na des/ /rdo rje sems
283a4(rgyud): dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang / /gang phyir sems can don gyur
283a5(rgyud): pas/ /de phyi nga ni kun tu bzang / /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems
283a6(rgyud): nyid kho na bdud nyid de/ /sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan
283a7(rgyud): 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de phyir de nyid sangs
283b1(rgyud): rgyas nyid/ /bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang / /gdug pa thams cad nges
283b2(rgyud): par gnon/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/ /kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni/ /mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin/ /brtan pa thams cad grub
283b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ /des na phyag na rdo rje des/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum/ /yab ni thabs la mkhas pa
283b4(rgyud): ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir/ /rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang / thar ba yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa
283b5(rgyud): che/ /dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
283b6(rgyud): gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir/ /nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir/ /gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir/ /'jig rten gsum
283b7(rgyud): pa khams gsum nga / /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyin yid zhe na/ nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde/ /bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir/ /g.yo
284a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir/ /sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no/ /zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
284a2(rgyud): so/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi/ /dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir/ /gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir/ /
284a3(rgyud): bskal ba thog mar bcom ldan gsungs/ /de nas de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /gsang ba'i
284a4(rgyud): phyir ni snying por brjod/ /yi ge hUM ni mi 'gyur mchog /de nas nye bar snying po yi/ /de kho na nyid shes pa ni/ /de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang / snying po rab tu brjod par
284a5(rgyud): bya/ /snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub/ /nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod/ /de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /dngos
284a6(rgyud): grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje de nyid don yod grub/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom
284a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na/ ji lta gnas dang 'khor lo dang / ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba
284b1(rgyud): dang / /'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang / /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul/ /de nas rnam par shes pa ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis/ /'khor lo mngon sum
284b2(rgyud): mthong ba yis/ /rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris/ /phyogs kun mnyam
284b3(rgyud): pa nyid dmigs la/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing / /sgo
284b4(rgyud): bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan/ /der bdag po'i don shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog
284b5(rgyud): ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub
284b6(rgyud): chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
284b7(rgyud): so/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa/ /thams cad dag pa bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi
285a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbang phyug nyid/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni/ /rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir/ /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+ma chen
285a2(rgyud): po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus/ /zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar nam mkha'i snying po yin zhe na/ /thams cad nam mkha'i bcom ldan 'das//
285a3(rgyud): sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang / /de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi ni/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni/ /rdo rje rgyal
285a4(rgyud): mtshan mchod pa che/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom
285a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la/ /spyan
285a6(rgyud): ras gzigs la rdo rje sku/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen
285a7(rgyud): po'i mtshon cha che/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams
285b1(rgyud): cad sangs rgyas nyid/ /sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos/ /nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de
285b2(rgyud): kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dril
285b3(rgyud): bcas pas/ /bkug te de nas rjes bsgrubs pa/ /dril bu nyid kyi ba ba yin/ /ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /rab tu
285b4(rgyud): dga' bas mchod nas ni/ /glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul bas/ /mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod/ /de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam
285b5(rgyud): tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs/ /dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis/ /rang nyid bsgrubs
285b6(rgyud): nas snying po bzlas/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i
285b7(rgyud): bdag / ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang / /rtog
286a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa kun las bsgrub bya gang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/
286a2(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas/ /rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing / /rtog pa thams cad rjes bsgrubs pas/ /mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la ji ltar 'bad pa
286a3(rgyud): med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni/ /phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yi/ /ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing / /thams cad byed cing
286a4(rgyud): thams cad bza'/ /langs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /gang dang de ru 'chag pa 'am/ /dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am/ /gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no/ /dbang po gang dang
286a5(rgyud): gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /thams cad nyid ni
286a6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni
286a7(rgyud): sdig kun dang bral bas/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams
286b1(rgyud): mchog gi bla ma gsol/ /mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams
286b2(rgyud): kyis byin brlabs pa/ /bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga /de nas ston
286b3(rgyud): pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni/ /rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so/ /bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen
286b4(rgyud): gso ba yin/ /mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni/ /mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos
286b5(rgyud): 'phel gsol/ /de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min/ /sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'/ /dad pa med cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs
286b6(rgyud): pa| |rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa/ /de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o/ /gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu bsgrub pa
287a1(rgyud): @#/ /'am| |yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed/ /so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du/ /bdud kyi las tshogs
287a2(rgyud): rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs/ /des ni thams
287a3(rgyud): cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan/ /bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/ /ji ltar 'dod
287a4(rgyud): pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed/ /rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po rnams kyis
287a5(rgyud): rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni/ /gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min/ /'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin/ /rtogs pas dngos
287a6(rgyud): grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur/ /brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin/ /rtag pa 'di ni mchog
287a7(rgyud): chen gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed/ /dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang / shi na
287b1(rgyud): tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes
287b2(rgyud): par mdzad/ /de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob/ /de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin/ /de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes
287b3(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs/ /dam pa'i
287b4(rgyud): chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlab pa/ /rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che/ /ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du/ /phyi
287b5(rgyud): nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar dag chen gsungs nas ni/ /sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi/ /gsungs la rjes su
287b6(rgyud): yi rang mdzad/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so// //thugs dam pa'i snying po tho lding du rgya gar gyi mkhan
287b7(rgyud): po paN+Ti ta mkhas pa chen po maN+t+ra kA la sha dang / sgrub bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
288a1(rgyud): @#/ /lo ts+tsha chen po rin chen bzang po yis/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la/ /bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas/ /bdag gis
288a2(rgyud): 'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta na ya sha ta pa ny+tsa sha ti kA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
288a3(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu ba/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom
288a4(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis/ khams
288a5(rgyud): gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug /de
288a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams
288a7(rgyud): lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ rtag pa khams gsum
288b1(rgyud): gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ /'dod pa'i khams
288b2(rgyud): thams cad na/ nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan
288b3(rgyud): phreng dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
288b4(rgyud): brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying
288b5(rgyud): po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
288b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing
288b7(rgyud): mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du
289a1(rgyud): @#/ /dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar
289a2(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems pa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ /'di lta ste/
289a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i
289a4(rgyud): gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub
289a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /bsnyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni
289a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid tshim par byed pa
289b1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /
289b2(rgyud): lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
289b3(rgyud): gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
289b4(rgyud): so| |ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
289b5(rgyud): so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
289b6(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ /su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig thos na
289b7(rgyud): yang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang / chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang
290a1(rgyud): @#/ /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur
290a2(rgyud): ro| |su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re bzhin klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge
290a3(rgyud): 'dzin thob pas/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
290a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
290a5(rgyud): thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa dag
290a6(rgyud): na| 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje
290a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i sems can du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings
290b1(rgyud): te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/ rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshil gces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying
290b2(rgyud): po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs
290b3(rgyud): par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje sra ba nyid kyis phyir/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
290b4(rgyud): ni| byang chub chen po'o/ /don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir
290b5(rgyud): chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o/ /thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/ thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par
290b6(rgyud): rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de
290b7(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
291a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur
291a2(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin pa/ don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po rab tu smras so/ /a| de nas
291a3(rgyud): m a rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya
291a4(rgyud): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis
291a5(rgyud): gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes
291a6(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
291a7(rgyud): sgom pa nges 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag
291b1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya chen po ston te/ 'jig rten gsum
291b2(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas
291b3(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nge bo nyid dag pa'i
291b4(rgyud): chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad
291b5(rgyud): de| 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa
291b6(rgyud): thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /shes pa thams cad
291b7(rgyud): rnam par dag bas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa
292a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams
292a2(rgyud): dang | dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
292a3(rgyud): bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab

292a5(rgyud): b com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes
292a6(rgyud): bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad

292b1(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum te/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba
292b2(rgyud): 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /trAH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

293a3(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i

299a1(rgyud): @#/ /brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub
