299a4(rgyud): ya bAk+tsit+ta guh+ya a lang kA ra byA ha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi
299a5(rgyud): rgyal po/ bla ma dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
299a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
299a7(rgyud): ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes
299b1(rgyud): rin po che chen po'i cod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung ba dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge
299b2(rgyud): 'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi las sna tshogs pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
299b3(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po spro ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
299b4(rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / de
299b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi mnga' bdag chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
299b6(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje se shes dpe med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' lta bu dang /
299b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rigs dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa gnyis su med par gyur ba dang /
300a1(rgyud): @#/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po la dga' ba dang / de bzhin
300a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i snying po mdzes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
300a3(rgyud): r do rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po la nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po la 'ba'
300a4(rgyud): zhig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'ang 'di lta ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / nam mkha'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / a bo
300a5(rgyud): dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
300a6(rgyud): gzhan yang ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgyal 'ang 'di lta
300a7(rgyud): ste/ mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / nye bar zhi ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i
300b1(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo dang / gyen du lta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brda' sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun
300b2(rgyud): mo dang / 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / rol pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug gi
300b3(rgyud): bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun
300b4(rgyud): mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to/ /gzhan yang / dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di lta ste/ snying
300b5(rgyud): bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / gdug pa thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / rjes su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo
300b6(rgyud): chen mo dang / khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / thams cad 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen po la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / 'jig rten gyi
300b7(rgyud): khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / dam tshig gsum
301a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / 'jig pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo
301a2(rgyud): srung ma chen mo dang / gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo rnams dang yang
301a3(rgyud): thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'ching ba ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran
301a4(rgyud): mo chen mo dang / gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /
301a5(rgyud): bskal bar gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o/ /gzhan yang / dpe med pa'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta
301a6(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo
301a7(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / thams
301b1(rgyud): cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen po la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs gcig
301b2(rgyud): ste| de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i yab chen po dang / mkha' 'gro'i rdo rje dbang phyug dang / dri yi dbang phyug dang / stug po bkod pa dang / zla ba'i
301b3(rgyud): 'od dang / 'dun pa srel dang / skye bo yongs su dor ba dang / legs par sbyangs pa dang / 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / gdung ba skyed pa dang / 'dul bar byed pa dang / gdug pa
301b4(rgyud): thams cad sel bar byed pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang / gnas pa po dang / brtse ba can dang / chos 'chang ba dang / bskyod pa po dang / spo ba po dang / 'ching ba po dang /
301b5(rgyud): skor ba po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdo rje yab rnams so/ /gzhan yang / mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta
301b6(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa dang / rdo rje chu dang / gzhan yang / rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang / rgyas par byed pa
301b7(rgyud): pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas
302a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtag pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/ /kun tu bzang po'i sku yi ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil
302a2(rgyud): 'khor spros/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin legs bzhugs/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje
302a3(rgyud): 'dus pa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
302a4(rgyud): lhags te/ rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun don khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /thugs kyi rin chen mchog
302a5(rgyud): khyod 'dud/ /chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud/ /chos rnams kun mchog khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud/ /dam tshig mchog gi khyod la 'dud/ /
302a6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /grags pa chen po bdag cag ni/ /mgon po khyod la zhu ba zhu/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil
302a7(rgyud): 'khor mchog / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin
302b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra zhig / 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams
302b2(rgyud): dad par mi 'gyur zhing / rang gi sems yongs su sun 'byin la des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste/ mnar med pa rnams su
302b3(rgyud): skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams su
302b4(rgyud): skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /brjed ngas pa rnams dang / blo gros chung ba rnams dang / khyi dang / bya rog dang / byi la dang / phag dang / stag
302b5(rgyud): dang / glang po che dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta bar mi bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i yum
302b6(rgyud): de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/ bcom
302b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang gis 'di'i ming gzung na yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par
303a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag yid dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
303a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
303a3(rgyud): gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po/ 'od 'phro ba
303a4(rgyud): gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
303a5(rgyud): dam pa 'di bka' stsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum gyur ba/ /stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad/ /ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya/ /rtogs pa thams cad rnam par
303a6(rgyud): spangs/ /sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa/ /gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya/ /de kun sgyu mas sgyu ma'o/ /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /des na sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /
303a7(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yis/ /thams cad yum gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya/ /gsang ba'i
303b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis/ /dben zhing dga' ba'i gnas su ni/ /yid kyi legs par 'dus byas pa/ /nam mkha' la ni thig gis gdab/ /thog mar de yi dam pas so/ /
303b2(rgyud): de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig /gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mu khyud dag gi rnam bdun du/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya/ /dbus kyis cha ru dkyil 'khor
303b3(rgyud): ni| |'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su'o/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma ze'u 'bru ldan pa bri/ /mtshams
303b4(rgyud): dang mtshams su 'ang bam ni/ ji lta ba bzhin bsnyems bcas pas/ /srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs/ /srid bu bzhi yis nye bar sbras/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta
303b5(rgyud): babs seng+ge dag gis brgyan/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /bla res steng du bres pa dang / rin chen rdo rje pad ldan sngon/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khyab/ /
303b6(rgyud): bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /rgyan phreng glang po ldan pa ni/ /phyi rol gnas te legs par bri/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su
303b7(rgyud): ni/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bya/ /mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis/ /sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya/ /de nas lha mo zhal bzhi ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/ /phyag
304a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhi ba la spyan yangs ma/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing / /zhi ba'i g.yas par rdo rje ste/ /g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /dkar dang
304a2(rgyud): dmar po cher sngo ba/ /sngo bsangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od/ /gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che/ /gtsug rgyan con pan dam pa can/ /skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma/ /
304a3(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /gos kyis stod ni legs bsgribs pa/ /bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzum bcas shing / /sna tshogs gos ni legs gyon pa/ /dbu ma'i
304a4(rgyud): zhal ras gser gyi 'od/ /zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste/ /mdun na rin chen bdun gnas pa/ /pad+ma mchog ldan seng+ge'i khri/ /zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan/ /nyi
304a5(rgyud): ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba/ /rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya/ /'di yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal/ /stong phrag
304a6(rgyud): du ma'i phyag ldan ma/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gis rdo rje pad+ma 'chang / /sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag
304a7(rgyud): gzhan dkrigs/ /gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can/ /dbu rgyan pad+ma'i bzhin ras ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od/ /dpa'
304b1(rgyud): bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /dpa' bo des ni bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgoms te/ /der ni bsnyems pas 'gro bar bya/ /dpa' bos lho ru bri bya ba/ /gshin rje'i 'dab
304b2(rgyud): ma mdzes pa la/ /mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang / /rin chen khri la legs par bzhugs/ /bzhin ras sngo la spyan dkar ba/ /'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og pag can/ /
304b3(rgyud): mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog /rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dgongs ma/ /de nas blo ldan rab song ste/ /nub
304b4(rgyud): tu yang ni de bzhin du/ /dpal dang ldan pas legs par bri/ /chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma/ /dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma/ /gtsug na cod pan gyis spras ma/ /sprul
304b5(rgyud): rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma/ /dar dang rin chen gyis klubs ma/ /pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /nyi ma
304b6(rgyud): du ma'i snang ba can/ /ji ltar rigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas byang du phyin nas su/ /song ste dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /mi g.yo bzhin ras grags chen ma/ /mar gad 'bar ba
304b7(rgyud): mtshungs pa mo/ /dkar po'i dar gyis yang dag klubs/ /gtsug na nor bu cod pan bzang / /gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkra ma/ /sna
305a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /'od kyis gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas mtshams kyi
305a2(rgyud): 'dab ma la/ /me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma/ /rdo rje snang byed dag pa ma'i/ /mchod pa sngags rig pa yis bris/ /gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg /rang gi bdag po'i phyogs
305a3(rgyud): su'o| |'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du/ /bzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen po/ /gar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po/ /sngags pas 'bad de bri bar bya/ /pad+ma la skyes
305a4(rgyud): 'dab ma la/ /thams cad du ni 'grub pa bri/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /sgo skyong ba ni rnam bzhi dang / /phyi rol du yang lha la sogs/ /ming ni yang dag bri bar bya/ /
305a5(rgyud): de nas khrus byas lus byugs la/ /me tog bdu ga sogs kyis bdug ste/ /sna tshogs gos ni rab gyon la/ /me tog phreng dang gos kyis brgyan/ /gtsug phud cod pan
305a6(rgyud): dang ldan zhing / /mdzes pa'i dar gyis yang dag klubs/ /rdo rje dril bu lag par ldan/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag gis/ /de nas thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje
305a7(rgyud): ma mo dka' thub che/ /bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing / /lan gsum du ni g.yas bskor bas/ /
305b1(rgyud): rdo rje ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /dam tshig ldan pa thams cad byon/ /glu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis/ /dregs pa yis ni g.yas dang
305b2(rgyud): g.yon/ /'gying ba dang ni 'dud par bya/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don mdzad brtson pa po/ /ser sna mi mnga' sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang / /
305b3(rgyud): bde gshegs dam pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i bskyed pa po/ /pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab pa lags/ /zhes so/ /de nas de dag rang nyid kyi/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul
305b4(rgyud): bas byon/ /mtshan ma dag ni bzang po rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu blta bar bya/ /rang ngam gzhan la 'bab sogs pa'i/ /mtshan ma ji ltar mthong ba na/ /de tshe nges par ma
305b5(rgyud): mo ni| |bde gshegs thugs kyi dgongs par byon/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga ji bzhin rab brtags te/ /de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la
305b6(rgyud): bri bar bya/ /gal te de ni mi smra ba na hUM gi yi ge dang / /ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis ni yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya'o/ /de nas shes rab ldan ma gzhug /slob ma'i gtso bo thal
305b7(rgyud): sbyar te/ /mig la mig dar gyis g.yogs la/ /rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'/ /ma mo thams cad la dmigs te/ /der ni me tog dor bar bya/ /me tog gang
306a1(rgyud): @#/ /la lhung gyur ba/ /ma mo de ni de yis 'grub/ /de nas go rims ji bzhin du/ /sgo skyong ba nas brtsams nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bar/ /
306a2(rgyud): slob ma la ni bshad par bya/ /dam tshig thob par gyur nas su/ /sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bya/ /ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bstan par bya/ /gzhan
306a3(rgyud): du slob dpon blo ngan ni/ /nges par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas kyang yang dag 'grub cing / /myur du dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa
306a4(rgyud): 'am/ /rims dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis/ /gdungs te nad kyis rgyun du ni/ /'chi ba ru yang 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad pa na/ /rtag tu dmyal ba nyid du ni/ /
306a5(rgyud): rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro/ /mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no/ /des na bu kye dam tshig ni /khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos/ /ma mo kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /theg pa chen
306a6(rgyud): po'i cho gas gnas/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis yum rnams kyi dam tshig bka' stsal ba/ /rin
306a7(rgyud): chen sems kyi dam tshig gis/ /rnam pa gsum ni sbyang bar bya/ thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis/ /de 'dra'i dam tshig yang dag
306b1(rgyud): pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to/ /ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /lan gsum du ni bskor nas
306b2(rgyud): kyang / /spyi bor phyag ni byas nas su/ /lan gsum par du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub thob par du/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /byung
306b3(rgyud): ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs/ /de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru/ /dri yi rgyas ni yongs bkang la/ /dar dang ras sogs
306b4(rgyud): kyis g.yogs te/ /me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas/ /rin chen sman gyis rab bkang ba'i/ /gcig lhag bcu drug bzang po la/ /ma mo'i snying bo nyid kyis ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad
306b5(rgyud): du bzlas pa yis/ /sngags shes pas ni dbang bskur ro/ /slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis/ /thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang / /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos btud nas/ /bdag ni che go mo
306b6(rgyud): rdo rje/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa'o/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid/ skal ba chen po bdag la stsal/ /slob dpon mchog tu
306b7(rgyud): rmad byung ba/ /dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /des ni bdag gi sems can rnams/ /don gyi dam pa bdag gis bgyi/ /sangs rgyas kun
307a1(rgyud): @#/ /gyis don bgyid pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang po khyod kyi drin/ /de nas dbang bskur sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /slob mas ye
307a2(rgyud): shes rdo rje yi/ /go 'phang la ni gzhag nas su/ /bum pa bzang po gcig gam ni/ /yang na bcu drug dag gam ni/ /lnga 'am yang na bcu yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang
307a3(rgyud): bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma bri bar bya/ /pad+ma lo 'dab brgyad pa la/ /ge sar lte ba ldan par bri/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje bri/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od
307a4(rgyud): zer phreng / /de yi mdun du 'khor lo bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun gyis bskor/ /lho yi phyogs su rin po che/ /nub tu pad+ma nyid yin te/ /byang du ral gri chen po'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng
307a5(rgyud): 'khrugs 'od zer can/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa dri zhim pa/ /'od ldan pa ni skal ba che/ /sgo dang sgo ru bzhi nyid do/ /phyi rol tu yang mi 'chi kun/ //
307a6(rgyud): gcig nas gcig tu rgyal sgrogs pa/ /bde byed gcer bu'i cha lugs te/ /ming thos pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /slob ma bsnyems dang bcas pa bzhag /
307a7(rgyud): chos kyi rang bzhin gtam brjod do/ /de ring khyod ni rigs su skyes/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /rtag pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal
307b1(rgyud): dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag / rdo rje pad+ma lag byin te/ /gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin/ /bu yis bya ba chen po gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang gnas/ /der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas
307b2(rgyud): su/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /'di la mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o/ /dus su 'dod pa nyid du gyis/ /dam tshig mchog tu gyur ba'o/ /brtul zhugs
307b3(rgyud): bzang pos ci 'byor bas/ /de nas yon ni phul byas nas/ /slob dpon gyi ni zhabs la btud/ /ma dang chung ma bu mo dang / /srid mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bdag nyid
307b4(rgyud): dang / /rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni/ /nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta/ /glang po rta dang ba glang sogs/ /ma he dang ni ma he mo/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa/ /bla ma la
307b5(rgyud): ni chen pos dbul/ /bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog /thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la/ /rgyan phreng rnams dang bzhad gad dang / /sgeg dang rtse
307b6(rgyud): 'jo dga' ba dang / /rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang / /bza' btung bca' ba la sogs pa'i/ /rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis/ /mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /sems can
307b7(rgyud): kun gyi don dang ni/ /bdag gi yang ni ches cher mdzad/ /bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa der/ /ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol/ /shes rab ldan pas yon phul
308a1(rgyud): @#/ /te/ /slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis/ /gar byas lag pa mgor bzhag ste/ /rims kyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya/ /de nas bzang mo rnam mnyes
308a2(rgyud): te/ /thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /bdag gis skal bzang stsal nas kyang / /rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
308a3(rgyud): dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
308a4(rgyud): yum bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba'i dus pa las byung bar rang rang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so/ /shes rab ye shes
308a5(rgyud): mchog sgrub pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen pos gsung du gsol/ /thabs kyis sems can thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa/ /rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur ba/ /
308a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje mchog /dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba/ /rdo rje chen pos gsung du gsol/ /thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can/ /sems can rnams
308a7(rgyud): kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / /'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che/ /dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i/ /
308b1(rgyud): dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /las kun gyi ni 'bras brnyes pas/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che/ /sems can rnams kyi yab chen po/ /sna tshogs dam pa bshad du gsol/ /
308b2(rgyud): zhes bya bas so/ /de nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas/ /gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i/ /zab mo yi ni chos bka' stsal/ /'di ni
308b3(rgyud): sgrub po gang yang med/ dngos grub bam ni sgrub thabs kyang / /thabs cad rnam par rtog las byung / /rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin/ /bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang med/ /chos
308b4(rgyud): rnams med cing chos nyid med/ /sbyor ba med cing sems can med/ /de bzhin pha dang ma yang med/ /byed pa med cing skyong ba med/ /'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min//longs spyod med cing za
308b5(rgyud): po med/ /shes med shes pa po yang med/ /rnam shes med cing shes bya med/ /brdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa/ /des na snang ba thams cad ni/ /sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung / /de ltar chos
308b6(rgyud): rnams rnam rig pa/ /grol nas gos par mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad
308b7(rgyud): gyur na/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs/ /thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i rgyan la legs
309a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhugs nas/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa po/ /de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te/ /rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus/ /grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba/ /mnga' bdag
309a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
309a3(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi stong du ma nyams pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab pa yi/ /phyogs kun tu ni rab 'phro ba'o/ /de
309a4(rgyud): yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /dus mtha' me dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /de yi steng du sa chen po/ /gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa/ /de yi steng du chur shes bya/ /zla ba gang ba kha ba 'dra/ /sngags pas
309a5(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang / /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /dpag tshad kyi na tshid tsam pa/ /grub bzhi ba la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /ri
309a6(rgyud): bo chen po cog brgyad pa/ /dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom/ /sngo bsangs mar ga ta 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag
309a7(rgyud): 'khrugs/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga ba rnam par bsam/ /dkar po shel dang 'dra ba'o/ /'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras/ /de yi steng du rin po che/ /chu skyes sngon po'i 'dab
309b1(rgyud): 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi phreng / /phyogs bcu nam mkha' khyab pa'o/ /de yi gtsug tu pad+ma che/ /nam mkha' khyab pa yi ni mchog /lo ma stong phrag du ma can/ /lte ba dang ni ze'u 'brus
309b2(rgyud): dkrigs/ /de yi mdun du nyi ma che/ /'od zer stong phrag du ma can/ /de yi steng du zla ba che/ /dkar po'i 'od zer 'bar bas dkrigs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yin/ /gzi brjid dkar po 'phro
309b3(rgyud): ba'o/ /de yi dbus su ma mo bri/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dra ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phro ba mo/ /phyag gnyis ma la thugs zhi ba/ /bsam gtan
309b4(rgyud): spyan ldan bsam gtan yid/ /bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgya yi/ /ser mo gzhon nu rab bzhad pa/ /dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo/ /dkar po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ral ba'i thor tshugs
309b5(rgyud): cod pan bzang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa/ /ye shes gdan la mnyam par bzhugs/ /ba spu rnams kyi rtse bug gnas/ /rgyal ba rab tu 'phros pa ste/ /byang chub pha rol son par mdzad/ /de
309b6(rgyud): yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa/ /yi ge mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs/ /thams cad du ni legs 'phro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa/ /rab tu thal
309b7(rgyud): mo sbyor ba 'o/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rig sngags khro bo'i tshogs kyang ni/ /chos nyan pa yi tshul du yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo ni phyogs ni thams
310a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad du/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi rnams so/ /sbyin pa la sogs ci rigs par/ /bcu drug po'ang gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me che/ /ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par
310a2(rgyud): bya/ /lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min dmyal las byung / /'di rnams thams cad lhun po la/ /kun nas yongs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas me tog phreng ldan 'jug /dri dang me
310a3(rgyud): tog yang dag ldan/ /gos dkar 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas/ /bdag dag
310a4(rgyud): pas ni dag par bya/ /shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas/ /sgo yi drung du legs 'khod la/ /glu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya/ /thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum/ /rang
310a5(rgyud): gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras dang bcas te byon/ /spyon cig spyon cig lha dang sring mor bcas mchod pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub thugs mnga' ba/ /spyon cig
310a6(rgyud): spyon cig thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen/ /chos kyi yi ge bde bar gshegs pas rjes bskos pa/ /mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dam bca' dran par mdzod/ /ma
310a7(rgyud): mo rnams ni mchog glus bskul bas byon par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas rang gis me tog gi snyim pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil
310b1(rgyud): dbul par bya'o/ /oM bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /de nas de dang lhan cig tu/ /'dres pa ru ni gyur bar bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta
310b2(rgyud): pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas 'di yis brtan par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa la sa ma ya ma tsa la s+t+waM/ de nas 'dis mnyes par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma na san+tu sti sa ma
310b3(rgyud): ye hUM/ e h+ye hi dzaHe h+ye hi dzaH/ de nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir/ /oM sarba ang+ga puN+Da ra ma hA b+ha ga bA na sa la sma ra sma ra s+pha ra s+pha ra sarba ang+ga a bA yu bik+Sh+Nu ma hA
310b4(rgyud): bud+d+ha sa mu drAn hUM hUM aM/ 'di yis ma mo bskul nas su/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'od po che/ /dkyil 'khor ba la spro bar bya/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bsngags te me tog dor bar
310b5(rgyud): bya/ /oM sarba ang+ga puN+Da rI ka pra tI ts+tsha d+hAM ku su mAny+dza liM hUM a/ de nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la rig sngags 'dis ji ltar bshad pa ltar legs par
310b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs la rang gis dbang bskur rang gi snying po rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi nus pa dang ldan pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de
310b7(rgyud): nas me tog la sogs dang / /bza' dang btung dang ro dag gis/ /mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin/ /slob ma'i rgyal po gzhug par bya/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rim pa yi/ /sbyor
311a1(rgyud): @#/ /ba yis ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin pad/ /las kyi rdo rje de bzhin no/ /zhags pa lcags kyu dril bu dang / /lcags sgrog rnga yab dang ni gdugs/ /
311a2(rgyud): ral gri mig sman thur ma gnyis/ /rgyal po'i nye bar spyod pa dang / de la rgyan rnams bstan nas su/ /dkyil 'khor der ni dbang bskur ro/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyis dbang bskur ba/ /las
311a3(rgyud): kun byed par rab tu bshad/ /dam tshig gam ni sdom pa yang / /rang gi slob ma mnyan du gzhug /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /dbang dang drag shul spyod pa ni/ /legs par rnam
311a4(rgyud): par dag sems kyis/ /ci 'dod par ni bya ba byos/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen
311a5(rgyud): pos slar yang las dam pa rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ji lta'i gzugs kyi snod byas la/ /dkyil
311a6(rgyud): 'khor gyis ni dbus su gzhag / zho dang mar gsar 'o ma ni/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang bsres te/ /ga pur dang ni ldan byas la/ /yid la byed pas bzlas te bsgrub/ /zla ba nyi ma
311a7(rgyud): gzas bzung tshe/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag bya/ /thog mar me ni spar byas nas/ /'bad pa yis ni rlung gis bus/ /gser gyi snod du bsdu bar bya/ /ba ru na yi khu bas
311b1(rgyud): sbyar/ nyi ma dang ni zla ba la/ /slar yang rdzas de bskam par bya/ /de nas de ru lha mo yi/ /khrag dang sa bon blugs par bya/ /de yis myur du rdzas dag ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /
311b2(rgyud): grub nas thog mar lha mo la/ /cung zad tsam zhig dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon la/ /skal ba nyis 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /de nas grub pa gzhan rnams dang / /rang gi slob mar
311b3(rgyud): skal ba bzhin/ /de nas byin brlabs sbyor ba yi/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zas kyi sa bon dang ni bza'/ /skad cig de la gzugs brjes te/ /rdo rje
311b4(rgyud): sems dpa' lta bur gyur/ /gang dang gang gi gzugs rnams su/ /bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sngags pa yis/ /de dang de yi bsam gtan gyis/ /blo gros brtan pas bza' bar bya/ /de
311b5(rgyud): dang de yi gzugs su ni/ /gdon mi za bar brje bar 'gyur/ /gzhan pa yi ni rdzas dag kyang / /'di nyid kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /mig sman gyis ni mig byugs pas/ /khor yug tu ni
311b6(rgyud): mi snang 'gro/ /snying la ldong ros kyis byugs na/ /yid kyi spyod yul nyid du 'gro/ /ba bla yis ni lus byugs na/ /mkha' la nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mig sman nag po blangs nas su/ /
311b7(rgyud): nag po'i phyogs la bza' bar bya/ /de yi bshang ba'i mar khu las/ /dud pa mkhas pas bsgrub par bya/ /de yis mig la byugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs
312a1(rgyud): @#/ /zhing / /stobs ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i mtshon/ /nyid 'gyur rga dang 'chi ba med/ /mig sman dang ni ba lang mar/ /ma he dang ni ra nyid dang / /mi yi mig sman
312a2(rgyud): nyid dag ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su/ /sngags pas bzung ste btso bar bya/ /mig sman chen po mchog tu bzang / /'di yis mig la byugs na ni/ /grub pa yid du
312a3(rgyud): 'ong bar 'gyur/ /mi snang 'grub pa thams cad kyis/ /blo gros chen po rgyal por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen po/ /nges par thob 'gyur gzhan du min/ /rdzas kyi
312a4(rgyud): gnas skabs le'u 'di/ /mtshungs med chen po nyer bshad do/ /gos dang gdugs sogs ral gri dang / /mtshon cha dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /snying po snying gar byas
312a5(rgyud): nas ni/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po ches/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhin ras mchog /de yi zhal du byas nas su/ /de dang ldan
312a6(rgyud): pas bsgom par bya/ /mnga' bdag gang gis dbang phyug ltar/ /skad cig de la de 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi ni spyi bo'i char/ /mchog gi dam pa bsam gtan bya/ /skad cig de
312a7(rgyud): la mchod pa che'i/ /sangs rgyas su ni de 'gyur ro/ /de yi spyi gtsug nyid du ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de ni kun gyi rgyal dbang po/ /las kun byed pa'i don grub
312b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying gar bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su snying po blta/ /de nas rdo rje rig pa 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje'i dbang po 'grub/ /rin chen chen po cha brgyad pa/ /snying ga ru ni
312b2(rgyud): mkhas pas bsgom/ /der ni snying po bsam pa yis/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /yid la bsgoms pas skad cig la/ /pad+ma che ldan mnga'
312b3(rgyud): bdag gis/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mchog dang dman pa 'bring po yi/ /dngos grub dam pa bsgrub
312b4(rgyud): par bya/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /yi ge dam pa bsgom par bya/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /thams cad bdag tu bsgom par bya/ /de las langs
312b5(rgyud): te bdag zhi bas/ /zla 'od kha ba ltar bsil ba'i/ /'od zer sprin gyis cher gtams pas/ /bsgrub bya'i spyi bor gzhag par bya/ /skad cig de la bdug pa dang / /bza'
312b6(rgyud): dang dug sogs rab 'phrog cing / /nyi ma gcig gam bdun nam ni/ /bsgrub bya zhi 'gyur gzhan du min/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /snying po'i mchog
312b7(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya/ /'od zer ser po'i phreng mdzes pa/ /bsgoms pas de ni rgyas par byed/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /mnyam par gzhag pas lha mo
313a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsam/ /dmar po'i rang bzhin 'bar dag pa/ /bsgrub bya'i sems la 'phro bar bya/ /slar yang sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi lus la gzhug
313a2(rgyud): par bya/ /'khor los bsgyur ba lta bu yang / /de ni ci nas dbang du 'gro /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su yi
313a3(rgyud): ge ni/ /mar gad 'od 'dra bsgom par bya/ /'od zer sprin gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /mkhas pa yis ni snying gar bsam/ /bsgrub bya la ni snying po'i 'od/ /bstims pa'i
313a4(rgyud): skad cig de la 'bab/ /rdo rje gar gyis gar byed cing / /phyag rgya sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor dang / /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgyas thams cad ston par 'gyur/ /'das
313a5(rgyud): dang ma 'ongs ci 'dod pa/ /lce brkyang pas ni smra bar byed/ /'dod dang mi 'dod dge mi dge /rdo rje'i ngag gis smra bar 'gyur/ /yang na legs par sbyar ba 'am/ /grong gi'am
313a6(rgyud): tha mal skad dag gis/ /'dod dang mi 'dod dge mi dge/ /'tsho ba 'am ni 'chi ba dang / /nyams dang mi nyams rang gzhan gyi/ /de dag thams cad de yis smra/ /de las gzhan
313a7(rgyud): du de mi smra/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /dbang bdag rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis gsungs/ /khros te lce rtser bsgoms nas su/ /lha mo yi ni snying po'i mchog /lcags kyu'i rnam
313b1(rgyud): par spros nas su/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /rlung la bzhag ste skad cig la/ /khrag rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /char rgyun 'bab pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang gi kha ru
313b2(rgyud): dbab par bya/ /de ni 'thungs pas sngags shes te/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun tu spyod dpal ldan/ /nyi ma'i snang ba lta bur 'gyur/ /'di
313b3(rgyud): nyid kyi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /'o ma zho dang mar bzang po/ /mar khu chu dang me tog kun/ /rlung gis dgug pa nyid du bya/ /zhags pas mgrin pa bcing byas te/ /lcags
313b4(rgyud): kyu yis ni snying ga nas/ /rlung gis kun nas bteg nas su/ /lha mo de bzhin gnod sbyin mo/ /mi mo de bzhin lha min mo/ /brgyad brgya kho na bzlas pa yis/ /bud med
313b5(rgyud): tshul du dgug par bya/ /bsgrub bya sgrub byed ming spel nas/ /ka ba rtsig pa de bzhin khyim/ /dril bu rnams dang bum rnams la'ang / /lha mo yi ni snying po yi/ /brgya
313b6(rgyud): bzlas pas ni 'bebs par 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma mchog /khro ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gsal byed kyis ni gsal byas pas/ /las rnams dag ni thams
313b7(rgyud): cad bya/ /dur khrod ro ni ma nyams pa/ /mar ngo'i brgyad la bsdus nas su/ /byang du phyogs te gzhag par bya/ /de yi khar ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /gsang sngags legs par bzlas nas
314a1(rgyud): @#/ /su/ /rdzas kyi dam pa ci rigs pa/ /ba bla mig sman rdo chu dang / /ldong ros dang yang yang na btsag /dkar rtsi sol ba nyid dang ni/ /gur gum dang ni rgya spos sam/ /ru rta shu
314a2(rgyud): dag ga bur dang / /tsan+dan de bzhin a ga ru/ /sha dang khrag ni nyid dang yang / /de bzhin sor mo'i gdu bu ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas bzhag nas kyang / /de yi steng du bsdad
314a3(rgyud): la bzla/ /nyi ma shar nas de blangs pas/ /grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dman pas dngos grub dman pa ste/ /rab kyis rab tu rnam par bstan/ /bar mas bar

314a6(rgyud): pa'i ming dang ni/ /yongs su spel te bris pa yis/ /dbang ma song ba dbang 'gro ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no/ /khams kyis ming ni bris pa ni/ /dbang du byed pa'i

314b1(rgyud): rus bdug pas/ /dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed/ /gnod sbyin mo ni nges par 'gugs/ /sha dang khrag gi bdug pa yi/ /srin mo 'gugs

319a1(rgyud): @#/ /dman pa'i sems su bshad pa dang / /mchog gi mchog ni chen po dang / /bar mas bar ma'i dngos grub ni/ /skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams

319a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /kund dkar po zla ba 'dra/ /'od zer dkar pos mdzes pa mo/ /skye bo nad pa 'chi ka ma/ /de yi lus la gzhug par bya/ /de nas de ni stobs ldan 'gyur/ /
319a4(rgyud): brgyad gnyis pa yi lang tshor ldan/ /nad rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /bstan bcos kun gyi don rig cing / /shes rab dran pa mchog dang ldan/ /de
319a5(rgyud): bzhin rang 'gyur rnal 'byor ba/ /nam mkha' la ni yang dag bsgom/ /mdzes pa'i rin chen sna tshogs pa'i/ /thams cad du ni char 'bab pa/ /'di yis phongs pa rnam par sel/ /phongs
319a6(rgyud): pa rnams la rab tu brtag / the bong yi ni tshad tsam pa'i/ /nor rgyun ma yi rnam pa bya/ /lha mo la ni mnyam par gzhag /de yi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas/ /ji srid 'bum phrag kho na
319a7(rgyud): ste/ /de nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /zla ba gang ba'am bcu bzhi 'am/ /brgyad pa'am gzas gzung nyin par la/ /mchod pa chen po byas nas su/ /mkhas pas mtshan mo thog thag
319b1(rgyud): bzlas/ /de nas dga' bas gzugs brnyan der/ /gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur/ /de nas bzung ste mdor bsdu na/ /mi yi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ /bzlas pas mtshan ma bzang
319b2(rgyud): byung na/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nor chen 'gyur/ /bar mas gling ni thob par 'gyur/ /tha ma yis ni khor yug go /thams cad du ni bzlas tsam gyis/ /longs spyod zad par 'gyur ma yin/ /rgyal po thams
319b3(rgyud): cad dbang 'gyur zhing / /bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /snying gar rnal 'byor byas nas su/ /nor bu lag par bcangs nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsgom/ /myur du
319b4(rgyud): rin chen rgyal por 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byas gyur pas/ /rtag tu sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i grub rnyed de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ji bzhin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
319b5(rgyud): sems dpas bka' stsal to/ /de nas sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /yum de rnams ni legs byon nas/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor legs gnas pa/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ /gang du rgyal ba kun
319b6(rgyud): bzhugs nas/ /bla na med pa'i don mdzad pa/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /myur du las ni 'grub pa legs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad kyi dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting
319b7(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi dam tshig dam pa de rnams la las kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal ba/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi
320a1(rgyud): @#/ /dbus su grub gsum pa/ /de yi steng du lha mo bzhag /'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa la/ /zhal bzhi ma la cher 'jigs pa/ /mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa mo/ /thod pa'i phreng
320a2(rgyud): ba'i cod pan can/ /rdo rje lcags kyu thod pa dang / /zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon par 'dzin/ /pags pa chen po gos su gyon/ /khro mo mig 'bras rab phyung ba/ /mche bas mchu mnan zhal chen mo/ /
320a3(rgyud): de yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /mtha' ma'i zhal ni mdor bsdus pa/ /sna tshogs gtum dang drag po'i zhal/ /du ma'i phyag gis yang dag 'khrugs/ /zhags pa lcags kyu thod sogs dang / /rdo rje can
320a4(rgyud): gyi sog le 'dzin/ /thod pas lus la bres gyur cing / /cod pan chen pos 'jigs byed mo/ /gshin rje dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /mtha' gdong dam pa yi ni mchog /sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin khros/ /
320a5(rgyud): mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /ral grib rin chen thod pa dang / /rin chen dbyug gu 'dzin pa'i mchog /de nas lha mo
320a6(rgyud): legs bri ba/ /pad+ma'i zhal ma 'jigs chen mo/ /dmar mo phyag na nyi zhal 'dzin/ /bskal ba'i me dang mtshungs pa mo/ /g.yon pa ru ni khro mo che/ /ma bcom ma ni ska rags mgul/ /las
320a7(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dril ldan mchog / mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /gtsug na thod pa 'jigs su rung / /rab gtum stobs dang gsal ba mo/ /'byor ldan cho ga rig pas bri/ /phyi rol tu ni legs
320b1(rgyud): bri ba/ /khro bcas 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/ /ral ba'i thor tshugs chen po can/ /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /phyag rgya bzang pos phyag mtshan pa'o/ /de yi phyi ru lha rnams ni/ /snyim
320b2(rgyud): pa rab sbyar yi dam pa/ /thams cad du ni yongs su gzhag /'jig rten skyong ba gzhag par bya/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong ba yang de bzhin du/ /de nas gtor ma'i cho ga ni/ /
320b3(rgyud): sha bcas btung ba ro dang ldan/ /de nas go cha bcings gyur bas/ /thod pa'i cod pan chen po dang / /khrag gam chang gis bkang ba'am/ /thod pa ldan pas 'jug par bya/ /thams cad 'grub pa'i
320b4(rgyud): ma mo rnams/ /'di yis spyan ni drang bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /gsang ba'i don du ma mo rnams/ /de ring nyid du dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'jigs chen ma rnams thams cad
320b5(rgyud): gshegs/ /'jigs pa'i sgra dang cher gtum dang / /kha nas 'od zer stong phrag ni/ /mthong ba dang ni thos pa na/ /mtshan mar yang ni shes par bya/ /de nas de yis ar+g+haM sbyin/ /ci bder bzhes
320b6(rgyud): shig 'jigs mdzad ma/ /gdug pa chen po gsol bar mdzad/ /gdug gtum 'jigs par byed pa yis/ /de nas bdag la dbang bskur te/ /thod par gnas pa'i ro yis ni/ /srang
320b7(rgyud): tsam gyi ni sha zos na/ /ma mo thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas mngon spyod las rnams kun/ /dam tshig bsrung ba yis ni bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang /
321a1(rgyud): @#/ /bla ma rnams la 'khyal smra ba/ /rtag tu gsod par lha mo rnams/ /bgyid par bdag ni rjes su gzung / /de nas cho ga de nyid kyis/ /slob ma'i dam pa gzhug
321a2(rgyud): par bya/ /khro bo'i lha la bskul nas su/ /me tog dmar po dor bar bya/ /bdag gi me tog dam pa 'di/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /bdug pa 'di ni bzung nas su/ /gsol byed 'di
321a3(rgyud): ni gsol bar mdzod/ /lha mo gang la lhung gyur ba/ /de yis de la mchog gsol lo/ /de nas dbang bskur byin nas su/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun bzhag ste/ /thod pa ru ni gnas pa yi/ /
321a4(rgyud): khrag gis dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de nas sgo ru bos nas su/ /dam chig 'bad pas 'dzin du gzhug /rab tu gdug pa'i snying gi khrag /bzang po 'di ni 'thung zhig gu/ /zo zhig zo zhig
321a5(rgyud): sha chen po/ /btung ba 'jigs pa chen po 'thung / /gzhan du na ni 'chi 'gyur te/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gza' rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yi/ /ring por mi thogs rab
321a6(rgyud): tu za/ /de nas mngon spyod las rnams ni/ /stong phrag dag ni bslab par bya/ /de yi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang nyid khro bor bzung gyur bas/ /gnod byed thams cad gsad par bya/ /
321a7(rgyud): dgra rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /gdug pa thams cad bca' bar/ /srin po thams cad gzhom par bya/ /mtha' yas zhal ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /gsad dang gzung ba de yis/ /
321b1(rgyud): bya/ /zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam pa'ang yin/ /mkha' gdong ma yis thams cad rin po che tshogs 'byung ngo / /pad+ma'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /
321b2(rgyud): chang gi dam pa btung bar bya/ /ma bcom ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /sha ni 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no/ /nam mkha' rengs pa chen po ste/ /dmag dpung 'byor ba'i dam pa 'o/ /rmugs dang
321b3(rgyud): rmongs pa thams cad du/ /dpyad pa ru ni mi bya 'o/ /sngar bshad pa yi las rnams dang / /ma bshad pa la ci 'dod pa/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis kun bya ste/ /thams cad du ni the tshom med/ /
321b4(rgyud): dur khrod kyi ni thal bar ba la/ /dgra bo'i gzugs ni 'bad pas bya/ /ming dang spel bar byas nas su/ /ma mo'i ral gris btub par bya/ /de nas nyi ma bdun na ni/ /brlag par 'gyur bar gdon
321b5(rgyud): mi za/ /gang lus ji ltar bcad gyur ba/ /de dang de yi yan lag 'chad/ /zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pas bcad/ /de yi mgrin par zhags pa ni/ /mkhas
321b6(rgyud): pas sbrel te bcing bar bya/ /lcags kyus snying gar phug nas su/ /rlung gis bskyod de drang bar bya/ /de nas de yi ming bskul nas/ /de ni shes rab ldan pas dgug /dman dang mchog gi dbye ba
321b7(rgyud): yis/ /'di yi 'bras bu nga yis bshad/ /mdor bsdus pas ni shes par bya/ /sngags pa'i rgyal po'i sbyor ba yis/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /
322a1(rgyud): @#/ /de yis dngos grub gsol mi 'gyur/ /nye bar 'tshe ba 'jigs rnams dang / /gdon dang gnod sbyin srin por bcas/ /mi bzad nad kyis btab nas su/ /
322a2(rgyud): shin nas mnar med nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin dbang bskur gyi/ /dkyil 'khor la bzhag yum rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin/ /gsang ba'i sgrub
322a3(rgyud): thabs nyan du gzhug / rang yum ma mo'i sa bon gyis/ /rang gi rnam rtog bdag yum min/ /lta bus yab gyur bsgrubs na ni/ /nyi ma bdun na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yab
322a4(rgyud): ston pa/ /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod yul te/ /drag po kun dang bde chen po/ /ye shes kun gyi mchog gi mchog /shes rab kyis ni thams cad bsgrub/ /las rgyas pa yi dam pa'i
322a5(rgyud): mchog / bye brag tu ni bskul nas su/ /byang chub kyi ni yon tan gyi/ /thams cad du ni 'od gsal ba'i/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab kyi ni las dbye bas/ /gzugs
322a6(rgyud): dang dbyibs nyid dag gis so/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang / /bza' ba dang ni nyer spyod pa/ /gtor ma lha bshos nyid dang ni/ /shin tu bde ba'i
322a7(rgyud): stan nyid dang / /de dang de ni nges par sbyar/ /bzlas dang bsam gtan sa bon ni/ /rang gi lus khyab pa nyid do/ /gsang sngags dag ni thams cad las/ /gsang sngags 'di ni rab tu bsngags
322b1(rgyud): tshe 'dir dam pa'i rjes grub cing / /gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni bcom ldan kun rdo rje/ /ye shes 'byung gnas mnga' bdag gsungs/ /las kun gyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /'di ni sgyu mas
322b2(rgyud): 'gro la bzhugs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog tu dge /ye shes chen pos
322b3(rgyud): gsung du gsol/ /gang gis mngon par rgyas btab kun/ /mnga' bdag dus mi ring bar 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
322b4(rgyud): par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya rtags su yang dag bshad/ /tha snyad tsam du rnam par btags/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi kla klo'i skad/ /phyag rgya thams cad yang dag bshad/
322b5(rgyud): 'on kyang mgon po mchog gi brtags/ /lag pa'i rnam dgod mtshan ma nyid/ /gang gis yid ches legs skye rnams/ /dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams ni/ /sgrub po rnams kyis rab bskul na/ /
322b6(rgyud): grub pa'i dam pa rab tu stsol/ /dus las thams cad byon nas su/ /slar yang gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /lag pa zla ba nyi mar bya/ /shes rab thabs su rab tu brtag /de nas sngags pas
322b7(rgyud): yongs su sbyar/ /rang gi sa bon ngag gis mtshan/ /oM pra dz+nyA pA ya sa mA yo ga /de nas thal mo nges par sbyar/ /phan tshun rjes su rtogs chen po/ /khu tshur shin tu gzhag par byar/ /khu tshur
323a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsdams pa lta bur bcing / /so so ru ni sbyor bar bya/ /snying gi dbus su nges par bzung / /g.yon pa'i steng du lag pa g.yas/ /bzhag ste sor mo so sor bya/ /
323a2(rgyud): lag g.yas bsgreng nas phyogs kun tu/ /'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lta bur bskum/ /sor mo thams cad rtsibs su bya/ /oM sarba d+harma tsakra sa mA ye/ /de bzhin
323a3(rgyud): g.yon pa yongs su spro/ /sor mo rtsibs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /shes rab steng du bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas pa yang ni de bzhin no/ /rtse mo cung zad sbyar bar bya/ /chos kyi las ni chen po byed/ /de
323a4(rgyud): nyid mnyam du bskums pa ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes su grags de bzhin ming med byas nas su/ /lhag ma rnams ni gdong du sbyar/ /phyag rgya chen po shin tu ni/ /dngos grub thams cad
323a5(rgyud): rab tu gsol/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bsdams na ni/ /rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur/ /kun tu bzang po rgyal po che/ /lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod/ /ce'o/ /de nas ma mo de rnams
323a6(rgyud): kun/ /slar yang gtso bo la bstod nas/ /shes rab chen po rnam bzhi yi/ /phyag rgya zhu ba rnam par byas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi rab kyi mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig /gsang ba'i
323a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i yal ga mchog / shes rab thabs kyi lus bzang ba/ /gang zhig gsan ba'i rnal 'byor ni/ /gang gi rnal 'byor ba bde ba/ /rdzu 'phrul 'phel dang yang dag pa'i/ /rdzu 'phrul skye ba
323b1(rgyud): 'dir snyen pa/ /bcom ldan ston pas bka' stsal ba/ /gsad pa'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i gzhi/ /gang gi myur du sgrub po kun/ /rab tu bde bar gnas pas 'grub/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mnyes
323b2(rgyud): te gsang ba'i dam pa gsungs/ /phyag rgya'i pha rol phyin pa rnams/ /bde ba chen po rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje thal mo dam par bsdams/ /rdo rje dbus su gzhag par bya/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags/ /
323b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub/ /de nyid rdo rje lta bur bya/ /bskyod pas bde ba skyed par byed/ /'di ni chos 'dzin zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya gsang ba bsgrub pa'o/ /g.yon par thabs ni bskums nas
323b4(rgyud): su/ /bskyod pas bde ba 'gugs par byed/ /dag pa'i las zhes rab tu grags/ /bde ba thams cad rab stsol byed/ /de nyid kha dang rkan la ni/ /sbyar ba chen mo zhes su bshad/ /rdo rje phan tshun
323b5(rgyud): yang dag sbyar/ /lcags kyu'i kha ni bskyod par bya/ /kha ni phan tshun yongs sbyar ba/ /gsang ba'i zhags pa zhes su grags/ /de bzhin bskums par byas nas su/ /dam du bsdams te bcing
323b6(rgyud): bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba bsdams pa'i rgya/ /ye shes bsdams pa rab tu 'grub/ /thams cad rdo rje ltar rdo rje/ /de bzhin bskyod cing bskor bar bya/ /de 'di gsang ba rab tshim pa/ /tshim pa'i don
323b7(rgyud): ni ster bar byed/ /lhag ma phyag rgya chen po ru/ /shes bya phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa'o/ /de nyid las kyi phyag rgya mchog /las kyi dbye bas sbyar bar bya/ /zhes so/ /de nas ma mo de rnams kun/ /yid
324a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni tshim zhing mgu ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan yangs pa'i/ /legs so ba ni nges par phul/ /legs so legs so gsang chen po/ /legs so legs so
324a2(rgyud): mchod chen po/ /legs so legs so rnal 'byor che/ /legs so legs so rab tshim mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun
324a3(rgyud): mo rnams kyis dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor zhu ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin khyod la 'dud/ /spyod pa'i rin chen khyod la 'dud/ /dam pa'i rgyu gyur khyod la 'dud/ /
324a4(rgyud): sna tshogs mdzad pa khyod la 'dud/ /dpa' po 'dul ba khyod la 'dud/ /gsang ba'i chos ldan khyod la 'dud/ /zhi ba'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mgon po khyod la bdag cag zhu/ /
324a5(rgyud): bdag gis dkyil 'khor zhu ba'i phyir/ /mnga' bdag rgyal dang sems can rnams/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor
324a6(rgyud): bka' stsal ba/ /de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /dbus su pha rol phyin ma dgod/ /d+hI zhes bya ba shes rab can/ /thabs dang ldan pas gsal byas pa/ /'di yis sngags pa 'jigs
324a7(rgyud): med par/ /zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'gyur/ /rig pa 'di yis de yi ni/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa dang / /dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang / /tshim dang 'phrog dang 'bras chen po/ /
324b1(rgyud): zhi bas zhi ba zhes su bshad/ /brnyes ma zhes pas rgyas par bshad/ /dbang dang dgug rang dbye ba la/ /byed ma'o dbang la drag mo yin/ /sha yi mtha' ru bdud gsod ma/ /gsod pa dang ni spel bar
324b2(rgyud): bya/ /'gro ba dang ni yang dag ldan/ /sor mo zhags pas dkri bar bya/ /thams cad du ni drag po dgug /drag po drag po'i go 'phang gnas/ /'di yi cho ga ldan pa yis/ /las kyi tshogs kyi mchog kun bya/ /
324b3(rgyud): sems la rnal 'byor legs bsam ste/ /brgyad brgya brgya kho na bzlas pa yis/ /dbang bcas nyid dam dbang chen po/ /stobs kyis mgo bo mnan nas su/ /ma mo'i tshogs kun de yis bzla/ /dus mi ring bar 'grub
324b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /gzi brjid chen pos bka' bzhin du/ /mgo bos nye bar phyag 'tshal te/ /'di yi ma mo thams cad kun/ /gzi brjid kyis ni gzi ldan pa/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'od ldan pas/ /go rims
324b5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du/ /dpe zla med pa'i dngos grub byed/ /grub pa'i lam la rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba yis/ /'di na ston pa chen pos gsungs
324b6(rgyud): ma skyes skye ba med la bzhugs/ /rtag pa ston pa thams cad pa/ /nam mkha' nyi zla dri ma med/ /de dag thams cad rab dga' ste/ /dngos po spangs pa'i btsun mo yis/ /gar dang glu dang sil snyan
324b7(rgyud): mchog / bzhad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba dang / /bud med sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul dang / /gling bu pi wang rdza rnga sogs/ /ting ting shag dang dung sgra dang / /ro dang reg pa dri chen po/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs bde
325a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan pas/ /dpa' chen la ni mchod byas nas/ /snyems dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/ /slar yang mgon po la gsol btab/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /
325a2(rgyud): mgon po ci yi phyir mi gsung / /yab rnams kyi ni thams cad dang / /yum rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus pa/ /mchod pa yang ni thams cad de/ /bran bcas pho nya pho nya mo/ /'jig rten pa ni mtha'
325a3(rgyud): dag gi / gtso bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa rnam par
325a4(rgyud): 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /de dag nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la gzhug pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / mnyes par bya ste/ nyid kyi sku
325a5(rgyud): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa bsgyings pa dang ldan pa la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bde ba yongs su skyes pa rab tu dgyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
325a6(rgyud): lhan cig sbyod pa dang bcas pa/ bran dang bcas pas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /mgon po dbang phyug rdo rje sems/ rdo rje snang ba mdzes pa'i sku/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /
325a7(rgyud): dpa' po chen pos gsung du gsol/ /gang gis rgyal ba kun bskyed pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba
325b1(rgyud): rgyan gyi bkod pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /zhu ba rab tu zhus pa ni/ /gang
325b2(rgyud): phyir nga la dngos med kyang / /zhu ba zhus pa thams cad thos/ /gsang ba chen po'i smon lam dang / /de bzhin snying rje'i pha rol phyin/ /dran pa med las dran pa yang / /dran 'gyur dran po bzhin
325b3(rgyud): gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/ /chos dang chos min rnam par spangs/ /brjod du med pa bshad par bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
325b4(rgyud): bdag nyid de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po bka' stsal ba'i phyir/ /slar yang glu'i dbyangs 'dis zhu ba zhus pa/ /chos dbyings
325b5(rgyud): mi g.yo bde la legs bzhugs dam pa'i thugs/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyis zhabs legs btud pa/ /bde mchog lha yi lha ste sa dbang 'jig rten bla/ /dkyil 'khor bde ba
325b6(rgyud): mchog la bzhugs gsol bde chen gyi/ /sa gnyis gtsug gis phyag byas bde ldan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu gar mdzad sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs shig kye/ /'gro
325b7(rgyud): kun phan dgongs rab tu bzhugs gsol mchod pa chen po kye/ /cha lugs rnam pa du mas 'gro kun 'dul mdzad kun gyi dam pa kye/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
326a1(rgyud): @#/ /cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bskul ba'i tshig nyid kyis thugs la bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba chen po rab tu
326a2(rgyud): sim pa bde ba la longs spyod pa rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ bde ba chen po
326a3(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba la rab tu gnas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las rab tu phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /de yi lte bar 'di dgod do/ /rdo rje chen po bsam
326a4(rgyud): gtan pa/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug dag dang ldan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yab/ /kun gyi thog mtha' rab byung ba/ /de la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /thams cad kun tu brtag par bya/ /pad+ma'i
326a5(rgyud): lo ma rtsibs la ni/ /rang gi chos dang rab tu spel/ /ma mo rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /mchod pa la sogs rab tu brtag /sgo ru sgo ba yongs su brtag /sgo yi phyi ru sgo skyong ba/ /btsun mo lhan cig
326a6(rgyud): spyod bcas pa/ /kun nas lha rnams gzhag par bya/ /de nas rang gi sa bon gyis/ /klu dang gnod sbyin 'phar ma gzhan/ /dri za rnams dang mi'am ci/ /lha min nam mkha' lding de bzhin/ /'jig
326a7(rgyud): rten skyong ba thams cad ni/ /sgo ru gnyis gnyis gzhag par bya/ /gdon dang dug dang rims dang nad/ /yi dwags sha za srin po dang / /dmyal ba brgyad po phyogs brgyad kyi/ /'khor lo'i phyi
326b1(rgyud): ru bzhag par bya/ /de nas 'khor lo'i mu khyud bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun rang bzhin/ /de yi sgo ru bri bya ba/ /shar du 'dod chags skye gnas lag /zhe sdang drag po lus gnag pa/ /byang du legs
326b2(rgyud): par bri bar bya/ /gti mug nub tu bri bar bya/ /lho ru nga rgyal nyid yin no/ /sog le dang ni gos nag po/ /de bzhin dbyug gu 'jigs chen po/ /'di rnams phyag rgyar brtags pa'o/ /de nas ji lta ba bzhin
326b3(rgyud): 'jug / de nas gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya ngas par bcings pa'i lag par gyur pas rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran pas phyag rgya de nyid kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam pa dang / rdo rje'i glu 'dis bskul te/
326b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sangs rgyas zhal ras sangs rgyas dpal/ /bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa mtha' dag gis bskor
326b5(rgyud): te/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs pad+ma'i spyan ras pad las 'khrungs/ /dam tshig rnam dag rnams kyis dpa' bo dam pa'i phyag /glu dbyangs rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje'i blo gros nges par bskul/
326b6(rgyud): byon 'gyur song shig song shig ces/ /'khod cig 'khod cig 'khod par bya/ /tshim zhing tshim la rab tu tshim/ /zhugs shig zhugs shig 'jug par bya/ /kwa kye zhes brjod bskul ba yis/ /
326b7(rgyud): sal gnas kun rab tu 'bebs/ /de nas me tog dor bar bya/ /bcom ldan bde bar bzhes su gsol/ /lha dbang gang la lhung 'gyur bzung / /de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /yang na yid la gang
327a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dod pa'i/ /sgrub byed sgrub po dam pas byed/ /de nyid du ni dbang bskur ba/ /rnal 'byor ba ni mkhas pas blang / /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rgyan rnams
327a2(rgyud): kun kyis rnam par brgyan/ /dar la sogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ /phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag bzang pos/ /de bzhin du ni me tog dor/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM bdag gis brjod/ /ma tog
327a3(rgyud): gang la lhung gyur pa/ /de yis sbyor bas dbang bskur bya/ /yang na gang 'dod rnal 'byor gyis/ /sbyor ba bsgoms te dbang bskur bya/ /yang na bdag po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /gal te
327a4(rgyud): de ni sbyor ldan 'gyur/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla bre sogs/ /b+h+r-ing ga ra yi bum pa dang / /rnga yab rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /seng ge'i khri ni bzang po dang / /gser dang dngul gyi
327a5(rgyud): dbyug gu dang / /rin chen dbyug gu du ma ni/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag /dbang bskur spro ba chen po yis/ /de ni stan la bzhag nas su/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas dbang bskur
327a6(rgyud): ro/ /dbang bskur ji ltar rigs pa yi/ /gsang ba'i sbyor bas dbang bskur ro/ /thog mar sdom pa ldan pa yis/ /de ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /'dir ni nga yi dam tshig gzung / /phyir dang
327a7(rgyud): gsang ba rnam pa bzhi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rab gsal byed/ /gdug pa thams cad gsad pa bya/ /'jungs rnams kyi nor dbrog bya/ /
327b1(rgyud): lta ba ngan la brdzun du smra/ /srog chags gsod la smra bar bya/ /gzhan gyi bud med mngon bgrod par/ /ci bde bar ni phrogs shig bu/ /gzhan rdzas 'phrog par byed rnams dang / /dkon
327b2(rgyud): mchog gsum la 'gal byed pa/ /gsang dang gzhom par bya ba dang / /de bzhin khrag rnams btung ba ru/ /'bad pa yis ni thams cad byos/ /dam tshig rnam pa gsum bo yis/ /de nas
327b3(rgyud): yon ni phul nas su/ /bla ma la ni gus pa yis/ /zhabs la mgo bos nges gtugs te/ /rang lus rgyal po'i longs spyod dang / /chung ma'am yang na bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bran nyid dang / /
327b4(rgyud): sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /ma dang rang gi mna' ma dang / /grong dang yul gyi longs spyod dang / /shing rta 'gro dang glang po dang / /rnam par bkra ba'i rta rnams dang / /nor gyis gang ba'i grong
327b5(rgyud): rnams dang / /ba glang ma he re rnams dang / /lug rgod rnams dang gzhan rnams dang / /rnga mo mdzes pa'i rnga mo mo/ /gzhan yang gzhan yang gang 'dod pa/ /ji ltar rigs pas mchod par
327b6(rgyud): bya/ /rim bzhin rang gi slob ma'i tshogs/ /mgon po mchod nas gshegs su gsol/ /gang gzhan rdo rje spun la yang / /de nas sgrub thabs dam pa bslab/ /srog dang thur sel
327b7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /sems kyi brtan pa nyid du bya/ /zla ba nya ba lta bur dang / /cha shas dag ni bcu drug kyang / /de yi dbus su rnam bsam pa/ /gtso chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go /mdor
328a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsdus nas ni spro bar bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rang lus bsam/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal/ /'dod pa'i zil gyis mnan nas su/ /rnal
328a2(rgyud): 'byor can bdag dpal ldan 'grub/ /lha dbang bcas pas phyag 'tshal zhing / /nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa sel/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs/ /zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa yis/ /

328a4(rgyud): yis/ /sngags pas thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi sbyor bas sngags zlos pas/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsungs/ /yan lag lnga las skyes pa gzung / /'byung po'i nyi ma

328a6(rgyud): sems can gyis/ /thams cad rnam pa kun tu 'o/ /bskal par gnas shing shes rab che/ /bstan bcos thams cad rab tu mkhas/ /gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /

328b1(rgyud): bya/ /zhags pa lcags kyu rtse gsum mtshan/ /g.yon par thod pa 'dzin pa po/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /spyan gsum rnam par gtsigs pa pa/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ /

329a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang / yab rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol lo/ /de phyir gsungs shig bcom ldan 'das/ /bde bar gshegs

330a7(rgyud): gsal ba/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /de yi mdun du dkar po bri/ /zla ba'i 'od 'dra grags chen po/ /zla ba shar ka'i 'od mdzes pa/ /'dzum bag can la gzhon nu'i

332a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang ni mthon mthing 'dra/ /rin chen sgron ma rin chen lag /'od mchog ldan pa'i lha mo ni/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor dag la bri/ /'od kyis snang zhing mdzes
332a2(rgyud): pa la/ /lag na 'od zer legs mdzes pa'o/ /rdo rje brang skyes cher bkra ba/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lag na sna tshogs gos ldan pa/ /byang du rtag tu bri bar bya/ /de
332a3(rgyud): bzhin sbyor bas bris nas su/ /pho nya mo yang legs par bri/ /snying skul byed pa mdzes ma ni/ /shar du legs par bri bar bya/ /rdo rje myu gu mda' ldan dmar/ /mig gnyis
332a4(rgyud): dang ni gos sngon po'o/ /de dang nye bar dpa' mo ni/ /lag na lcags kyu zhags pa mchog /gdug pa 'gugs pa'i lha mo bri/ /sngo bsangs dmar la legs brjid pa'o/ /rjes su mnyes
332a5(rgyud): ma'i pho nya che/ /nub tu rtag tu bri bar bya/ /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed ma/ /lpags pa'i zhags pas lag pa mdzes/ /khrag 'gugs pa yi pho nya mo/ /byang du gnas pa bri bar bya/ /

332a7(rgyud): gnag dka' thub chen po ma'o/ /de yi byang du dpa' bo yis/ /sgo skyong stos chen bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bebs ma legs dmar ba/ /lag mthil dril bu dang ldan pa'o/ /dam
332b1(rgyud): tshig gsum ldan spyan gsum ma/ /rtse gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa mo/ /'jigs pa'i lus can cher gsal ma/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khrugs/ /'bar ba'i me lce'i lag pa
332b2(rgyud): can/ /me yi phyogs su yang dag brten/ /lha mo chen mo thog ma ma/ /lag na rdo rje'i gtsub shing can/ /dmar zhing sngo ba bri bya ste/ /ji lta ba yi rim pas so/ /gdul dka' 'dul ba'i lha mo
332b3(rgyud): ni/ /sgo skyong ba yi gnas na gnas/ /dpa' mo rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag /byin za 'bar ba dang mtshungs ma'o/ /de nas bran mo bri bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas lag pa mtshan/ /'jig rten gsum
332b4(rgyud): 'ching bran mo ni/ /nub tu yang dag bri bar bya/ /'ching pa chen mo'i lag pa can/ /rab dmar gur gum 'od zer can/ /bran mo 'jigs pa'i me gdong ma/ /sgron bcas lag pa'i rtse mo mchog
332b5(rgyud): rab gnag pa la lus chen mo/ /cho ga ji bzhin rtag tu bri/ /bran mo gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur gdong / /'khrug pa'i tshul la rab 'jigs ma/ /lag na thod pa rlon pa can/ /shin tu
332b6(rgyud): dmar zhing 'od chen mo/ /sku gsung thugs 'ching bran mo ni/ /shar du yang dag bri bar bya/ /dkar zhing dmar la lus che ba/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i lag pa mchog /de nas rol pa
332b7(rgyud): mo bri bya/ /go rims ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes ma ni/ /mdzes shing rin chen gyis nyer brgyan/ /mda' gzhu'i lag can dmar ba mo/ /gos dang phreng ba dmar
333a1(rgyud): @#/ /po 'dzin/ /byang du sngags pas bri bya ba/ /kun nas 'bebs ma che ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i lag pa 'dzin pa mo/ /bde ba 'bebs la legs par gnas/
333a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum 'joms khro mo ni/ /rdo rje rol pa mo zhes bya/ /drag shul chen pos sdigs par byed/ /mnyam par gzhag pas shar du bri/ /rab tu dga' ba rjes
333a3(rgyud): rtog ma/ /sngags pa spro bas rgyab tu bri/ /'dod chags phyag rgya'i lag pa ma/ /'gro ba'i gtso bo mnyes par mdzad/ /dga' byed ces bya bri bar bya/ /thams cad rdo rje rol pa
333a4(rgyud): mo/ /dga' bo'i rtse 'jo'i lag can bkra /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ni/ /sngags pa cho ga shes pas bri/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad legs gnas pas/ /phyi rol rdo rje bri
333a5(rgyud): bar bya/ /rang gi rig ma g.yon du gnas/ /dbang por mig gsum bri bar bya/ /rdo rje can gyi rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /rang gi chung ma sogs
333a6(rgyud): pas bskor/ /chu lhar tshangs pa chen po ni/ /gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya/ /sgo ru sgo ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che/ /kun nas dmar zhing cher gtum pa/ /sangs rgyas

333b1(rgyud): byed/ /'ching byed drag po chen po ni/ /brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bri/ /bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs/ /rags shing stan las mi g.yo ba'o/ /ne tso khug rta dang mtshungs pa'i/ /mnyes
333b2(rgyud): byed mchog ni bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /rig sngags pha rol phyin rnams kyang / /rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag pa mdzes/ /zhi ba sogs kyis yongs su bskor/ /
333b3(rgyud): gshin rje 'khor lo'i lag pa ni/ /shin tu mdzes pa'i rdo rjes mtshan/ /ser po'i gos 'dzin gnag pa po/ /mtshon cha sogs pas yongs su bskor/ /lus ngan du ni dbang po bri/ /rdo
333b4(rgyud): rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes/ /de nas mchod pa rnam par bri/ /rdo rje me tog 'thor ba'i gzugs/ /lag na me tog snyim pa mdzes/ /me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sngags pas rdo rje
333b5(rgyud): bdug pa bri/ /yid sim byed pa'i dam pa ni/ /lag na bdug pa mig yangs ma/ /mkhur tshos cung zad dkar ba ma'o/ /lha mo rdo rje snang byed ma/ /gser bsregs pa yi mdog 'dra la/ /

333b7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs la yid 'phrog ma'o/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje mdzes pa'i gzugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lag na rdo rje me long 'dzin/ /'dzum bcas dgod pa'i dkyil
334a1(rgyud): @#/ /'khor can/ /sgra yi rdo rje sna tshogs lus/ /dkar dang sngo ba'i lus dang ldan/ /pi wang gling bu ting ting sogs/ /sgrogs pa shes rab can gyis bris/ /ro yi
334a2(rgyud): rdo rje skal chen mo/ /lag na ro yi snod 'dzin pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje reg bya sngo bsangs che/ /chu skyes sngon po 'dab 'dra'i

334a6(rgyud): pas bri/ /gar dang bcas pa'i lag pa can/ /sngo bsangs dkar po cher dkar ba/ /mig che ba la 'dzum bcas mchog /rdo rje sil snyan dag mo che/ /dur du ra yi rnga mdzes rdung /
334a7(rgyud): rdo rje rnga chen lha mo che/ /rnga chen rdung ba bri bar bya/ /rdza rnga ma ni mkhas pas bri/ /rdza rnga rdung bar byed pa mo/ /lha mo mu kuN+Da rdung ma/ /mu kuN+Da ma bzhin mdzes ma'o/ /pa Ta ha ni rdung byed

334b2(rgyud): ni dam pa 'grub/ /lag na rdo rje ting shag /rdo rje ting ting shag bri bya/ /lag na rdo rje cang te ma/ /kha dog dkar mo 'od zer che/ /'khar rnga rdung pa'i lag pa can/ /rdo rje 'khar rnga ma bri bya/ /

337a7(rgyud): kha sa man+ta b+ha dra sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma yo nya haM/ /'di yis bzung ste myur ba ru/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che/ /de ni blangs te spyi gtsug tu/ /blo gros bzang pos bcing
