338b7(rgyud): sbyor ba bsam/ /yid la bsam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /de yi phyag rgya'ang de dang mtshungs/ /rin chen gyi yang rin chen che/ /rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gsal/ /de bzhin dri
339a1(rgyud): @#/ /dang ldan pa ni/ /sgrub pa po yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis/ /lha gzhan dag kyang rig par bya/ /dkyil 'khor ram ni
339a2(rgyud): dam tshig kyang / /bsgoms pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /rig sngags kyi yang sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams kyis ni de nyid na/ /bsgoms na myur
339a3(rgyud): du nges par 'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can/ /gsang ba rgyan bdag dam pas gsungs/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi mchog gi mchog /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par
339a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / /yum de rnams kyis gsol ba/ myur du sbyor ba mchog bsgrubs pas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ji ltar
339a5(rgyud): 'grub/ /de dag thams cad myur du gsungs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bdag gis/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /rig sngags kyang ni legs par sgrub/ /btsun mo
339a6(rgyud): mchog gi gnas dbang phyug/ /dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
339a7(rgyud): tor rnam par rgyal ba rnam par bgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / yum rnams kyis zhu ba'i
339b1(rgyud): tshig rdo rje 'di nyid kyis sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las rnam par phyung ngo / /lha rnams kyi ni snying po dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor du ni legs par
339b2(rgyud): bshad/ /ji ltar sngon du kha dog sogs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol/ /sems can rnams
339b3(rgyud): la phan bde'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang / /mtshan ma la sogs dam pa rnams/ /de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang / /rdo rje dam pa gsor mdzad nas/ /lag pa'i mtshan ma bka'
339b4(rgyud): stsal pa/ /gang gi lha rnams mtshon 'gyur pa'o/ /lag pa zla ba nyi ma ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsam par bya/ /shes rab thabs kyis sa bon ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu spro/ /slar yang
339b5(rgyud): sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje pad+mar rnam bsam bya/ /de nas shes rab pha rol phyin/ /sor mo'i rtse mor dgod par bya/ /de nyid sbyor ba'i bsdus nas su/ /phan tshun nges par sbyar bar bya/ /
339b6(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar ba'i/ /bde ba myangs par 'grub par 'gyur/ /'ching ba chen pos bcings nas su/ /lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i/ /gsang sngags rgyal po sngags rig pas/ /
339b7(rgyud): yang dang yang du byin gyis brlabs/ /bcangs te 'od ldan rnam pa gnyis/ /brgyang nas rtse mo sbyar bar bya/ /de 'di snying po zhes bya ba'o/ /gnyis pa grags pa ldan pa yin/ /snying po
340a1(rgyud): @#/ /yis ni mtshan byas nas/ /rim gyis snying gar bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje mnyam par sbyar byas te/ /der ni bcings pa gzhug par bya/ /'di ni dam tshig nges
340a2(rgyud): bya ste/ /dam tshig ma lus sgrub par byed/ /'di yis lha mo mtha' yas zhal/ /thams cad du ni nges par 'grub/ /de nyid bsdigs pa lta bur sbyar/ /las kun byed pa'i
340a3(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje gnyis ni pad+ma yi/ /sbyor ba bstan pa mchog tu rmad/ /de las phyi rol bskums pa ni/ /gsum pa ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /snying ga ru ni snying po bsam/ /
340a4(rgyud): snying dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod/ /rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar/ /dam tshig bdag byed nyid du 'gyur/ /de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas gsal/ /chen po'i las ni byed
340a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de nyid mdzod spur sbyar ba'i brjid/ /phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur/ /de nyid chu skyes rnam pa ru/ /snying gar bzhag pa snying po mchog /de bzhin rdo rje mnyam
340a6(rgyud): sbyar ba/ /dam tshig bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ /snying gar kun bsdigs sbyor ba yis/ /rab rgyas pa yi bzhin ras mchog /bsnyems pa byed pa thams cad kyang / /'dis ni
340a7(rgyud): las byed 'grub pa yin/ /de nyid kha ru sbyar bas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'grub/ /de nyid 'od ldan rtse mo ni/ /thur du bstan te snying gar gzhag /'di ni 'gyur ba med pa
340b1(rgyud): yi/ /snying po'i chos sgrub byed pa'o/ /de nyid snying gar yongs su bskor/ /snying gi dkyil 'khor nyid du bzung / /'di ni dam tshig dngos grub che/ /bdag nyid chen pos bslab
340b2(rgyud): par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje mnyes pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub byed/ /dbab dang 'khor ba nyid dang ni/ /gar byed chen po de bzhin du/ /de bzhin thal mo sbyar nas su/ /
340b3(rgyud): snying gar bzhag pa snying por bshad/ /spyi bor bskor ba byas pa ni/ /dam tshig ces bya bdag nyid che/ /steng du bsdigs pa las su 'gyur/ /mchod pa ma lus rab sgrub byed/ /snying po
340b4(rgyud): la sogs 'og tu gzung / /chos la sogs par yongs su brtag /de nyid brgyang ste snying gar bzhag /snying po zhes su legs par bshad/ /bskor ba dam tshig ces bya ste/ /las thams
340b5(rgyud): cad ni de bzhin no/ /de las thal mo rdo rje gnyis/ /steng bsgreng snying po la sogs bzhin/ /sngon bshad lha mo thams cad kyi/ /gsang sngags rig par shes par bya/ /gnyis su byas la
340b6(rgyud): g.yas min pas/ /bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa bzung nas su/ /mngon par phyogs te gzhag par bya/ /gzugs kyi snying po ches che pa'o/ /de nyid kha yi phyogs bzhag pa/ /sgra yi snying po yid
340b7(rgyud): 'phrog pa'o/ /de nyid cung zad bskums nas su/ /lce yi rnam pas kha ru gzhag /ro myang ba yi sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi/ /phyag rgya sngags pas shes par bya/ /ro
341a1(rgyud): @#/ /'phrog pa yi las rnams so/ /de ni gnyis su byas nas su/ /g.yas pa'am ni g.yon pa yis/ /snying gar legs sbyar sbyor bdag gis/ /reg pa'i phyag
341a2(rgyud): rgya ngo mtshar che/ /'di yis chos dang dam tshig dang / /las kyang rab tu skye ba yin/ /cho ga shes pas rnal 'byor sbyar/ /reg pas 'bebs pa'i mchog yin no/ /de bzhin sbyar
341a3(rgyud): ba so sor bya/ /g.yon pa rked par gzhag par bya/ /g.yas pa kha yi phyogs su bzung / /khro bo'i tshul gyis de bzhin du/ /'di ni bzhad ldan zhes bya ba'i/ /phyag rgya mchog tu
341a4(rgyud): rmad 'byung ba'o/ /de 'am bkrol te snga ma bzhin/ /rked pa ru ni legs par gzhag /de las langs te slar yang khar/ /mkhas pas dal gyis bskyod par bya/ /de gnyis
341a5(rgyud): snying gar yongs su sbyar/ /bsnyems pas sdud dang 'gyed par bya/ /ji srid spyi bor gtugs pa yis/ /chos dang la sogs kun tu 'gyur/ /snying po la sogs sngags rig
341a6(rgyud): pas/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /dngos grub thams cad thob 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bka' bzhin no/ /thal mo mnyam por legs par sbyar/ /g.yon pa'i steng
341a7(rgyud): du de bzhin gzhan/ /de dag snying gar bsgreng bar bya/ /de ni phan tshun shes rab yin/ /sngags pa chen pos sbyar bar bya/ /gzhan ni sbyor bas rnam par spro/ /'di ni chos kyi pha
341b1(rgyud): rol tu/ /'gro ba'i chos kyi mchog tu bshad/ /de bzhin thal mo mnyam por sbyar/ /snying gar g.yon par gzhag par bya/ /'od ldan rdo rje'i gdong pa dang / /mdor bsdus nas
341b2(rgyud): ni sbyar nas su/ /g.yas pa thur du 'phyang bar bya/ /de bzhin steng bstan mchog sbyin no/ /me tog snyim pa yang dag sbyar/ /rdo rje gnyis ni dbus su bzhag /bzod pa gnyis po de
341b3(rgyud): la sbyar/ /sbyin pa dag ni phyi ru bskum/ /de ni steng du legs par gzhag /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin rgyal po'i 'bras bu ster/ /de ni sbyor bas so sor bya/ /g.yon
341b4(rgyud): pa snying gar yongs su bzhag / g.yas pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /yongs su bskor zhing bskor nas su/ /g.yas pa ru ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas su/ /rdo rje'i steng
341b5(rgyud): du 'od mdzes ma/ /phyi rol bskul ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi steng du gdong pa bzhag /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin dge ma'o/ /de bzhin lag pa steng du
341b6(rgyud): sbyar/ /rtsibs mchog rin chen ma ru 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i bya ba de nyid kyis/ /de bzhin zhag gcig bsam par bya/ /sbyor ba de yi bcing ba ru/ /sngags shes gtso bo sngags pas bya/ /
341b7(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar/ /khro mo rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying gar blo gros ldan pas bzung / /de ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis/ /bltas nas lus can 'gugs par byed/ /de
342a1(rgyud): @#/ /las sor mo'i rtse mo rnams/ /cung zad bsnol te brkyang bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba lta bur bsgreng / /kha sbyar sgrol byed ngo mtshar che/ /rgya 'di rnams
342a2(rgyud): kyis rgyas btab na/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de las thal mo sbyar nas su/ /gzi brjid rdo rje de bzhin no/ /de ltar lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ /de yi
342a3(rgyud): mtha' gdong zhags pa 'o/ /sog le'i thal mo nges par ni/ /'dir ni thod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'di ni gnyis pa nyid yin te/ /las kun gyi ni dam pa sgrub/ /de bzhin
342a4(rgyud): bcing ba legs bcings nas/ /rab tu sbyin pa brkyang bar bya/ /g.yas pa steng du byas nas su/ /bsad pa lta bur bcing bar bya/ /'di ni rdo rje mdung thung ste/ /srin po
342a5(rgyud): thams cad phye mar byed/ /'dir ni de bzhin thod pa dang / /zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang yang / /sog le dang ni gri thung ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i cho gas bya/ /rdo rje thal mo so
342a6(rgyud): sor bya/ /lag pa g.yas pa steng du ni/ /rin chen lta bur byas la gzung / /sor mo thams cad spro bar bya/ /g.yon pa'ang de bzhin spro bar bya/ /de dag nyi zlar shes par bya/ /
342a7(rgyud): thal mo bsgreng ste shes rab dang / /las kyi rdo rje rtse mo sbyar/ /'dir ni las rnams thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs las mchog sgrub par byed/ /de bzhin dgug dang zhags
342b1(rgyud): pa dang / /thod pa rdo rje nyid yin no/ /de las thal mo thod pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i dbus su bu ga ni/ /sgron ma can zhes legs bshad de/ /'di ni rdo rje ngo mtshar che/ /zhags pa lcags
342b2(rgyud): kyu de bzhin du/ /slob dpon blo gros ldan pas shes/ /gzungs rnams dang ni thams cad kyi/ /sngar bshad pa yi phyag rgya nyid/ /thod pa rdo rje'ang shes par bya/ /phan tshun gcig
342b3(rgyud): la gcig tu ni/ /thams cad gzungs kyi phyag rgya ru/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta bar/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi ni rtag pa ru/ /rdo rje slob dpon
342b4(rgyud): gyis bya ste/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung / /kun bzang bdag nyid chen po pa/ /sems can kun mchog las kyi mchog /sangs
342b5(rgyud): rgyas mchog gtso mnga' bdag che/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
342b6(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de dag thams cad la yang dang / /yang du gzigs te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus zhan pa spobs pa dman pa la mos par
342b7(rgyud): gzigs nas de rnams la bka' bsgo ba/ /dbang po'i ma mo rnams kyis shod/ /rang rang gi ni sgrub sna tshogs/ /de nas de rnams legs tshim nas/ /rdo rje can la gsol ba
343a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rdo rje la ni dang po mchog /nyi ma gser
343a2(rgyud): mdog dang mtshungs par/ /gsang sngags shes pas de bsgom bya/ /rang gi lus las spros nas su/ /rang gi rnam par bsam par bya/ /de nas sngags bdag 'grub par 'gyur/ /
343a3(rgyud): sngags kyi de nyid bdag po cher/ /kun tu 'gro ba sna tshogs che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra ba bzhin/ /gnyis pa'i de nyid bsgom pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma las byung ba/ /dmar po'i
343a4(rgyud): gos la gzi brjid che/ /'bar ba dag ni me dang mtshungs/ /rang las spro bya thams cad du/ /'jig rten dbang phyug lta bur 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dbang chen gzhag par bya/ /
343a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ni cher dge ma/ /dang po'i lha mo drod dang ldan/ /rang gi lus la nges par khyab/ /bsdus nas bdag dang 'dra ba'i bdag /yid bzhin nor bu'i snang bar
343a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus son par/ /'gro ba'i sgo gtan lha mo ni/ /rang lus lus ldan thams cad du/ /ljang gu dang ni ljang ser ma/ /las kun sgrub pa'i dam
343a7(rgyud): pa yis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'gyur/ /ma mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /shes rab ye shes dam pa gnas/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi dam pa ru/ /mkhas pa yis ni
343b1(rgyud): bsgom par bya/ /kun gyi bdag po dpal dang ldan/ /kun bzang mnga' bdag chen por 'gyur/ /bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par
343b2(rgyud): bya/ /chos kyi yi ge yang dag sbyar/ /lha min bdag por bdag 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
343b3(rgyud): chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog gi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
343b4(rgyud): thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab 'khor dang bcas pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la glu dbyangs
343b5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ /thams cad khyab pa'i ye shes che/ /mkha' la rlung ltar cher gshegs pa/ /yab kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bzang / /kun mchog dam pas bshad
343b6(rgyud): du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po mchog rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
343b7(rgyud): ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rgyas pa las nges par phyung ngo / /dbus su nyi ma chen po ni/ /hUM yig sbyor bas bsam par bya/ /
344a1(rgyud): @#/ /sor mo kun gyi rtse gnas su/ /sa bon lnga yi yab dgod bya/ /tshigs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /yi ge thams cad rnam par bsam/ /nyi ma'i
344a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag la ni/ /bzang po thams cad rnam bsam bya/ /'khor lo chen po phyag rgya'i tshul/ /lag pa g.yon par bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su shes rab che/ /
344a3(rgyud): de bzhin gzhan yang dgod par bya/ /de nas spro ba'i de nyid ni/ /gsang sngags 'di yis sbyar bar bya/ /oM pra dz+nyo pA ya sa ma yo ge hUM a/ /de nas phan tshun sbyar byas nas/ /rdo rje thal
344a4(rgyud): mo rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje bsdams par byas nas su/ /rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam/ /de nas shes rab che bsgreng ste/ /rtse mo cung zad bskum par bya/ /'dod pa'i dbang
344a5(rgyud): phyug snying por 'gyur/ /snying gar bzhag na snying po 'grub/ /de nyid bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /de nyid snying gar bsdams pa ni/ /phyag rgya chen
344a6(rgyud): po zhes su grags/ /thams cad kyis kyang mdor bsdus pa'i/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /de bzhin legs par bcing bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gnyis/ /
344a7(rgyud): phyi yi rgyab tu bskum par bya/ /mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug snying dga' ba'o/ /shes rab dag ni de bzhin sbyar/ /dam tshig ces par rab tu grags/ /lhag ma rnam par spro bar bya/ /
344b1(rgyud): las kyi gnas 'khod chen por grags/ /shes rab dag ni zum tshul gyis/ /dri yi dbang phyug rab dgyes pa'o/ /bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong pa gnyis/ /lo ma'i tshul du brkyang bar bya/ /
344b2(rgyud): dam tshig sgrub pa ster bar bshad/ /'di las rtse mo rnam phye ba/ /las kun byed pa zhes bshad de/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed/ /de nyid rtse mor snying gar sbyar/ /bdag nyid chen
344b3(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya mchog / rgyal po mchog lta'i rgyal po ru/ /'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pas shes rab mgo /dril bu'i dam pa snying po mchod/ /bzod dang brtson
344b4(rgyud): 'grus gdong sbyar ba/ /dam tshig mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /cung zad gdong pa bskum par bya/ /las byed pa yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /gdong pa legs par brkyang nas su/ /steng du shes rab rtse
344b5(rgyud): mo gcig / 'di ni chen por shes bya ste/ /dbang phyug thams cad byed pa'i mchog /sna tshogs byed pa mchog gi mchog /'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi bsdams las shes
344b6(rgyud): rab bsgreng / /rdo rje sra ba'i chos dang ldan/ /gdong pa che ste rin po che/ /'di ni dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog /de gnyis de bzhin rnam par gzhag /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge dag /rab brkyang
344b7(rgyud): bzhi yi sams dpa' yi/ /las rnams thams cad byed par bshad/ /de bzhin tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /'di ni chen po dam pa'o/ /bsdams las bzod dang brtson 'grus dag /
345a1(rgyud): @#/ /legs par brkyang ste bstod pa ni/ /snying po'i zla ba ltar bcings pa/ /dam tshig 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /phan tshun gyi ni gdong sbyar ba/ /'di ni las byed
345a2(rgyud): dam pa ste/ /lhag ma khu tshur ltar byas la/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes su 'grub/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs par bcing / /rtse mo'i rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /shes rab 'ba' zhig rtse
345a3(rgyud): mor bya/ /lhag ma dag ni de bzhin no/ /lhag ma bsdams te gzhug par bya/ /snying po chos ni byed pa'i mchog /khu tshur g.yon pa g.yon du bzung / /rdo rje rdo rje can gyis brkyang / /
345a4(rgyud): g.yas pa'i sbyin pa brkyang nas ni/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar dgug par bya/ /'di ni las byed shes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas su/ /snying
345a5(rgyud): gar 'khor lo'i tshul du ni/ /g.yas pa'i rtse mo lcags kyur bya/ /sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol son/ /de bzhin bcing ba legs bsdam bya/ /gnyi ga de bzhin lcags kyu ste/ /de
345a6(rgyud): ltar 'og ma bcug nas su/ /snying gar bzhag pa las rjes 'brang / /de nyid dgug par sbyor ba ni/ /thams cad dgug pa rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin sbyin pa bskums nas su/ /
345a7(rgyud): yang dang yang du brkyang bar bya/ /snying gar bskor ba zhes su bshad/ /de nyid 'og tu bstan pa ni/ /dam tshig can zhes rab tu grags/ /rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste/ /kha ru g.yo
345b1(rgyud): par byed pa mchog / las las rnam par tshim zhes bya/ /las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster/ /lag pa bcings pa las bkrol te/ /shes rab mdzod du rab tu brtag /'di ni dam tshig
345b2(rgyud): cher mdzes pa/ /de phyir de ltar chos mdzad do/ /g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni/ /mi snang mdzod de des na las/ /rin chen pad+ma ldan pa'i gdong / /snying gar bzhag pa snying por 'gyur/ /
345b3(rgyud): bsdams nas go char byas nas su/ /bskor ba dam tshig ces su 'dod/ /'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags/ /bsnun pa las byed pa ru brjod/ /bsdams las nyi ma rnam par spro/ /bskor
345b4(rgyud): ba dam tshig mchog yin no/ /lag pa'i mtha' ma chos chen po/ /kun sdud las kun byed pa'o/ /bsdams las sbyin pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o/ /de nyid steng du
345b5(rgyud): bskor nas su/ /spros pas chos sgrub byed pa 'o/ /rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las/ /dbang bskur dam pa sgrub par byed/ /de nyid steng du spro ba ni/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /snying gar legs
345b6(rgyud): bzung snying po ste/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dam tshig mchog /khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /re ba kun rdzogs
345b7(rgyud): mdzad pas gsungs/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rnam par bcings/ /pad+ma'i rnam pa mchog tu bya/ /ster byed pa ni mig ltar bya/ /snying gar bzhag pa kun mchog 'grub/ /de nyid mig bzhag
346a1(rgyud): @#/ /las yin no/ /bzhad pas chos de dam pa'i chos/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i mig yin te/ /pad+ma'i mdzod la rab tu gnas/ /thal mo yang dag sbyar ba ni/ /snying po
346a2(rgyud): mchog tu rmad byung pa'o/ /kha ni cung zad phye ba ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no/ /snying gar shin tu gsal phye ba/ /ma lus las ni rab tu sgrub/ /rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ni/ /
346a3(rgyud): chos ste mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /'di rnams kyis ni myur 'grub ste/ /sngags pas sngags kyis bskul bas so/ /de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te/ /snying gar 'khor lo nyid
346a4(rgyud): du bya/ /'khor lo gsum pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsibs bzhis legs brgyan chos su blta/ /bskor ba las kyi rdo rje 'o/ /'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na/ /grub pa'i dam pa 'grub
346a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs bsgreng ste/ /shes rab myu gu dag tu bya/ /sbyin par rin chen ltar byas pa/ /sems dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
346a6(rgyud): kyi/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /snying gar chos kyi dam tshig dang / /snying po rig sngags legs par sbyar/ /de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng / /'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin
346a7(rgyud): no/ /mthe chung bzang po'i kha sbyar ba/ /kun gong rdo rje ldan par bya/ /gnas ni bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grub/ /spyi bor las su bshad pa ste/ /snying gar snying po brtag
346b1(rgyud): par bya/ /bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste/ /ngag gis kun bskul chos yin te/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /bcings nas shes rab dag ni bsgreng / /'od ldan dag ni rtsa bar
346b2(rgyud): sbyar/ /'di ni dang por shes par bya/ /thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro /bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig /rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog /de bzhin du ni 'di sbyar bas/ /
346b3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te/ /rdo rje nang du de bzhin no/ /snying gar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar/ /ji snyed las kyis ming bzang po/ /rdo
346b4(rgyud): rje rab brkyang mgrin par gzung / /kun tu bskor ba rab tu bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur bsrung sogs go 'phang bzang / /lhag ma cho ga bzhin rnal 'byor/ /rnal
346b5(rgyud): 'byor de nyid rab tu sbyar/ /phyag rgya rtags dang mi rnams ni/ /lha rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che'o/ /dbang phyug dpal rdor sems dpas gsungs/ /de nas de rnams
346b6(rgyud): legs tshim nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni thal sbyar te/ /zhu ba rdo rje bla na med/ /dpa' bo rdo rje can la zhus/ /yongs su rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byung la/ /yab dang yum ni
346b7(rgyud): bla na med/ /ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa lags/ /'khor ba las ni legs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /grong gi chos ni brten pa las/ /ji ltar thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /gang
347a1(rgyud): @#/ /du rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur/ /gang na 'chi ba rab tu gnas/ /gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grub/ /gang las rnal 'byor pa zhes bgyi/ /gsang sngags ji ltar gsang
347a2(rgyud): sngags lags/ /snying po zhes bya'i snying po gang / /phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /rig sngags rig pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar lha rnams dgug pa dang / /gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yis
347a3(rgyud): bgyid/ /rnam par grol rnams bcing ba dang / /mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du/ /ji ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing / /tsum pa 'khyud pa nyid dang yang / /mthong nas rjes su chags pa dang / /
347a4(rgyud): lag pa'i dgos pa ji snyed pas/ /phyag rgya ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang cher dgod pa/ /sgeg dang smra ba ji ltar lags/ /gzugs dang sgra dang da bzhin dri/ /gtso bo ro dang
347a5(rgyud): reg par 'gyur/ /me tog bdug pa mchog dang dri/ /mar me gsal ba mchog gang lags/ /mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal
347a6(rgyud): bas zhu ba 'di dag gis/ /phreng ba rdo rje can la zhus/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa longs spyod pa rdo rje zhes
347a7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu ba rgyas pa 'di dag phyung ngo / /shes rab yum du legs bshad de/ /yab ni thabs la
347b1(rgyud): la mkhas pa'o/ /'di ni bsten pa nyid kyis ni/ /grong las thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /bag chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ /gnyi ga dag ni gdon yin te/ /grol dang ma grol zhes su bshad/ /
347b2(rgyud): de ni rnal 'byor pa ru brjod/ /gsang sngags yid du bshad pa ste/ /snying po yang ni de bzhin no/ /yid la rnam par gzhag na ni/ /gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /thar pa chos
347b3(rgyud): kyi rgya mtsho yin/ /lha rnams gang la rgyas btab pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te/ /dngos grub bde ba bla na med/ /rig sngags ye shes ma lus te/ /rig sngags pha rol phyin par bshad/ /
347b4(rgyud): de shes pa ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /grub nas bde ba rnam par gsum/ /shes rab la ni shes rab ni/ /gzhug dang dgug pa de bzhin no/ /gshegs su gsol ba btab par shes/ /bcings
347b5(rgyud): pa brtan par byed pa 'o/ /mnyes pa yis ni legs tshim yin/ /bskul ba 'phro ba nyid du bshad/ /bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /gnyis su med pa zhes su brtags/ /ro gcig de
347b6(rgyud): nyid bshad pa ni/ /'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod/ /tsum pa rdo rje rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje ye shes zhes su bshad/ /shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bshad do/ /
347b7(rgyud): shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /tsum pa na zhes nges par bshad/ /gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste/ /rtags ni lus zhes brjod pa yin/ /de yi 'khyud pa reg par shes/ /
348a1(rgyud): @#/ /chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgya 'o/ /lag pa'i 'od rnams lha mo ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bgrod pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya ste/ /lag pa'i dgod pa'i sbyor bas
348a2(rgyud): so/ /gar dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni/ /lha rnams thams cad mnyes par 'gyur/ /'di rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchod na dngos grub thams cad ster/ /zhes bcom ldan
348a3(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so// //
348a4(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i lan dang /

348b1(rgyud): pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don/ /ye shes kun don thams cad mdzad/ /thams cad khyab pa sems can don/ /gnyis
348b2(rgyud): dang gnyis med phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan dgyes pas/ /sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba/ /gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /
348b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la blta ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
348b4(rgyud): me tog bdug pa dri zhim dang / /gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang / /btung ba ro dang sgron ma gsal/ /mal khri stan dag yid 'ong ba/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /yid ni bde bar
348b5(rgyud): gnas par byed/ /slob dpon rdo rje can dang ni/ /khyad par du ni sgrub bos bya/ /dgod dang sgeg dang de bzhin glu/ /sil snyan gar ni rab dga' ba/ /mchod pa'i lan te shin tu ni/ /sangs rgyas
348b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba/ /'di ni mchod pa'i lan du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che/ /phyag rgya skyes bu'i rnam
348b7(rgyud): pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni rang gzugs te/ /gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni las bzang can/ /phyag rgya rang gi bdag por shes/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni sgrub pa po/ /ji srid dbye ba stong
349a1(rgyud): @#/ /phrag ni/ /dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya/ /zhes so/ /gar ni gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gar gyi lan ni gar mkhan ma'o/ /ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang / /dbye ba bzhi ru
349a2(rgyud): brtag par bya/ /kun tu bzang po la brten nas/ /ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o/ /las kyi sbyor la yang dag bsten/ /ji srid bzang po'i rjes 'brang ba'o/ /bla 'og yang dag bskyod pa
349a3(rgyud): yis/ /gar dang steng gi gar bskor ba/ /rtog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa yis ni rab tu gsang / /ji lta'i sil snyan rdung spyad ni/ /rdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyis dkrol/ /
349a4(rgyud): de las byung ba'i sil snyan lan/ /gsil bas sil snyan nyid du brjod/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i cho ga sbyar/ /ji srid las mchog spyod yul ba/ /de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /kun tu
349a5(rgyud): bzang por 'gro bar bya/ /sgrogs pas grub ces brjod pa ste/ /'dren pa gsum las legs par 'byung / /dbyangs rnams rnam drug shes par bya/ /glu yi phyag rgya zhes su 'grub/ /
349a6(rgyud): de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /ji srid mgo dang snying gar son/ /mgrin pa sna yi sbyar ba dang / /mgul pa g.yo ba nyid kyis so/ /'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba ste/ /len dang gtong
349a7(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rim/ /chos rnams thams cad blang ba dang / /gdon gyi tshogs rnams bzlog pa ste/ /rnam 'gyur las ni slar yang 'dir/ /sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'o/ /ji srid las ni rjes
349b1(rgyud): sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang / /sems dang lus kyi rnam bsgyings pas/ /gdug pa thams cad bzlog par bya/ /lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun/ /rnam 'gyur gyi ni lan yin no/ /
349b2(rgyud): dbrog pa dgug par shes bya ste/ /gtong ba dag ni dbrog pa'i lan/ /dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba/ /bgegs kyi gnas ni rab gnon pa'o/ /dbrog pa'i lan ni rab bzlog ste/ /bsdigs
349b3(rgyud): pa'i rkang pa dgod par shes/ /brda ni dran pa'i don du ste/ /phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yis/ /'grub dang ma 'grub sbyor ba rnams/ /slob dpon slob ma sogs pas bsgrub/ /brda lan lha mo
349b4(rgyud): rnams kyis ni/ /bskul dang so sor bskul ba'o/ /dri ba smra dang 'dri ba ste/ /mthong nas 'dri ba 'dri ba'i lan/ /legs pa'i gzugs mthong blta ba ste/ /lha yi ye shes spyod yul lo/ /blta
349b5(rgyud): ba'i lan ni de las slar/ /sbyor ba mchog gis sbyor ba'o/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni/ /g.yas g.yon blta ba blta ba ste/ /ji snyed blta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub par byed pa'i lan yin no/ /
349b6(rgyud): dam tshig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bka' rtags byas pa nyid du 'dod/ /gang phyir thos pa 'dzin pa yi/ /sgrub po lan du shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /ye shes
349b7(rgyud): lnga yis byin brlab pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor lan ni lha mo rnams/ /gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa'o/ /gsang ba sbas par bshad pa ste/ /gsang ba'i lan ni legs sbas pa'o/ /gsang chen
350a1(rgyud): @#/ /sems kyi 'du shes te/ /bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa lha mo dang / /lha yi bde ba bde chen po/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi/ /
350a2(rgyud): gsang chen lan du brjod pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas de rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la legs

350b1(rgyud): bdag dang / /gang gis myur du mtshungs 'gyur ba/ /oM hUM b+h+yo g+he Ta hUM/ oM hUM b+h+yo g+he Ta hUM/ g+he Ta hUM/ g+he Ta hUM/ ru lu ru lu/ g+he Tu g+he TuM/ g+he Tu g+he TuM/ g+he Ta g+he Ta/ hUM Ta nA Da yo/ hUM Ta nA Da yo/

351a1(rgyud): @#/ /yang gar sbyor las/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying gar de bzhin bsgreng bar bya/ /yang na gnyis pa nyid kyang ste/ /shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya/ /skar ma
351a2(rgyud): lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir/ /'dir ni bsnyems bcas rjes su chags/ /de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba sbyar/ /yang dang yang du dgrol bar bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur 'di
351a3(rgyud): la gdon mi za/ /de nyid snying gar khu tshur te/ /rdo rje gdong pa skar ma'i kha/ /rang gi gnas su bzhag pa ste/ /dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid bsnyems pas cher bstan te/ /yang
351a4(rgyud): dang yang du yongs su bskyod/ /de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru/ /thams cad du ni spro bar bya/ /de nyid kha ru bstan pa ni/ /rdo rje bshad par rnam par bshad/ /'di rnams kyis ni don rnams kun/ /

351a6(rgyud): tho rnams ma lus 'phrog par byed/ /'di dag gis ni las rnams kun/ /pad+ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bya/ /de bzhin khu tshur legs par sbyar/ /shes rab kyis ni snying gar bsnun/ /de las

351b1(rgyud): ni byed pa'i mchog / 'di rnams kyis ni thams cad sgrub/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o/ /zhes bcom

351b6(rgyud): kyis/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod/ /dkar dang ser po ches dmar ba/ /sngon po'i 'od zer glog las byung / /tha ma kun gyi thog ma ru/ /'od zer bzang po sbyar
351b7(rgyud): bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga la/ /gnas nas bsgom dang bzlas pa sbyar/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor ming yin te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi rten/ /brten pas sgrub bo shin
352a1(rgyud): @#/ /tu yang / /dus mi ring bar sa stengs 'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /kun sbyor dri ma med pa'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /skye dang
352a2(rgyud): 'chi ba 'joms pas gsungs/ /de nas rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni/ /legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /bde ba che la legs zhes gsol/ /
352a3(rgyud): rdo rje kun gyi bdag po gtso/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyis bstod par byas/ /rdo rje glu sogs sbyar ba yis/ /dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas sangs
352a4(rgyud): rgyas bdag po tshul/ /sangs rgyas nas ni rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sras po nges par mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyis/ /sbyor bas blo gros sprin
352a5(rgyud): rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa/ /dpal gyi rdo rje dri med rdo rje ye shes rdor/ /rdo rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa/ /bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs
352a6(rgyud): bton te/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje/ /dpal gyi rin chen rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen sprin/ /rin chen rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen
352a7(rgyud): mdzes/ /mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ /skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang sdig pa rnams bcom nas/ /dpal gyi pad+ma pad+ma dam pa'i bla ma pad sems dpa'/ /

352b2(rgyud): bdag po sna tshogs mkhyen/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs yum gyis ma gos pa/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /ci dga' 'dod la rig pa dam

352b7(rgyud): chags bral la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs bde can
353a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /chos dang ldan pa thams cad du/ /nyin re zhing ni bstod byed na/ /bsam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/

359a3(rgyud): bgyi ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par
359a4(rgyud): bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ rje gcig /bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs
359a5(rgyud): su sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal
359a6(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ /bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang / /de ni
359a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /gtsug
359b1(rgyud): lag khang dang skyed mos tshal/ /mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs/ /ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis/ /gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der
359b2(rgyud): ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang / /them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang / /seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan/ /dar dang
359b3(rgyud): lnga ldi do shal phreng / /dril bu dang ni rnga mas brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan/ /srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang / /phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan/ /
359b4(rgyud): dgu yi char ni bgos pa las/ /sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya/ /rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la/ /lte bar
359b5(rgyud): bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug / rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la/ /rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya/ /dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni/ /dung dang kun da zla 'dra la/ /zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yi/ /
359b6(rgyud): seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang / /ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri/ /de yi spyan sngar ngan song kun/ /sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste/ /phyag gnyis
359b7(rgyud): ting 'dzin tshul du bsnol/ /zla ba rgyas dang pad+ma'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la/ /rgyal mchog skyes bus gang bar bri/ /rgyab tu shAkya'i rigs dbang po/ /gtso
360a1(rgyud): @#/ /bo thub pa bri bar bya/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs char ni/ /rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis/ /lo tsa nA dang mA ma kI /de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams/
360a2(rgyud): rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin/ /grwa yi phyogs ni kun tu bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa'
360a3(rgyud): rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /mkhas pas lA s+ya la sogs pa/ /mchod pa grwa yi phyogs su bri/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /rta
360a4(rgyud): babs khyams ni thams cad du/ /byams pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang / /de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams/ /khro bo mngag gzhug pho nya sogs/ /bri
360a5(rgyud): bya yang na ming yang rung / /phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri/ /byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che/ /shar dang nub kyi
360a6(rgyud): gling du ni/ /brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad ni/ /'khor dang bcas par bri bar bya/ /gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te/ /lha min dri za nam mkha' lding / /gnod sbyin
360a7(rgyud): srin po lto 'phyo che/ /'byung po yi dwags 'dre rnams dang / /klu dang grul bum ri rnams dang / /rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya/ /gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang / /khro
360b1(rgyud): bo ma rungs 'tshe ba yi/ /bgegs dang bi nA ya ka rnams/ /sems can kun la phan byed pa'i/ /drang srong skal ba chen po rnams/ /phra men ma dang bud med bri/ /de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma/ /'byung
360b2(rgyud): ba bzhi yi lha chen po/ /khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang / /shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs/ /dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa rnams/ /ming dang brda' 'am yang na ni/ /thig le rnams kyang bri bar
360b3(rgyud): bya/ /de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la/ /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /gdugs dang rnga ma lda ldi dang / /'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod/ /gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni/ /
360b4(rgyud): brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung / /dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya/ /mar me gtor ma bum pa dang / /mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag bya ste/ /bza' ba
360b5(rgyud): btung ba sbyar legs dang / /bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su/ /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /'byung po dag dang klu dag dang / /mi dang mi min de bzhin te/ /
360b6(rgyud): me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang / /'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas/ /rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus/ /rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya/ /de nas khrus la sogs byas la/ /dri dang phreng mchog phreng ba can/ /dri
360b7(rgyud): zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang / /me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug /gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor/ /mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya sngags dang
361a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag ldan zhing / /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHthugs rje'i bdag /tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang / /gsang ba'i bcing
361a2(rgyud): ba bcings nas ni/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya/ /zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang / /de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya/ /mtheb gnyis nang du bkug nas ni/ /bskyod par gyur
361a3(rgyud): nas dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan ma skyes nas mgu nas ni/ /thog ma tha ma med pa mngon sum mthong / /a rga mchog brtags bsang la sogs pa yi/ /dbyangs snyan pa yis
361a4(rgyud): bstod dang lha rdzas kyi/ /mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya/ /sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang / /phyogs na gnas
361a5(rgyud): pa rnams la rnam par brtag / de yi gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya/ /de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi/ /gnas su slob ma yongs su smin bya ba/ /'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub
361a6(rgyud): par/ /de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug /de rnams byin rlabs byang chub smon lam gdab/ /zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la/ /bsrung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sdom gnas
361a7(rgyud): pa/ /rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya/ /dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal pad+mar lag gnyis bya/ /me tog rin chen la sogs de
361b1(rgyud): brgyan la/ /yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya/ /sngags ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra a d+hi ti Sh+tha hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra pra be sha hUM/ a sa me tri sa me mahA sa ma ye hUM/ /
361b2(rgyud): de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/ /'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis/ /sman par dgongs
361b3(rgyud): nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badzra pra tIts+tsha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /me tog rin chen la sogs gang / /bab par gyur ba'i rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni/ /dngos
361b4(rgyud): grub 'gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis/ /sngags 'dis dam tshigs sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas rigs kyi phyag rgya snying gar bcings te dam tshig
361b5(rgyud): gi lha snying la gnas par bya ba'i sngags/ oM badzra sa ma ya hriM da yaM me pra be sha dri D+ha tiSh+tha tiSh+tha hUM/ de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das
361b6(rgyud): na sreg bar byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni/ /de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang / /
361b7(rgyud): bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad/ /de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang / /sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'/ /shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya/ /khyod kyis
362a1(rgyud): @#/ /srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams/ /dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing /
362a2(rgyud): sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya/ /sems can gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi spangs/ /dus kun tu ni byang chub sems/ /snying
362a3(rgyud): po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /lha dang bla ma de bzhin no/ /sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang / /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /lha la phul ba'i rnying po dang / /de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya/ /
362a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te/ /sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya/ /gdon gyi las sogs bya ma yin/ /mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya/ /mdor na yid gnyis som gnyis
362a5(rgyud): the tshom mi bya ste/ /bdag gi de nyid dang ni sogs de bzhin no/ /mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas/ /sarba bid kyis ji bzhin dbang bskur te/ /bum pa la sogs ji snyed
362a6(rgyud): mang thogs pas/ /bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur/ /de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la/ /mi dbang dbang phyug
362a7(rgyud): 'khor lo thob pa dang / /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /sngags bsgrub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la/ /sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya/ /des kyang mos
362b1(rgyud): pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ /ci ste nor yod bla ma dbul bar bya/ /nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser/ /bzhon pa khyim gdan bu pho bu mo rnams/ /skyes pa dag dang bud med yang
362b2(rgyud): na ni/ /grong dang grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams/ /rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis/ /yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya/ /myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la/ /mdor na rang gi
362b3(rgyud): lus kyang dbul bar bya/ /tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang / /'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na/ /lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos/ /sangs rgyas kun dang bla ma
362b4(rgyud): mnyam/ /rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal mthong 'gyur bas/ /cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya/ /rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang / /rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis
362b5(rgyud): brnyas ma yin/ /rtag tu 'khon gyi gcug mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma gnod byed ma rungs pa/ /dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang / /de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la/ /
362b6(rgyud): bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste/ /de ltar gyur na kun rig gis/ /gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan pa dang / /brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
362b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /ras la bcom
363a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la/ g.yas su ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po/ g.yon
363a2(rgyud): phyogs su ni shAkya thub pa/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyag
363a3(rgyud): na rdo rje/ de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra bsnams pa/ phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du bya/ rta mgrin dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
363a4(rgyud): rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lha la brten par bri/ de gnyis kyi dbus su lo tsa nA dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams rang rang
363a5(rgyud): gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams par bri/ de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / nya khar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang /
363a6(rgyud): chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yongs su gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / bshos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i
363a7(rgyud): 'og tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis
363b1(rgyud): brlabs par dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/
363b2(rgyud): bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / /dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang / /dge slong bram ze pho mo dang / /'bras bu mthong na myur du ni/ /mchog dang par ma tha ma 'grub/ /de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang / /
363b3(rgyud): phyag rgya mngon par byin brlabs nas/ /ci bdog pas ni mchod par bya/ /rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas kyang / /
363b4(rgyud): bdag gi de nyid bsams nas su/ /dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du/ /'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas/ /de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya/ /sngags
363b5(rgyud): ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas/ /de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ /mchod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang / /mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya/ /
363b6(rgyud): ci ste gtso 'am de yi sras/ /yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na/ /bsod nams snod la ci dga' bar/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya/ /lha ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni/ /de la rtag tu dgyes nas
363b7(rgyud): stsol/ /phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang / /dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la/ /skal ba re re phul nas ni/ /de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing / /med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis/ /blangs nas
364a1(rgyud): @#/ /bdag nyid spyad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan brtson par/ /bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur/ /ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na/ /las rnams thams
364a2(rgyud): cad nus par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin skar mda'i gdon la sogs/ /chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis/ /zhi ba la sogs las kun ni/ /dran bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur/
364a3(rgyud): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du
364a4(rgyud): gyur pa rnams ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur ba'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
364a5(rgyud): dbang po nyon cig / sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur ba'i sems can sdig pa byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
364a6(rgyud): las thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig / de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bum pa la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu
364a7(rgyud): brtag / de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las/ /de ni myur du rnam par thar/ /sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de/ /dag par gyur ba'i lha rnams
364b1(rgyud): kyi/ /rigs su skyes par gyur nas kyang / /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / /chos 'gro ba ni thos par 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am/ /gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung / /
364b2(rgyud): ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las/ /sems can rnams ni sgrol ba'i phyir/ /sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing / /snying rje can gyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rnal 'byor
364b3(rgyud): can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang / /mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya/ /rang gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi/ /snying po snying gar bris
364b4(rgyud): nas kyang / /lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de/ /khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya/ /de yi ming yang smos nas ni/ /gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la/ /rim gyis 'bum ni tshad tsam du/ /mchod
364b5(rgyud): rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya/ /de ltar byas na nges par ni/ /dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dwags byol song sdug bsngal
364b6(rgyud): las/ /gol te lha yi gnas su skye/ /de yi ming nas brjod nas ni/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing / /'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni/ /brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang / /bye ba
364b7(rgyud): snyed du rab bzlas na/ /lha yi gnas su nges par skye/ /de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang / /mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du/ /sbyin sreg byas par gyur na
365a1(rgyud): @#/ /ni/ /dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi/ /sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni/ /'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur par/ /mtshan ma yang
365a2(rgyud): dag byung bar du/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /ra yi 'o mar ldan pa dang / /dri yis bskus pa'i yam shing gis/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni nges
365a3(rgyud): par yang / /lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas/ /de yi mtshan ma ston par byed/ /yang na lha yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /yang na hoM khung nang du ni/ /me yi ltas ni ston byed cing / /lha
365a4(rgyud): yi gnas su skyes pa dang / /sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni/ /dkar po nyid dang g.yas su 'bar/ /gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med/ /zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phro la/ /brtan
365a5(rgyud): la glog bzhin dri ma med/ /yang na me lha nyid kyis ni/ /bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de/ /zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la/ /bzhin mdog dkar zhing lam mer 'bar/ /de ni mtshan ma
365a6(rgyud): 'di dag gis/ /dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing / /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du khung
365a7(rgyud): brkos la/ /rdo rje mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri/ /de bzhin sems dpa' rnams
365b1(rgyud): dang ni/ /'jig rten gtso la sogs pa bri/ /bya dang bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang / /brgyad snyed tsam du gzhag pa 'am/ /yang na bcu drug snyed du gzhag /
365b2(rgyud): bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos/ /me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ /sbyin sreg dkyil
365b3(rgyud): 'khor dam pa ni/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba yin/ /cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang / /lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la/ /sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas/ /arga phul bar shes
365b4(rgyud): nas kyang / /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ /ga pur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams
365b5(rgyud): dang / /dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste/ /'bras chen yos dang la du dang / /sbrang rtsi sha kha rar ldan pa/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gi
365b6(rgyud): sngags kyis btab pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang / /chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas su/ /bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya/ /gos dang
365b7(rgyud): rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng la sogs pas mchod/ /gtsug phud dpung bar de bzhin du/ /sngags bris nas ni gdags par
366a1(rgyud): @#/ /bya/ /snying ga lkog ma kha phyogs su/ /sarba bi d+yAs byin gyis brlab/ /dbral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /mgo bo gtsug phud dpung ba gnyis/ /sna dang rked pa
366a2(rgyud): pus mo bol/ /long bu sna yi rtse mo dang / /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas la ni/ /de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags/ /mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go /
366a3(rgyud): de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i phyir/ /stan dang bcas te thab dbus su/ /gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /de nas sngags 'chang sngags kyis ni/ /btab pa'i gos kyis g.yogs par bya/ /de nas
366a4(rgyud): byin za dge ba rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ /zla dkar kund zhi zhal zhi ba'i lus/ /mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi me bkug la/ /arga dbul bar brtags
366a5(rgyud): nas de bzhin du/ /blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs sogs gzhag /ji ltar gsungs bzhin yon tan 'dod pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs
366a6(rgyud): la/ /arga la sogs btags te de bzhin du/ /bder gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya/ /de nas byin za la ni brtag bya ba/ /bsreg byas bkang ste de yang sbar ba'i

366b2(rgyud): pad+mas sdig mnan cing / /rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho/ /bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung / /de yi snying pos de bzhin du/ /brgya phrag stong ngam yang

366b6(rgyud): na brgya rtsa brgyad bar du/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas su/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam/

368b5(rgyud): bskul nas yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun chad kyi nam mkha'i ngos thams

372b1(rgyud): mang po gzhom par bgyi/ sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ ma

372b4(rgyud): kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po legs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos
372b5(rgyud): la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag
372b6(rgyud): yod par byos la sgrubs shig / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa las/ brtag pa dang po'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ /
372b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad do/ /dpa'
373a1(rgyud): @#/ /bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni/ /dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa/ /thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgrib pa thams
373a2(rgyud): cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes ya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM
373a3(rgyud): sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba karma A ba ra NA ni b+ha smi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM bi na sha ya sA ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM bruM bi shod+ha ya A ba
373a4(rgyud): phata sarba A ba ra NA ni s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM pr-i ta pr-i ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM tra Ta tra Ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshi n+da ts+tshin+da sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM bi dra ba bi dra ba
373a5(rgyud): sarba a bA ya ta t+t+wa NA ni hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tu hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ba tsa sarba bre ta ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba tiR+ya ga ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag rnams
373a6(rgyud): kyi yo byad bshad do/ /oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sarba durga ti bi sho d+ha ni puSh+pa bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri
373b1(rgyud): hUM phata/ oM sarba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha nA sha ni gan d+ha bi ta hUM phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sarba na ra ka ga ti A kar Sha Ni hUM dzaHphaT/ oM sarba na ra ka ga ti a b+hud+d+ha ra Ni hUM hUM phaT/
373b2(rgyud): oM sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sha ni hUM hoHphata/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin
373b3(rgyud): tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan/ /nang gi rim pa bris nas ni/ /lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi/ /bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya/ /lag na rdo rje stobs
373b4(rgyud): chen ni/ /dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri/ /rgyab tu 'khor los bsgyur ba bri/ /g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la/ /g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri/ /gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs/ /

373b6(rgyud): brgyan par bya/ /dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams gzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /de nas dri
373b7(rgyud): zhim dri la sogs/ /rang gi lus ni bskus nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni/ /oM dzaHhUM baM hoHb+ha ga bAn/ e h+ye hi mahA kla ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHsa ma ya staM zhes pas
374a1(rgyud): @#/ /lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo / /de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song
374a2(rgyud): thams cad las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong dus rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par
374a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba byas

374a6(rgyud): gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /
374a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
374b1(rgyud): phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o/ /thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyi byin gyis rlobs/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni/ /

374b3(rgyud): sbyar ba ni/ /rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /snying gar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /dam tshig
374b4(rgyud): thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag la/ /de yi steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta
374b5(rgyud): ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do/ /de nyid las bzlog ste ltag 'og bsnol la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis
374b6(rgyud): gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung
374b7(rgyud): gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyams la/
375a1(rgyud): @#/ /mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub
375a2(rgyud): mo gnyis dang / srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo dang / srin lag gnyis
375a3(rgyud): rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung dang mthe bo so sor bsdams la/ lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag
375a4(rgyud): rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de las 'og nas gyen
375a5(rgyud): du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag
375a6(rgyud): rgya'o/ /de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni a rga'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba las gung mo gnyis bsnyams
375a7(rgyud): te/ tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bkrug pa ni rnam par
375b1(rgyud): 'joms pa'i rgya'o/ /de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu
375b2(rgyud): tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te/ mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo
375b3(rgyud): gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te/ lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis

375b6(rgyud): 'o/ /de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i 'o/ /de nyid las slar bkug ste/ mthe bo gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o/ /de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa
375b7(rgyud): ni rin po che'i 'o/ /de nyid las sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid las spyi bo bzhag pa dpal gyi'o/ /de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i
376a1(rgyud): @#/ /'o/ /de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i 'o/ /de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'o 'o/ /de nyid las gdub bu 'dra bar byas pa ni

376a6(rgyud): ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te/ cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o/ /yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris
376a7(rgyud): la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis
376b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de
376b2(rgyud): dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal

376b4(rgyud): bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang bral bar gyur pa dang / ma de'i mya ngan

377a6(rgyud): rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs pa yang gsod par 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /

377b5(rgyud): gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o/ /de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni/ /ci bdog pas ni mchod byas te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi/ /zab mo'i chos ni nyan
377b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag pa/ /thos nas kyang ni skyabs su song / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos/ /rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar gyur/ /

378a2(rgyud): ma gcos pa'i rgyu las byung / /bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /mgon med skyabs yang med pa ste/ /thos nas mya ngan zug rngu

378a4(rgyud): byin lha yi dbang po yi/ /blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la/ /lha rnams kun dang yid mthun zhing / /rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes/ /bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas/ /

378a6(rgyud): lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang / gang gi tshe sngon byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya

378b1(rgyud): dbang po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to/ /ma gang yin pa de gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsi ka nyid yin no/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa
378b2(rgyud): de ni gzhan yin par mi blta yi/ lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs te/ ba spu'i
378b3(rgyud): bu ga nas spu rnams langs shing / rgyal ba/ rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis mngon par bstod de gsol ba btab
378b4(rgyud): po/ /ko Ta ko Ta k+Sha/ ko Ta ba/ ko Ta ko Ta/ ko Ta bash+tsa/ ko Ti ka /ko la k+Sha/ ko la ba/ ko la ko la bash+tsa/ ko lasta thA i ti zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog

378b6(rgyud): ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ /gsang ba'i bdag po/ bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na

379a1(rgyud): @#/ /lha'i bu rnams/ gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag pa yang dag par bskyed pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par sgrubs
379a2(rgyud): shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
379a3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs
379a4(rgyud): ka nas phyung ngo / /oM pu N+ye bu N+ya mahA bu N+ye/ a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi ti ka ri ni swA hA/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gi gzungs 'di bshad
379a5(rgyud): ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dwags rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang
379a6(rgyud): dag par shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin
379a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhus par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
379b1(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do/ /oM a mi te/ a mi ta ud b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/
379b2(rgyud): a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta/ gA mi ni/ sarba karma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka re swAhA/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o/ /de nas yang
379b3(rgyud): b com ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes
379b4(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni me sarba
379b5(rgyud): satwa nA ny+tsa swAhA/ /'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
379b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /
379b7(rgyud): oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Na/ rat+na mA la/ bi shu d+d+he/ shod+d+ha ya/ sarba pA paM ni hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/ rnam
380a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bcom par 'gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
380a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sarba A ba ra Na/ bi
380a3(rgyud): nA sha ni/ ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so/ /bskyod/ rab
380a4(rgyud): tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do/ /bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dkyil
380a5(rgyud): 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste/ /rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi/ /
380a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste/ /rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po/ /phyag na rdo rje dril
380a7(rgyud): bsnams shing / /zla brgyas pa'i zhal 'dzum bri/ /shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni/ /mgon po mi bskyod bri bar bya/ /lho yi phyogs su rin chen bri/ /nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la/ /byang
380b1(rgyud): phyogs su ni gdon mi za/ /dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba chas pa dang / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing / /
380b2(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang / /phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bzhugs bri/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /de bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri/ /
380b3(rgyud): sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la/ /khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri/ /de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs/ /sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHoM b+ha ga bAn badzra e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /de nas
380b4(rgyud): gtso bo byon pa dang / /mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang / /'chi bdag sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams/ /'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la/
380b5(rgyud): lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /yang na me tog phreng ba ste/ /de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ /oM pra tIts+tsha badzra hUM/ de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/
380b6(rgyud): de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dkrol bar bya ste/ oM badzra hA s+ya yud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dis bstan par bya ste/ oM badzra pa sh+ya ho/ /de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
380b7(rgyud): oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
381a1(rgyud): @#/ /oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma ka la sha

381a6(rgyud): b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra guh+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAMH/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM pradz+nyA pa ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa
381a7(rgyud): hUM AH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /oM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM aH/ de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od
381b1(rgyud): can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i
381b2(rgyud): 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/ gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lnga mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par
381b3(rgyud): bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser gyi mar snod gsar bar bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing
381b4(rgyud): mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad ldang la rlangs pa'am/ du ba'am/ me byung ngam/ 'od zer ram/ me sgron nam/
381b5(rgyud): 'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am/ mar gsar ram/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/
381b6(rgyud): klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu sbrus te/ nang par sngar bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba
381b7(rgyud): bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang / nyi ma yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni med do/ /mtshan ma byung na
382a1(rgyud): @#/ /yang 'jig rten na nad med/ ldo ba rkyen/ lus la skra dkar dang / gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro/ /lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
382a2(rgyud): yang / bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /de na rgyal po chen po bzhis
382a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde

382b7(rgyud): ni mkhas pas mchod/ /cho ga bzhin du arga dbul/ /de nas sngags mkhan sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis/ /slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang /
383a1(rgyud): @#/ /bram ze la sogs de bzhin te/ /me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis dor bar bya'o/ /oM badzra
383a2(rgyud): pra tIts+tsha twaM ma ho ta ha ma/ /gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni/ /de ni 'dis 'grub gzhan du med/ /de nas grwa la bzhag pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te/ /dang po phyag
383a3(rgyud): na rdo rje yi/ /phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de la sogs pa go rims kyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal

383a6(rgyud): bcas pas/ /rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi/ /de gnod gzhan gyi phru ma dang / /de yi nad dang 'chi bdag gi /'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i/ /gnod pa rnams

384a3(rgyud): skad ces gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te/ dbang bskur ba thob pa'am/

385b6(rgyud): bcas par mchis la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog thams cad rab tu bstab par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi

386a1(rgyud): @#/ /gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang / mi'i bdag po'i bu dang / yang na lan gnyis su byung ba'am/ lan gnyis su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang /

386b1(rgyud): su bri'o/ /ngos rnams su phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o/ /pa ba sangs ni mdun du la/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon par gza' lhag bri bar bya/ /me
386b2(rgyud): yi phyogs su mig dmar dang / /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan phyogs su spen pa'o/ /srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /

386b4(rgyud): kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te/ /oM badza ha na hUM phaT/ /oM dzra gra ha sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra gra ha pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bza' brgyad sngags
386b5(rgyud): btab pa'i/ /bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ /gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po de dag gyis
386b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu

387a1(rgyud): @#/ /tshigs dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di

392b7(rgyud): sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te/

393a2(rgyud): pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste/ mngon sum du mthong nas de 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mnyam
393a3(rgyud): par gzhag na de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa
393a4(rgyud): ma ya/ mA ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra a t+ma kou0f85haM/ zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas 'di sa me tog dor bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha
393a5(rgyud): ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas phreng ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM/ oM
393a6(rgyud): rat+na rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM trAM/ oM pad+ma pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hrIH/ oM karma karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM kruM/ de nas dam tshig dang / bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog
393a7(rgyud): gsum dang byang chub sems/ /bla ma dam pa rnams mi spang / /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang zhing / /brdzun du smra bar bya ma yin/ /pha rol bud
393b1(rgyud): med spyad mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya ste/ /de yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing / /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la/ /rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams
393b2(rgyud): la lta smos ci dgos/ /ci ste glen pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rnying dang lha yi grib ma dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma
393b3(rgyud): rnams/ /gom pas 'gom par mi bya'o/ /glen pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams/ /mkhas
393b4(rgyud): pas bsgrims te gsad par bya/ /chos min ldan dang sdig sbyong dang / /rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang / /dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse ba'i/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni
393b5(rgyud): sngags kyis gsad/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor blangs la/ /sems can phongs la sbyin par bya/ /bla ma la ni mchod pa dang / /de ltar dam tshig bsgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor phyir dang
393b6(rgyud): dam tshig can/ /phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /mchod phyir mi yi dbang po 'am/ /phyug po rnams kyi nor dbrog go /sems can rnams la phan spyod pas/ /rtag tu dam tshig
393b7(rgyud): bla ma'i nor/ /srog chags srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /sngags rig pas ni
394a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas/ /thams cad byas shing kun zos kyang / /'grub 'gyur
394a2(rgyud): nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA na te dA s+yA mi gr-i h+na badzra su sid d+ha ye/ oM badzra
394a3(rgyud): tiSh+tha hUM/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba karma ni ku ru bud d+hA nA ma hUM/ de nas bla ma bla ma'i phyir/ /khyod kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /nor
394a4(rgyud): dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang / /stan dang bzhon pa de bzhin te/ /bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang sring mo tsha mo
394a5(rgyud): dang / /gzhan yang ci bzheng thams cad ni/ /phan par bsam phyir bla mar dbul/ /de nas byang chub bar du ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang / /'jig rten pa yi mthu
394a6(rgyud): chen rnams/ /gang 'dod pa dag bsgrub 'dod pas/ /dngos grub rnams ni gsol bar bya/ /de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas
394a7(rgyud): dad pa'i sems ldan pa/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
394b1(rgyud): bsam/ /rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang / /bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du/ /sgrub pa po ni bsgyur bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /de nas

394b6(rgyud): par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir nga la zhus pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i bu

395a3(rgyud): bsod nams kyi phung po yang mi bzod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das do

396a2(rgyud): 'bar bri/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri/ /de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang / /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs

396b1(rgyud): khung gru bzhi pa/ /kun tu mu ran ldan par bya/ /de dbus pad+ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po ldan par bri/ /khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /mu ran rnams la chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol du ni

397b1(rgyud): dang / /phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams
397b2(rgyud): kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/

397b6(rgyud): la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na/ nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam/
397b7(rgyud): de'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang du 'dir rab tu spyod pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyag na rdo rje nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal
