399b2(rgyud): pa dang / /stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems/ /smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i/ /slong ma dam pa sngags 'di yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni
399b3(rgyud): gzung bar bya/ /oM badzra hUM dzaH/ oM badzra sa ma ya pra be sha hUM/ oM badzra pA Ni pra tIts+tsha badzra sa twa mahA su kha hUM/ ha ha ho sa ma ya s+t+raM/ me tog gi phreng ba dor nas gang la bab pa'i

399b6(rgyud): pa sh+ye ho Adz+nyA pa ya ti ban+na mok+Sha ya ma ni hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
399b7(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pA Ni swa yAn+te a nu rak+to a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba badzra a b+hi She ka ta hUM A/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba bud d+ha a b+hi She ka ta
400a1(rgyud): @#/ /oM hUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba rat+na a b+hi She ka ta oM traM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba pad+ma a b+hi She ka ta a hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi shiny+tsa sarba karma a b+hi
400a2(rgyud): She ka ta oM AH de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' mnod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA a b+hi She ka ta oM kan+te dA s+yA mi gr-ih+Na badzra pra sid d+ha
400a3(rgyud): ye hUM/ de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no/ /bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i dbus su ni/ /kun tu bzang
400a4(rgyud): ngam bde ba che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang / /snying gar hUM zhes bya bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing / /
400a5(rgyud): kun tu bzang por bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /hUM las sangs rgyas gzugs gyur nas/ /phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /snying gar 'khor lo rab
400a6(rgyud): bsgoms na/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor rnam bsgoms te/ /snying ga'i dbus su phaT ces pa/ /hUM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /khro bo stobs chen
400a7(rgyud): nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje bstan par bdag bsgyur la/ /snying gar a zhes bya ba yis/ /bskor ba'i hUM dang trAM ldan pa'i/ /bsams na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rjer bsgoms
400b1(rgyud): la snying gi ni/ /dbus su pad+mo zhes bya ba/ /oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /phyag na pad+mo mnyam par 'gyur/ /'khor lo rgya gram hUM ldan par/ /a zhes bya bas bskyed nas
400b2(rgyud): kyang / /oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams bshad bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /de ltar dbang dang mngon
400b3(rgyud): spyod rnams/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgyur la/ /zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya zhing / /cho ga shes pas
400b4(rgyud): nang par nyid/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis de lus la/ /'phro bar gyur par rnams bsgoms te/ /rtag tu shar bltas 'od zer gyis/ /nyes pa
400b5(rgyud): thams cad sel bar bsam/ /'di ni sems can phan dga' bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i sku chen nam/ /bde ba chen por bsams
400b6(rgyud): nas kyang / /nang par re re 'od byed na/ /snga ma bzhin du las byas te/ /nang par sngar ni sems can rnams/ /sdig can sems can zhi bar 'gyur/ /gser 'od mdzes shing 'bar
400b7(rgyud): ba yi/ /rin chen 'dzin du bsams nas ni/ /bza' ba legs byas nyi ma yi/ /gung la rgyas pa'i las shis te/ /rin chen 'dra bar khung brkos la/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg rab tu
401a1(rgyud): @#/ /bya/ /yang na sngags pas snga ma bzhin/ /'od kyi lus la rab tu dgang / /sbyor dang ldan pas khung bu ni/ /pad+mo 'dra bar byas nas kyang / /pad+ma 'dzin
401a2(rgyud): par bdag bsgyur la/ /bdag dang nye ba'i nyi ma'i mthar/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis lus bkang nas/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /
401a3(rgyud): 'dren pa kun tu bzang po yis/ /zhi ba'i las ni rab tu bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyag pa ste/ /dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no/ /dpal gyi rnam rgyal de bzhin du/ /longs
401a4(rgyud): spyod dbang phyug dpal mnyam med/ /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid dang / /mdog sdus shin tu 'bar ba bya/ /bzhad cing rmad du mdzad pas ni/ /dga' mgu rangs pa rnams
401a5(rgyud): su 'gyur/ /pad+mo bzhad pas chos kun ni/ /rtogs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mnyes 'gyur lha bran smos ci dgos/ /gzhan gyi rigs sogs tshogs
401a6(rgyud): mchog rnams/ /rnon pos gcod pa nyid du mdzad/ /gdon dang yi dwags 'dre rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po bka' nyan dang / /gza' mchog brgyad ni ma rungs
401a7(rgyud): rnams/ /'khor los rtsa nas 'byin par mdzad/ /lkugs dang lkugs pa ma yin dang / /glen rnams mi smra smra bar mdzad/ /lce la dzaM zhes bya ba yis/ /ma rungs rnams
401b1(rgyud): kyang lkugs par mdzad/ /rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang / /sems can don mdzad thams cad ston/ /hAM zhes bya bas 'phro mdzad cing / /rdo rje srung bas srung bar mdzad/ /hUM zhes
401b2(rgyud): bya ba'i so yis ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid kyis kyang / /ma rungs rab tu ma rungs kun/ /za byed sdig spyod smos ci dgos/ /ma rungs snying gar dam du ni/ /baM zhes bya ba bsams

402a2(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do/ /lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsams te/ hUM zhes
402a3(rgyud): bya ba dang / a zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo gnyis ka la a la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug gis

403a6(rgyud): ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o/ /bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/ de nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad pa'i ya mtshan no/ /thal mo pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni pad+ma'i 'o/ /

403b7(rgyud): 'byor ma yir bshad/ /de dag kun kyang thun mong du/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /thal mo brkyang bar bshad pa ste/ /yang na thal mo pad+mor bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /a zhes

405b6(rgyud): badzra kro d+ha na ni rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha pa sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ni bI ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ra ti sa ma ya a b+hi
405b7(rgyud): Shiny+tsa hUM phaT/ 'dis dbang bskur la de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de/ bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ /de nas snying gar nyi ma
406a1(rgyud): @#/ /bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/ /khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing / /de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /
406a2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su/ /gsod pa yin par bshad mod kyi/ /zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams/ /de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin

406a4(rgyud): la sogs pas 'joms byed pa/ /khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bar/ /gsad pa'i las la bsam par bya/ /khros par gyur ba'i rgod ma'i khas/ /sha dang khrag rnams
406a5(rgyud): 'jib byed cing / /de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par/ /bsams na nges par brlag par 'gyur/ /khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad/ /zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsam zhing / /'od
406a6(rgyud): zer 'byung ba mang po yis/ /khyab par gyur par rnams bsams la/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs/ /'od zer der ni phyung nas kyang / /de yi nad rgas gnod pa
406a7(rgyud): rnams/ /zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor/ /de nas hUM gi tshig bzhag la/ /rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing / /haM gi 'khor los go char bya/ /'od zer chu yi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas
406b1(rgyud): de yi ming smros shig / bzlas pas tshul bzhin bsam par bya/ /de nas khung bu gsum la rnam cig ni/ /zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dra la/ /khru gang tsam mam yang na khru do pa/ /
406b2(rgyud): mi rgyal mchog rnams kyi ni gnyis su bsgyur/ /de yi sa rnams rnam par sbyang byas te/ /'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse ltar gyur pa
406b3(rgyud): gcig / 'od zer dkar po phreng bskor gzi can gzhag /phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste/ /rigs brgyal sogs phyag rgya zur phyin cing / /rgyal po bzhi yi ji
406b4(rgyud): bzhin phyag mtshan rnams/ /phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs phyogs su/ /lha chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang / /'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya/ /dri zhim chus bkang
406b5(rgyud): mdog 'od dkar gyur la/ /dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyad/ /dkar gsum gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang / /bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag /
406b6(rgyud): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ni bla re dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga ma la sogs gzhag /nang re ga bur bcas pa'i dri zhim pa/ /tsan+dan la sogs pa yi byug pas byug /kha ni
406b7(rgyud): shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya'am/ /yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dpa'i gdan/ /gos la sogs dkar phreng ba
407a1(rgyud): @#/ /dkar gyis brgyan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang / /nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang / /til mar dang ni til nyid dang / /yungs kar dang ni 'bras yos dang /
407a2(rgyud): 'bras chen nas dang gro rnams dang / /me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams/ /ga bur dang ni bsres nas kyang / /tsan+dan dkar pos bsgos pa dang / /'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu
407a3(rgyud): rnams/ /zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la/ /de dag khung bu'i khyad par las/ /rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya zhing / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog /sor bcu drug ni bar ma ste/ /
407a4(rgyud): tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du shes/ /shin tu chung na sor brgyad de/ /bud shing zho dang ldan pa la/ /dri chus bskus pa shes par bya/ /bud shing de las byung ba'i me/ /sbyar nas dri
407a5(rgyud): chus gtor nas ni/ /pad+ma dkar po zhal 'dra dge /pad+ma nor bu ril ba thogs/ /lag na dbyung pa mchog thogs pa/ /pad+ma dkar po'i stan steng 'dug /de lta'i me lha bkug
407a6(rgyud): nas kyang / /arga blang te dbul bar bya/ /de nas zla rgyas dkar po la/ /bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te/ /pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su/ /bsams nas steng du
407a7(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /de nas de ltar bsams nas kyang / /bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste/ /de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni/ /shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya/ /nang par sngar ni
407b1(rgyud): gtsang 'gyur zhing / /shin tu dri zhim lus byugs la/ /bdud rtsi bzhin bsam sbyin sreg bya/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'/ /lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di/ /dang por me lha brtag
407b2(rgyud): byas la/ /khro bo de ni de lus su/ /spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs par bsams/ /de nas dang po khro bo la/ /bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum/ /
407b3(rgyud): de nas me lha nyid la gsum/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /de nas lha rnams re re la/ /de nas bgegs la sogs la dbul/ /de yid 'ong ba'i lha yang rung / /de nas dang po khro bo
407b4(rgyud): yi/ /sngags kyis yam shing sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas gcig tu bsres nas kyang / /bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /de bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu/ /brgya stong snyed dam yang na ni/ /
407b5(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni/ /khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya/ /de yi lus la dbang bskur zhing / /mnyam par bzhag bas bsrungs nas kyang / /mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni/ /
407b6(rgyud): lha rnams thams cad gshegs par gsol/ /'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams kyang / /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ci ste de ni sdig can nam/ /gal te mnyam par ma bzhag pas/ /
407b7(rgyud): de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na/ /stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la/ /de nas de bzhin byas nas ni/ /gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i las so/ /'bras bur ldan
408a1(rgyud): @#/ /pa'i nags tshal lam/ /yang na nags sam rgyal po 'am/ /rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste/ /khru do yang na khru bzhi
408a2(rgyud): pa'am/ /de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad de/ /chung mchog bar ma rnams las gcig /rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin/ /mdor na hom khung bya ba ni/ /stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil
408a3(rgyud): 'khor ni/ /chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de/ /bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid/ /mchog la bcu drug yang na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya/ /mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam/ /sum
408a4(rgyud): cu gnyis su bya ba yin/ /phyi yi 'khor lo de yi phyed/ /pad+ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rin chen dang / /pad+ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya/ /de yi
408a5(rgyud): dbus su brko ba ni/ /legs par bltas te phyed kyi tshad/ /khru bzhi pa 'am khru brgyad pa/ /yang na dpal bskyed pad+ma 'dra/ /mdor na 'jim pa ser po yis/ /de bzhin
408a6(rgyud): khung mchog brkos nas ni/ /gur gum la sogs bskus nas kyang / /de yi dbus su bris nas ni/ /tshon mchog ser pos bskus nas kyang / /ser 'od 'dra bar bsgom
408a7(rgyud): par bya/ /de nas tshon ni dmar ser gyis/ /rin chen pad+ma la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya/ /rim gnyis yang ni rim
408b1(rgyud): bzhi'am/ /yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par/ /der ni sgo ba de dag nyid/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su brtag par bya/ /bum pa kha dog gser 'dra zhing / /dri chus rab tu bkang ba la/ /
408b2(rgyud): shin tu mdzes brgyad bcu gnyis sam/ /sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste/ /dkri ba'i dar ni ser po la/ /kha rgyan yal ga me tog can/ /dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang / /
408b3(rgyud): phreng ba mar me rgyan rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang / /bla re gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan/ /bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang / /me tog la sogs
408b4(rgyud): ser pos brgyan/ /byang phyogs kha ltas 'dug nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul khro bo yi/ /nyid kyi rnal 'byor rjes dran zhing / /lha yi yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan/ /btso
408b5(rgyud): ma gser gyi 'od dang 'dra/ /de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra/ /gnod sbyin dang ni dzam+b+ha la/ /gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing / /yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad pa/ /mdor na de yi 'od
408b6(rgyud): zer gyis/ /nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /de nas rgyal srid thob 'gyur na/ /lus rgyas pa lta smos ci dgos/ /rgyas par bya phyir de ming nas/ /smos te brgya phrag brgya
408b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad/ /yang na de bzhin stong phrag ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg rab bya ste/ /byang phyogs su ni seng+ge yi/ /gdan gyi steng na rin chen dang / /pad+ma nyi
409a1(rgyud): @#/ /zla gdan steng na/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog /rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis
409a2(rgyud): brgyan nas ni/ /phyag ni mchog sbyin gzhol ba dang / /rin chen char yang 'bebs brtson zhing / /'od zer ser 'phro thams cad kyis/ /de la shin tu khyab byed bsam/ /dung dang
409a3(rgyud): pi wang cang te'u dang / /sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo/ /khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang / /yam shing
409a4(rgyud): bud shing khyad par dbye/ /mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang / /chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin/ /bar ma khru dor shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te/ /me tog 'bras
409a5(rgyud): bur bcas rigs kyi/ /ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug /'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang / /me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni/ /phal

409b1(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang / /don ni nges par rab tu 'grub/ /'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ /de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis/ /de la dbang

410a1(rgyud): @#/ /'dra ba'am pad+mo 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ /mda' 'dra zla ba kham 'dra dang / /de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /zheng du mchu yi phyed kyi tshad/ /zhing gi

410a5(rgyud): dmar po dang / /btsag gam mtshal yang de bzhin du/ /zangs kyi phye dang yungs kar du/ /skye tshe 'bru dang lan tshwa dang / /til dang dri zhim thig le'i 'bru/ /la phug yungs rdog
410a6(rgyud): de bzhin te/ /khrag dang rdul ni chen po rnams/ /bsreg bya phyir ni bsdus nas kyang / /sngar bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i/ /khu bas yang dang yang bskus nas/ /khro bo'i

410b3(rgyud): steng du mda' bcas gzhu/ /rtag tu hoM khung khor yug tu/ /pad+ma nyid ni bri bar bya/ /gzhu yi dbus su rdo rje nyid/ /khor yug tu ni mda' nyid bri/ /gzhu yi phyi rol pad+ma

411a4(rgyud): bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag / de ltar bsams te snyoms zhugs pas/ /las byas pa ni gang yin pa/ /des ni lha yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi dang lha min smos ci dgos/ /las rnams
411a5(rgyud): zin par gyur ba dang / /chags pa'i sems su byas nas ni/ /de yi 'od zer spyi bor dgang / /de ni bsrungs nas btang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod pa yis/ /lha rnams mchod
411a6(rgyud): de gshegs par gsol/ /de nas bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas/ /dbang gi las so/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha/ /phyag 'tshal
411a7(rgyud): yang dang yang du ni/ /rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gi /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang / /phyag na rdo rje rgyal can la/ /dga' ba'i bsam pas bstod byed pa/ /
411b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

411b6(rgyud): byed sngags byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' bsgrub pas legs pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ /rdo rje gzi brjid
411b7(rgyud): gzi brjid che/ /'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /rdo rje drag po drag po che/ /'od stug pas na stug po che/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa 'o/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/
412a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /ha la ha la nag
412a2(rgyud): po che/ /sgra che zhing ni 'joms pa can/ /rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ /rnyog pa'i dus ngan rnams sbyong ba/ /skad cig g.yo ba'i the tshom gcod/ /glog bzhin zhal gyi ljags
412a3(rgyud): las 'phro/ /rdo rje me ste drag po'i zhal/ /drag po rab snang snang mdzad pa/ /nyi ma stong gis gdungs pa'i zhal/ /spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /khro bo du ma
412a4(rgyud): 'od bzhin 'phro/ /phyag rnams du ma mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal la sku yang stong / /'khyil zhing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la/ /sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/ /rnam par
412a5(rgyud): rtog pa ma lus spangs/ /ma rig 'joms pa'i tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ /sgyu ma gtogs 'dod rdo rje can/ /rtse gsum rtse gsum 'chang
412a6(rgyud): 'phrog pa/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi zhing dul la dga' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs pa/ /sangs rgyas bdag
412a7(rgyud): nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /rdo rje rab skyes rdo rje sems/ /kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba/ /mtshan rnams dam pas rnam par brgyan/ /khams gsum bdag nyid khyab pa/
412b1(rgyud): po/ /thams cad rdo rje bdag nyid gtsang / /gang gis 'di bris bkug gyur ta ma/ /rtag tu de don 'chang byed dam/ /dran nam mnyan par byed kyang rung / /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar
412b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang /
412b3(rgyud): srin po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ /rjes su yi rang ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
412b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+ting gar+b+b+ha dang /
412b5(rgyud): bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de dza ya rak+Shi ta sa bsgyur cing zhus/ A tsA R+ya rin chen mchog gis skad gsar bcas kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad
412b6(rgyud): du/ sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dzo rA dza s+ya ta thA ga s+yA ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha s+ya kalpe ka de sha nA ma/ /bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
412b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal shAkya seng+ge la phyag 'tshal/
413a1(rgyud): @#/ /lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha thams cad kyi mchog dga' ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ nor bu dang /
413a2(rgyud): gser gyi shing lo ma dang / yal ga dang / lcug mar bcas pa'i sdong po dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / me tog ka ma la dang / me tog ut+pal dang / me tog
413a3(rgyud): ka r+Ni kA dang / me tog bak+ku la dang / me tog ti la ka dang / me tog a sho ka dang / me tog man+dA ra ba dang / me tog man+dA ra ba chen po la sogs pa me tog rnam pa sna
413a4(rgyud): tshogs pas nye bar mdzes pa/ /dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis yang dag par brgyan pa/ /rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs skad
413a5(rgyud): snyan pa 'byin pa/ rnga dang / rnga mu kund dang / gling bu dang / rnga b+hi ri la sogs pa'i sga sgrogs pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dang / lha'i bu rnam pa sna tshogs
413a6(rgyud): pa rnams rnam par rtse ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na'o/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha thams
413a7(rgyud): cad dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya stong rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
413b1(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag
413b2(rgyud): khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad rnams la/ 'di lta ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros spobs pa dang / blo gros mi g.yo ba dang / blo gros yangs pa dang /

413b4(rgyud): dang / blo gros ma lus pa dang / kun tu bzang po ste/ de dag la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha' yas shing mu med
413b5(rgyud): pa rnams kyis bsti steng du byas/ /bla mar bya/ mchod cing rjed par byas/ shin tu phul du byung bar byas te 'khor gyi tshogs chen po'i dbus su tshangs pa chen po pad+ma'i gdan

413b7(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'od zer 'phro ba dang / sdud pa du ma'i phreng ba rang gi mdzod spu nas phyung ste/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi

414a2(rgyud): dag pa so so so sor thob par byas shing dga' ba'i tshal yang kun tu snang bar byas te/ mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod nas lan brgya phrag

420a1(rgyud): @#/ /par bya ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas nas/ /mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis/ /khro bo'i yid kyis dgab bya ba/ /khro bo ti rin ti ri bcing / /de nas rdo rje phyed

420a5(rgyud): bgegs thams cad la bsnun no/ /de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs bsreg par bya ste/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT ces
420a6(rgyud): brjod cing rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba la mthe bo rdo rje bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i rjes la badzra ne trI ban+d+ha sarba bi g+han di
420a7(rgyud): na/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo gnyis brkyang ste mnyam la bzung ba ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag

420b2(rgyud): bcing bar bya ste/ oM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT ces pa dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor nas mgo bo'i steng du bzung ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan

421a7(rgyud): rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du rdzogs par bya ste/ /oM badzra bi dA badzra tsa kra hUM zhes bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo

422a1(rgyud): @#/ /ta thA ga ta badzra d+harma pra brta ya maM zhes bya ba 'dis so/ /de nas de bzhin du langs la rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste/ snying gar byas la byang phyogs su
422a2(rgyud): spyi bo sa la reg cing phyag bya ste/ oM sarba bit+pU dza karma Ne at+mA naM ni R+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karma ku ru mAM zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs

423a1(rgyud): @#/ /hUM zhes pa'o/ /oM bid+d+hA s+ya lA s+ya ra ti krI TA sau khya a nut+ta ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa dang / oM sarba bid a nut+ta ra bo d+hi a lang+kA
423a2(rgyud): ra was+t+ra pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes pa'o/ /de nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rjes su dran par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

423a5(rgyud): yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems

423b1(rgyud): hA badzra ud b+ha wa dA na pA ra mi tA pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod de/ sems can tham cad mi dge ba'i lus dang /

426a3(rgyud): kyis mchod par lhag par mos te/ nye bar spyod pa lnga la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /yang dag par mchod nas ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan bsngags par byed

426a6(rgyud): la/ oM tiSh+Tha badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba shA shwa to me b+ha ba hr-i da yaM me a d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsha hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ /zhes bya'o/ /oM badzra muSh+Ti baM/ sems ma rdo rje bcings nas/

426b1(rgyud): slong bar byed pa'i mchog / ces pa'o/ /oM sarba bid sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje bsdams pa brtan byas nas/
426b2(rgyud): gung mo dag ni kha sbyar te/ /mtha' ma bzhi po kha sprad pa/ /myur du sdig pa dral bar 'gyur/ /oM sarba bid trA Ta hUM/ sems ma rdo rje bcings la/ oM sarba bid sarba a ba ra na bi sho
426b3(rgyud): d+ha ni mu ne hUM phaT/ 'od pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas de'i rjes la rnal 'byor bas snying gis dbus su yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i steng du/ oM mu ne mu ne ma
426b4(rgyud): hA mu na ye swAhA/ oM na maHsarba durga ti sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma a ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ de dag gis ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong
426b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas la/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor

427a1(rgyud): @#/ /las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ de nas rdo rje rgyal las kyi phyag rgyas
427a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sprul te/ oM sarba bid badzra tsakra hUM zhes pas so/ /sems ma rdo rje bcings nas de nyid kyi sor mo dbus ma gnyis kyis phreng ba thogs la sa ma ya hUM zhes
427a3(rgyud): pa 'dis yid kyi 'jug go / phreng ba de yang rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste/ pra tI ts+tsha badzra hoHzhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas rang gi mgo bor bcings te/ oM pra ti gr-ih+na s+t+waM i maM
427a4(rgyud): satwa ma hA ba la zhes pa 'dis so/ /gdong pa bcings la/ yang 'dis dgrol lo/ /oM/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de/ khyed kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson/ /rdo rje'i mig
427a5(rgyud): ni bla na med/ /thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur/ /zhes pa dang / he badzra pA sh+ya zhes pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen por ji srid bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de

427b1(rgyud): Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bid+yA badzra badzri Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bid+yA rat+na badzri ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bid+yA d+harma badzri Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba bid+yA karma badzri Ni hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa

427b6(rgyud): sngags so/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mthe bong dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung gyen du bsgreng ste kha sbyar nas mdzub mo dang ming med sems dpa'i skyil krung byas pa

432b6(rgyud): de nas dpal shAkya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ /de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags thams cad kyis bskyed par bya ste/ rdo rje gtsug tor
432b7(rgyud): nas brtsams te ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga
433a1(rgyud): @#/ /tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ ta d+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ne sho d+ha ne/ sarba pA paM sho d+ha ne shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ sngags 'di
433a2(rgyud): nges par brjod do/ /de nas de'i phyir go rims ni/ /rims bzhin yang dag rab bshad bya/ /oM badzra hUM phaT/ kha yi sgo nas phung nas ni/ /kun nas 'od zer lnga bar 'thon/ /kun
433a3(rgyud): nas phyogs bcur snang byas nas/ /sems can rnams ni thams cad ni/ /sdug bsngal rnams ni thar mdzad de/ /'od zer rnams ni slar logs nas/ /thugs kar zhugs
433a4(rgyud): te de rjes la/ /sngags dang 'od zer gnyis 'dres pa/ /las byung sku ni yongs rdzogs pa/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs/ /shar phyogs pad+ma zla bar bzhugs/ /

433a6(rgyud): rgya yang dag bzhugs/ /de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu ni/ /sngar bshad pa yi thams cad kyang / /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sngags dang 'od zer legs 'dres dang / /sku ni
433a7(rgyud): bskyed cing yang dag rdzogs/ /ji bzhin gnas su bzhugs par bya/ /oM rat+no ta ta ma trAM zhes bya bas dbyung bar bya'o/ /lho yi rtsibs su yang dag bzhugs/ /pad+ma zla ba'i
433b1(rgyud): dbus su ni/ /rin chen gtsug tor de bzhin gshegs/ /thugs ka nas ni nges bton nas/ /sangs rgyas mtshan gyis yang dag brgyan/ /sku mdog sngo zhing shin tu mdzes/ /'di yi
433b2(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog sbyin nyid/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i/ /sems can kun la dbang bskur mdzod/ /sngar bzhin spro dang bsdu ba dang / /gzugs bskyed pa yi rim pa yin/ /

440a3(rgyud): pa/ /rta babs bzhi pa shin tu mdzes/ /dpa' bo lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams bzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs
440a4(rgyud): bri bar bya/ /de nas me tog phreng ba dang / /dri sogs rang gi lus la byug /slob dpon 'jug par bya ba ste/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHb+ha ga wa na/ e h+ye hi mahA kA ru Ni kA dr-i sh+ya hoH/ zhes
440a5(rgyud): bya bas lha thams cad spyan drang ngo / /de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par grol te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang sa gong ma rnams
440a6(rgyud): su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur ro/ /snga ma
440a7(rgyud): bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba byas pas rims thams cad dang / gdon la sogs pa rnams las
440b1(rgyud): thar par 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad byed do/ /brtag pa gzhan gyis cho gas kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
440b2(rgyud): dang / /srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi dbang du gyur pa rnams 'gro ba thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan la sogs pa mngon par bris pa las bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang
440b3(rgyud): bskur ba rnams kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas seng+ge'i lta stangs kyis zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal
440b4(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag rgya mchog gi mtshan nyid dam pa bshad par bya ste/ thugs rje'i gdung ba'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyal ba thams
440b5(rgyud): cad kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas dpral bar thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor
440b6(rgyud): rig pas mgrin pa'i phyogs su thal mo kha phye ba pad+ma'i rnam par bya'o/ /thugs kar rdo rje thal mo byas sor mo dbus ma rtse mo sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi
440b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa gan rkyal du bang par bzhag la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzlog ste bzhag la mthe bong gnyis sbyar te zhi ba'i lta bas blta'o/ /'di ni de bzhin
441a1(rgyud): @#/ /gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid yongs su bskor te phan tshun sbyar te mthe'u chung dag dang / mthe bong
441a2(rgyud): dag lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par bcings la snying gar gzhag go / 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo gang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung dang / mthe bong sbyar te
441a3(rgyud): bzung zhing lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba'o/ /'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi pad+ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams par brtan par byas nas/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje rtse mor byas
441a4(rgyud): la/ mthe'u chung dang mthe bo ra ba tu brkyang ba'o/ /'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyis mthe'u chung dang / mthe bong gnyis de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo dang / /ming
441a5(rgyud): med pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par bya'o/ /'di ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi mdzub mo dang / /ming med dag rin po che'i rnam
441a6(rgyud): par bya'o/ /'di ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung dang / mthe bong so so so sor sbyar nas lhag ma rnams rab tu brkyang ba ni mtshon cha thams cad kyi phyag
441a7(rgyud): rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa de kho na bzhin du rab tu 'jug pa ni las thams cad pha'i phyag rgya'o/ /snyim pa gyen du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid 'og nas
441b1(rgyud): 'thor ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams la 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid rab
441b2(rgyud): tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid gung mo rnams nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bsnyams te tshigs
441b3(rgyud): bar ma bcag nas sor mo thams cad brkyang ba 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag
441b4(rgyud): rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi snying pa 'od zer gyi rnam pa ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid spyi bo'i gnas su bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe
441b5(rgyud): bong dang / mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings la bskor ba 'di ni 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin
441b6(rgyud): po che ltar bya ste/ lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas
441b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin dang / g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams pa
442a1(rgyud): @#/ /las mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mda' 'dra bar
442a2(rgyud): byas pa ni mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyag rgya dang mthe bong rtse sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o/ /de nyid kyi tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i 'o/ /de nyid sor mo rnams
442a3(rgyud): 'od zer 'dra ba ni gzi brjid kyi 'o/ /de nyid spyi bor bzhag pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i 'o/ /de nyid pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i
442a4(rgyud): 'o/ /de nyid gung mo dang mdzub mo bkug pa ni ral gri'i 'o/ /de nyid gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i 'o/ /de nyid pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o/ /de nyid rtse mo yid tsam
442a5(rgyud): bskyed pa ni sna tshogs kyi'o/ /de nyid shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o/ /de nyid rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /de nyid dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o/ /de
442a6(rgyud): nyid mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o/ /de nyid rtse mo sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o/ /de nyid phan tshun mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o/ /de nyid bskyod pa ni dril bu'i 'o/ /de
442a7(rgyud): nas tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshe thung ba dang / skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang /
442b1(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ /bdag la gsang ba'i bdag pos bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
442b2(rgyud): la sogs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams/ gang khyod la 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang
442b3(rgyud): dag par skyes pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par sgrubs shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thams cad tshe dpag tu med par khyab par 'byung ba'i
442b4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
442b5(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / /oM pu N+ye pu N+ye mahA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro b+ha tsi te ka ri Ni swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs
442b6(rgyud): 'di bshad pa tsam gyis ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / byol song gi 'gro ba rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag
442b7(rgyud): nyid kyis rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas shing snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
443a1(rgyud): @#/ /snying po'i chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
443a2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do/ /oM a mi te a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM
443a3(rgyud): b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krA n+te/ a mi ta bi kran+ta gA mi ni sarba ka rma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rang
443a4(rgyud): tu zhi'o/ /de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa thams cad rnams par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin
443a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snyong po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsam ni ro tsa ni/ /tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa
443a6(rgyud): ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba ka rma pa raM pa rA Ni me sarba satwa na ny+tsa swA hA/ 'di bshad pa tsam gyis thams cad de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /de nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das
443a7(rgyud): kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa 'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam
443b1(rgyud): par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM rat+ne rat+ne/ mahA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Ne/ rat+na mA lA bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya/ sarba bla paM hUM
443b2(rgyud): tra Ta/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom zhing rnam par bcom par gyur to/ /de nas lar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms par sgrib
443b3(rgyud): p a thams cad rnams par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung
443b4(rgyud): ngo / /oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/
443b5(rgyud): bskyod rab tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod/ /bsgul/ rab tu bsgul/ /yang dag par rab tu bsgul zhing ngo mtshar che zhing rmad du byung ba du ma 'jig rten du snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
443b6(rgyud): de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /logs bzhi dang yang yang dag ldan/ /rta babs bzhi dang kun tu ldan/ /kha khyer dang ni sgo khyud bcas/ /de yi dbus su
443b7(rgyud): 'khor lo yi/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bri par bya/ /rtsi bas bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /de yi dbus su mgon po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen
444a1(rgyud): @#/ /po/ /phyag na rdo rje dril bu can/ /zla ba rgyas zhal 'dzum pa bri/ /shar gyi rtsibs kyi dbus kyi char/ /gtso bo mi bskyod pa nyid bri/ /lhor ni rin chen bri bya zhing / /
444a2(rgyud): nub tu chu skyes pad+ma ste/ /byang du gdon mi za zhes grags/ /dpa' bo stobs chen bri par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha lugs mdzad/ /zla
444a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa rnams/ /phyag na mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs pa bri/ /grwa yi cha rnams
444a4(rgyud): thams cad du/ /de bzhin bdug pa la sogs bri/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang khro bo dang / mchog tu khro bar gzhol ba bri/ /de nas rnal 'byor rang nyid zhugs/ /sngags kyi lha
444a5(rgyud): rnams spyan drangs te/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHb+ha ga bAn/ /badzra e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /de nas mgon po byon pa la/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /'chi bdag nyid dang
444a6(rgyud): sprul 'jigs pa'i/ /'chi bdag gzhon phyir gzhugs par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings/ /lag na rin chen thogs pa gzhug /yang na me
444a7(rgyud): tog phreng ldan pa/ /de dag dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ /oM pra tI ts+tsha badzra hUM/ de nas dam tshig sbyin te/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol
444b1(rgyud): par bya'o/ /oM badzra hA s+ya ud g+ha TA ya hUM/ de nas 'dis dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /oM badzra dri sh+ya hoH/ de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te/ /oM badzra a b+hi ShaM ny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha
444b2(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur sbyin te/ oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM oM bud+d+ha kal sha a
444b3(rgyud): b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM rat+na mA la a b+hi
444b4(rgyud): Shiny+tsa trAM trAM trAM trAM trAM/ oM badzra paT+Ta a ba laM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM badzra mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa
444b5(rgyud): hrIHoM ka rma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM badra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hUM trAM hrIHaHoM badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aH/ oM badzra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM bruM/ oM badzra tsakra a d+hi pa d+hi s+t+waM/
444b6(rgyud): a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM oM/ trAM trAM trAM/ hrIHhrIHhrAM/ aHaHaH/ oM badzra d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ta thA ga ta d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/
444b7(rgyud): oM pad+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ra t+ni yu h+yi a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM
445a1(rgyud): @#/ /pad+ma gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ oM pradz+nya pA ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin no/ /oM b+h+ruM badzra A yu
445a2(rgyud): She hUM aH/ 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis
445a3(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bris la
445a4(rgyud): mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas so/ /de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la g.yon pa'i
445a5(rgyud): rdo rjes mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas dri mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri ngad kyang ldang ngo / /dro ba dang / du ba dang / me yang 'byung
445a6(rgyud): ngo / /'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am/ mar gsar pa'am/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag
445a7(rgyud): gam/ klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam/ zos na mtshan ma ji
445b1(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang / nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur ro/ /tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do/ /mtshan ma ma
445b2(rgyud): byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing / skra dkar dang / gnyer ma med pa dang / lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa
445b3(rgyud): tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag
445b4(rgyud): btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang ra nga gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/
445b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang par zhu/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar zhu/ /rgyal po chen po dag legs so/ /legs so/ /shod cig dang / ngas rjes su yi rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab
445b6(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ngal gsos pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ste byin gyis brlab bas rang gi snying po rang gi snying gnas phyung la/
445b7(rgyud): om bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis de khon bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM d+hi/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying
446a1(rgyud): @#/ /po bshad pa/ oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru
446a2(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su mgon po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri/ /de yi g.yon pa'i logs su ni/ /ngal gso dge pa lag pa na/ /
446a3(rgyud): be con dang ni ne 'u le/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgan/ /sbom zhing seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog gzi brjid ldan pa bri/ /khas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin chen tshogs
446a4(rgyud): char 'bab pa bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni/ /pe wang sgrogs par yang dag brtson/ /rol cing kha dog ljang gu nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /g.yas su
446a5(rgyud): dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /ral gri phyag na bsnams pa bri/ /nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang / /rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis yongs su bskor/ /
446a6(rgyud): mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug /'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'i/ /
446a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing / /de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo / /spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil chi ga bzhin/ /de nas slob ma rgyal rigs
446b1(rgyud): sam/ /rje rigs bram ze la sogs kyang / /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhug /oM badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de
446b2(rgyud): nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pra ta'i ts+tsha d+haM ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de/ /'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de nas grwa gnas
446b3(rgyud): pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te/ /lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'o/ /phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya/ /de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang
446b4(rgyud): bskur bas/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur/ /dzam+bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi pa yi bdag po mchog/ lan bzhi dbang ni bskur
446b5(rgyud): ba dang / /lan bzhir rab tu zhugs na ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /rang gi bu bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang / /'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa
446b6(rgyud): dang / /yul 'khor pho brang bcas pa yi/ /rgyal pos rtag tu bskyang bgyi ste/ /de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang / /de yi pha rol sde dang nad/ /'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang / yams dang
446b7(rgyud): nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi/ /ngal gso pos ni rgyas par bgyis/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid/ /phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms/ /
447a1(rgyud): @#/ /mig mi bzang gis bde bar byed/ /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de yi ni/ /re ba kun dang bsam pa kun/ /bgyi ste gal te ma nges na/ /
447a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bslus pa yin/ /de nas phyogs skyong bcus bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang sems can thams
447a3(rgyud): cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rab tu dbul lo/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so/ /legs so/ /de legs pa smros shig/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po
447a4(rgyud): dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM iM oM a/ oM ya/ oM ri/ oM baM/ oM yaM/ oM yaM/ oM ba'/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad
447a5(rgyud): de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs kyi char/ /gzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis/ /nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs/ /sgo skyong
447a6(rgyud): rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas de kun sbyan drangs la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang / /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyags skyong la
447a7(rgyud): sogs sngags bzlas pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod pa yis/ /sgrub phyir snying po'i sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams//
447b1(rgyud): brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang su zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dpang bskur bas dkyil
447b2(rgyud): 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ /rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kun nas bsrung ba
447b3(rgyud): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o/ /dus dang / dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams
447b4(rgyud): bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /
447b5(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden bral gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rgyal po chen po de dang /
447b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po'i bu dang / bram ze'am/ rje rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / yi dwags dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa
447b7(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
448a1(rgyud): @#/ /ldan 'das/ bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cad kun nas so sor bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /'bru
448a2(rgyud): rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ /klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /dug dang / thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /mi tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongs
448a3(rgyud): su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

449b2(rgyud): gyis brlab tu gsol/ /legs so/ legs so/ /ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig/ de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom
449b3(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ oM A/ oM so/ oM aM/ oM bu/ oM pri/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag

449b5(rgyud): bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya/ /yi gnas su mig dmar nyid/ /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid/ /srin
449b6(rgyud): po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje

450a1(rgyud): @#/ /nas gza' brgyad sngags ni sngags pa yis/ bum pa brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ de nas rdo rje phyag rgyas dbang bskur re/ de nas
450a2(rgyud): gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das

450b1(rgyud): ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams 'bul lo// //

450b5(rgyud): de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang / /nor rgyas bu dang dud skyong dang / /pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du/ /mdor na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri/ /
450b6(rgyud): sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yi/ /mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri/ /bum pa brgyad rnams gzhag bya ste/ /gtor ma lha bshos mdzes pa dang / /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir
450b7(rgyud): bcas/ /btsos pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang ngo / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni/ /sbrul mgo sbrul mgo can rnams dgug/ phud ces bya ba lhan cig ste/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod
451a1(rgyud): @#/ /do/ /de nas rgyal po'am rgyal rigs ni/ /de dag thams cad bcug nas su/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phung ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /
451a2(rgyud): de nas ming tsam bzung bas kyang / /klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ /spyan sngar thal mo sbyar
451a3(rgyud): 'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir
451a4(rgyud): zhugs pa de dag bslus par gyur na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la bslus par gyur cig / de'i tshe bdag bye tshan gyis sregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag
451a5(rgyud): cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig / rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba par bgyi'o/ /gzi byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson

451a7(rgyud): kyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed par bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba'i bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab

451b2(rgyud): de nas dug gis zin pa la/ /phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs/ /bsams nas de la phud yig bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud
451b3(rgyud): kyi rlung gis pags pa sha / rus gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug /mtha' dag drangs te gso bar bya/ /de nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur gyis kyang
451b4(rgyud): kun sel na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ /de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i ma mo chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag

452a6(rgyud): khrag gis gang bas mchod nas su/ /sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang / /mgo thod mgo yi dum pu dang / /khrag gam chang bkang bum

453a7(rgyud): lo can/ /g.yas na dbang po rang nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams/ /chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /bum pa

453b2(rgyud): spyan drang zhing / /dzaHhUM baM hos lha thams cad/ /pho brang dam par 'jug par mdzod/ /de nas de rnams gshegs bltas nas/ /dga' ba chen po mchod par bya/ /de

467b5(rgyud): can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi / bcom ldan
467b6(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
467b7(rgyud): rnams las tshegs med par grol bar 'gyur ba de nyid de bzhin du nyon cig / de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi/ /bum pa rnams ni snga ma
468a1(rgyud): @#/ /bzhin/ /dbang bskur ba ni brtag par bya/ /de nas sngon gyi sdig byang zhing / /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni/ /kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur/ /
468a2(rgyud): sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid che/ /de yang gnas gtsang lhar skyes nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas chos pa gro thos/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas/ /rim gyis byang chub mngon
468a3(rgyud): sum byed/ /de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming / /gur gum gyis ni bris nas su/ /ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las/ /sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir/ /sngags pa
468a4(rgyud): gzhan la phan brtson zhing / /brtse bas mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang skur te/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags
468a5(rgyud): nas su/ /mchod rten dbus su bzhag par bya/ /rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni/ /snying ga de yi phyogs bris nas/ /lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed de/ /khyim du yang ni gzhag
468a6(rgyud): par bya/ /de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags/ /gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni/ /'bum ni yongs su rdzogs par du/ /mchod rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig chen sdig ni
468a7(rgyud): zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya/ /de ltar byas na de nges par/ /dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin yi dwags byol song las/ /grol te lha rigs
468b1(rgyud): rnams su skyes/ /de yi ming dang spel nas ni/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas/ /gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshad/ /byed ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya/ /lha'i rigs rnams
468b2(rgyud): su skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi ming nas spel ba yi/ /mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du/ /spyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni/ /chen po'i sdig pa
468b3(rgyud): las grol 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi/ /gnas su yang dag skye par 'gyur/ /yungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras/ /ra yi 'o ma yang dag ldan/ /de bskus yam
468b4(rgyud): shing de srid du/ /cho ga ji bzhin sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni nges par yang / /lha rigs rnams su skyes pa yi/ /mtshan mnye bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mchog skyes
468b5(rgyud): dang / /yang na thab khung nang du ni/ /dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang / /gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med/ /'phro ba bsdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang / /glog bzhin dri ma med 'od
468b6(rgyud): brtan/ /me rtags 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na me lha bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te/ /zla ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o/ /
468b7(rgyud): mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la/ /de nas dmyal sogs rnams grol zhing / /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin thab khung
469a1(rgyud): @#/ /brko/ /rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin rang gi phyogs su bri/ /ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /
469a2(rgyud): 'jig rten la sogs phyin nas bri/ /de nas bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor ma brgyan rnams bkang ba ni/ /brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu gzhag /bza' dang bca' ba zhal bras dang / /me tog phreng sogs
469a3(rgyud): de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyi legs par brgyan/ /de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni/ /mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga shes
469a4(rgyud): par de bris nas/ /lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te/ /sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis/ /arga la sogs phul nas ni/ /mdor bsdus mchod par byas nas su/ /
469a5(rgyud): lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ /ga bur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /dri yi chus ni legs
469a6(rgyud): bkang ste/ /'bras chen spos dang la du dang / /sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs su bzlas/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gi sngags kyis
469a7(rgyud): btab pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za sogs su gnas pa yi/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas su/ /chu mchog
469b1(rgyud): gis ni bkrus nas ni/ /sngags bzlas dri yis byug par bya/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng ba la sogs mchog /
469b2(rgyud): gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du/ /sngags bris na ni gdags par bya/ /snying ga mgrin pa kha phyogs su/ /sarba bid+yAs byin gyis brlab sa/ /dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /
469b3(rgyud): mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis/ /rna ba dku dang pus mo bol/ /sna yi rtse mo long bu dang / /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni/ /de ltar
469b4(rgyud): gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge / mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag /de dag ngan song yongs sbyangs phyir/ /stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag /de nas sngags pas sngags kyis
469b5(rgyud): ni/ /mngon par bsngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs/ /de nas byin za yang dag rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ /zla ba kund bzhin du zhi ba'i
469b6(rgyud): yid/ /dpag med kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag /de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya/ /de nas dang po de yi sbyin sreg ni/ /rdzogs par byas zhing 'bar ba nyid
469b7(rgyud): la ni/ /yongs su brtags pa nas ni rgyal ba las/ /sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang / /bcas pa'i brgya ni yongs su brtag par bya/ /de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi
470a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyal po yang / /bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag /de nas zhal ras dkar po sbyar drangs la/ /yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum
470a2(rgyud): mchod/ /phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi dbu rgyan can/ /bsam par bya zhing yang ni
470a3(rgyud): bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po brgya phyag stong ngam ni/ /ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni/ /de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya/ /de
470a4(rgyud): nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dri chu dang / /ba yi rnam lnga pa bcas la/ /sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te/
470a5(rgyud): gong bu byas nas ga bur drir/ /sa dang legs par bsres byas la/ /sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing / /lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am/ /yang na
470a6(rgyud): lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la/ /'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na sku gzugs
470a7(rgyud): zhal 'dzum mam/ /de spos ngad ldan 'od snang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang / /dung dang rnga dang
470b1(rgyud): gling bu dang / /pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mtshan ma de/ /sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba/ /de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas/ /ji srid mtshan ma byung bar
470b2(rgyud): du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par byas/ /de mthar cho ga shes par yis/ /mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas/ /de nas de yi
470b3(rgyud): sdig pa ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong / /lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang ni/ /de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su/ /rnam par mi rtog sems
470b4(rgyud): kyis ni/ /byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /gal te de yang med gyur na/ /de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyis phya/ /de yi ming tsam bris nas su/ /
470b5(rgyud): mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang / /sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas su/ /sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na/ /gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye/ /thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /mi
470b6(rgyud): spel sngags ni mngon btab nas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor/ /de ltar byas na sdig pa can/ /yin yang ngan song rnams la ni/ /rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang / /dge
470b7(rgyud): ba mchog gi sa bon ni/ /bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid/ /'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grub bsam gtan shes rab rgyu/ /
471a1(rgyud): @#/ /rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan/ /'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni/ /'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos/ /'di la the tshom med pa yin/ /gang yang
471a2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pa'i bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i
471a3(rgyud): rang bzhin mi shes pa pha dang / ma la sems mi brtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang /
471a4(rgyud): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab dang thabs
471a5(rgyud): med na grol ba med do/ /zhes pa bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes
471a6(rgyud): par mdzad do/ /mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do/ /brgya byin/ gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal ba bzhin du byas so/ /'bras bu de bzhin
471a7(rgyud): du thob par gyur to/ /dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i dang po dang / gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang
471b1(rgyud): mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ oM pa shu pa ti nI la kaN+tha u
471b2(rgyud): ma prI ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing
471b3(rgyud): ming med dang / mdzub mo yang rdo rje'i rnam par chung zad mdud par bya'o/ /'di ni phyags bdag gi phyag rgya'o/ /khyab 'jug khyung la zhon pa/ mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa
471b4(rgyud): dag na dbyug to dang / rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yon pa dag na dung dang / 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu rma
471b5(rgyud): bya la zhon pa/ zhal drug pa/ dmar po g.yas pa dag na shak+ti dang / rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bur shes par bya'o/ /
471b6(rgyud): mi smra ba rdo rje dang pa la zhon pa/ gser mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dbyug tho dang / sbyi blugs
471b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha glang po che dkar po la zhon pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yas pas 'jig rten las
472a1(rgyud): @#/ /'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khyil ba khro bo yang shing rta la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po g.yas pa
472a2(rgyud): dang / g.yon pa na pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang / rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do/ /rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po dang pa la zhon pa/ g.yas
472a3(rgyud): pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma dang / zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa/ mdog sngon po phyag g.yas na rdo rje
472a4(rgyud): 'dzin cing / g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas
472a5(rgyud): na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje ske rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che la zhon pa can/ phyag
472a6(rgyud): g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa mdog dkar po'o/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu 'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis
472a7(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ldang gu/ /bya ku li ka'i shing rta la zhon pa/ /phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /
472b1(rgyud): rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta bu'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis shak+ti 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ne tso'i shing rta la zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje
472b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhen/ mdog dmar po'o/ /rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi
472b3(rgyud): bdag po sbal pa la zhon pa mdog dkar po'o/ /phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnam rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo
472b4(rgyud): me tog gi shing rta'i khang bu la zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste
472b5(rgyud): 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog sngon po'i ri dwags la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa/ /gyon pas dar 'dzin
472b6(rgyud): pa'o/ /mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o/ /rdo rje me'i pho nya mo ra stes la zhon pa mdog dmar po/ g.yen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo
472b7(rgyud): rje dang / go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje me lta bu'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed po nya sngon po ro langs la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pas
473a1(rgyud): @#/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon pas
473a2(rgyud): zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa sngon po/ phag gi gdong pa can g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje nag po
473a3(rgyud): bra na mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ mdog nag mo'o/ /rdo rje log 'dren phran bra ba byi ba la zhon pa mdog dkar
473a4(rgyud): po/ glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o/ /rdo rje srul
473a5(rgyud): mo bran mo mdog sngon mo/ g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba la zhon pa'o/ /klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa dang gdengs ka brgyad pa/ mdog dkar po g.yas pas
473a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa klu'i zhags pa'i 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje chu srin ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa/ mdog dkar po gdengs ka brgyad ma/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo
473a7(rgyud): rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o/ /'jigs mdog ma ljang gu g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri be Ta ka 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mo mdog dkar ser g.yas
473b1(rgyud): pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pas pi wang dang g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o/ /bgrod ka mdog ljang gu seng+ge la zhon pa/
473b2(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi
473b3(rgyud): dang / gang phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas
473b4(rgyud): pa'o/ /de nas thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti rin ti ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go /yi ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rjes rnam par snang
473b5(rgyud): mdzad la skor ba bdun dang / dung dang / dril bu'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang / chad pa'i nyes bzhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom
473b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hUM bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo / /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang / /gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang / /mkhas
473b7(rgyud): pas lhag pa rnam spang phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu kun tog bya/ /'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo
474a1(rgyud): @#/ /rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams/ /yid kyi dbye bar bya ba nyid/ /oM badzro t+g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha hUM zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya yang 'di yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs
474a2(rgyud): te/ /mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag gzung / /legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ /sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas
474a3(rgyud): la rin po che bdun las byas pa'am/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa/ nag po la sogs pa med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin
474a4(rgyud): po che dang / sman thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa/ yal 'dab dang bcas pa mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la bsrung ba byas
474a5(rgyud): pa/ phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa/ me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ khro bo ti rin ti ris yongs
474a6(rgyud): su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM badzra u da ka hUM zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa
474a7(rgyud): byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhag go /'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hUM bzhi pa
474b1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag go / de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang ngo / /byu ru de bzhin sa le

481a1(rgyud): @#/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad po rnams kyis khor bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thams

481a4(rgyud): grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dbul te/ /bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ /'bral yos

481a6(rgyud): khaM zhes pa la sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te/ gsum gsum gter bar byas te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / mchod
481a7(rgyud): yon rnams kyang thog ma dang / tha mar dbul bar bya'o/ /de la dang po re zhig maN+Dal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas sbyan drang ngo / /de nas dam tshig bstan

481b2(rgyud): shar phyogs su kha ba ltas te g.yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje bstan la/ g.yas pas dku'i phyogs su bzhag ste/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo

481b7(rgyud): su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i sngags ni ag+na ye hi e h+ya hi ka bi la dz+wa la dz+wa la da ha da ha shi khi to li bi rU pak+Sha swA hA/ gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas

482a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o/ /srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du gshibs te bsgreng ba snying gar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i

482b4(rgyud): bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba

482b7(rgyud): phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas gzhag pa ni ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba

484a1(rgyud): @#/ /dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim gnas dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa
484a2(rgyud): dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma can dang khron par gnas/ /
