487b5(rgyud): 'di skad brjod par bya/ /slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson/ /gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba/ /de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang
487b6(rgyud): chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /zhes pa nas/ sems can mya ngan las 'das la dgod/ /ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ /gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam
487b7(rgyud): sbyin par bya zhing deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba yo ga tsit+taM ud pA da yA mi zhes pa 'dis/ byang chub
488a1(rgyud): @#/ /sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /de yi snying gar snyed pas ni/ /rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya/ /s+ya ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hoHbadzra
488a2(rgyud): sid+d+hi ya thA su khaM zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang / me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing / gdong dri zhim
488a3(rgyud): pos byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa'i chus dbang skur la/ oM gr-ih+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM zhes pa 'dis khro bo ti rin ti ri rang nyid bcings
488a4(rgyud): la slob ma 'ching du gzhug go / rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas la/ /mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis/ /yid kyi khro bas dga' bya bas/ /khro bo ti rin ti ri dran/ /de nas de nyid
488a5(rgyud): mthe bong dag gi me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ badzra sa ma yaM pra ti sh+yA mi zhes pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgug
488a6(rgyud): cing lhor zhags pas gzhug go / nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab bo/ /yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la 'di skad ces
488a7(rgyud): brjod do/ /deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi de nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yi/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs
488b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /khyod dam
488b2(rgyud): tshig nyams par 'gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid khro bo ti rin ti ri kha gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras
488b3(rgyud): te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te/ gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo 'gems par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po
488b4(rgyud): lan gcig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go / de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyed kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod/ /gal
488b5(rgyud): te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /badzra ung+ka ThaHzhes bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces smra'o/ /deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ ngas
488b6(rgyud): 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so/ /khyod kyi nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes pa'o/ /
488b7(rgyud): de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo/ /de nas slob ma'i snying ga dang / mdzod spu dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i
489a1(rgyud): @#/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ hUM trAM hrIHaHzhes pa 'di dag gi go rims bzhin
489a2(rgyud): du'o/ /sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying gar phye la rang gi snying ga'i yi ge yaM las yi ge phyung la/ slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su slos bcug la lus thams
489a3(rgyud): cad gang bar bsam mo/ /'di skad ces brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab tu gsol zhes smros shig /de nas
489a4(rgyud): myur du rdo rje slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ri bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ /'di de dam tshig rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar grags/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /khyod
489a5(rgyud): la de nyid 'bab gyur cig / badzra A be sha AHzhes pa bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar
489a6(rgyud): brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing 'di dag brjod de/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ grih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa
489a7(rgyud): ya hUM/ na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra bi d+ya ra dza hUM phaT/ aHaHaHaHaHbcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu
489b1(rgyud): dang / lan brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje hUM gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog dmar po 'bar ba gang bzhin par bsam mo/ /slar yang
489b2(rgyud): gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa mnan la steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs
489b3(rgyud): su rnam par snang mdzad dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo hUM gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnan bzhin pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil
489b4(rgyud): 'khor dang hUM gi rnam pas brdeg bzhin pa dang / de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa'i mi bskyong ba la sogs pa'i rnams kyis hUM trAM hrIHaHzhes bya ba rang
489b5(rgyud): gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing de la dbab ste/ hUM badzra A be sha ya aHzhes rnam pa brgyar brjod par bya'o/ /gal te sdig
489b6(rgyud): pa mang ba nyid kyis 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe sdig pa bral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang yang du bral bar bya'o/ /yam shing 'jag ma rnams kyi me/ /rab 'bar rdo rje
489b7(rgyud): khro bo yi/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dbul ba yis/ /de yi sdig pa thams cad ni/ /til gyi sbyin sreg des nges bsreg /oM sarba pA pa da ha na badzrA ya swAhA zhes bya ba dang / lag pa
490a1(rgyud): @#/ /g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ yi ge hUM dbus su bsams te/ mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin sreg
490a2(rgyud): bya'o/ /de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis de'i lus la sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la/ /de nas yang rdo
490a3(rgyud): rje babs pa de kho na bzhin du bcings la dbab par bya ste/ nges par 'bebs par 'gyur/ de lta bus kyang gang la bab par ma gyur pa de la dbang bskur mi bya'o/ /babs na skad
490a4(rgyud): cig ma de nyid de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang dag par babs par shes nas yang oM badzra satwa su saM gra hA ta zhes pa la sogs
490a5(rgyud): pa'i glu brjod la/ khro bo'i khu tshur dang de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o/ /de phebs na rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe slob
490a6(rgyud): dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo / /de'i tshe rdo rje chos khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing
490a7(rgyud): ngo / /de lta bus nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams te bru hi badzra zhes pa brjod do/ /de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ de nas phreng ba
490b1(rgyud): de dkyil 'khor chen por dor te/ pra tIts+tsha hoHzhes bya'o/ /de nas gang du babs pa de 'dis 'grub bo/ /de nas oM pra ti gr-i h+Na twaM i maM satwa mahA ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo
490b2(rgyud): bor bcing ngo / /de nas/ oM de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang / /khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med/ /thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur/ /he badzra pA sh+ya zhes pa
490b3(rgyud): 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te/ ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstan no/ /de nas tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa
490b4(rgyud): la sogs pas slob ma'i snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol lo/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du 'am/ phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgo la mngon par phyogs pa legs
490b5(rgyud): par bris la slob ma dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste dbang bskur ro/ /dri dang me tog la sogs

490b7(rgyud): cad rnams kyis mngon par dga' bas dang po re zhig chu'i dbang skur ba dang / cod pan dang / dar dpyangs dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gis dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang
491a1(rgyud): @#/ /bskur la yang me tog la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod do/ /slob ma rnams kyi rdo rje thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon la rab
491a2(rgyud): tu btud la yon gyi mchog phul la me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba yang gzung bar bya'o/ /slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba ni dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas de kho na bzhin du ji ltar
491a3(rgyud): nges par bstan pa'i gnas su bzhag la/ de tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de'i lus la dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad la sogs pa bkod de slar yang oM badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba dzaHhUM
491a4(rgyud): baM hoHhUM phaT zhes pa 'di rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad dam steng yongs su bzlas pa byas la/ de nas/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i
491a5(rgyud): bum pa nas chu blangs la chu'i dbang bskur ba byin no/ /'di yang brjod de/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i
491a6(rgyud): chus 'grub bo/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang / /dkyil 'khor can min na mi smra/ /skye bo 'dus pa gnas pa ni/ /rgod dang ma dang pa la min/ /de nas chog thams cad nyams su blangs la mtshan brgya
491a7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad pas legs par bstod de tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang bar byin nas gzangs bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad lung bstan no/ /de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba
491b1(rgyud): byung ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig ces bya'o/ /'di yi las kyi dngos grub ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang / /

491b3(rgyud): can nyid/ /rdo rje sems nyid snyed mi dka'/ /gang la dngos grub nges 'byung dang / /gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang / /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams dang yang / /'chi bdag dang ni bdud sde
491b4(rgyud): rnams/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs bstan bcos rno/ /dngos grub las 'joms de dag ni/ /bdag nyid chen po de la ni/ /mi 'byung skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis/ /nges par dngos
491b5(rgyud): grub myur rab 'byung / /lha rnams kyang ni cher gnyes shing / /skad cig gis kyang rab rnyed 'gyur/ /yams dang nyer 'tshe skyon la sogs/ /chos lci nges par ring du 'gyur/ /de yi yul du nad dang
491b6(rgyud): don/ /rims la sogs pa mi 'byur zhing / /mu ge ca co chen rnams dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur/ /lha dang klu rnams spro chen gyis/ /bde bar yang ni skyong bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po
491b7(rgyud): chen po bzhi rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong brgyu skar bcas/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' la sogs/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis skyong / /de nas brgya byin la sogs lhas/ /yang dang yang du
492a1(rgyud): @#/ /phyag 'tshal nas/ /rin chen gdugs sogs mchog rnams ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te/ /phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la/ /dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod/ /
492a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje rdo rje rdo 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rdo rje
492a3(rgyud): yan lag rdo rje mchog / rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon cha cher/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ste rab 'bigs pa/ /rdo rje rnon po
492a4(rgyud): rnon po che/ /che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che/ /rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che/ /byang chub sangs rgyas rang 'byung ba/ /rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen che/ /rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje pad+ma rnam sbyong ba/ /rdo
492a5(rgyud): rje khro bo gtum po che/ /rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed srung ba che/ /rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed/ /rdo rje ro langs ro langs che/ /rdo rje srin po za ba po/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin
492a6(rgyud): gnod sbyin che/ /rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog /'jigs rung skrag byed ma rungs pa/ /drag po 'jigs byed rngam byed pa/ /bsgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste/ /rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa/ /rdo
492a7(rgyud): rje dga' ba dga' ba che/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang byed pa/ /rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che/ /'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /rdo rje drag po drag po che/ /'od mthug pa ni mthug pa che/ /nam mkha' dang ni
492b1(rgyud): mnyam pa yi/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog /rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho/ /rdo rje ye shes ye shes che/ /rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /ha la ha la
492b2(rgyud): nag po che/ /sgra chen rnam par sgreg pa po/ /rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che/ /snyigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po/ /dus kyi g.yo ba'i gcod pa'i mchog /zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phro ma/ /rdo rje me ste rab tu gtum/ /
492b3(rgyud): gtum pa'i rab snang 'dzoms pa po/ /nyi ma stong gi 'od zer zhal/ /spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po/ /khro bo du ma'i 'od 'phro ba/ /phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha brgya/ /du ma'i zhal te sku yang stong / /'khyil zhing sku
492b4(rgyud): yang 'khyil ba lags/ /thugs chos bdag nyid sku mi mnga'/ /rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs/ /ma rig 'joms pa tshangs pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad/ /sgyu ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can/ /mdung can
492b5(rgyud): rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog byed/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba/ /zhi zhing dul la dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rab rtogs mdzad/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku/ /rdo rje
492b6(rgyud): legs skyes rdo rje sems/ /kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba/ /mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa po/ /khams kun bdag nyid khyab pa bo/ /thams cad rdo rje'i bdag nyid gtsang / /gang gis 'di bris klog pa dang / /rtag
492b7(rgyud): tu don ni 'chang byed dam/ /dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung / /phyag na rdo rje mnyam par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i
493a1(rgyud): @#/ /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa phan pa dang / bde ba thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' bo de
493a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan
493a3(rgyud): po bla ma rje btsun chen po de ben+d+ra de ba'i zhabs dang / bla ma paN chen skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtam
493a4(rgyud): la phab pa/ / //spre'u lo dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thang po cher dbu btsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag
493a5(rgyud): bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'dren gyi lha'i gdings su tshar bar bgyis so/ / //dpal ldan rgyud rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi/ /brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas/ /chos rgyal sku drin paN chen
493a6(rgyud): sgra bsgyur mchog / skyes chen rnams kyis legs par dar bar mdzad/ /'di ni dpal ldan kun dga' snying po dang / /rje btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa yi/ /man ngag la brten rgya gar bal po na/ /yongs
493a7(rgyud): grags bla ma'i drin las kho bos bsgyur/ /sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsung bzhin du/ /gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams/ /bzod mdzad de dges 'gro ba kun/ /'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig/ //
